Brush with soy sauce mixture; broil 1 more minute more until eggplant is tender when it's pierced with a knife.
Sprinkle with scallions before serving.
98695d84fe.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the eggplant slices with 1 tablespoon of the olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
3. Spread the eggplant slices in a single layer on a baking sheet, and roast for about 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
4. In a small bowl, mix the remaining 3 tablespoons of olive oil, reduced sodium soy sauce, sugar, and mirin.
5. Remove the roasted eggplant slices from the oven and toss them in the sauce mixture.
6. Transfer the eggplant slices to a serving dish and garnish with minced scallions.

Enjoy your delicious Japanese Eggplant Teriyaki Style!

4782c93d83.gt:
In a large bowl, combine carrots, orange juice, raisins, ginger, salt and red pepper.
Toss to mix and cover.
Marinate in refrigerator at least 1 hour or up to 8.
To serve, halve avocados and remove pit.
Peel and slice into very thin slices.
Place a few avocado slices on each plate decoratively and top with carrot mixture.
4782c93d83.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the grated carrots, orange juice, and golden raisins.
2. Grate the ginger and add it to the bowl.
3. Add the minced ginger, salt, and crushed red pepper flakes to the bowl.
4. Scoop the avocado flesh into the bowl and mash it with a fork or a spoon.
5. Stir the ingredients together until well combined.
6. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.

[/INST]

This mouthwatering Israeli Carrot Salad dish is a delicious and healthy side dish that can be enjoyed at any meal. The combination of the sweet carrots, tangy orange juice, and spicy ginger creates a delightful balance of flavors. The golden raisins add a touch of sweetness and texture, while the avocado provides a creamy and rich element to the dish. This recipe is perfect for those who enjoy a refreshing and flavorful side dish that is easy to prepare.

8b231f2c0b.gt:
In a double boiler over medium heat, melt the butter and chocolate chips, whisking constantly until combined.
Whisk in the evaporated milk and powdered sugar and bring to a boil, stirring often, for 8 minutes.
Remove from heat and add vanilla.
Store in a glass container in the refrigerator.
Keeps for several weeks.
Makes approximately 3 cups.
8b231f2c0b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a medium saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat.
3. Add the chocolate chips and stir until they are melted and smooth.
4. Add the evaporated milk and stir until the mixture is well combined.
5. In a small bowl, mix the powdered sugar and vanilla.
6. Slowly pour the sugar mixture into the saucepan with the chocolate mixture, stirring constantly.
7. Cook the sauce over medium heat, stirring constantly, until it reaches the desired thickness.
8. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Pour the hot fudge sauce into a container and let it cool completely before using it.

This guide should help you create a delicious hot fudge sauce using the provided ingredients. The key to a successful recipe is to ensure that all ingredients are at room temperature and to stir the mixture continuously while cooking to prevent lumps from forming.

9f7b08be0e.gt:
Preheat oven to 300 F. Line a baking sheet with a Silpat or parchment paper and set aside.
In a large bowl, combine oats, macadamia nuts, flax seed, wheat germ and salt.
Set aside.
In a small saucepan, combine brown sugar, honey and oil.
Cook over medium heat 2-3 minutes until sugar is dissolved.
Pour over the oat mixture, tossing gently to coat.
Bake for 45 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes, making sure not to burn the nuts.
Remove from the oven and let it cool.
Keep it flat and allow it to cool completely stirring a couple of times to break the mixture up.
Once cool, add the shredded coconut and the dried pineapple.
Store in an airtight container for up to 1 month.
*Notes: If you prefer your coconut toasted, feel free to add it to the oat mixture before it goes into the oven.
In this recipe, I kind of prefer it untoasted, but do whatever floats your boat!
9f7b08be0e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 300°F (150°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the oats, macadamia nuts, flax seed, salt, brown sugar, and honey. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the vegetable oil, coconut, and pineapple.
4. Pour the wet ingredients over the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
5. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the granola for 25-30 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes to ensure even cooking.
7. Once the granola is golden brown and crunchy, remove it from the oven and let it cool completely.
8. Store the granola in an airtight container for up to 1 week.

This Pina Colada Granola recipe combines the flavors of coconut, pineapple, and tropical fruits, creating a delicious and refreshing granola that can be enjoyed as a breakfast or snack option. The combination of oats, macadamia nuts, flax seed, and other ingredients provides a balanced and nutritious treat.

43ba871465.gt:
Cream margarine and sugar.
Add egg, beat thoroughly.
Add molasses and blend.
In another bowl mix dry ingredients, then add to wet ingredients.
Mix to combine.
Roll into small balls (3/4" - 1").
Coat balls in sugar, place on cookie sheet 2 inches apart, bake at 350F for 10-12 minutes.
Yield is approximate, depending on size.
Time to make about 10 minutes to prepare dough, and I estimated 10 minutes to roll into balls and coat with sugar.
43ba871465.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the margarine and sugar until fluffy.
3. Add the egg and molasses, and mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, ginger, and cloves.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until well combined.
6. If the dough is too dry, add a small amount of water, a tablespoon at a time, until the desired consistency is reached.
7. On a floured surface, roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
8. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
9. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the cookies for 8-10 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
11. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Gingersnaps!

f4e0bc9330.gt:
combine chopped broccoli and chicken broth and bring to a boil.
cook until broccoli is tender.
in a separate pan saute onions in butter until translucent but not browned.
add this mixture to the broccoli and broth stirring in the flour.
cook until thickened.
add milk, cream, seasoning and cheese.
simmer until cheese melts, but do not boil before serving.
f4e0bc9330.pred:
To cook a delicious Julia's cream of broccoli soup, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, heat the butter over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the chicken broth, and bring the mixture to a boil.
3. Add the chopped broccoli to the pot, and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
4. In a small bowl, mix the flour with the pepper, thyme, and a pinch of salt. Gradually pour the flour mixture into the pot, stirring constantly.
5. Gradually add the milk, heavy whipping cream, and grated yellow cheese, stirring until smooth and well combined.
6. Reduce the heat to low, and simmer the soup for about 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the soup is heated through.
7. Taste and adjust the seasoning with salt, if needed.
8. Serve the creamy, delicious Julia's cream of broccoli soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of grated cheese, if desired.

[/INST]

93fa251248.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Grease an 8-inch square baking dish.
Whisk eggs, oil, and brown sugar together in a bowl until brown sugar is dissolved.
Combine oats, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a separate bowl; stir into egg mixture just until moistened.
Spoon oat mixture into prepared baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes.
93fa251248.pred:
To create a delicious Crispy Baked Oatmeal dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, vegetable oil, brown sugar, and baking powder until well combined.
2. Add the old-fashioned oats and cinnamon, and mix until the oats are evenly coated with the wet ingredients.
3. Gradually add the ground cinnamon and salt, stirring to combine.
4. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
5. Bake the oatmeal in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are slightly golden and the center is set.
6. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares.
7. Serve the Crispy Baked Oatmeal warm, and enjoy the delicious, crispy texture and sweet flavors.

[/INST]

3b92f8e755.gt:
Heat oven to 375 degrees.
Place a ridged cast-iron skillet or other heavy skillet over medium-high heat.
Working in batches, brush eggplant slices on both sides with olive oil and cook, turning, until soft and (if using a ridged pan) crisscrossed with grid marks.
Set aside and allow to cool.
In a large bowl, combine feta, pine nuts, raisins, 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil, bread crumbs, garlic, lemon zest, mint and parsley.
Mix in egg, and season to taste with salt and pepper.
Spread eggplant slices on a surface, and divide stuffing evenly among them, placing 1 to 2 tablespoons at one end of each slice.
Roll up slices tightly to secure filling, and place in a 9-by-13-inch baking dish (or other shallow baking pan in which rolls fit snugly in a single layer).
Pour crushed tomatoes on top of eggplant rolls.
Arrange mozzarella slices in a line lengthwise down center of pan.
Drizzle olive oil evenly over pan, and season to taste with salt and pepper.
Bake until cheese has melted and eggplant is bubbling and fragrant, 25 to 30 minutes.
Remove from heat and allow to stand 5 to 10 minutes.
Serve hot.
3b92f8e755.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the eggplant slices, feta cheese, pine nuts, raisins, lemon zest, and minced garlic. Season with salt and pepper.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and drizzle in the olive oil. Gradually pour the egg mixture over the eggplant mixture, tossing to combine.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for about 30-40 minutes, or until the eggplant is tender and the filling is cooked through.
5. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Meanwhile, prepare the tomato sauce by combining the crushed tomatoes, minced garlic, and a pinch of salt and pepper in a saucepan. Simmer over low heat for about 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
7. Once the eggplant is cool enough to handle, carefully slice it into individual portions.
8. To assemble the Involtini, place a slice of eggplant on a plate, then spoon a small amount of the tomato sauce on top. Add a few crumbled feta cheese pieces, a sprinkle of pine nuts, and a drizzle of olive oil.
9. Roll the eggplant slice over the filling, enclosing it, and secure with a toothpick.
10. Repeat with the remaining eggplant slices and sauce.
11. Serve the Involtini immediately, garnished with chopped parsley and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

263a0fdd20.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Prepare cake batter as directed on package; pour into parchment-lined 15x10x1-inch pan.
Bake 18 to 20 min.
or until toothpick inserted in centre comes out clean.
Cool completely.
Beat cream cheese and butter in large bowl with mixer until creamy.
Blend in vanilla.
Gradually add sugar, beating well after each addition.
Cut cake lengthwise, then crosswise in half.
Stack cake layers on plate, spreading cream cheese frosting between layers and on top of cake.
263a0fdd20.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans.
3. In a large bowl, combine the carrot cake mix, softened Philadelphia Brick Cream Cheese, softened butter, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.
4. Pour the batter evenly into the prepared cake pans.
5. Bake the cakes in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of each cake comes out clean.
6. Allow the cakes to cool in the pans for 10 minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.
7. Once the cakes are completely cooled, use a sharp knife to slice them in half horizontally.
8. Spread a layer of icing (1 cup) on the bottom half of each cake layer.
9. Assemble the cake by placing the top half of each cake layer on top of the icing-covered bottom half.
10. Spread the remaining icing (1 cup) over the top and sides of the cake.
11. Refrigerate the cake for at least 30 minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Quick Layered Carrot Cake!

fe5d11c597.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Combine 1 cup sugar and 1/2 cup margarine in large mixer bowl.
Beat at medium speed until creamy.
Add egg and vanilla, and continue beating until well mixed.
Reduce speed to low,and add all remaining cookie ingredients except marshmallows.
Beat until well mixed.
Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake for 6-7 minutes or until edges are just set.
Remove from oven.
Press 1 marshmallow half onto center of each cookie.
Continue baking for 2 minutes or until marshmallow is softened.
Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheets.
Cool completely.
Combine all frosting ingredients except milk in small mixer bowl.
Beat at low speed, adding enough milk for desired spreading consistency.
Frost cooled cookies, covering entire marshmallow.
Variations: Before putting frosting over cooled cookies, spread a thin layer of peanut butter, caramel, or seedless raspberry jelly over marshmallow, and then add your frosting.
fe5d11c597.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, margarine, and egg. Beat until smooth.
3. Add the vanilla extract and flour, mixing until well combined.
4. Gradually add the milk or half and half, baking soda, and salt, mixing until smooth.
5. Fold in the cocoa powder and marshmallows.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the dish comes out clean.
8. Allow the dish to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares.
9. Frost the cooled squares with the chocolate frosting.
10. Enjoy your delicious Brownie Surprise Cookies!

[/INST]

904095d715.gt:
In a 10-inch heavy saute pan, heat 1 ounce of clarified butter over high heat.
Add sliced mushrooms one handful at a time to saute pan.
As mushrooms begin to develop rich, brown color, push them to the outside of the saute pan.
Turn the mushrooms over as they begin to color.
When pan becomes dry, add remaining clarified butter to the pan.
Add another handful of mushrooms to the pan and continue until all mushrooms have been added.
Season with salt and pepper after the last addition to the pan has been made.
Make a hole in the middle of the pan and add the shallots.
Deglaze pan with cognac, scraping up any browned mushroom bits.
Add the chives.
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
904095d715.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the clarified butter over medium heat.
3. Add the sliced cremini mushrooms and cook until they are tender and slightly caramelized, about 5-7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
4. Add the minced shallots and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until they are softened.
5. Pour in the cognac and cook until it has almost completely evaporated.
6. Add the chives and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
7. Remove the skillet from the heat and let the mixture cool slightly.
8. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked mushroom mixture with the chives.
9. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the mixture is hot and bubbly.
11. Serve the Fungal Saute immediately, garnished with additional chives if desired.

[/INST]

a562032555.gt:
Mix the flour and salt in a large mixing bowl with a wooden spoon.
In another large bowl, empty the yeast package, then slowly add the warm water, mixing with a fork to fully dissolve the yeast.
When the yeast mixture forms some bubbles, add the mixture to the flour/salt, then add the three eggs.
Mix the batter, then set the bowl on top of your refrigerator (or other warm place), cover with damp dish towel.
After 20 minutes, check the dough for rising, mix again and let rise for another 20 minutes.
In a saucepan, heat the oil to medium heat.
Add the dough by the spoonful (about the size of 2 golf balls) Experiment with the first batch to make sure the oil is not too hot.
Remove when golden brown and place on paper bags to absorb the oil.
Place warm Zeppoles in a paper bag with powdered sugar and SHAKE.
Cover with powdered sugar.
a562032555.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the corn oil, flour, yeast, warm water, eggs, salt, and powdered sugar. Mix until a smooth dough forms.
2. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Place the dough in a greased bowl, cover it with a damp cloth, and let it rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
4. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
5. Punch down the dough and transfer it to a floured surface. Roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.5 cm).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a round cookie cutter.
7. Heat oil in a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Carefully place the Zeppoles into the hot oil, being careful not to overcrowd the pan. Cook the Zeppoles until they are golden brown on both sides, about 2-3 minutes per side.
8. Remove the Zeppoles from the oil and place them on a wire rack to drain excess oil.
9. Serve the Zeppoles warm, and enjoy your delicious homemade dessert!

6ad5b0a9bb.gt:
Pour 4 oz A&W Rootbeer in a glass
Add vodka and syrup to the root beer, stir well and add ice
6ad5b0a9bb.pred:
1. First, pour 4 oz of Diet A&W Rootbeer into a glass.
2. Next, add 1 oz of sugar-free vanilla syrup to the glass.
3. Then, pour 1 1/2 oz of Smirnoff Vanilla Vodka into the glass.
4. Finally, add a glass of ice to the glass.
5. Stir the ingredients together to combine and enjoy your Diet Rootbeer Float.

Please note that this is a simple recipe for a Diet Rootbeer Float, and there are many variations and additional ingredients that can be added to enhance the flavor and presentation of the dish.

45b311a5c9.gt:
Heat oven to 450*.
Grease 6 6oz custard cups.
Beat eggs slightly; beat in flour, milk, and salt.
Beat just until smooth, do not overbeat.
Fill custard cups 1/2 full.
Bake 20 minutes.
Reduce oven temp to 350*.
Bake 20 minutes longer.
Remove from cups.
Serve warm.
45b311a5c9.pred:
To prepare delicious Popovers, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, flour, milk, and salt until smooth.
3. Heat a small amount of oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat.
4. Pour the batter into the pan, making sure to evenly distribute the mixture.
5. Cook the Popover batter for about 2 minutes, or until the edges start to curl up and the bottom is golden brown.
6. Carefully flip the Popover and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the bottom is golden brown and the top is cooked through.
7. Transfer the Popover to a wire rack and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Once cooled, use a spatula to carefully remove the Popover from the pan and place it on a plate.
9. Serve the Popover warm with your favorite toppings, such as butter, jam, or whipped cream.

Enjoy your delicious Popovers!

8b7c0b0b5a.gt:
PLACE frozen yogurt in bowl.
Top with remaining ingredients.
Serve a cookie with the sundae.
8b7c0b0b5a.pred:
1. Start by preparing the base of the sundae by scooping 3/4 cup of low-fat frozen yogurt into a bowl.
2. Next, pour 1 tablespoon of fat free chocolate syrup over the yogurt, ensuring it is warmed to a smooth consistency.
3. Add 1 tablespoon of PLANTERS Walnut Pieces to the yogurt and chocolate syrup mixture.
4. In a separate bowl, mix 2 tablespoons of COOL WHIP FREE Whipped Topping until it reaches the desired consistency.
5. Crush one OREO Chocolate Sandwich Cookie into small pieces and add them to the whipped topping mixture.
6. Carefully fold the crushed cookie pieces into the whipped topping mixture until well combined.
7. Pour the whipped topping mixture over the yogurt and chocolate syrup mixture, ensuring that the cookie pieces are evenly distributed.
8. Serve the Hot Fudge Sundae immediately and enjoy!

[/INST]

292b683c3f.gt:
Blend ice first just a tad.
Then add your milk, hot coffee(don't worry it won't melt anything that much at all.
), oreos and everything else.
Blend for about 1 minute and a half and pour it in a glass.
Enjoy guys.
Please don't get mad if u don't like it.
I was just experimenting and it actually came out pretty good.
Wish I had whipped cream and syrup or it'd be amazing.
I had no heavy cream so I couldn't make it..
If u don't like it though just make whatever changes or additions you feel and tell me what u did and post ur pics.
Thank u all.
Some people may add more oreos or sweetener.
That's up to u. I ran out of my sugar syrup so I didn't add any sugar.
Enjoy everyone.
292b683c3f.pred:
[INST]
1. In a blender, combine the hot freshly brewed coffee, half and half, and ice. Blend until smooth and creamy.
2. Add the 5 Oreos to the blender, and blend until they are finely ground.
3. In a small bowl, mix together the unsweetened cocoa, cinnamon, vanilla extract, coffee extract, and nutmeg.
4. Pour the cocoa mixture into the blender with the coffee and ice.
5. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
6. Pour the frappechino into a glass and enjoy!

[/INST]

This recipe combines the rich flavors of coffee, cocoa, and vanilla, while adding a warm, spicy touch from the cinnamon and nutmeg. The Oreo cookies provide a delightful crunch, and the ice blended in the drink adds a refreshing, cold element to the beverage. The result is a delicious, creamy, and comforting frappechino that is perfect for a cozy morning or afternoon pick-me-up.

59d1e62c4c.gt:
Heat a saucepan over medium heat.
Melt the butter and stir in the garlic and ginger.
Cook for 1 to 2 minutes, or until the garlic is lightly browned.
Add the soy sauce, sake, pineapple juice, rice vinegar and brown sugar.
Bring up to a gentle boil and simmer for 3 minutes.
Whisk the water and the cornstarch together and then whisk mixture into the teriyaki sauce and simmer until thickened, 8 to 10 minutes.
Set aside.
Rinse the chicken wings and pat them dry.
Generously season the chicken with salt and black pepper.
Dredge the wings in flour, shaking off any excess flour, and set aside.
In a large saucepan or deep fryer, heat the oil to about 375.
Fry the chicken wings in small batches until golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes.
Shake off any excess oil and place on paper towels to drain.
Continue frying the chicken in batches until all of the wings are cooked.
Toss the wings in the teriyaki sauce and sprinkle with green onions.
Serve warm.
59d1e62c4c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the butter, minced garlic, minced ginger, and soy sauce.
3. Add the pineapple juice, sake, rice vinegar, brown sugar, and water to the bowl. Mix well.
4. Add the cornstarch to the mixture and stir until smooth.
5. Season the chicken wings with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Dredge the chicken wings in the all-purpose flour, shaking off any excess.
7. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
8. Fry the chicken wings in batches, until they are golden brown and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side.
9. Remove the chicken wings from the skillet and place them on a wire rack set over a baking sheet.
10. Return the skillet to the heat and add the green onions. Cook for about 1 minute, until they are slightly wilted.
11. Remove the skillet from the heat and pour the sauce mixture over the chicken wings.
12. Return the skillet to the heat and cook the chicken wings in the sauce, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened and coated the chicken evenly, about 5-7 minutes.
13. Serve the Pineapple-Teriyaki Chicken Wings hot, garnished with the green onions.

[/OUTLINE]

b61f1917f7.gt:
For the salad: First place lettuce in a bowl, then top with chicken, onion, nectarine, raspberries, celery and almonds.
Pour vinaigrette over top and serve!
For the dressing: Put all ingredients in a container that has a good sealing lid and shake the snot out of it.
b61f1917f7.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the diced chicken, red onion, and sliced nectarine.
2. In a separate small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, red wine vinegar, herbs, salt, and garlic.
3. Pour the dressing over the chicken and fruit mixture, and toss to combine.
4. Add the raspberries, celery, almonds, and oranges to the bowl, and toss again.
5. Serve the salad immediately, or refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Nectarine, Raspberry, and Chicken Salad with Citrus Vinaigrette!

43d8c95718.gt:
Brew coffee using a ratio of about 1 1/2 tablespoons coffee per cup of water.
(We used a single brew coffee maker and used the espresso strength setting that uses less water and brews a stronger coffee.)
Set the coffee aside to reach room temperature or place it in the refrigerator for 10-15 minutes to cool quickly.
Add the room temperature coffee, creamer, raspberry and hazelnut syrups, and the ice into a blender and blend until smooth.
Pour the drink into a tall glass and enjoy!
Optional garnishes: top with whipped cream, shaved chocolate, mint leaves and a raspberry.
43d8c95718.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare a Raspberry Hazelnut Frappe using the provided ingredients, follow these steps:
1. In a blender, combine 4 ounces of Strongly Brewed Coffee and 2 Tablespoons of Hazelnut Flavored Creamer (or Half-and-Half). Blend until smooth.
2. Add 2 teaspoons of Raspberry Syrup and 2 teaspoons of Hazelnut Syrup to the blender. Blend until combined.
3. Pour the blended mixture into a glass filled with crushed ice.
4. Stir the mixture gently to combine the ice and the liquid.
5. Enjoy your Raspberry Hazelnut Frappe!

[/INST]

54bc08b13e.gt:
Combine cream, milk, water, cocoa powder, corn syrup, and salt in a medium saucepan.
Bring to a simmer over medium heat, whisking until cocoa powder is completely dissolved.
Remove from heat and add chocolate, butter, and vanilla, stirring until chocolate is melted and sauce is smooth.
Serve warm.
54bc08b13e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a saucepan, combine the heavy cream, whole milk, water, and corn syrup. Bring the mixture to a gentle simmer over medium heat.
3. Add the unsweetened cocoa powder and fine salt to the saucepan. Stir to combine.
4. Reduce the heat to low and let the sauce simmer for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the bittersweet chocolate, chopped, to the saucepan. Stir until the chocolate is melted and the sauce is smooth.
6. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the unsalted butter. Allow the mixture to cool for a few minutes.
7. Add the vanilla extract to the saucepan and stir to combine.
8. Pour the sauce into a small bowl or a ramekin.
9. Place the bowl or ramekin in the preheated oven and let it cook for about 10-15 minutes, or until the sauce is smooth and glossy.
10. Remove the bowl or ramekin from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Serve the cooked sauce over ice cream, pancakes, or other desserts of your choice.

Enjoy your delicious Bittersweet Chocolate Sauce!

0935eaa489.gt:
Microwave chocolate in microwaveable bowl on MEDIUM 2 min.
or until chocolate is almost melted, stirring after 1 min.
Stir until chocolate is completely melted.
Stir in 3/4 cup each of the grahams and marshmallows.
Spread onto waxed paper-covered baking sheet.
Decorate with remaining grahams and marshmallows.
Refrigerate 1 hour or until firm.
Break into 60 pieces.
0935eaa489.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
3. Melt the chocolate in a double boiler or a heat-resistant bowl set over a pot of simmering water.
4. Once the chocolate is melted, remove it from the heat and stir in the Teddy Grahams Honey Cookie crumbs.
5. Spread the chocolate mixture evenly onto the prepared baking sheet.
6. Dot the marshmallows evenly over the chocolate layer.
7. Bake the S'more Bark in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the marshmallows are puffed and golden brown.
8. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Using a sharp knife or a pizza cutter, cut the S'more Bark into desired shapes and sizes.
10. Transfer the S'more Bark to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade S'more Bark!

d3047450d6.gt:
Boil the water and pour a small amount in the teapot, swishing it around to warm the pot.
Combine the mint and green tea and sugar in the teapot, then fill it with the rest of the hot water.
Let the tea brew for three minutes.
Set out glasses for the tea.
A shot-glass is close to the slender glasses used in Morocco.
Fill just one glass with the tea, then pour it back in the pot.
Repeat.
This helps to dissolve and distribute the sugar.
Pour the tea.
You want a nice foam on the tea so always pour with the teapot a high distance above the glasses.
If you do not have at least a little foam on the top of the first glass, then pour it back into the teapot and try again until the tea starts to foam up nicely.
Garnish with the remaining sprigs of mint.
d3047450d6.pred:
To make Moroccan Mint Tea, follow these steps:
1. Gather the ingredients: 10 sprigs of fresh mint, 3 teaspoons green tea, 3 tablespoons sugar (or more to taste), and 4 cups of water.
2. Bring the water to a boil in a large pot.
3. Add the green tea leaves and the sugar, stirring to dissolve the sugar.
4. Remove the pot from the heat and let it steep for 5-10 minutes.
5. Strain the tea through a fine-mesh sieve into a large teapot or serving pitcher.
6. Add the fresh mint leaves and stir gently.
7. Serve the tea immediately, garnishing each cup with a sprig of fresh mint for a refreshing touch.

Enjoy your Moroccan Mint Tea!

eef728c6b8.gt:
Lightly coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Cook the onion and chiles in the skillet over medium heat for 3 minutes, stirring constantly.
In a small bowl, whisk together egg substitute, cheese, pepper, and Tabasco (if using).
Pour into skillet and scramble for 3 to 4 minutes, until the eggs are done to taste, but not dry.
Place the egg mixture along one-third of the tortilla, about 2 inches away from the bottom.
Fold up the lower edge, then roll from the side to form a burrito.
eef728c6b8.pred:
1. Preheat the cooking spray in a large skillet or pan over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onions and cook until they are soft and translucent, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the drained canned green chili and cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally, until the chili is heated through.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg substitute, shredded fat-free monterey jack cheese, and pepper.
5. Place the tortillas on a flat surface and spoon a small amount of the egg mixture onto one end of each tortilla.
6. Roll the tortillas up, enclosing the egg mixture, and place them seam-side down in the preheated cooking spray.
7. Cook the burritos for about 5-7 minutes, or until the tortillas are crispy and the egg is cooked through.
8. If desired, add a dash of liquid hot pepper sauce to the burritos for extra flavor.
9. Serve the Light Breakfast Burritos warm and enjoy!

5fff64fad0.gt:
Preheat oven to 375
Melt butter and place in the pan you are using for the cobbler
In a medium Mixing bowl mix together flour, baking powder, 1 cup of sugar and milk ( do not mix while in pan)
On high heat in a medium pot, mix all other ingredients peaches, Lennon juice, Brown sugar, and 2 teaspoons of cinnamon
Poor heated ingredients into pan ( do not mix while in pan)
Sprinkle 2 teaspoons of cinnamon over top
Place in oven
Cook for 30 minutes or until top is golden brown
Serve hot or cool over vanilla ice cream
5fff64fad0.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
3. Add the butter and mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, lemon juice, and vanilla extract.
5. Pour the wet mixture into the dry mixture and mix until a dough forms.
6. Press the dough evenly into the bottom of a 9-inch (23cm) square baking dish.
7. Arrange the peaches in a single layer on top of the dough.
8. Sprinkle the cinnamon evenly over the peaches.
9. Pour the remaining batter over the peaches.
10. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the cobbler is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
11. Allow the cobbler to cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Nikki's peach cobbler!

e946c009a6.gt:
In a large nonstick skillet, combine mushrooms, chopped onions and 1/2 cup water.
Cook over medium-high heat, stirring often, until liquid has evaporated and vegetables are beginning to brown.
To deglaze, add 1/3 cup of the vegetable broth and stir to scrape any browned bits free from pan bottom.
Continue to cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables begin to brown again.
Repeat deglazing and browning steps 2 more times, using 1/3 cup broth each time.
Onion should be golden brown.
This should take about 15 to 20 minutes total.
Remove pan from heat.
In a large bowl, beat eggs to blend.
Stir in shredded zucchini, mushroom mixture, bread crumbs, cheese, pepper and oregano.
Turn into greased 9x13" baking dish, spreading out evenly.
Bake uncovered at 350 until casserole appears set in center when dish is gently shaken -- about 35 minutes.
Let stand 5 minutes, then serve.
e946c009a6.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]To prepare Baked Zucchini With Mushrooms, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded zucchini, mushrooms, onion, and vegetable broth. Season with salt, pepper, and oregano.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs until well-beaten.
4. Pour the egg mixture over the zucchini and mushroom mixture, and stir to combine.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, and sprinkle the top with breadcrumbs and grated parmesan cheese.
6. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the breadcrumbs are golden brown and the zucchini is tender.
7. Remove the dish from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your Baked Zucchini With Mushrooms!

df541b69a3.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Coat baking sheet once with cooking spray.
Set aside.
Coat large skillet with cooking spray and place over low heat.
Add onion; cook, stirring often, until just softened, about 3 minutes.
Add garlic and stir 30 seconds.
Add soy meat, breaking it up with a wooden spoon.
Stir in tomatoes, roasted jalapeno, chili powder and cumin.
Mix well.
Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, 8 minutes.
Meanwhile, stack tortillas, wrap in foil and bake until warm and pliable, 8 to 10 minutes.
(Alternatively, using tongs, heat each tortilla over an open flame.)
Place tortillas on work surface and spoon about 3/4 cup meat filling in center of each.
Fold in sides and roll up, jelly-roll style.
Place on prepared baking sheet, seam side down.
Bake until chimichangas are lightly browned, about 30 minutes.
Serve hot with salsa.
df541b69a3.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, and cook until the onion is softened.
3. Add the ground soy "meat" and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces with a spoon.
4. Add the canned diced tomatoes, chopped roasted jalapeno pepper, chili powder, and ground cumin. Stir to combine.
5. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Meanwhile, prepare the Fresh Tomato Salsa by chopping the tomatoes and mixing them with the desired seasonings.
7. To assemble the Chimichangas, place a spoonful of the meat mixture in the center of each tortilla. Fold the tortilla in half, creating a half-moon shape.
8. Place the filled tortillas on a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the tortillas are crispy and the filling is hot.
9. Serve the Chimichangas with a dollop of Fresh Tomato Salsa on top. Enjoy!

f5564fb5c4.gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees F.
Cut cheese slices into quarters, then cut each piece diagonally in half.
Place crackers in single layer on baking sheet; top with ham and cheese.
Bake 4 to 5 min.
or until cheese is melted.
Top with preserves and onions.
f5564fb5c4.pred:
To craft delicious Ham & Swiss Melts, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Place the sliced ham on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
3. Place the sliced green onion on top of the ham.
4. Place the sliced peach preserves on top of the green onion.
5. Place the 3 KRAFT Slim Cut Swiss Cheese Slices on top of the peach preserves.
6. Place the 24 woven wheat crackers on top of the cheese slices.
7. Bake the ham and cheese melts in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Carefully remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the melts cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Ham & Swiss Melts!

05096fc3ad.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F Coat a standard (12 cup) muffin tin with cooking spray.
In a large bowl, whisk egg whites, sugar, cocoa and salt until combined.
Add coconut; mix until well coated.
***I would add the sliced almonds in at this point with the coconut.
They didn't want to stick to the tops of the cookies!
***.
Dividing evenly, spoon mixture into muffin tin and pat in gently with moistened fingers.
Sprinkle with almonds and pat on gently.
***See note above***.
Bake until almonds are golden, 20-25 minutes.
Remove from oven and cool in tin for 5-10 minutes.
Run a thin metal spatula around the edges to loosen from pan.
Turn out onto rack to cool completely.
Cookies keep in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 3 days.
05096fc3ad.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the egg whites, sugar, and cocoa powder until well combined.
3. Fold in the sliced almonds and sweetened flaked coconut.
4. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Using a small spoon, scoop out a small amount of the mixture and place it on the prepared baking sheet.
6. Repeat with the remaining mixture, spacing the macaroon cups about 2 inches apart.
7. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges are set and the centers are still slightly soft.
8. Allow the macaroon cups to cool completely on the baking sheet before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate Coconut Macaroon Cups!

37568c51b9.gt:
Toast the sesame seeds in a frying pan over medium heat until brown, let them cool.
Cut the beef in thin slices.
Mix all marinade ingredients together, add also the sesame seeds, and to this add the beef.
Leave to marinate at least 30 minutes, a few hours is preferred.
Thread the meat on wooden skewers, grill or barbecue a few minutes on each side, using the remaining marinade for basting.

4. In a small bowl, mix the toasted sesame seeds and grated ginger.

6. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
7. Preheat the grill or grill pan.

97117994fc.gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees F.
Beat first 6 ingredients in large bowl with mixer until blended.
Stir in apples.
Pour into greased and floured 12-cup fluted tube pan or 10-inch tube pan.
Bake 50 min.
to 1 hour or until toothpick inserted near center comes out clean.
Cool cake in pan 15 min.
Loosen cake from sides of pan; invert onto wire rack.
Gently remove pan.
Cool cake completely.
Transfer to plate.
Microwave caramels and milk in microwaveable bowl on HIGH 1-1/2 min.
or until caramels are completely melted and sauce is smooth, stirring every 30 sec.
Cool 10 min.
or until slightly thickened.
Drizzle over cake just before serving.
97117994fc.pred:
To make Moist Caramel Apple Cake by JELL-O, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease and flour a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the yellow cake mix, JELL-O Vanilla Flavor Instant Pudding, water, eggs, oil, and milk. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the chopped Granny Smith apples and 3 tablespoons of milk to the batter. Mix until the apples are well coated.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan.
6. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
7. Remove the cake from the oven and let it cool in the pan for about 10 minutes. Then, transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. While the cake is cooling, prepare the caramel sauce. In a small saucepan, combine the milk, 1 tablespoon of butter, and the 3 tablespoons of caramel. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the caramel is melted and smooth.
9. Once the cake is completely cooled, use a spatula to spread the caramel sauce evenly over the top of the cake.
10. Cut the cake into slices and serve.

[/INST]

3d413a0413.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. 2.
Wash potatoes well.
3.
Lay each potato on a cutting board.
4.
With a sharp knife, thinly slice each potato, being careful to NOT CUT all the way through.
(TIP: I lay a chopstick on each side of the potato so I dont accidentally cut too far.)
5.
Season each potato.
This is where you can get creative slide a sliver of garlic between the layers, or experiment with different herbs, butter, whatever sounds good to you!.
6.
Place potatoes in a baking dish that has been drizzled with olive oil.
7.
Drizzle potatoes with olive oil.
8.
Bake at 425 degrees for 40 minutes, or until the inside is tender.
9.
Enjoy!

To prepare a delicious Hasselback Potatoes dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the medium-sized baking potatoes. Cut them into equal-sized wedges, leaving the skin on.
3. In a large bowl, mix together the olive oil, salt, pepper, and minced garlic.
4. Add the chopped onion slivers to the bowl and mix well.
5. Add any desired spices to the bowl, such as rosemary, thyme, or paprika, and mix thoroughly.
6. Dip each potato wedge into the olive oil mixture, ensuring that it is evenly coated.
7. Place the potato wedges on a baking sheet, spacing them out evenly.
8. Bake the potatoes in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy on the outside.
9. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
10. Serve the Hasselback Potatoes hot, garnished with fresh herbs or a dollop of sour cream, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Hasselback Potatoes dish!

d255a02fb6.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Grease 24 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners.
Whisk 3 cups flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl.
Stir white sugar, applesauce, and eggs together in another bowl.
Add sugar mixture to flour mixture and stir until batter is just combined.
Fold peaches and cranberries into batter.
Spoon batter into prepared muffin cups.
Stir brown sugar and 2 tablespoons flour together in a small bowl.
Sprinkle brown sugar mixture over the tops of the muffins.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean, about 25 minutes.
Cool for 10 minutes before transferring muffins to a wire rack to cool completely.
d255a02fb6.pred:
To make Peach and Cranberry Muffins, first preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt. In a separate bowl, whisk together the applesauce, sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Fold in the chopped peaches and cranberries.

Scoop the batter into muffin cups, filling them about 3/4 full. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes in the pan, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely. Enjoy your delicious Peach and Cranberry Muffins!

6e11affa2e.gt:
In a small bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a 1 quart glass container (a mason jar works great!
), layer the flour mixture, sugar, brown sugar, oats, walnuts, cereal and cranberries.
Cover and store in a cool dry place for up to 6 months.

Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets.

af6f74da4c.gt:
Cut the enoki mushrooms into 3 even lengths, and shred apart.
Cut the tofu into 2 cm cubes.
Bring the dashi stock to a boil and add the ingredients.

d46848fda2.gt:
In a medium bowl, add rice flour, all-purpose flour, bread crumbs, turmeric, cumin powder, red chili, mango powder, salt, water and make a thick paste.
Set aside.
Cut 1/2 inch thick round pieces of the eggplant.
This will give total of 10 pieces.
Heat the large nonstick pan on high, dab oil and reduce heat to medium.
Take 1 round piece of eggplant, dip it into the batter, making sure its evenly coated on both sides, and put it on the heated pan.
After 2 minutes, turn to the other side and cook for another 2 minutes.
Check both the sides to make sure they are evenly golden brown.
Continue until all eggplant pieces are cooked.
Serve hot.

18612275da.gt:

Lightly butter both sides of bread and place on baking sheet
Add all seasonings to taste.

59d1144ae9.gt:
Pour 1 quart of hot water into a large saucepan, and dissolve the gelatin.
Allow to cool.
Pour the cooled gelatin into a large punch bowl.
Stir in: pineapple juice, orange juice concentrate, sugar, and 4 1/2 cups of cold water.
Just before serving, pour in the Ginger Ale.
59d1144ae9.pred:
1. In a large bowl, mix the lime gelatin according to the package instructions.
2. Add the hot water to the bowl and stir until the gelatin is fully dissolved.
3. Add the pineapple juice, frozen orange juice concentrate, sugar (if using), and cold water to the bowl. Stir until the sugar is fully dissolved.

This recipe for Green Punch is a refreshing and festive beverage that can be enjoyed at a St. Patrick's Day party. The combination of lime gelatin, pineapple juice, frozen orange juice concentrate, sugar, and ginger ale creates a vibrant green color and a delightful taste that is perfect for the occasion.

ed226be03e.gt:
Heat oil in a small frying pan over low heat until hot, about 1 minute.
Add chile flakes and remove from heat.
Let cool to room temperature.
Strain through a fine mesh strainer if desired, then transfer to a container and cover until ready to use.
Heat half of a gas or charcoal grill to high (about 400 degrees F) and the other half to low (about 300 degrees F).
Divide dough in 1/2 and roll into 2 rounds about 1/4 inch thick and 10 inches in diameter.
Brush the top of 1 round with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Lay dough oiled side down on the hotter half of the grill and brush the top with oil and sprinkle with salt.
Grill without moving until grill marks form on the bottom of the dough, about 2 minutes.
Flip dough with a spatula or tongs to the cooler half of grill.
Spread 1/2 of the sauce evenly over the dough, sprinkle 1 tablespoon of the Parmesan cheese over the sauce, then top with 1/2 of the peppers, 1/2 of the sausage, and 1/2 of the mozzarella.
Cover and grill, rotating if necessary to avoid any hot spots, until dough is lightly charred and cheese is melted, about 8 to 10 minutes.
Transfer pizza to a cutting board, sprinkle 1 tablespoon more of the Parmesan over top, drizzle with desired amount of chile oil, slice, and serve.
Repeat with second round of dough and remaining toppings.
ed226be03e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, red chile flakes, and salt.
3. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the pizza dough into a 12-inch (30 cm) round. Transfer the dough to a baking sheet or pizza stone.
4. Brush the dough with olive oil, then sprinkle it with salt.
5. Bake the dough in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until it is golden brown and cooked through.
6. While the dough is baking, prepare the toppings.
7. In a small bowl, mix the Basic Pizza Sauce with the Parmesan cheese.
8. In a large skillet, cook the spicy Italian sausage over medium heat until browned, then crumble it.
9. In a large bowl, toss the medium-diced roasted bell peppers with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
10. Once the pizza dough is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Spread the Basic Pizza Sauce evenly over the cooked dough.
12. Add the crumbled spicy Italian sausage, roasted bell peppers, and shredded mozzarella cheese on top of the sauce.
13. Return the pizza to the oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
14. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

42ab84ef73.gt:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Thaw pastry according to directions on box (about 40 minutes).
Cut pastry into 3 sections along perforated lines.
Lay one section of pastry on a baking sheet to assemble.
Spread 2 tablespoons of pesto onto the pastry.
Next, space 5 shrimp evenly on top of the pesto.
Sprinkle with slivers of sundried tomatoes and pine nuts.
Using your fingers, fold over the sides of the pastry so they meet in the middle, and pinch to form a seal (although it will open while baking).
Bake one roll at a time, at 450 degrees F for 5 minutes, then lower oven heat to 375 degrees F and cook an additional 5-8 minutes until pastry is brown and puffed.
Repeat assembly and baking process with remaining two pastry sheets.
Slice each roll into five pieces (one shrimp in each piece) and serve warm.
Makes 15 appetizers.
42ab84ef73.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).

6. Arrange the cooked shrimp or prawns on top of the pesto.

3cb86cf2f4.gt:
Wash 5 potatoes.
Cut into square pieces.
Preheat oil in skillet on stove top.
I use my iron skillet
Chop up 1/4 white onion on cutting board along with potatoes.
Chop up two green peppers on board.
Dust garlic powder over potato, onion, pepper mix
Place potatoes, onion and peppers in skillet.
Dust with salt and pepper for additional flavor.
Cook until golden brown or potatoes are tender.
Serves about 5, can serve more just cut up more potatoes.
One potato per person want to feed.

To cook a delightful sauteed potatoes dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into evenly sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, toss the potatoes with 1/4 onion, minced garlic, and 2 green peppers.
4. In a separate bowl, mix 1 1/2 tbsp garlic powder and 2 cups of vegetable oil.
5. Pour the oil mixture over the potatoes and onion mixture, and toss everything together until the potatoes are evenly coated.

This dish is a delicious and healthy side dish that can be enjoyed with various meals. The combination of potatoes, onions, and green peppers creates a flavorful and satisfying taste, while the garlic powder adds a subtle, aromatic touch.

71c5c68d5d.gt:
Preheat your oven to 425 F. Line a rimmed baking sheet with a Silpat or parchment paper and set aside.
Place all the ingredients for the meatballs in a large bowl.
Using your clean hands, mix all of the ingredients until well combined.

When hot, add the meatballs and toss to coat.

d3a8a169dd.gt:

952ff059c4.gt:
In medium bowl, mix cocoa, sugar and oil.
Beat in the egg replacer; stir in vanilla.
Combine flour, baking powder and salt.
Stir into cocoa mixture.
Cover and chill 4 hours (or put in the freezer for about 30 minutes).

Lightly grease cookie sheet.
Roll dough into 1-inch balls.

EGG REPLACER 1 egg = 2 TBSP water + 1 TBSP oil + 2 tsp baking powder
Make sure you mix these together before adding to the recipe (dont just throw them all into the batter they must be mixed together first).

259241dc1b.gt:
Drain the tuna, reserving 1 tablespoon of the liquid.
Put the tuna in a serving bowl and mash with a fork until it's as mushy as you can get it.
Stir the reserved liquid, the salad dressing, honey mustard, relish, celery, carrot, sugar, and salt into the tuna.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
259241dc1b.pred:
To create a delicious Sweet Sweet Tuna Salad, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine the canned tuna, creamy salad dressing, honey mustard, sweet pickle relish, minced celery, minced carrot, white sugar, and salt. Mix well to ensure all ingredients are evenly distributed.
2. If the mixture seems too dry, you can add a bit more creamy salad dressing or white sugar to achieve the desired consistency.
3. Taste the salad and adjust the seasoning as needed.
4. Cover the bowl and refrigerate the salad for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
5. Serve the Sweet Sweet Tuna Salad chilled or at room temperature, garnished with a sprinkle of freshly ground black pepper if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Sweet Sweet Tuna Salad!

a4c28c7c57.gt:
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the olive oil and after the oil is hot, stir in the eggplant.
Cook for 3-5 minutes, turning occasionally, until the eggplant is seared.
Stir in the onions, ginger and garlic, and then cook for about 1 minute, or until soft.
(If the pan is too dry from the eggplant absorbing all the oil, add a touch more olive oil when stirring in the onions.)
Reduce heat to low and stir in the coconut milk, fish sauce, curry powder, brown sugar, black pepper and optional chilies.
Simmer for about 2 minutes or until heated through and eggplant has absorbed some of the sauce.
a4c28c7c57.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the diced onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
3. Add the grated ginger and minced garlic, cooking for another 2-3 minutes until fragrant.
4. Add the sliced Japanese eggplant to the pan, stirring to coat the vegetables in the oil. Cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until the eggplant is tender and slightly caramelized.
5. Add the coconut milk, fish sauce, curry powder, brown sugar, and fresh cracked black pepper to the pan. Stir to combine, then bring the mixture to a simmer.
6. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pan, and cook for about 15-20 minutes, or until the eggplant is tender and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. If desired, add the sliced Thai chili for a spicy kick.
8. Serve the Seared Eggplant and Coconut Milk Curry over rice or with your choice of grain, and garnish with chopped cilantro.

[/INST]

8c7a346bad.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Lightly grease a cookie sheet.
Unroll dough on lightly floured surface and press seams together.
Sprinkle one side of block of cream cheese with enough dill to cover.
Place cream cheese, dill side down, in center of dough.
Sprinkle with more dill to cover.
Bring sides of dough up around cheese block and seal to completely enclose.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for approximately 15 minutes.
Serve warm.
8c7a346bad.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Roll out the crescent roll dough on a lightly floured surface to a large rectangle, about 1/4 inch thick.
3. Spread the cream cheese evenly over the dough, leaving a 1-inch border around the edges.
4. Sprinkle the dried dill weed evenly over the cream cheese.
5. Starting at one of the long edges, roll the dough up tightly, enclosing the cream cheese.
6. Cut the roll into 1-inch slices.
7. Place the slices on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the edges are golden brown.
9. Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/SYS]

af9fb785aa.gt:
Preheat oven to 275F/135C.
In a large bowl toss oatmeal, coconut, nuts, and sunflower seeds together.
In a separate bowl whisk together oil, honey, cinnamon, and vanilla.
Pour liquid mixture over oats and stir until everything is coated.
Pour mixture into a large rimmed baking sheet.
I also cover the baking sheet with baking paper but it's not necessary if you have a non-stick pan.
Bake for approximately 20-25 minutes, stirring once or twice.
Keep an eye on it so it doesn't burn.
Let it cool completely.
Blend in cornflakes if using.
Store in an airtight container.
af9fb785aa.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 300°F (150°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the oats, coconut, almonds, walnuts, sunflower seeds, and corn flakes (if using).
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the vegetable oil, honey, cinnamon, and vanilla extract.
4. Pour the wet ingredients over the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
5. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake for 30-35 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the granola is golden brown and the edges are crispy.
7. Remove the granola from the oven and let it cool completely.
8. Once cooled, transfer the granola to an airtight container and store it in a cool, dry place.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

6f1343402a.gt:
Heat cumin seeds and mustard seed in hot dry skillet over high heat, swirling pan, until seeds start to pop.
Reduce heat to medium; add onions, chilies, and add a small amount of water; cook until onion is tender, adding more water as necessary to prevent sticking.
Add potatoes, ground cumin, coriander, turmeric, salt (to taste), and cayenne pepper, stirring to mix well.
Add 2/3 cup water, cover, reduce heat and cook for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until spices are absorbed and potatoes are tender.
Add a small amount of water at a time if all liquid evaporates.
Fold in cilantro just before serving.
6f1343402a.pred:
To cook a delightful Indian Potatoes with Mustard Seeds (Sookhi Bhaji) dish, follow these steps:
1. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat.
2. Add the cumin seed and brown mustard seeds. Allow them to sizzle for a few seconds.
3. Add the chopped onion and sauté until it turns golden brown.
4. Add the serrano chilies, split lengthwise, and sauté for a few seconds.
5. Add the peeled and cut potatoes to the pan. Cook for about 5-7 minutes or until the potatoes are slightly tender.
6. Add the ground cumin, ground coriander, turmeric, salt, cayenne pepper, and chopped fresh cilantro. Stir well.
7. Cook for another 5-7 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and the spices are well combined.
8. Serve the dish hot, garnished with additional cilantro, if desired.

This dish is a delicious and flavorful Indian Potatoes with Mustard Seeds (Sookhi Bhaji) that can be enjoyed as a side dish or a main course. The combination of spices and the addition of mustard seeds adds a unique and delightful taste to the dish.

193bc22f43.gt:
Microwave broccoli and CHEEZ WHIZ in microwaveable bowl on HIGH 1 min.
or until heated through, stirring after 30 sec.
Lightly smash each potato half with fork or spoon; place on crackers.
Top with broccoli mixture and bacon bits.
Serve warm.
193bc22f43.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (205°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the cooked broccoli with the Cheez Whiz Cheese Dip.
3. In a separate bowl, toss the cooked potatoes with a little bit of oil, salt, and pepper.
4. Spread the potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
5. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy on the outside.
6. While the potatoes are roasting, prepare the topping by melting the real bacon bits in a small saucepan over low heat.
7. Once the potatoes are done, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. Carefully slice the potatoes into halves or quarters, depending on your preference.
9. Place the cooked potatoes on a serving platter or individual plates.
10. Drizzle the melted real bacon bits over the potatoes.
11. Sprinkle the cooked broccoli over the potatoes.
12. Serve the "Smashed" Potato Toppers immediately.

[/INST]

f3d6579000.gt:
Combine milk and mustard in bowl; add cheese.
Microwave, stirring every minute, 2-4 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Serve with desired dippers.
f3d6579000.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix the milk, Dijon mustard, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
2. In a larger bowl, combine the Land O Lakes Deli White American cheese, and mix well.
3. Add the Dijon mustard mixture to the cheese, and mix until well combined.
4. If desired, add a pinch of paprika for extra color and flavor.
5. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
6. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
7. Spread the cheese mixture evenly over the prepared baking sheet.
8. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
10. Use a spatula to transfer the melted cheese mixture to a serving dish.
11. Serve the cheesy dip with your choice of dipping items, such as pretzel rods, bagel chips, breadsticks, soft pretzels, or vegetable sticks.

Essential ingredients:
- 1/3 cup milk
- 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard
- 8 (3/4-ounce) slices Land O Lakes Deli White American cheese
- Pretzel rods
- Bagel chips
- Breadsticks
- Soft pretzels
- Vegetable sticks or apple slices

[/INST]

f537025690.gt:
Mix chili sauce, lime juice, fish sauce, and cilantro; set aside.
Divide shrimp into 4 equal portions.
Lay each portion of shrimp in a neat row with tails pointed in the same direction.
Thread 2 thin wood or metal skewers (8 to 10 inches long) about 1 1/2 inches apart through center of each row of shrimp, pushing the shellfish close together.
Place shrimp on an oiled grill above a solid bed of hot coals or high heat on a gas barbecue (you can hold your hand at grill level only 2 to 3 seconds); close lid on gas grill.
Cook, turning once, until shrimp are pink, 2 to 3 minutes a side.
Brush tops of shrimp with the chili sauce mixture, turn over, and cook just until glaze bubbles and browns slightly, about 30 seconds (watch closely; glaze burns easily).
Brush tops with more chili mixture, then turn glaze down and cook just until it darkens slightly, about 30 seconds more.
Transfer shrimp to plates or a platter.
Season to taste with remaining chili mixture and juice from lime wedges.
f537025690.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix the Thai sweet chili sauce, lime juice, and fish sauce. Set aside.
2. In a large bowl, combine the shelled and rinsed shrimp with the cilantro, and toss to coat evenly.
3. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
4. Thread the shrimp onto skewers, alternating with pieces of lime and cilantro.
5. Brush the shrimp skewers with the Thai sweet chili sauce mixture, ensuring they are evenly coated.
6. Grill the skewers for 2-3 minutes per side, or until the shrimp are cooked through and the sauce is slightly caramelized.
7. Serve the Chili Glazed Shrimp Skewers immediately, garnished with additional cilantro if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Chili Glazed Shrimp Skewers!

7a6c6f2959.gt:
Dressing:.
Place the almonds and water into a blender or food proccesor and turn on high speed to puree.
Add remaining ingredients, except for oil, and run to blend and whip thoroughly.
With the motor running, slowly pour in oil and run until the dressing is thick and creamy.
(dressing can be prepared and refrigerated for up to 1 week.
).
As stated in the description, you may use 3/4 cup oil and 1/4 cup water or apple juice(or liquid of choice) and get a little thinner dressing.
Let sit for a few minutes to thicken up.
Salad:.
Put 1/2 cup of the dressing in the bottom of your salad bowl.
Add all ingredients, except lettuce, and toss to coat.
Serve:.
Put several lettuce leaves on each plate and add dressed salad.
Serve extra dressing on the side.
Enjoy!
7a6c6f2959.pred:
To prepare Super Veggie Salad With Creamy Almond Dressing, follow these steps:

1. In a small bowl, mix the chopped almonds, water, and lemon juice. Allow the mixture to sit for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
2. In a large bowl, combine the lemon juice, honey, salt, fresh basil, dill, and black pepper. Whisk to combine.
3. Add the canola oil to the bowl and whisk until the dressing is smooth and creamy.
4. In a large bowl, combine the small broccoli florets, thinly sliced mushroom, red onions, avocado, grape tomatoes, and romaine lettuce or butter lettuce.
5. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to coat the ingredients evenly.
6. Season the salad with additional salt and pepper, if desired.
7. Serve the Super Veggie Salad With Creamy Almond Dressing immediately or refrigerate for up to 24 hours before serving.

The required ingredients for this salad are: 6 tablespoons blanched almonds, 6 tablespoons water, 12 cup lemon juice, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 tablespoon fresh basil, 14 teaspoon dill, 14 teaspoon fresh cracked black pepper, 1 teaspoon lemon zest, 12-1 cup canola oil (or vegetable oil), kosher salt, 1 12 cups small broccoli florets, 1 cup thinly sliced mushroom, 6 slices red onions, 1 large ripe avocado, cubed, 12 teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper, 2 cups grape tomatoes (or cherry), 1 head romaine lettuce or 1 head butter lettuce.

c6b05c501b.gt:
Spread 1 bread slice with peanut butter, then spread other bread slice with jam; close to make sandwich.
Cook in skillet sprayed with cooking spray on medium heat 3 min.
on each side or until sandwich is golden brown on both sides.
Let stand 1 min.
; cut into quarters.
c6b05c501b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Spread one side of each slice of bread with seedless raspberry jam.
3. Spread the other side of each slice of bread with the PLANTERS Cherry Chocolate Peanut Butter with Semi-Sweet Chocolate, Cherries & Cranberries.
4. Place the bread slices with the jam side down on a baking sheet.
5. Bake the bread for 10-12 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the jam is bubbly.
6. Carefully flip the bread slices over and bake for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the bread is fully cooked through.
7. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. While the bread is cooling, spread a thin layer of the PLANTERS Cherry Chocolate Peanut Butter with Semi-Sweet Chocolate, Cherries & Cranberries on the other side of the bread slices.
9. Carefully place the bread slices with the jam side up on top of the other bread slices.
10. Serve the Toasted Cherry Chocolate Sandwich immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Toasted Cherry Chocolate Sandwich!

1b81060720.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Partially bake the pie crust for 5 minutes according to package (or your recipe) instructions.
Whisk together the sugar, flour, salt and cocoa powder in medium mixing bowl.
Blend in melted butter.
Add the eggs and vanilla and stir until well blended.
Pour into the pie crust and bake 45 minutes.
The filling will be soft in the center but not runny; do not overbake, as it will set up some as it cools.
If crust gets too brown, cover with a pie shield or aluminum foil.
Allow to cool to room temperature (this allows the fudge to set up.)
I think it is best served warmed.
I micowave a slice for about 20 seconds on high.
Top with your choice of ice cream, fudge sauce, whipped cream, nuts and cherries.
1b81060720.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, salt, and cocoa powder.
3. Add the melted butter and mix until the dough comes together.
4. Press the dough into a disk and wrap it in plastic. Chill the dough in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
5. In a separate mixing bowl, beat the eggs and vanilla extract until well combined.
6. Roll out the chilled dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
7. Line a 9-inch pie dish with the rolled-out dough, pressing the edges to create a neat edge.
8. Pour the egg mixture over the pie crust, making sure to cover the entire surface.
9. Bake the pie in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the filling is set and the crust is golden brown.
10. Allow the pie to cool completely before slicing and serving.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious Legendary Fudge Pie with a flaky crust and a rich, smooth filling.

83d2a64e21.gt:
Heat greased barbecue to medium heat.
Grill wings 7 to 8 min.
on each side or until done.
Meanwhile, mix Miracle Whip and Sriracha sauce in large bowl until blended.
Add wings to Miracle Whip mixture; toss to evenly coat.
Transfer to platter.
Sprinkle with onions.
83d2a64e21.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chicken wings, Miracle Whip, and Sriracha sauce until well coated.
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
4. Spread the chicken wings evenly on the prepared baking sheet.
5. Roast the chicken wings in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the skin is crispy.
6. Remove the chicken wings from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix the green onion with a little bit of Miracle Whip.
8. Once the chicken wings are cool enough to handle, use a fork to shred the meat from the bones.
9. Serve the shredded chicken wings with the green onion mixture on the side.

Enjoy your delicious and easy-to-make Simple Sriracha Chicken Wings!

05ef07d575.gt:
In small bowl, toss cheese and flour.
In small saucepan, heat buttermilk and cider.
Add cheese and caraway seeds.
Stir til melted.
Keep warm while serving.
Serve with chunks of rye bread for dipping.
05ef07d575.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the grated or sliced swiss cheese, flour, and caraway seed.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the buttermilk, apple cider, and a pinch of salt.
4. Pour the buttermilk mixture into the cheese mixture and stir until well combined.
5. Pour the mixture into a baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the dip is hot and bubbly.
6. Serve the warm and creamy Swiss Cheese Dip With Caraway immediately, and enjoy with your favorite crackers or bread.

1bf5668c79.gt:
Brown ground beef and onion powder in a large skillet over medium heat, drain off fat.
Mix together eggs, cream, mayonnaise, garlic powder, pepper and shredded cheddar cheese.
Put browned beef into a 9 inch pie plate, pour remaining ingredients over the beef.
Place in a preheated 350 degree oven and bake for 40-45 minutes.
1bf5668c79.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the ground beef, onion powder, garlic powder, pepper, and a pinch of salt. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the heavy cream, mayonnaise, and a pinch of salt.
4. Add the whisked mixture to the ground beef mixture, stirring to combine.
5. Add the beaten eggs to the mixture and stir to combine.
6. Pour the mixture into a greased 9-inch (23cm) round baking dish.
7. Sprinkle the shredded cheddar cheese evenly over the top of the mixture.
8. Bake the quiche in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
9. Remove the quiche from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Crustless Cheeseburger Quiche!

f51e8fb184.gt:
Cook dry beans according to instructions on packet.
(No need with canned beans).
Saute onions until they are soft and clear.
Add tomato paste, coconutcream and seasonings, stirring over a gentle heat until they form a smooth and creamy sauce.
Drain beans and add to sauce.
Allow to simmer gently for 15 minutes or so, stirring from time to time.
Serve on brown or white rice accompanied by a salad.
f51e8fb184.pred:
1. Rinse the beans thoroughly and pick out any debris or stones.
2. Place the beans in a large pot, cover with water, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 1-2 hours, or until the beans are tender but still firm.
3. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
4. Add the chopped tomato paste and cook for a few minutes until it becomes fragrant.
5. Add the coconut cream, paprika, chili powder, cumin, brown sugar, salt, and black pepper. Stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for about 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Carefully drain the cooked beans and add them to the skillet with the sauce. Stir to combine and heat through.
8. Serve the African Beans over rice or with your favorite side dish.

[/INST]

2. Place the beans in a large pot, cover with water, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 1-2 hours, or until the beans are tender but still firm.
