13a6ba0924.gt:
In a medium-sized pot, place dessicated coconut and water.
Mix and allow to soak for 1/2 an hour.
After 1/2 an hour, turn heat onto low and bring to a gentle simmer.
Simmer, covered, for 10 minutes.
Turn off heat and leave pot on element for 1/2 an hour.
After 1/2 an hour, transfer coconut mixture to blender or processor and process for 45 seconds.
Put a large sieve over a bowl and empty coconut mixture into it.
Press down hard on coconut solids with the back of a spoon to remove as much coconut milk as possible.
This method produces approximately 2 cups of coconut milk.
Can be made up to 2 days before use in a recipe and refrigerated, covered.
The milk will separate in the fridge, forming a creamy fat layer on top, and a thinner liquid layer underneath.
Not to worry, the fat layer will melt into the liquid when heated and form a lovely milk.
13a6ba0924.pred:
1. First, you will need to soak the desiccated coconut in water for at least 8 hours or overnight. This will help rehydrate the coconut and make it easier to grind.
2. After soaking, drain the water and rinse the coconut with fresh water.
3. Grind the coconut in a blender or food processor until it reaches a smooth consistency.
4. Add the water you have reserved from the initial soaking process, and blend the mixture until it reaches the desired consistency.
5. If the mixture is too thick, you can add more water to achieve the desired consistency.
6. Once the mixture is smooth and creamy, you can strain it through a cheesecloth or a nut milk bag to remove any remaining coconut pieces.
7. Store the coconut milk in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a perfect Make Your Own Coconut Milk.

ee28b1bd5a.gt:
Over medium high heat saute the onions stirring frequently (5min).
Add the tomato paste and keep stirring (5min).
Next add the berbere and cook for 5 minutes adding a little bit of water when the bottom of the pot starts catching.
Keep stirring.
Add the rinsed lentils and cook together for an additional 5 minutes (continue to stir adding a bit of water so that the mixture doesn't burn).
Add about 5 cups of water and bring to a boil.
Occasionally stir.
Once the water reduces and lentils have thickened add the ground coriander, garlic and salt.
Reduce heat and leave for about 5 minutes.
Serve with injera.
ee28b1bd5a.pred:
1. Rinse the red lentils and place them in a large pot.
2. Add 8 tablespoons of vegetable oil to the pot and cook the lentils over medium heat until they are tender but still have a slight bite.
3. In a small bowl, mix the tomato paste, berbere, and red onion. Add the mixture to the pot with the lentils, stirring to combine.
4. Cook the mixture for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the flavors are well-blended.
5. Add the garlic cloves to the pot and stir to combine.
6. In a small bowl, mix the coriander, 12 teaspoons of salt, and 8 cups of water. Pour the mixture over the lentil mixture and stir to combine.
7. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the lentils are tender and the sauce has thickened slightly.
8. Serve the Mesir Wat dish on top of injera bread.

[/INST]

55a63594d1.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F.
In a large bowl, combine 1/4 cup cheese, milk, egg, cumin, red pepper, corn muffin mix, corn, and green chilies; stir until moist.
Pour into a 9 x 13 baking dish coated with cooking spray.
Bake for 15 minutes.
Pierce surface liberally with a fork.
Pour enchilada sauce over the top.
Top with chicken and remaining 3/4 cup cheese.
Bake for an additional 15 minutes or until cheese melts.
Let stand for 5 minutes before cutting.
Serve with a dollop of sour cream on top.
Delicious!
55a63594d1.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded Mexican cheese, milk, egg, ground cumin, ground red pepper, and corn muffin mix. Mix well.
3. Add the cream style corn, chopped green chilies, and red enchilada sauce to the mixture. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the shredded chicken to the mixture and stir to combine.
5. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the casserole is hot and bubbly.
7. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

ea9ea44d2f.gt:
Place the cucumber, celery, garbanzo beans, carrots, raisins, and mint in a large bowl, and toss with the olive oil and red wine vinegar to coat.
Serve immediately.
ea9ea44d2f.pred:
1. Wash and peel the carrots, and shred them using a grater or a food processor.
2. Wash and peel the cucumber, and slice it into thin rounds.
3. Wash and peel the celery, and slice it into thin rounds.
4. Drain the garbanzo beans and rinse them.
5. Chop the fresh mint leaves.
6. In a large bowl, combine the shredded carrots, sliced cucumber, and chopped celery.
7. Add the drained garbanzo beans, raisins, and chopped fresh mint leaves.
8. In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil and red wine vinegar.
9. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
10. Serve the Cucumber and Mint Salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

This Cucumber and Mint Salad is a refreshing and healthy side dish that can be enjoyed as a light meal or a part of a larger dish. The combination of cucumber, celery, and mint provides a cool and crisp texture, while the garbanzo beans and raisins add a touch of protein and sweetness. The dressing made from olive oil and red wine vinegar enhances the flavors of the ingredients, making the salad a delightful and nutritious option.

eca8b785b9.gt:
Preheat oven to 250-300 degrees celcius (or mark 6).
Peel potatoes, wash and drain well.
Slice the potatoes as finely as possible or use a slicer to make things easier.
Rub the garlic around a baking dish or skillet.
Grease the dish with butter.
I also greased it with cream cheese.
Start laying the sliced potatoes in the dish separating them only slightly, keeping them compact.
Add salt, pepper, parsley.
Add a layer of cream.
Spread the cream on the potatoes.
Add some grated cheese.
Repeat step 5 for as many layers as you have potatoes.
You might need to add cream or cheese.
On the final layer top with some parsley and a lot of cheese and bake for 45-60minutes.
eca8b785b9.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Wash the potatoes thoroughly and pat them dry with a paper towel.
3. Cut the potatoes into evenly sized pieces, about 1-2 inches in size.
4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the potatoes, heavy cream, grated cheese, chopped parsley, garlic, and cream cheese.
5. Season the mixture with salt and pepper, to taste.
6. Transfer the potato mixture to a large baking dish or individual ramekins.
7. Dot the top of the potatoes with the remaining butter.
8. Bake the potatoes in the preheated oven for about 45-60 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

This Potatoes au Gratin recipe is a delicious and comforting dish that can be enjoyed as a side dish or a main course. The combination of potatoes, heavy cream, grated cheese, and other ingredients creates a rich and flavorful dish that is perfect for gatherings or special occasions.

1b5ad8b724.gt:
Cut cauliflower into florets.
Add them to the food processor and process until finely ground.
Dice one tomato and slice another tomato for garnishing.
In a large bowl, place the processed cauliflower, diced tomato, green onion, and garbanzo beans and mix.
Add 1/2 cup pesto and mix.
Taste and add more pesto if needed.
Season with black pepper.
Arrange the salad on a plate with tomato slices.
Infuse love and serve!
1b5ad8b724.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the cauliflower into florets and toss them in a bowl with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread them out on a baking sheet and roast them in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly browned.
3. While the cauliflower is roasting, cook the garbanzo beans according to the package instructions or cook them on the stovetop until they are tender.
4. In a large bowl, combine the roasted cauliflower, cooked garbanzo beans, chopped green onions, and the drained chickpeas.
5. In a small bowl, mix the pesto sauce with a little olive oil to create a smooth, creamy dressing.
6. Pour the pesto dressing over the salad and toss it well to coat the ingredients evenly.
7. Season the salad with additional black pepper to taste.
8. Serve the Cauliflower, Chickpea, and Pesto Salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving to allow the flavors to meld together.

This Cauliflower, Chickpea, and Pesto Salad is a delicious and nutritious meal that combines the natural flavors of cauliflower, chickpeas, and pesto. The roasted cauliflower adds a delightful crunch and warmth to the dish, while the chickpeas and garbanzo beans provide a hearty, protein-rich element. The pesto dressing adds a burst of fresh, herbal flavor, and the green onions add a touch of crunch and color. This salad is perfect for a light lunch, a side dish, or even a main course, and it can be easily customized with additional ingredients or flavors to suit your preferences.

a777a9be09.gt:
In a wide mouth 1 quart jar, layer the barley, peas, rice and lentils.
Then layer around the edges the onion, parsley, salt, lemon pepper, bouillon and the alphabet pasta.
Fill the rest of the jar with the twist macaroni.
Seal and attach a gift card.
The gift card should read: Add contents of jar to 3 quarts of water, 2 stalks of chopped celery, 2 sliced carrots, 1 cup of shredded cabbage (optional) and 2 cups diced tomatoes.
Over medium low heat, cover and simmer about 1 hour, or until vegetables are tender.
a777a9be09.pred:
1. Begin by preparing the ingredients:
- Rinse the barley, split peas, rice, lentils, and pasta in a large bowl.
- Drain the pasta and lentils, and set aside.
- Rinse the split peas and add them to the bowl.
- Rinse the barley and add it to the bowl.
- Rinse the rice and add it to the bowl.
- Rinse the dried onion and add it to the bowl.
- Rinse the parsley and add it to the bowl.
- Rinse the lemon pepper and add it to the bowl.
- Rinse the beef bouillon granules and add them to the bowl.
- Rinse the alphabet pasta and add it to the bowl.
- Rinse the twist macaroni and add it to the bowl.

2. Combine the ingredients in a large pot or Dutch oven, stirring to combine.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes or until the pasta is cooked through.
4. Remove the pot from the heat and let it sit for a few minutes.
5. Carefully transfer the contents of the pot to a clean jar, leaving about 1/2 inch of space at the top.
6. Allow the soup to cool for a few hours or overnight.
7. Store the jar in the refrigerator and enjoy your homemade Country Soup in a Jar.

[/INST]

a89cd4ec7b.gt:
Sprinkle all ingredients over 2 full slabs of pork/ribs
Light your grill and let coals cool to about 300F as to not over seer meat and fortify optimal flavor for an good medium paced cook
When ribs are 20 mins from finished brush both sides of ribs and continue to cook until finished (BBQ sauce should not be messy) BBQ sauce added to enhance flavor not overwhelm ribs
a89cd4ec7b.pred:
[INST]
To make Dangerously good ribs, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the ribs with a mixture of onion powder, garlic powder, and seasoned salt.
3. Place the ribs in a baking dish, and pour in 1 cup of Italian dressing.
4. Cover the dish with foil, and bake for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the meat is tender and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
5. Remove the foil, and let the ribs rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

f140cdb94b.gt:
In a saucepan over medium heat, combine sugar and water.
Cook, stirring frequently, until sugar is dissolved.
Stir in vanilla and almond extract.
Cool, and refrigerate.
To serve: In a punch bowl with ice, mix 1 cup syrup with 2 liters ginger ale or lemon-lime soda.
f140cdb94b.pred:
To make Vanilla Punch, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, combine 5 cups of white sugar and 2 cups of water. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly to ensure the sugar is fully dissolved.

2. Once the sugar has dissolved, add 2 tablespoons of clear imitation vanilla extract and 2 tablespoons of almond extract. Stir well to combine.

3. Reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until the desired sweetness is reached.

4. Remove the pot from the heat and let the mixture cool for a few minutes.

5. Pour the cooled mixture into a large pitcher or punch bowl.

6. Serve the Vanilla Punch immediately, garnished with a sprig of fresh mint or a slice of lemon, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Vanilla Punch!

eee6e2952e.gt:
In a bowl, toss the beef with 1/2 tablespoon of vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon of garlic, 2 teaspoons of sugar and the fish sauce; season with pepper.
Let stand.
In a bowl, toss the onion and vinegar.
In another bowl, mix the soy sauce with the olive oil and remaining 1/2 teaspoon of sugar.
Season with salt and pepper.
In a wok, heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil over high heat until smoking.
Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of garlic and 1/4 teaspoon of salt; cook until golden, about 30 seconds.
Add half of the meat and cook for 3 minutes without stirring; turn and cook 1 minute longer.
Transfer to a plate; cook the second batch.
Return the meat to the wok and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
On a large platter, toss the pea shoots with the onion and the soy dressing.
Spoon the beef on top and serve.
eee6e2952e.pred:
1. In a large skillet or wok, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.
2. Add the beef to the skillet and cook until browned, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the sugar, fish sauce, and pepper, and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the white wine vinegar and soy sauce, and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.
6. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, salt, and pepper.
7. Add the beef back to the skillet and toss it with the sauce mixture. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until the beef is fully cooked and the sauce has thickened slightly.
8. Add the baby pea shoots to the skillet and toss to combine. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until the pea shoots are heated through.
9. Serve the Shaking Beef with Pea Shoot Salad immediately.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
In this cooking guide, we have provided a detailed recipe for preparing Shaking Beef with Pea Shoot Salad. The essential ingredients include 1 pound beef sirloin, cut into 3/4-inch dice, 2 1/2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons minced garlic, 2 1/2 teaspoons sugar, 1 tablespoon Asian fish sauce, Freshly ground pepper, 1/2 medium onion, very thinly sliced, 2 teaspoons white wine vinegar, 2 teaspoons soy sauce, 2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil, Salt, and 6 ounces baby pea shoots.

To prepare the dish, start by heating the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant. Next, add the beef to the skillet and

9a8b0b4825.gt:
Beat eggs and sugar, and zest together in a medium bowl.
Sift in the flour, melted butter, baking powder and lemon zest.
Stir to combine.
Preheat oven to 180AC (360AF).
Lightly grease a 23-cm (9-in) tart pan with rimovable base.
Divide the pastry into two by putting the first half into the pan.
Pour-in over the mixture half of green apples.
Pour then the other half of the mixture and cover again with the remaining apples.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, until the center is fine to touch and a shewer comes out clean when tested.
Leave the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before turning out into a rack to cool completely.
Serve, share and enjoy!
9a8b0b4825.pred:
To make a delicious AMIEs APPLE cake, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the cake flour, baking powder, and lemon zest.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until just combined.
6. Fold in the sliced green apples.
7. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
8. Bake for about 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious AMIEs APPLE cake!

c089da7346.gt:
In a food processor or blender, blend berries and sugar until completely pureed, about 5 minutes.
Scrape mixture into a 9 -x-9" loaf pan and freeze until solid, at least 4 hours.
c089da7346.pred:
To make Mixed Berry Sorbet, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine the 3 cups of frozen mixed berries and 1 tablespoon of sugar.
2. Cover the bowl and refrigerate it for at least 2 hours or overnight.
3. After the mixture has chilled, remove it from the refrigerator and let it sit at room temperature for about 30 minutes.
4. Meanwhile, prepare an ice cream maker according to the manufacturer's instructions.
5. Once the mixture has reached room temperature, transfer it to the ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
6. After the ice cream has churned, transfer it to an airtight container and place it in the freezer for at least 2 hours or overnight.
7. After the sorbet has chilled, remove it from the freezer and let it sit at room temperature for about 30 minutes.
8. Serve the Mixed Berry Sorbet immediately or store it in the freezer for up to 2 weeks.

Enjoy your delicious Mixed Berry Sorbet!

34e60e4215.gt:
Whisk first 5 ingredients in bowl to blend.
(Can be made 1 day ahead.
Chill.
Bring to room temperature and rewhisk before using.)
Cut off peel and white pith from oranges.
Cut oranges into 1/4- to 1/2-inch-thick rounds.
Cut each round into quarters.
Transfer orange pieces to large bowl.
Add remaining ingredients and toss to combine.
Toss salad with enough dressing to coat and serve.
34e60e4215.pred:
[INST]To create a mouthwatering Arugula Salad With, Oranges, Pomegranate Seeds, and Goat Cheese dish, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine the arugula, pomegranate seeds, and red onion.
2. In a separate small bowl, whisk together the extra-virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, thawed frozen orange juice concentrate, coarse salt, and ground black pepper.
3. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to coat evenly.
4. Add the crumbled goat cheese to the salad and toss again.
5. Serve the salad immediately, allowing the flavors to meld together.

Enjoy your delicious Arugula Salad With, Oranges, Pomegranate Seeds, and Goat Cheese dish!
<</SYS>>

e621c384f2.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment.
Unfold pastry and cut into 4 equal squares.
2.
Spread 1 teaspoon mustard on each pastry square, leaving 1/4 inch border.
Layer 1 slice turkey, 1 slice Swiss, and 1 slice ham in the center of each square.
Whisk egg with 1 tablespoon water; brush onto edges of the square.
Fold squares to form triangles and crimp edges to seal.
Place on a baking sheet and brush with remaining egg mixture.
3.
Bake pastries for 25 minutes or until golden.
Dust with sugar and serve with preserves on the side.
e621c384f2.pred:
To create a delightful Puff Pastry Monte Cristo dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

2. Thaw the frozen puff pastry according to the package instructions.

3. In a small bowl, mix the honey mustard, confectioners sugar, and a pinch of salt.

4. Cut the thawed puff pastry into 4 equal squares.

5. In a small bowl, whisk the egg.

6. In a small skillet, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat.

7. Add the egg to the skillet and stir continuously until the egg is cooked through and slightly set.

8. Remove the egg from the skillet and let it cool slightly.

9. Place one of the puff pastry squares on a plate.

10. Spread a layer of the honey mustard mixture on the pastry square.

11. Top the honey mustard with a slice of smoked turkey, a slice of Swiss cheese, a slice of smoked ham, and a whole large egg.

12. Roll the pastry over the filling to encase it.

13. Repeat the process with the remaining puff pastry squares and filling.

14. Place the filled pastries on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes or until the pastry is golden brown and the filling is cooked through.

15. Serve the Puff Pastry Monte Cristo dish warm, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

[/INST]

2a96229516.gt:
Brown sausage in a skillet over med.
heat.
Drain fat and transfer to crockpot.
Combine remaining ingredients in crockpot.
Cover and cook on low 8 hrs.
or on high 4 hrs.
Remove bay leaves.
Serve over cooked rice.
2a96229516.pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks. Remove the sausage from the pot and set aside.

2. In the same pot, add the onions, green peppers, and celery. Cook until the vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.

3. Add the minced garlic and cook for an additional minute.

4. Stir in the thyme, oregano, white pepper, black pepper, and cayenne pepper. Cook for a few more minutes, until the spices are fragrant.

5. Pour in the chicken bouillon cube and bay leaves. Stir to combine.

6. Add the drained black beans, tomato sauce, and water. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the beans are tender and the sauce has thickened.

7. Add the cooked sausage back to the pot and stir to combine.

8. Cook for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the sausage is heated through and the rice is cooked to your desired level of doneness.

9. Serve the Creole Black Beans and Rice over rice, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

[/INST]

aaf069b0ba.gt:
Prepare coffee T DISC in mug or large heatproof glass.
Add brown sugar and light cream; stir.
Top with thawed whipped topping and a light sprinkling of ground cinnamon.
Add cinnamon stick.
aaf069b0ba.pred:
1. In a saucepan, combine the 1 tablespoon of brown sugar and the 1 tablespoon of light cream. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the sugar is dissolved.
2. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the thawed Cool Whip Whipped Topping.
3. Add the 2 tablespoons of ground cinnamon and the 1 cinnamon stick to the mixture. Stir to combine.
4. Pour the mixture into a glass or a mug.
5. Serve the Fantastic French Vanilla immediately.

This recipe is a simple and delicious way to enjoy a warm, comforting beverage. The combination of the rich, warm flavors of the coffee, the sweetness of the brown sugar and light cream, and the creamy texture of the Cool Whip Whipped Topping creates a delightful and satisfying drink. The addition of the cinnamon and cinnamon stick enhances the flavor profile, giving the drink a warm, spicy, and comforting aroma. This recipe is perfect for a cozy evening at home or as a delightful treat to share with friends and family.

24b368b73d.gt:
To make Salad: Toast pine nuts in skillet over medium heat 5 minutes, or until golden brown.
Transfer to plate to cool.
Combine radicchio, radishes, fennel, and cucumber in large bowl.
To make Lemon-Mint Dressing: Puree mint, lemon juice, oil, maple syrup, and mustard in blender until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add dressing to salad; toss to coat, and garnish with toasted pine nuts.
24b368b73d.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the pine nuts with a drizzle of olive oil and a pinch of salt. Spread the pine nuts evenly on a baking sheet and roast for 5-7 minutes, or until they are golden and fragrant.
3. In a large bowl, combine the large head of radicchio, red radishes, fennel bulb, and cucumber.
4. In a small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, maple syrup, and Dijon mustard.
5. Pour the dressing over the salad mixture and toss to coat evenly.
6. Season the salad with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the Radicchio, Radish, and Fennel Salad immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
This cooking tutorial is designed to guide you through the process of making a delicious Radicchio, Radish, and Fennel Salad. The ingredients include 1/2 cup pine nuts, 1 large head of radicchio, quartered and thinly shredded, 6 red radishes, finely sliced, 1 fennel bulb, trimmed, halved, and finely sliced, 1 large cucumber, sliced into 1/4-inch matchsticks, 1/2 cup fresh mint leaves, 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1/4 cup olive oil, 2 Tbs. pure maple syrup, and 1 1/2 Tbs. Dijon mustard.

First, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) to roast the pine nuts. Next, combine the ingredients for the salad in a large bowl, and then toss them with the dressing made from lemon juice, maple syrup, and Dijon mustard. Season the salad with salt and pepper to taste.

Finally, serve the Radicchio, Radish, and Fennel

6002037e6e.gt:
Add Angostura bitters to a chilled old-fashioned glass and swirl to coat glass; pour off excess.
Add gin and, if you like, ice and a splash of soda water.
6002037e6e.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients:
- 3 dashes Angostura bitters
- 2 ounces London Dry-style gin
- Splash of soda water (optional)

2. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
3. Add the gin and bitters to the mixing glass.
4. Stir the ingredients together.
5. If desired, add a splash of soda water to the mixing glass.
6. Stir again to combine the ingredients.
7. Strain the mixture into a cocktail glass.
8. Garnish with a lemon twist, if desired.
9. Enjoy your Pink Gin!

Please note that the recipe may vary depending on personal preferences and the specific ingredients available. Feel free to experiment with different bitters or gin brands to find your favorite combination.

fb12110aad.gt:
Brown beef strips in 1 tablespoon oil in nonstick skillet; cook 1 to 2 minutes.
Stir in cooking sauce and sour cream.
Simmer 8 minutes or until sauce thickens, stirring occasionally.
Serve over noodles.
fb12110aad.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the cooked seasoned frozen beef strips and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil and cook the onions until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
5. Add the mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Pour the ProgressoTM Recipe StartersTM creamy portabella mushroom cooking sauce into the skillet and stir to combine with the onions and mushrooms.
7. Add the sour cream to the skillet and stir until the sauce is smooth and creamy.
8. Return the cooked beef to the skillet and stir to combine with the sauce.
9. Cook the beef and sauce mixture for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the beef is fully cooked through.
10. If desired, cook the hot cooked noodles according to the package instructions and serve the beef stroganoff over the noodles.

[/INST]

b1cd30f000.gt:
Brown the chorizo and ground meat.
Add cumin, salt, ketchup, and garlic.
Beat the eggs add 2 tablespoonfuls of water as you beat them
In another pan add your beaten eggs fry, and roll the pan a bit.
add water and steam with lid on this is to toughen the egg a bit and to get eggs done.
Remove from heat add meat to it and roll it up shred the cheese on top.
Serve hope you enjoy!
b1cd30f000.pred:
To create a delicious Spanish style eggs dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the chopped chorizo and cook until it is browned and crispy, about 5-7 minutes.

2. Add the ground meat to the skillet and cook until it is browned and fully cooked through, about 10-12 minutes.

3. Add the ground cumin, granulated garlic powder, and salt to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.

4. In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs, water, and a pinch of salt.

5. Pour the egg mixture into the skillet with the meat and spices. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the eggs are fully cooked and the mixture is slightly set, about 5-7 minutes.

6. Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the finely shredded sharp cheddar cheese.

7. Place the skillet in a steamer or use a steamer insert, and steam the dish for 2-3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the eggs are fully cooked through.

8. Serve the Spanish style eggs hot, garnished with chopped parsley or cilantro, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Spanish style eggs dish!

c382163c5c.gt:
Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F. Set a rack on each of 2 baking sheets.
In a bowl, toss the sweet potato slices with the oil and season with salt and pepper; make sure each slice is coated with oil.
Arrange the slices in a single layer on the racks.
Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, rotating the sheets halfway through baking, until the chips are deeply golden.
The chips will crisp as they cool.
Looking for more quick and easy recipes?
Check out our quick family-favorites, fast dinners for weeknights, and healthy recipes for less than $3 a serving.
c382163c5c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Wash and peel the sweet potato, then cut it into thin, evenly sized chips.
3. In a large bowl, toss the sweet potato chips with the extra-virgin olive oil, kosher salt, and freshly ground pepper.
4. Spread the chips out on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Bake the chips in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy.
6. Remove the chips from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Baked Sweet Potato Chips!

f4794c8922.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Smooth all filling ingredients together in a large bowl.
Place filling in a 9-inch glass pie plate and bake for 35-40 minutes, until golden.
Let cool for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, stir together topping ingredients and spread on top of cheesecake.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.
f4794c8922.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla extract.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the low-fat sour cream and organic unbleached cane sugar until smooth.
5. Pour the sour cream mixture into the cream cheese mixture and mix until smooth.
6. Pour the mixture into a greased 9-inch (23 cm) springform pan.
7. Bake for 45-50 minutes or until the center is set.
8. Allow the pie to cool completely on a wire rack.
9. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.

This cooking tutorial for Grandma's Crustless Baked Cheesecake Pie includes the essential ingredients, such as reduced-fat cream cheese, natural cane sugar, eggs, low-fat sour cream, organic unbleached cane sugar, and vanilla extract. By following these steps, you can create a delicious and satisfying cheesecake pie that is both easy to make and enjoyable to share with family and friends.

0bb9567cbe.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Separate each biscuit into 3 pieces.
Place on baking sheet.
Combine the cheese, mayo, onion, bacon, sugar, garlic salt and hot pepper sauce in a medium bowl; mix well.
Place a spoonful of the mixture, spreading evenly, on each biscuit round.
Bake 10 minutes or until golden.
0bb9567cbe.pred:
To prepare a delicious Bacon Biscuit Puffs dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the grated cheddar cheese or swiss cheese, mayonnaise, sugar, garlic salt, and hot pepper sauce. Mix well to ensure the cheese is evenly distributed and the flavors are combined.
3. Add the cooked crumbled bacon to the mixture and stir to combine.
4. Next, carefully open the can of refrigerated layer biscuits and place them in the bowl with the cheese mixture. Gently toss the biscuits to coat them evenly with the cheese mixture.
5. Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish or a muffin tin, ensuring that the biscuits are evenly distributed.
6. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the biscuits are golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Allow the dish to cool for a few minutes before serving.

This Bacon Biscuit Puffs dish is a delicious and satisfying breakfast or brunch option that combines the flavors of crispy bacon, gooey cheese, and the tangy mayonnaise. The addition of the garlic salt and hot pepper sauce adds a unique and savory twist to the dish, making it a popular choice for those who enjoy a spicy kick in their breakfast.

b150cd3f5e.gt:
Grease and flour a standard loaf pan.
Preheat oven to 350F.
Combine first 7 ingredients in bowl of food processor and pulse a few times to mix.
Add butter and one egg.
Process until mixture is moistened.
With machine running, add remaining ingredients, scraping bowl as necessary.
Bake for 1 hour and 10 minutes, or until tester comes out clean.
Cool in pan 10 minutes.
Remove from pan and cool on rack.
b150cd3f5e.pred: [INST]To make the Pumpkin Spice Pound Cake, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9x13 inch baking dish. In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and ginger. Add the cold unsalted butter and mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and vanilla extract. Gradually add the pumpkin puree to the dry ingredients, mixing until just combined. Pour the batter into the prepared baking dish and smooth the top with a spatula. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely. Enjoy your delicious Pumpkin Spice Pound Cake!

524529d38b.gt:
Add ingredients (except for cornmeal) to machine bread pan in order as per manufacturer's instructions.
Set to "Dough" cycle.
Lightly grease one 9 x 13-inch pan and sprinkle with cornmeal.
When the dough cycle is complete, roll out dough and place in pan.
Let rest in pans for 10-15 minutes.
Add toppings of your choice.
Bake at 350F until done (approximately 20 minutes, depending on the thickness of toppings).
I make the pizza in 9x13 rectangular pans rather than the round pizza pans, because the squares pieces are easier to reheat and pack in school lunches.
524529d38b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the water, sugar, salt, and olive oil.
3. Add the cornmeal and flour, and mix until a dough forms.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it is smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Place the dough in a greased bowl, cover it with a damp cloth, and let it rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
6. Punch down the dough, and transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
7. Roll out the dough to your desired thickness, and transfer it to a greased pizza stone or baking sheet.
8. Spread the desired amount of sauce on the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
9. Add your desired toppings, such as cheese, meats, and vegetables.
10. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Remove the pizza from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

9c6c383e4a.gt:
Boil the spaghetti for 15 minutes.
Boil the soy granules for 10 minutes.
Heat the oil in a heavy skillet.
Add the diced onions.
Saute for 2-3 minutes.
Add the tomatoes, soy granules, ground pepper, sea salt, paprika, red wine and dry basil.
Cook for 3 minutes then add the yeast flakes and stir.
Remove from heat.
Last but not least, add the minced garlic cloves (we dont want to heat the garlic too much).
Pour the Bolognese sauce over the spaghetti, garnish with fresh basil, and serve!
9c6c383e4a.pred:
To make Vegan Bolognese Spaghetti, follow these steps:

1. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions until it is al dente.
2. In a large pan, heat the unrefined sunflower oil over medium heat.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
4. Add the diced onions and cook until they are softened and translucent.
5. Add the soy granules and cook for a few minutes, stirring to combine.
6. Add the ground pepper, sea salt, sweet paprika, and red wine (if using) to the pan. Stir to combine.
7. Add the diced tomatoes and cook for a few minutes, stirring occasionally.
8. Add the dry basil and cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally.
9. Add the ground yeast flakes and stir to combine.
10. Cook the mixture for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened.
11. If the sauce is too thick, you can add a little water or broth to achieve the desired consistency.
12. Taste the sauce and adjust the seasoning as needed.
13. Serve the Vegan Bolognese Spaghetti over the cooked spaghetti.

Enjoy your delicious Vegan Bolognese Spaghetti!

96d86ade02.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Spray baking dish with cooking spray.
Add chicken pieces and season with garlic powder and onion powder.
Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes.
In a bowl, mix barbecue sauce, honey, ginger, and Worcestershire sauce.
Pour evenly over chicken and bake uncovered for 20-25 additional minutes or until sauce thickens and internal temperature is 180F.
96d86ade02.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chicken pieces with the barbecue sauce, honey, ginger, Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, and onion powder.
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
4. Place the chicken pieces on the prepared baking sheet, making sure they are evenly spaced.
5. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for about 1 hour or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into pieces and serving.

[/INST]

97692d5fc3.gt:
Spread tortilla with dressing and mustard; top with remaining ingredients.
Fold in opposite sides of tortilla, then roll up from one end, leaving top end open.
Place on microwaveable plate.
Microwave on HIGH 1 min.
or until heated through.
97692d5fc3.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: a 10-inch flour tortilla, MIRACLE WHIP Dressing, GREY POUPON Dijon Mustard, leftover cooked ham, sliced, cut into strips, prepared STOVE TOP Stuffing Mix, and chopped tomatoes.

2. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

3. Place the flour tortilla on a flat surface.

4. Spread a thin layer of MIRACLE WHIP Dressing on one half of the tortilla.

5. On the other half of the tortilla, spread a thin layer of GREY POUPON Dijon Mustard.

6. Place the cooked ham strips on top of the mustard-covered half of the tortilla.

7. Sprinkle the prepared STOVE TOP Stuffing Mix evenly over the ham.

8. Add the chopped tomatoes on top of the stuffing.

9. Fold the tortilla in half, enclosing the ingredients.

10. Place the folded tortilla in the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the tortilla is crispy and the filling is hot and bubbly.

11. Remove the wrap from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into wedges and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Ham 'n Stuff Wrap!

0c55421a39.gt:
Combine the ingredients in the order listed in a spill proof shaker and shake until thoroughly mixed.
Top wtih whipped cream and grated chocolate, if using.
Serve immediately.
0c55421a39.pred:
To cook a delightful Creamy, Bubbly Italian Sodas dish, follow these steps:

1. In a blender, combine 4 ounces of fluid Hazelnut Or Raspberry Syrup, 12 ounces of fluid Sparkling Water, and 1/4 cup of Crushed Ice. Blend until smooth and creamy.

2. In a separate bowl, whisk together 1/4 cup of Half-and-half and 1/4 cup of Whipped Cream For Topping (optional).

3. Pour the blended mixture into a glass, and gently stir in the whipped cream mixture.

4. Garnish the drink with a drizzle of Grated Chocolate (optional) and a sprinkle of Whipped Cream For Topping (optional).

This delicious Creamy, Bubbly Italian Sodas dish is perfect for a refreshing and indulgent treat. The combination of the creamy syrup, sparkling water, and whipped cream creates a delightful and satisfying beverage. The grated chocolate adds an extra touch of luxury and flavor, making it a perfect choice for a special occasion or simply to enjoy on a warm day.

276686850b.gt:
Add 3 quarts water and olive oil to 6 quart pot.
Bring water to a boil.
Add noodles and boil 6 minutes.
No salt!
While noodles cook, pour cans of soup and Albacore into large mixing bowl and stir with a fork adding one soup can of water until it is smooth like gravy.
When noodles are done, drain them and rinse them with hot water.
Return cooked noodles to pan and add soup and tuna while stirring.
Pour tuna and noodle mixture into 9"x13" baking pan.
Sprinkle with pepper, garlic powder and spread both cheeses.
Add french fried onions evenly over the top of noodle mixture.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake in pre-heated 350 oven for 30 minutes.
Remove foil after baking for 30 minutes and increase oven temperature to 400 for 10 more minutes to brown onions and seal cheeses.
Cut into large squares and serve while hot.
276686850b.pred:
[INST]Albacore Tuna Casserole:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cook the wide egg noodles according to package instructions until they are tender.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked noodles, canned Albacore Tuna, Cream of Mushroom Soup, Parmesan and Cheddar cheeses, French Fried Onions, ground black pepper, garlic powder, and olive oil. Mix well.
4. Transfer the mixture to a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Serve hot and enjoy!

[/INST]

8582739828.gt:
Whisk together 2/3 cup broth, soy sauce, brown sugar, ketchup, ginger, garlic, and vinegar and pour into a large sealable plastic bag.
Add tenderloin and seal bag, then marinate, chilled, turning bag over occasionally, 2 hours.
Bring tenderloin to room temperature, about 1 hour.
Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 425F.
Pat tenderloin dry and reserve marinade.
Heat oil in a 12-inch ovenproof skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown tenderloin on all sides, turning with tongs, about 3 minutes total.
Transfer skillet to oven and roast pork until thermometer inserted diagonally into center of meat registers 155F, 12 to 15 minutes.
Transfer to a cutting board and let stand, loosely covered with foil, 10 minutes.
While meat is roasting, pour marinade through a fine-mesh sieve into a small saucepan and boil until reduced to about 1/3 cup, 10 to 15 minutes.
Stir in remaining cup broth and bring sauce to a simmer.
Serve slices of tenderloin with sauce.
8582739828.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the chicken broth, soy sauce, brown sugar, ketchup or tomato paste, and minced garlic.
3. Season the pork tenderloin with salt and pepper.
4. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
5. Place the pork tenderloin in the skillet and sear for 2-3 minutes on each side to create a nice crust.
6. Remove the pork from the skillet and place it on a baking tray.
7. Pour the marinade mixture over the pork tenderloin and make sure it is evenly coated.
8. Place the pork tenderloin in the preheated oven and cook for 15-20 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
9. Remove the pork from the oven and let it rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
Please provide the step-by-step instructions for cooking a delicious Ginger-Marinated Pork Tenderloin from scratch using the following ingredients: 1 2/3 cups chicken broth (13 1/2 ounces),1/4 cup soy sauce,1/4 cup packed brown sugar,3 tablespoons ketchup or 2 tablespoons tomato paste,3 tablespoons finely grated peeled fresh ginger,3 garlic cloves, minced,1 tablespoon cider vinegar or balsamic vinegar,1 (3/4 pound) pork tenderloin,1 tablespoon olive oil,Special equipment: an instant-read thermometer.

1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the chicken broth, soy sauce, brown sugar, ketchup or tomato paste, and minced garlic.
3. Season the pork tenderloin with salt and pe

12fdd3534c.gt:
Preheat oven to 180 degrees.
Place in a saucepan the sugar, mashed banana, bi-carb soda, milk and margarine/butter.
Stir until it is a caramel colour.
Cool mixture.
When mixture is cool, add the eggs and flour.
Mix until combined.
Place into a greased cake/loaf tin.
Bake in the oven for approx 25-30 mins or until a skewer comes out clean when inserted.
Top with your favourite Cream Cheese Icing when cooled.
12fdd3534c.pred:
To make a delightful Lynnie's Super Moist Banana Cake dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the margarine or butter until soft and fluffy.
3. Add the sugar and continue to cream until light and fluffy.
4. Add the mashed banana and bicarbonate of soda, and mix well.
5. Gradually add the milk, mixing until smooth.
6. In a separate bowl, whisk together the self-raising flour, eggs, and a pinch of salt.
7. Gradually add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until just combined.
8. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) cake pan.
9. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Lynnie's Super Moist Banana Cake!

b7bd1b9a99.gt:
Combine 1 cup broth and butter in small saucepan.
Bring to boil over high heat.
Continue to boil until liquid is reduced to 1/4 cup and has a syrupy consistency, about 15-20 minutes.
Stir in cream.
Set aside.
Bring remaining 12 cups broth to a boil in Dutch oven.
Add egg noodles and celery; cook until noodles are tender.
Stir in reserved cream mixture; add chicken.
Season to taste with salt and pepper, add parsley.
Heat just to serving temperature.
Do not boil.
b7bd1b9a99.pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the whipping cream and cook until the cream is hot and bubbly.
2. Add the chicken broth, egg noodles, celery, and carrots to the pot. Stir to combine.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the noodles are cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
4. Season the soup with poultry seasoning, salt, and pepper to taste.
5. Carefully transfer the soup to a large bowl or serving dish, and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your Comforting Chicken Noodle Soup!

bc714d6f9c.gt:
Heat oil in medium saucepan over medium-high heat.
Add onion; cook 2 to 3 minutes or until tender, stirring occasionally.
Add rice; cook 1 to 2 minutes more or until rice is browned lightly, stirring frequently.
Add broth, drained tomatoes, chili powder and cumin to saucepan; stir to combine.
Bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes or until liquid is absorbed.
bc714d6f9c.pred:
1. Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the rice, chili powder, and cumin to the saucepan. Stir to combine.
4. Pour in the chicken broth and Ro*Tel can. Stir to combine.
5. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the saucepan.
6. Simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
7. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Serve the Spanish Rice warm.

[/SYS]

02b1542927.gt:
Preheat oven to 180C/160C fan forced.
line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place thighs on a work surface, open out and generously spread tapenade inside each.
Fold fillets back into shape.
Cut pastry sheets in half.
Place chicken at one end of the sheet fold edges in, fold pastry over chicken and roll to make a neat parcel.
Pinch sides to seal.
Place, seam-side down, on a prepared tray.
Brush with egg to glaze.
Sprinkle with basil.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and pastry is golden brown.
Serve with vegetables.
02b1542927.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the basil and parmesan tapenade.
3. Season the chicken thigh fillets with salt and pepper.
4. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken thigh fillets and cook until browned on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
5. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
6. In the same skillet, add the frozen butter puff pastry sheets. Cook until the pastry is golden brown, about 2-3 minutes.
7. Carefully place the chicken thigh fillets on top of the cooked pastry.
8. Spread the basil and parmesan tapenade mixture over the chicken.
9. Carefully crack an egg over the top of the chicken and pastry.
10. Bake the Chicken Wellingtons in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the egg is cooked to your desired level of doneness.
11. Remove the Chicken Wellingtons from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.
12. Garnish with dried basil leaves.
13. Serve the Chicken Wellingtons with steamed green and yellow vegetables on the side.

[/INST]

3c3d0872d0.gt:
FOR THE STEAK: In a large bowl, marinate sirloin steak in minced garlic, minced shallots, soy sauce, ginger, and the juice from the limes& lemons.
This should marinate for at least 2 hours in the refrigerator.
Over a high using a saute pan or cast iron pan, sear the sirloin on all sides until charred but not overcooked.
Place pan in a 400 degree oven until cooked.
Steak should be rare to medium rare.
Steak can be grilled also FOR THE GARNISH: In a small bowl, marinate red onions in rice vinegar, soy sauce, and the juice from the limes& lemons, then set aside.
Remove steak from refrigerator, slice very thin using a very sharp knife.
TO SERVE: On a flat plate or platter, spread out the marinated red onions evenly.
Layer sliced sirloin over the red onions.
Garnish with chopped green onions This should be served slightly chilled.
3c3d0872d0.pred:
To make a delicious Steak Tataki With Citrus Ponzu dish, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the steaks: Remove the fat from the sirloin steaks, and cut them into thin slices.

2. Prepare the marinade: In a large bowl, mix the minced garlic, shallots, tamari soy sauce, ginger, lime juice, and rice vinegar. Add the sliced steaks to the marinade and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.

3. Prepare the Ponzu sauce: In a small bowl, mix the lime juice, tamari soy sauce, and green onions.

4. Cook the steaks: Preheat a skillet or grill pan over medium-high heat. Cook the steaks for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until they are cooked to your desired level of doneness.

5. Serve: Remove the steaks from the marinade, and transfer them to a serving plate. Pour the Ponzu sauce over the steaks, and garnish with thinly sliced green onions.

6. Enjoy: Serve the Steak Tataki With Citrus Ponzu dish immediately, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

0fa7e0e5ac.gt:
In a large bowl, whip heavy whipping cream until firm peaks form.
Spoon into a separate bowl and set aside.
In the same bowl you just whipped the cream in, stir pumpkin, ricotta, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and vanilla together.
Scrape sides and whip 1 minute.
Carefully fold in whipped cream.
Spoon or pipe into sugar cones and top with chocolate chips and walnuts.
Serve.
0fa7e0e5ac.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pumpkin puree, ricotta cheese, and granulated sugar. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla extract, and mix until well combined.
4. Fill the sugar cones with the pumpkin mixture, leaving a small amount of space at the top.
5. Bake the filled sugar cones in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the filling is set and the edges are slightly golden.
6. Remove the baked cones from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Meanwhile, melt the chocolate chips and walnuts in a double boiler or a heat-resistant bowl set over a pot of simmering water.
8. Once the cones are cool enough to handle, carefully remove the sugar cone shells and fill them with the melted chocolate and walnut mixture.
9. Return the filled cones to the oven and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the chocolate filling is set and the edges are slightly golden.
10. Allow the baked cones to cool completely before serving.

[/INST]

e81515ca45.gt:
Slice the chicken tenders diagonally into thin strips and season lightly with salt and pepper.
It's easiest to slice partially defrosted tenders.
Cut off both ends of the cucumbers and chop roughly into thin long pieces.
After 3 minutes, when the sauce thickens from the katakuriko coated on the chicken like the photo, it's done.
Heat 1 tablespoon of sesame oil in a pan over medium heat, and add the chicken tenders.
Spread out the pieces and fry.
Lightly fry both sides, add the cucumbers and stir fry for about 1 minute.
Turn up the heat to high, and add the ingredients listed under [A] (water or soup stock, vinegar, sugar, ketchup, tonkatsu sauce and salt).
Stir fry for 3 minutes while shaking the pan, being careful not to let the sauce burn.
After 3 minutes, when the sauce thickens from the katakuriko coated on the chicken like the photo above, it's done.
Doesn't it look delicious?
e81515ca45.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the Katakuriko, salt, and pepper.
3. In a large skillet or wok, heat some oil over medium heat.
4. Add the chicken tenders and cook until they are browned and cooked through. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the cucumbers and cook until they are tender.
6. Add the Katakuriko mixture to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook for a few minutes until the sauce thickens slightly.
7. Add the cooked chicken tenders back to the skillet and stir to combine.
8. Pour in the water or Chinese soup, vinegar, sugar, ketchup, and tonkatsu sauce. Stir to combine.
9. Cook the dish for a few minutes until the sauce has thickened and the chicken is fully cooked.
10. Serve the Cucumber and Chicken Sweet and Sour Stir-fry over rice or noodles.

[/INST]

2f161399c5.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook and stir sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
Stir in cream cheese.
Unroll crescent dough and separate into individual pieces; spoon 2 to 3 teaspoons sausage mixture onto each piece of dough.
Roll dough around filling.
Brush each crescent roll with egg white.
Arrange crescent rolls on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven until rolls are lightly browned, about 15 minutes.
2f161399c5.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sausage, cream cheese, and egg white. Mix until well combined.
3. Unroll one package of crescent rolls and press the seams together to form a large rectangle.
4. Spread the sausage mixture evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges for the crescent rolls to rise.
5. Roll the dough over the sausage mixture, starting from the long side and rolling towards the short side.
6. Place the filled crescent rolls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the crescent rolls are golden brown.
8. Remove from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before cutting them into slices.

Enjoy your delicious Easy Sausage Rolls!

73d085e33c.gt:
Preheat a panini grill.
Slice each quarter of focaccia bread in half horizontally.
Spread each half with pesto.
Layer bottom halves with equal amounts chicken, bell pepper, onion, and cheese.
Top with remaining focaccia halves, forming 4 sandwiches.
Grill paninis 5 minutes in the preheated grill, or until focaccia bread is golden brown and cheese is melted.
73d085e33c.pred:
To prepare a delicious Chicken Pesto Paninis dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Place a quartered focaccia bread on a baking sheet.
3. Spread 1/2 cup prepared basil pesto evenly over the bread.
4. Add 1 cup diced cooked chicken, 1/2 cup diced green bell pepper, and 1/4 cup diced red onion on top of the pesto.
5. Sprinkle 1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese on top of the ingredients.
6. Bake the focaccia bread in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the focaccia bread from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Cut the cooled focaccia bread into quarters, and serve the Chicken Pesto Paninis warm.

This delicious Chicken Pesto Paninis dish combines the flavors of pesto, chicken, and cheese, creating a satisfying and tasty meal. The combination of ingredients, along with the warmth of the focaccia bread, makes for a delightful dining experience.

0787add592.gt:
Fry the egg and season with salt and pepper.
Add all other ingredients to a bowl and top with warm egg.
Drizzle with balsamic syrup.
0787add592.pred:
To create a delicious Quinoa Breakfast Bowl with Egg, Tomatoes, and Avocado, follow these steps:

1. Cook the quinoa according to the package instructions, typically by boiling in water and then simmering until the quinoa is tender and fluffy.
2. While the quinoa is cooking, chop the basil and slice the avocado.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the balsamic drizzle and a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. Once the quinoa is cooked, let it cool for a few minutes.
5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, sliced avocado, and chopped basil.
6. Crack the egg into the bowl and mix everything together gently.
7. Heat a small amount of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the egg and cook until the whites are set and the yolks are still runny.
8. Carefully pour the cooked egg mixture over the quinoa mixture and stir gently to combine.
9. Drizzle the balsamic mixture over the egg and quinoa mixture.
10. Serve the Quinoa Breakfast Bowl immediately, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

[/INST]

84afda0ee0.gt:
Boil egg noodles with a pinch of salt until cooked.
Add half of the soy sauce and allow to sit
(While noodles are boiling) Cut Chicken Breast into strips
Cut all vegetables to your liking.
Heat Vegetable Oil in a deep pan and add chicken, garlic, salt and pepper.
Fry until cooked
Add vegetables and cook until cooked
Add Cooked Egg Noodles and the rest of the soy sauce plus lemon.
(I like to add a table spoon of sweet chilli sauce aswell)
Serve and Enjoy :)))
84afda0ee0.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the onion, bell peppers, and spring onions. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Add the mushrooms and garlic to the skillet. Cook until the mushrooms are tender and the garlic is fragrant, about 3-5 minutes.
7. Add the soy sauce, lemon juice, and ginger to the skillet. Stir to combine.
8. Add the cooked chicken breasts back to the skillet and stir to combine.
9. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the chicken is heated through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
10. Cook the egg noodles according to the package instructions.
11. Serve the chicken noodle stir fry over a bed of cooked noodles.

Enjoy your delicious Nessa's Chicken Noodle Stir Fry!

9001c0cfc6.gt:
FRIED POUNDED PASTE FOR BASE
in pan with oil saute pounded paste till fragrant and lightly but not burn then drain excess oil
MAKE THAI CURRY NOODLE
in pan with 1 tbsp of oil saute thai red curry paste for half minute then add fried pounded paste with water and bring to a boil
put flat udon noodle and simmer for 13 minutes and add dash of fish sauce or light soy sauce then stir often to prevent burn bottom and sauce start thickening
add tomato and off heat
serve thai curry udon noodle with eggs
9001c0cfc6.pred:
1. In a large pot, bring the water to a boil. Add the egg and cook until the egg whites are set and the yolks are still runny. Remove the egg from the water and set aside.

2. In a separate pot, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the pounded shallot and cook until softened.

3. Add the pounded dried prawn to the pot and cook until they are slightly browned.

4. Add the thai red curry paste to the pot and cook for a few minutes, stirring constantly, until fragrant.

5. Add the tomatoes to the pot and cook until they are softened.

6. Add the cooked egg to the pot and stir to combine.

7. If desired, add the fish sauce or light soy sauce to taste.

8. Add the brown sugar to the pot and stir to combine.

9. Cook the curry over medium heat for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened and the flavors have melded together.

10. Serve the Thai Curry Udon Noodle hot, garnished with chopped cilantro, if desired.

[/INST]

ce8b9b020c.gt:
Preheat oven to Grill/Broil.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium high heat.
Add chicken and garlic and saute until chicken juices run clear, about 7 to 10 minutes.
Drain fat from skillet and stir in sauce.
Place chicken mixture on a cookie sheet and broil in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes, or until browned.
Let sit about 5 minutes to allow sauce to thicken.
ce8b9b020c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cubed chicken breast halves, minced garlic, and oil. Season the chicken with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
4. Spread the chicken mixture evenly on the prepared baking sheet, and bake for 20-25 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
5. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the stir-fry sauce by pouring the contents of the bottle into a small bowl.
6. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. In a large skillet or wok, heat a small amount of oil over medium-high heat. Add the cooked chicken to the skillet, and stir-fry for a few minutes until the chicken is heated through and the sauce is well-coated.
8. Serve the Crazy Chicken immediately, garnished with any desired toppings or sauces.

[/INST]

df0f792c26.gt:
Open amount of cans as needed.
Usually, one 15 oz can Enchilada Sauce per two two 4 oz Cans Green Chili.
Drain green chilies, Hatch Chilies always being best but do as you can, [we save the juices for later use here] mix both and heat in microwave or on stove.
Double or triple recipe as needed.
Feel free to add fresh Cilantro or even shredded pork or chicken if you have it.
Pour this sauce over most any Mexican dish!
These are a few great Enchilada Sauce brands we enjoy here in Albuquerque that are redily available.
A tip?
Don't tell anybody how easy this sauce is.
They really won't believe you.
Enjoy!
df0f792c26.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the can of Hatch Enchilada Sauce over medium heat.
3. Add the two cans of drained green chiles to the skillet. Cook for a few minutes, stirring occasionally, until the chiles are heated through.
4. If desired, add a pinch of ground cumin to enhance the flavor.
5. Pour the heated sauce and green chiles into a large mixing bowl.
6. Add the 1/3 tsp of ground cumin, if using, and mix well.
7. Spread the mixture onto the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Place the baking dish in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the sauce is bubbly and slightly crispy on the edges.
9. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Mike's 1 Minute Green Chile Enchilada Sauce dish!

bcb4dcacc0.gt:
Place all ingredients into your slowcooker.
Stir lightly.
Place lid on and cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for about 3 1/2 hours or until your potatoes and carrots are tender.
If using stovetop, just bring everything to a boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer for about 45 minutes or until veggies are tender.
bcb4dcacc0.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, cook the onion and carrot in the chicken broth over medium heat until the vegetables are tender.
3. Add the green bell peppers and cook for another 5 minutes.
4. Add the sauerkraut, apple, and minced garlic. Cook for an additional 5 minutes.
5. Add the turkey kielbasa or ham, crushed pineapple, and brown sugar. Cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauerkraut is tender and the sauce has thickened.
6. Season the stew with pepper, caraway seed, salt, and additional brown sugar if needed, to taste.
7. Serve the Sweet and Sour Sauerkraut Kielbasa Stew hot, garnished with chopped parsley if desired.

This Sweet and Sour Sauerkraut Kielbasa Stew is a delicious and comforting dish that combines the tangy flavors of sauerkraut with the savory taste of kielbasa or ham, and the sweetness of pineapple. The apples and green bell peppers add a touch of freshness and crunch, while the caraway seeds and pepper provide a subtle, aromatic depth. This hearty stew is perfect for a cozy meal during colder months or as a satisfying side dish during a family gathering.

8a8c406a8c.gt:
Cook pasta as directed, adding vegetables to the boiling water for the last 2 minutes of the pasta cooking time.
Meanwhile, Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet.
Add meat; cook 4 minutes or until browned on all sides, stirring occasionally.
Stir in dressing and teriyaki sauce; cook 2 minutes or until sauce is thickened, stirring occasionally.
Drain pasta mixture; Place in a large serving bowl.
Add meat mixture; toss to coat.

[INSTR]

f7b38ff708.gt:
Place all ingredients except melted butter in the pan of your bread machine according to manufacturer's directions.
Select dough cycle.
Check dough after 5 minutes mixing and add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water (or more) if needed.
When cycle is complete, remove dough to a lightly floured board and punch down.
Divide dough in half and roll each half to 3/4" thickness.
Cut with a 2 1/2" round biscuit cutter and place on greased baking sheet.
Brush tops with melted butter, cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled (about 1 hour).
Bake at 350 for 10 to 15 minutes or until lightly browned.
f7b38ff708.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your bread machine according to the manufacturer's instructions.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the warm milk, beaten egg, and melted butter.
3. Add the sugar, salt, and bread flour to the mixture, stirring until well combined.
4. Add the active dry yeast to the mixture and stir until it is fully incorporated.
5. Turn on your bread machine and set it to the dough setting.
6. Allow the bread machine to mix the ingredients for the allotted time, usually around 1-2 hours.
7. Once the dough has finished mixing, remove it from the bread machine and transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
8. Knead the dough until it is smooth and elastic, about 5-10 minutes.
9. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a clean cloth, and allow it to rise in a warm, draft-free area until it has doubled in size, usually around 1-2 hours.
10. Punch down the dough to release the air bubbles and knead it a few times.
11. Shape the dough into desired bun shapes and place them on a lightly greased baking sheet.
12. Allow the buns to rise for another 15-20 minutes, or until they have doubled in size.
13. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
14. Bake the buns for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown and fully cooked through.
15. Remove the buns from the oven and allow them to cool on a wire rack.

Enjoy your homemade Soft Sandwich Buns!

3d6a127178.gt:
Combine the ingredients and mix well.
Add the chikuwa sticks and coat.
Pour about 1 cm of oil in a pan, then evenly fry the chikuwa until crisp.
Sprinkle with black pepper while hot.
I recommend wrapping them halfway in parchment paper and munching on them as finger food.
3d6a127178.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the Katakuriko, curry powder, and parsley.
3. Cut the chikuwa into thin sticks, about 1/2 inch (1.5 cm) thick.
4. In a small bowl, mix the water, black pepper, and oil.
5. Dip each chikuwa stick into the water mixture, then coat it with the Katakuriko mixture.
6. Place the chikuwa sticks on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.

9. Serve the chikuwa sticks immediately, or store them in an airtight container for later use.

Enjoy your delicious A Kick of Spice! Chikuwa Fishcake Sticks Seasoned with Curry and Black Pepper!

064e7af1db.gt:
Preheat an indoor grill, and coat with cooking spray.
Place the chicken strips on the grill, and cook for about 7 minutes.
Allow them to cool slightly, then cut into cubes.
While the chicken is cooking, heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Place the onion rings in the skillet, and cook for a few minutes.
Add the red and yellow pepper, baby corn, and the stir-fry vegetables.
Increase the heat to medium-high; cook and stir for about 15 minutes.
Sprinkle in the sugar and salt.
Stir in the chicken.
Dissolve the cornstarch in water, and pour into the skillet along with the soy sauce.
Cook and stir until the sauce thickens.
064e7af1db.pred:
To prepare a perfect Chinese Happy Family, follow these key steps:

1. In a large skillet or wok, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and cook until it becomes soft and translucent.

2. Add the sliced red bell pepper and yellow bell pepper to the skillet. Cook for a few minutes until the vegetables are slightly softened.

3. Add the baby corn to the skillet and cook for a few more minutes until it becomes tender.

4. In a small bowl, mix the white sugar and cornstarch. Pour the mixture into the skillet with the vegetables and stir to combine.

5. Add the water to the skillet, stirring to combine the ingredients. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 5-7 minutes, or until the sauce thickens slightly.

6. Stir in the soy sauce and cook for an additional minute or until the sauce is heated through.

7. Serve the Chinese Happy Family over rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious and healthy meal!

5351aea004.gt:
Bring 1/2 cup sugar, the mint leaves, and 1/2 cup water to a boil in a medium saucepan.
Remove from the heat and steep for 20 minutes.
Strain the liquid through a fine sieve into a small bowl.
Press the leaves to extract all juices.
Cool to room temperature.
Pour the Pimm's No.
1, lime juice, and the reserved mint syrup into a medium pitcher; stir to combine and chill for at least 1 hour.
Mix the remaining 2 tablespoons of sugar and the lime zest together and spread out a 1/4-inch-thick layer on a small plate.
Rub the rims of six 8-ounce glasses with a lime wedge and dip the rims in the sugar mixture.
Fill each glass about halfway with ice cubes and one of the lime wedges.
Divide the Pimm's mixture among the prepared glasses.
Top off each glass with 1/3 cup ginger beer and a splash of seltzer.
Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint and serve immediately.
5351aea004.pred:
[/INST]

To make a delicious Minty Pimm's Cup, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1/2 cup of sugar, 2 tablespoons of sugar, 2 cups of fresh mint leaves, and 6 sprigs of mint.
2. Add 2 cups of Pimm's No. 1, 1/2 cup of lime juice, and 1 tablespoon of lime zest.
3. Squeeze in the juice of 1 lime and mix well.
4. Add 2 cups of ginger beer and 1 cup of seltzer, and mix until well combined.
5. Stir the mixture until the sugar has dissolved, and the flavors are well-mixed.
6. Serve the Minty Pimm's Cup in tall glasses, garnished with additional mint leaves if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Minty Pimm's Cup!

4378df82b0.gt:
Heat the oil in a skillet, then coat the steak with flour and brown in the oil.
Remove the steak from the skillet and drain.
Place the potatoes, carrots and onion in the bottom of the Crock-Pot.
Place the steak on top of the vegetables and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Pour the tomatoes and tomato sauce over the meat.
Cover; cook on Low for 10 hours or on High for 6 hours.
4378df82b0.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 300°F (150°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the beef round steak, flour, salt, pepper, and 2 tablespoons of oil. Mix well to coat the beef evenly.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the sliced onions and carrots.
4. In a large, heavy-bottomed pot or Crock Pot, heat the remaining oil over medium heat. Add the beef and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Remove the beef from the pot and set aside.
6. Add the onions and carrots to the pot, stirring occasionally, and cook until the onions are softened and the carrots are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
7. Return the beef to the pot and add the diced tomatoes and tomato sauce. Stir to combine.
8. Cover the pot and cook in the preheated oven for 2-3 hours, or in a Crock Pot on low for 6-8 hours, or until the beef is tender and the sauce has thickened.
9. Remove the pot from the oven or Crock Pot and let it rest for 10-15 minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Crock Pot Swiss Steak dish!

e8c76f1472.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Combine macaroni, 1-1/2 cups of the cheddar cheese, the spinach, tomatoes and Parmesan cheese in large bowl; set aside.
Heat oil in medium saucepan on low heat 1 min.
Add onions; cook 2 to 3 min.
or until crisp-tender.
Add flour; mix well.
Cook 2 min., stirring constantly.
Gradually add milk, stirring until well blended after each addition.
Increase heat to medium.
Bring to boil; cook 2 to 3 min.
or until thickened, stirring constantly.
Add to macaroni mixture; toss to coat.
Spoon into 1-1/2-qt.-casserole dish sprayed with cooking spray; sprinkle with remaining Cheddar cheese.
Bake 20 min.
or until heated through.
e8c76f1472.pred:
To cook a delicious Oh-So-Good Macaroni and Cheese dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large saucepan or pot, cook the macaroni according to the package instructions until it is tender but still firm. Drain the cooked macaroni and set aside.

2. In a separate saucepan or pot, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the chopped onions and cook until they are softened, about 3-4 minutes.

3. Add the flour to the onions and stir to combine. Cook for about 1 minute, stirring constantly, to create a roux.

4. Gradually add the milk, stirring continuously to prevent lumps from forming. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 5-7 minutes, or until the sauce thickens slightly.

5. Add the cooked macaroni to the saucepan with the cheese sauce, stirring to combine. Cook for about 2-3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the macaroni is heated through.

6. Stir in the chopped spinach leaves and the tomato, cooking for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the spinach is wilted and the tomato is heated through.

7. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.

8. Serve the Oh-So-Good Macaroni and Cheese dish immediately, and enjoy!

[/INST]

660f4fdb1a.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degree F. Grease a 13x9x2-inch baking pan; set aside.
In a medium mixing bowl beat cream cheese with an electric mixer until fluffy.
Beat in 1/4 cup sugar; fold in lemon yogurt and lemon peel.
Set aside.
In a large mixing bowl stir together 3 cups flour, 1 cup sugar, baking powder, salt and nutmeg or mace.
Cut in the 1 cup butter until mixture resembles fine crumbs.
Combine eggs, milk and almond extract.
Add to flour mixture, mixing until blended.
Spread half of the batter in the prepared pan.
Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the batter.
Spoon the remaining batter in small mounds over the cream cheese mixture, spreading out as much as possible.
Combine the 1/2 cup sugar and 1/2 cup flour; cut in the 1/4 cup butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Stir in pecans or almonds.
Sprinkle nut mixture over batter in pan.
Bake for 45 to 55 minutes or until cake is golden andtoothpick inserted in dough mounds comes out clean (do not test in filling).
Cool on wire rack at least 45 minutes before serving.
Chill to store.
660f4fdb1a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
3. Add the lemon yogurt, lemon peel, and extract. Mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and nutmeg or mace.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the creamed mixture, mixing until just combined.
6. Fold in the beaten eggs and milk.
7. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
8. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. While the cake is cooling, prepare the glaze by combining the powdered sugar, milk, and almond extract in a small bowl.
11. Once the cake is fully cooled, drizzle the glaze over the top.
12. Sprinkle chopped pecans or sliced almonds on top of the glaze.
13. Serve the Lemon Cream Coffee Cake immediately.

[/INST]

de0bb5ab55.gt:
Preheat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius or 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
Soak the bread in the milk for 1 minute; squeeze dry.
Combine the bread, sausage meat, raw egg, parsley, nutmeg, salt and pepper.
Mix well.
Lightly oil a 12 cup muffin tray; line each cup with a slice of bacon.
Cover with a layer of sausage mixture; add a hard boiled egg, pointy end up.
Enclose the egg completely with more sausage meat mixture.
Bake uncovered for 20 minutes or until cooked through.

723ad517a6.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Mix sugar, margarine and eggs until blended.
Add water and bananas.
Beat 30 seconds.
Stir in the rest of the ingredients until just moistened.
Pour into greased 9 inch loaf pan.
Bake for 55-60 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

3. Add the water, flour, baking soda, salt, and baking powder to the bowl. Mix until well combined.

5c278f764a.gt: Stir mayonnaise, salad dressing, relish, vinegar, sugar, lemon juice, and paprika together in a small bowl until smooth.

1. In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, French salad dressing, relish, vinegar, white sugar, lemon juice, and paprika.
