5. In a large pot, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the linguine pasta and cook according to the package instructions, until al dente.
6. In a small bowl, whisk together the red wine vinegar, lemon juice, oregano, basil, rosemary, salt, and pepper.
7. Drain the cooked linguine and return it to the pot. Pour the sauce over the pasta and toss to combine.
8. Add the cooked portobello mushroom caps to the linguine and toss to combine.
9. Serve the Linguine with Portobello Mushrooms immediately, garnished with additional fresh herbs if desired.

[/INST]

6a751b3cb8.gt:
Crumble the tofu and chop the vegetables.
You can also use other vegetables you like, such as spinach, kale, bell pepper, black olives, broccoli, onion.
Put a little splash of extra virgin olive oil in a pan on medium heat and saute mushrooms and asparagus (or whatever veggies you are using that take a little longer to cook).
Once they are cooked and starting to brown, set aside for a few minutes.
Add a little more oil to the pan to prevent the tofu from sticking.
Add tofu crumbles, and start with 1 teaspoon ground turmeric, adding more if needed.
Mix together until turmeric is evenly dispersed and tofu is a nice yellow egg-y color.
Add cheese shreds and nutritional yeast (adds more cheesiness) to the tofu and mix until cheese starts to melt.
Add all veggies to the pan, including sauteed mushrooms and asparagus.
Gently mix in salt, pepper, and garlic powder to taste.
6a751b3cb8.pred:
1. Preheat a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
2. Crumble the tofu into small, bite-sized pieces and set aside.
3. In a large bowl, combine the chopped asparagus, sliced mushrooms, and sliced tomato.
4. Add the oil to the skillet and heat it up.
5. Add the crumbled tofu to the skillet and cook until it is golden brown and slightly crispy.
6. Add the asparagus, mushrooms, and tomato mixture to the skillet.
7. Cook for a few minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender.
8. Add the avocado to the skillet and stir to combine.
9. Add the ground turmeric, salt, and pepper to taste.
10. Cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally, until the avocado is fully incorporated into the dish.
11. Add the Daiya cheese shreds to the skillet and stir to combine.
12. Cook until the cheese is melted and the dish is heated through.
13. Serve the Cheesy Veggie Tofu Scramble immediately.

[/INST]

ef00415f9c.gt:
Wash the rice and leave for 30 minutes.
This is 900 g of asari clams with shells.
Steam the clams in sake and remove the meat from the shells.
Save the soup left behind from steaming the clams.
Refer to steps 6 - 9 to find out how to steam the clams with sake.
Add the washed rice to the rice cooker, along with the soup we took in step 3, cooking sake and soy sauce.
Fill with water until you reach the 2 cups mark (or however much liquid you would normally use for the amount of rice you want), and cook the rice.
Once the rice has cooked, add the clam meat and let them steam for a while.
How to steam clams: Add the asari clams to a frying pan, pour over some cooking sake, put on the lid, and steam-cook on a low-medium heat.
If you overcook the clams the meat will shrink so take them off the heat as soon as they start to open up.
This is how they look when they're opened.
Take a look at this related recipe too Fukagawa Don (Rice bowl).
ef00415f9c.pred:
To cook a delicious Asari Clam Rice dish, follow these steps:
1. Prepare the ingredients: Rinse the rice thoroughly, and soak the clams in cold water for 30 minutes to remove any sand or debris.
2. Cook the rice: Bring 360 ml of water to a boil in a saucepan, then add the rice and cook until the rice is fully cooked and the water has been absorbed. This should take around 15-20 minutes.
3. Prepare the clams: Drain the clams, reserving the soaking water. Discard any clams that do not close when tapped.
4. Cook the clams: In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the clams, and cook until they open, which should take around 5-10 minutes.
5. Add the rice: Once the clams are cooked, add the cooked rice to the pot. Stir to combine the ingredients.
6. Add the cooking sake or soy sauce: Gradually pour in the reserved soaking water from the clams, and then add the cooking sake or soy sauce. Stir to combine the ingredients.
7. Cook the dish: Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for 5-10 minutes, or until the rice is fully cooked and the liquid has been absorbed.
8. Serve: Serve the Asari Clam Rice dish hot, garnished with chopped green onions and a drizzle of sesame oil, if desired.

This dish combines the flavors of the rice, clams, and cooking sake or soy sauce to create a delicious and satisfying meal.

ea93239d44.gt:
In a 3 cup or larger bowl, whisk the 1st 8 ingredients to combine.
Gradually add olive oil in a stream & whisk to combine well.
Add salt & pepper to taste & refrigerate for 24 hrs to allow flavors to blend.
NOTE: I use a wide-mouth jar w/screw-on lid + my immersion blender to make & store this in a single step.
TO SERVE: Simplicity is the most-favored presentation - as a bruschetta-type appy where 1/2-in slices of baguette bread are spread w/cream cheese, topped w/very thinly sliced smoked salmon & then this sauce is spread over the salmon slices.
A few tiny capers can be centered as an opt garnish.
HINT: For never fail perfect slicing of smoked salmon, freeze the salmon to a near frozen state & use your sharpest knife to shave slices of desired thickness.
ea93239d44.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the honey, brown sugar, Dijon mustard, prepared mustard, lemon juice, fresh dill, coriander, sour cream, and olive oil. Mix well.
3. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Place the meat in a large roasting pan, and pour the marinade over it.
5. Roast the meat in the preheated oven for about 2 hours or until it reaches an internal temperature of 145°F (63°C).
6. Remove the meat from the oven, and let it rest for about 15 minutes before slicing it thinly.
7. Serve the Gravlaxsosa (The Real Deal) with the sliced meat, and enjoy!

[/INST]

6ec14869d3.gt:
In a nonstick pan over medium heat, heat the oil.
Saute the garlic until soft; add the bell pepper, rosemary, and 1 tablespoon of parsley and saute 5 minutes longer.
Add the tomatoes; bring to a boil then reduce the heat and simmer, stir frequently for 10 minutes.
Add the chickpeas and cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through (5 minutes).
Stir in the ditalini, cheese and remaining parsley.
Top with a little more shredded cheese.
6ec14869d3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
3. Add the red bell pepper and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until it becomes tender.
4. Add the minced rosemary and parsley to the skillet, and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
5. Pour the canned tomatoes into the skillet, and stir to combine.
6. Add the drained chickpeas and cook for another 5-7 minutes, until the chickpeas are heated through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. In a large pot, cook the ditalini according to the package instructions.
8. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked ditalini, chickpea and tomato sauce, and shredded parmesan cheese.
9. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Serve the Chickpeas and Pasta dish hot, and enjoy!

8132be5a91.gt:
Heat 4 tablespoons of the oil in a large heavy-bottom soup pan.
Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the drained chickpeas, water, cumin and coriander.
Bring to boiling, then reduce heat and simmer for 2 1/2 hours or until tender.
Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a separate pan.
Add the vegetables, cover and cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, for 20 minutes.
Stir the vegetable mixture into the chickpeas.
Transfer half the soup to a food processor or blender and process until smooth.
Return the puree to the pan, then add half the lemon juice.
Taste and adjust lemon juice.
Season with S&P.
Heat through.
Ladle into warm bowls and sprinkle with the chopped fresh cilantro and garnish with cilantro sprigs.
8132be5a91.pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
2. Add the garlic and cook until it is fragrant and slightly golden, about 2 minutes.
3. Add the chickpeas, water, cumin, ground coriander, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the chickpeas are tender and the soup has thickened slightly.
5. Add the carrots, onions, and celery to the pot and cook for an additional 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
6. Remove the soup from the heat and let it cool slightly.
7. Stir in the lemon juice and chopped cilantro.
8. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
9. Serve the Tunisian Garlic and Chickpea Soup hot, garnished with extra chopped cilantro.

[/INST]

ad5d547737.gt:
Cut each cheese piece into 4 chunks; cut each cucumber half into 8 chunks.
Thread cheese and cucumbers onto 16 (6-inch) wooden skewers with all remaining ingredients except dressing.
Place on platter.
Drizzle with dressing.
ad5d547737.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the KRAFT Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing with 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
3. In a large bowl, combine the cut-up mozzarella cheese, cucumber, grape tomatoes, and olives.
4. Drizzle the vinaigrette dressing over the salad mixture, and toss to coat evenly.
5. Spread the salad mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the salad in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the salad from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Meanwhile, prepare the arugula by washing and spinning it in a salad spinner or by gently rubbing it with a paper towel to remove excess moisture.
9. Once the salad is cooled, toss the arugula into the salad mixture, and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Italian Salad-on-a-Stick!

8198c69331.gt:
Place all ingredients in your bread machine in the order given.
Set bread machine to dough cycle.
IMPORTANT!
CHECK YOUR MACHINE WHILE IT IS KNEADING and ADD MORE WATER IF NEEDED 1 TABLESPOON AT A TIME.
The dough should not be too dry - it should look smooth and satiny after kneading for a few minutes.
When dough cycle is complete, remove dough from machine and shape into long loaf (like french bread).
Place on a cookie sheet and let loaf rise for about 45 minutes or until doubled in size.
Bake at 350 degrees for about 30 minutes or until nicely browned.
You can also just cook this in your bread machine on the regular bread cycle if you want.
It still tastes great, you just don't get the cuban shaped loaf.
8198c69331.pred:
To create delicious Bread Machine Cuban Bread, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 14 cups of water, 12 teaspoons of sugar, and 1 teaspoon of salt.
3. Add the 2 teaspoons of bread machine yeast and stir to combine.
4. Gradually add the 3 cups of bread flour, stirring until the dough comes together. If the dough is too sticky, you can add a bit more flour, a tablespoon at a time.
5. Cover the bowl with a clean cloth and let the dough rise in a warm, draft-free area for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
6. Once the dough has risen, punch it down to release the air bubbles and knead it a few times.
7. Grease a large, lightly floured baking sheet or a bread loaf pan.
8. Shape the dough into a ball and place it on the prepared baking sheet or bread loaf pan.
9. Cover the dough with a clean cloth and let it rise for another 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
10. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and bake the bread for about 30-35 minutes, or until it is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
11. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack for about 10-15 minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Bread Machine Cuban Bread!

96a66bd364.gt:
Whisk the milk and oil together.
(The key to making this good and not tasting like oil is using a little less oil and a little more milk.)
Add flour, salt, and sugar.
Press on bottom of pie plate.
With a fork, poke holes in bottom and sides of crust.
Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.
So easy and so good.
See Amazing Blueberry Cream Cheese Pie for ideas on what to make this with.
96a66bd364.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, and salt.
3. Add the peanut oil and milk, and mix until the dough comes together.
4. Press the dough into a flat disk, wrap it in plastic, and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
5. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
6. Use a cookie cutter or a round glass to cut out circles of dough.
7. Place the dough circles on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
8. Bake the crusts in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
9. Remove the crusts from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before filling them with your desired filling.
10. Bake the filled crusts in the preheated oven for an additional 10-12 minutes, or until the filling is bubbly and the crust is golden brown.

[/INST]

61afcadcb1.gt:
1.
In a small bowl, combine almonds and brown sugar; set aside.
2.
In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Beat in the almond extract.
3.
Combine flour, baking soda and baking powder.
Add this to the creamed mixture alternately with bananas and sour cream.
Fold in the vanilla or white chips.
4.
Spread into a greased 13x9x2 inch baking pan.
Sprinkle with reserved almond and brown sugar mixture.
5.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
Cool on a wire rack.
61afcadcb1.pred:
[INSTRUCTIONS]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease and flour a 9x9 inch baking dish.
3. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
4. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Stir in the almond extract and vanilla or white chips.
6. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, baking soda, and baking powder.
7. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the sour cream, and mix until just combined.
8. Fold in the slivered almonds and bananas.
9. Pour the batter into the prepared baking dish.
10. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
11. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INSTRUCTIONS]

[/SYS]

6a6db8c9e3.gt:
trim away middle of bun
put 1 Cheddar cheese and 1tbsp of jam
add 3 hazelnut on each bun and bake 180 C for 5 minute till cheese melted
6a6db8c9e3.pred:
To craft a delicious Breakfast Bun, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Place the 2 mini buns on a baking sheet, and bake them for 5-7 minutes or until they are golden brown.
3. While the buns are baking, prepare the cheese by slicing it into 2 equal portions.
4. Once the buns are done, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
5. Spread a thin layer of blueberry jam on one of the buns.
6. Place the other bun on top of the jam-covered bun, creating a sandwich.
7. If desired, sprinkle the top bun with hazelnuts for added texture and flavor.
8. Place the sandwich back in the oven and bake for an additional 2-3 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove the sandwich from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Breakfast Bun!

8590091d29.gt:
Lightly oil grill and preheat to high.
Loosen skin on chicken pieces with fingers, by sliding hand between skin and flesh.
In a small skillet, saute green onion and 2 cloves garlic in butter or margarine for 1 minute.
Stir in breadcrumbs and parsley.
Push this seasoning under chicken skins, working it down well.
Combine 1 cup butter or margarine with mustard, 1 clove garlic and curry powder.
Spread this seasoned butter or margarine over chicken and put on preheated grill.
Cook 10 to 15 minutes each side, or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear.
Brush with remaining seasoned butter while grilling.
8590091d29.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the butter, garlic, and green onions.
3. Season the chicken legs with salt and pepper.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the bread crumbs, parsley, and coarse grained prepared mustard.
5. Dip each chicken leg into the butter mixture, then coat it with the bread crumb mixture.
6. Place the breaded chicken legs on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake the chicken legs in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the bread crumbs are golden brown.
8. Serve the Parsley Butter Seasoned Chicken hot.

baa571bacd.gt:
Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 400F.
Drain 1 can tomatoes, reserving juice, then break up tomatoes into 1/2-inch pieces with a spoon if necessary; puree the second can of tomatoes,including juice and reserved juice (from other can), 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon allspice in a blender OR use hand blender, until smooth.
Transfer tomato puree to a 2-quart heavy saucepan and boil uncovered, stirring occasionally, until reduced to about 1/2 cup, about 20 minutes, remove from heat.
Heat a dry 12-inch heavy skillet over moderate heat until hot, then brown lamb with 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, and remaining 1/2 teaspoon allspice, stirring and breaking up lumps (but leaving meat slightly chunky), about 5 minutes; add drained tomatoes and cook, stirring occasionally, until juices are absorbed, about 1 minute.
Cut polenta into 1/4-inch-thick slices with a sharp knife and cover bottom of a 9-inch glass pie plate with half of polenta slices (overlapping slightly); scatter half of lamb mixture over polenta, then top with half of mozzarella, then remaining polenta; scatter remaining lamb on top and spread tomato sauce over meat, then top with remaining mozzarella.
Bake, uncovered, until bubbling and beginning to brown, about 20 minutes; let stand, loosely covered with foil, 15 minutes before serving, Enjoy.
baa571bacd.pred:
To cook a delightful Lamb and Polenta Lasagna dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Prepare the ingredients:
- In a large mixing bowl, combine the ground lamb, 12 teaspoon of salt, and 7 teaspoon of black pepper. Mix well.
- In a separate bowl, combine the stewed tomatoes, 18 teaspoon of ground allspice, 12 teaspoon of salt, and 7 teaspoon of black pepper.
- In a third bowl, mix the prepared polenta with the remaining 3 teaspoon of ground allspice and 1 teaspoon of salt.

3. Assemble the lasagna:
- Spread a layer of the lamb mixture in the bottom of a large, oven-safe baking dish.
- Spread a layer of the tomato mixture on top of the lamb mixture.
- Add a layer of the polenta mixture on top of the tomato mixture.
- Repeat the layers, ending with a layer of the polenta mixture.

4. Bake the lasagna:
- Pour the remaining stewed tomatoes over the top of the lasagna.
- Bake the lasagna in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until the lasagna is cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.

5. Serve the Lamb and Polenta Lasagna:
- Allow the lasagna to rest for a few minutes before cutting it into slices and serving.

This delicious Lamb and Polenta Lasagna dish is a hearty and satisfying meal, perfect for sharing with family and friends.

b5c909ba3f.gt:
Heat grill.
Slice onion into slightly larger than 1/4-inch slices and brush both sides of each slice with olive oil.
Place onion on grill and cook 4-5 minutes per side or until brown and tender.
Let onion cool and then chop.
Place potatoes into boiling salted water for about 20-25 minutes or until just tender; drain.
When cool enough to handle, peeled and cut into 3/4 inch pieces.
In a large bowl, stir milk and vinegar together and let sit 1-2 minutes to thicken.
Whisk in mayo, salt and pepper.
Stir in onions.
Add potatoes to bowl, stir and then add celery.
Stir gently.
Cover and refrigerate for several hours before serving.
b5c909ba3f.pred:
1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. Cut the onion into small, evenly sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, combine the onion pieces, olive oil, and milk. Mix well.
4. Season the mixture with salt, pepper, and cider vinegar.
5. Place the mixture on the grill or grill pan, and cook for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the onions are tender and slightly caramelized.
6. While the onions are cooking, prepare the potatoes. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into bite-sized pieces.
7. In a large bowl, combine the cooked onions, potatoes, sliced celery, and mayonnaise. Mix well.
8. Season the salad with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Cover the salad and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
10. Serve the Grilled Onion Potato Salad chilled or at room temperature, and enjoy!

6cb33feaa0.gt:
Preheat oven to 375F Lightly grease cookie sheets.
Combine dry ingredients.
Set aside.
In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugars together.
Beat in the eggs, one at a time.
Stir in the vanilla.
Stir in the dry ingredients until well mixed, then stir in the chocolate chips, coconut and almonds.
Drop by rounded tablespoons onto the prepared cookie sheets.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes.
Cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
6cb33feaa0.pred:
[/INST]

To make Almond Joy Cookies, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the butter and both sugars until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the vanilla extract and mix until well combined.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
7. Fold in the chocolate chips, sweetened coconut, and chopped almonds.
8. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a prepared baking sheet.
9. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are set and the centers are still slightly soft.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Almond Joy Cookies!

ed047c7fd8.gt:
Add the milk, and small pieces of torn up cheese into a small saucepan.
Heat it up over medium-low heat until right before it starts to boil.
When the cheese has melted, mix well with a wooden spatula.
Let the mixture cool down.
Separate the egg yolks and egg whites.
Add the egg whites, 1/2 of the sugar into a bowl, and whip into a firm meringue.
Add the egg yolks and the remaining sugar into a separate bowl, and mix with a whisk.
Add the Step 1 mixture, and mix well.
Sift the cake flour into the Step 4 bowl, and mix well with the whisk.
Add the lemon juice as well, and mix well.
Add 1/3 of the Step 3 meringue into the Step 5 bowl, and mix well with the whisk.
Add the remaining meringue, and mix well with a spatula.
Pour the batter into a cake pan lined with parchment paper.
Place it in a baking sheet filled with hot water in the preheated oven, and bake for about 50 minutes at 160C.
Cover with aluminium foil halfway through so that it won't get burned.
If you don't mix the mixture really well during Step 6, it will separate into 2 layers, so please be careful.
If you are using a cake pan with removable bottom, the hot water will come into the pan while steam-baking in a water bath during Step 8, so please cover the bottom with aluminium foil and bake.
ed047c7fd8.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]To make a delicious Souffle Cheesecake Made with Sliced Cheese, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 160°C (320°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced cheese, milk, eggs, cake flour, sugar, and lemon juice. Mix until smooth and well-combined.
3. Pour the mixture into a greased and floured 20cm (8-inch) springform pan.
4. Bake the cheesecake in the preheated oven for approximately 45-50 minutes, or until the center is set.
5. Remove the cheesecake from the oven and let it cool in the pan for about 15-20 minutes.
6. Carefully remove the cheesecake from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.
7. Once the cheesecake is fully cooled, refrigerate it for at least 4 hours or overnight.
8. Before serving, dust the top of the cheesecake with powdered sugar, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Souffle Cheesecake Made with Sliced Cheese!

0f248f2042.gt:
In a large frying/saute pan add oil, butter and garlic, saute on low flame until oil starts to bubble.
Add tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Cook covered on a low flame for about 30 minutes.
Add vodka.
Cook uncovered for 25 minutes.
Add prosciutto-- cook 5 more minutes.
Add basil and heavy cream-- cook just 5 more minutes.
SERVE IT NOW!
I like this over penne pasta.
I only use Barilla.
0f248f2042.pred:
[/SYS]

To make the perfect vodka sauce with prosciutto, follow these steps:

1. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.

2. Add the diced plum tomatoes and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.

3. Add the vodka, salt, and pepper to taste. Cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened slightly.

4. Add the chopped prosciutto to the saucepan and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.

5. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.

6. In a blender, combine the heavy cream, grated Parmesan cheese, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Blend until smooth and creamy.

7. Pour the cream mixture into the saucepan with the tomato and prosciutto mixture. Stir to combine.

8. Add the chopped fresh basil to the saucepan and stir to combine.

9. Serve the Perfect Vodka Sauce With Prosciutto over pasta or your favorite dish. Enjoy!

This recipe combines the rich flavors of prosciutto, vodka, and heavy cream, creating a delicious and indulgent sauce that pairs well with pasta or other dishes. The fresh basil adds a touch of freshness and complements the other ingredients.

3c84706338.gt:
Preheat oven to 400?.
Spray a 2 qt casserole dish, or 9x9 baking pan with non-stick cooking spray.
In this order, layer the chicken, broccoli, 1 1/2 cups cheddar cheese and 2/3 of the bacon-bits in prepared baking dish.
Reserve the remaining cheese and bacon for topping.
Blend the eggs, milk, Bisquik, and 1/8 tsp.
fresh ground pepper until well combined.
Pour evenly over chicken mixture.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Sprinkle remaining cheese and bacon evenly on top.
Let cool 5 minutes before serving.
3c84706338.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked chicken, crumbled bacon, and shredded cheddar cheese.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the Bisquick, eggs, and milk.
4. Pour the egg mixture over the chicken and cheese mixture, and stir to combine.
5. Add the broccoli florets to the mixture, stirring to combine.
6. Transfer the mixture to a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Season the top with freshly ground black pepper.
8. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
9. Remove from the oven, let it cool for a few minutes, and then serve.

This Bacon-Cheddar Chicken & Broccoli Casserole is a delicious and satisfying meal that combines the flavors of chicken, bacon, and cheese with the nutritious broccoli. The use of Bisquick as a base adds a unique texture and aroma to the dish, making it a delightful and comforting meal.

022318dd52.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
Spray a large casserole dish with cooking spray.
(I have a 4 quart casserole dish I use for this.)
In a large skillet, brown together ground beef and onion; drain grease and return to pan.
Add tomato sauce, mushroom soup, 1/2 cup of the cheese, salt, pepper, and garlic.
Simmer uncovered.
While meat mixture is simmering, cook the pasta according to package directions.
Combine the pasta and the meat mixture together in the casserole dish; mix well.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on top.
Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is bubbly.
022318dd52.pred:
1. Cook the shell pasta according to the package instructions until al dente.
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it into small pieces as it cooks. Season with pepper, salt, and garlic powder.
3. Add the onion to the skillet and cook until softened.
4. Stir in the tomato sauce, cream of mushroom soup, and a splash of water. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. In a separate bowl, combine the shredded cheddar cheese and pepper.
6. Add the cooked shell pasta to the skillet, stirring to combine with the beef and sauce mixture.
7. Pour the cheese mixture over the pasta and stir to combine.
8. Cook the casserole in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for about 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious SeaShell Casserole!

565fbfd08a.gt:
NB: I like to use a fairly strong flavoured, but creamy blue cheese, like Gorgonzola, but Stilton is also nice.
Stock-wise, you may need a little more or less than in the ingredients list.
Bring stock up to a simmer.
Halve the leeks and remove any gritty bits from inside the rings.
Cut the leek into fine strips rather than semi-circles, of approx 1-2 inches in length.
Melt half the butter with the olive oil and cook the leeks for approx 10 minutes over a low-medium heat until soft and tinged with brown.
Add bacon to pan and cook for about 5 minutes.
Stir in garlic and rice, cook for a further minute or two, stirring the rice until it's coated in the butter and oil and starts to go slightly translucent.
Add the wine to the pan, turning up the heat to bubble most of it away.
Add a ladleful of hot stock to the leek and rice mixture at a time, stirring more or less constantly.
Add more stock each time that most of the liquid has been absorbed.
Add the fresh sage.
Keep doing this for approximately 15 - 25 minutes, until the risotto is creamy, but the rice grains still have a slight bite.
You'll need to start testing the rice after about 15 minutes, but it may take a little longer.
Turn off the heat.
Stir in the lemon juice, zest, remaining butter, parmesan and blue cheese.
Leave the risotto for another 2 minutes until rich, creamy and luscious.
Season to taste with black pepper and salt if needed.
565fbfd08a.pred:
1. Heat the butter and olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add the leeks and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the garlic and cook for another minute.
4. Add the smoked bacon or pancetta and cook until it is crispy.
5. Add the arborio rice and stir to coat it with the butter and oil.
6. Pour in the dry white wine and cook until it has been absorbed.
7. Add the chicken or vegetable stock, one cup at a time, stirring constantly.
8. Cook until the rice is tender and creamy, about 20-25 minutes.
9. Add the sage and lemon zest, stirring to combine.
10. Season with freshly ground black pepper to taste.
11. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the blue cheese.
12. Allow the cheese to melt and combine with the rice.
13. Stir in the parmesan cheese and serve immediately.

[/INST]

This "beat the Blues" Blue Cheese Risotto dish is a delicious and comforting meal that can help lift one's mood. The combination of the creamy rice, the smoky flavor of the bacon or pancetta, the tangy lemon, and the rich, pungent blue cheese creates a harmonious and satisfying dish. The sage adds a touch of freshness and earthiness, while the parmesan cheese provides a satisfying, nutty finish. This dish is perfect for a cozy night in or a special occasion, and it can be easily customized with additional ingredients or seasonings to suit individual tastes.

7b4784ea40.gt:
Slice the body of the prepped squid into rounds, then cut into 1cm dice.
Combine the flours, dashi stock granules, and water, and mix until it's slightly sticky (meaning the gluten in the flour has formed).
Add the squid to the batter, and leave for at least 30 minutes.
If the batter becomes too firm, add a little water so that it's the consistency of crepe batter.
Add oil in a pan, and pour in the batter (You can add an egg here to upgrade the pancake to a deluxe version.)
When one side is browned, turn the pancake over.
Cook the other side while pressing down hard on the pancake with your spatula.
When the pancake is cooked, spread the combined okonomiyaki and takoyaki sauces, fold in half and press.
If you add too much squid, the pancakes will be hard to cook.
I'm not too good at cooking these myself.
If you're not used to making pancakes, try cooking one with just a little squid added to the batter.
7b4784ea40.pred:
[/INST]

To create delicious Ika-yaki (Squid Pancakes), follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Rinse the squid and remove the tentacles and ink sacs. Cut the squid into bite-sized pieces.
- Sift the cake flour, bread flour, and katakuriko together.
- In a small bowl, mix the dashi stock granules with 200 grams of water.
- In a large bowl, whisk the vegetable oil and the mixture of the dashi water.
- Add the squid pieces to the bowl and toss them until they are evenly coated with the sauce.

2. Cook the Ika-yaki:
- Heat a non-stick frying pan or griddle over medium-high heat.
- Pour a small amount of the sauce mixture onto the pan, creating a thin layer.
- Carefully place the squid pieces onto the sauce, leaving enough space between them for even cooking.
- Cook the Ika-yaki for 2-3 minutes, or until the edges are slightly browned and the squid pieces are cooked through.
- Flip the Ika-yaki and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the other side is also slightly browned.

3. Serve the Ika-yaki:
- Remove the Ika-yaki from the pan and place them on a plate.
- Serve the Ika-yaki with a side of Okonomiyaki sauce and takoyaki sauce for dipping.

Enjoy your delicious Ika-yaki, a popular Osaka specialty!

58c85cf057.gt:
Mix 2 Tbsp flour and the salt and pepper in a ziptop bag.
Add chicken; shake to coat.
Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet.
Add chicken; saute 5 minutes, or until cooked through.
Remove to a plate.
In a cup, mix remaining flour, the broth and garlic.
Add asparagus to skillet and saute 1 minute until bright green.
Stir chicken broth mixture, add to pan and cook 1 minute until thickened slightly and asparagus are tender.
Add chicken back to pan.
Stir in tomatoes; remove from heat.
Stir in scallions and dill.
58c85cf057.pred:
1. Preheat a large skillet or frying pan over medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the 2 tablespoons of flour, 14 teaspoons of salt, and 14 teaspoons of pepper.
3. Add the chicken to the bowl and toss to coat the chicken evenly with the flour mixture.
4. Heat the oil in the skillet over medium-high heat.
5. Add the chicken to the skillet and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through, about 4-5 minutes per side.
6. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside on a plate.
7. Add the chicken broth to the skillet and bring to a simmer.
8. Add the minced garlic to the skillet and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
9. Add the asparagus to the skillet and cook until the asparagus is tender but still crisp, about 3-4 minutes.
10. Add the grape tomatoes to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
11. Add the scallions and dill to the skillet and cook for 1 minute.
12. Add the cooked chicken back to the skillet and toss to combine the ingredients evenly.
13. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.
14. Serve the Chicken & Asparagus Saute over rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious meal!

613e75a520.gt:
In a large bowl, mix mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, sugar and salt until combined.
Add cabbage mix, apples, celery and raisins to bowl with dressing, toss well.
Cover and refrigerate at least 30 minutes to allow cabbage to soften.
To serve, sprinkle with walnuts.
Garnish with radishes.
613e75a520.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, sugar, and salt. Mix well.
2. Add the coleslaw mix, apple, and granny smith apple to the bowl. Stir to combine.
3. Add the raisins and walnuts to the bowl, and stir to combine.
4. Add the radish tops and toss everything together.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
6. Before serving, gently toss the salad to mix the ingredients and serve immediately.

This step-by-step procedure will help you create a delicious Waldorf Salad Slaw using the provided ingredients. The combination of mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, sugar, and salt provides a balance of flavors, while the coleslaw mix, apples, and raisins add a crunchy texture and sweetness. The toasted walnuts and radish tops add a touch of contrasting flavors and textures, making the salad a delightful and refreshing dish.

4b92540ad2.gt:
heat oven to 425
line 9in pie plate with pastry
combine lemon juice with flour,sugar,nutmeg,cinnamon,lemon rind
place half of apples in plate, sharp edges inward
sprinkle with half of sugar mixture
top with rest of apples, heaping in center sprinkle with rest of sugar mixture
dot with butter
adjust top crust as directed and glaze
bake 40-50min or until apples test tender with fork and crust is brown
4b92540ad2.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the lemon juice, flour, granulated sugar, and brown sugar. Mix well.
3. Add the nutmeg, cinnamon, and grated lemon rind to the mixture. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the sliced, pared, and cored apples to the bowl. Mix until the apples are coated with the sugar mixture.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the butter or margarine with the remaining 1/4 tsp nutmeg and 1/2 tsp cinnamon.
6. Pour the butter mixture over the apple mixture, and mix until the apples are evenly coated.
7. Transfer the apple mixture to a pie dish.
8. Bake the pie in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until the apples are tender and the crust is golden brown.
9. Allow the pie to cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

f7ca0c32fa.gt:
Place greens on serving plate.
Top with chicken and corn.
Drizzle with salsa, then dressing.
f7ca0c32fa.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the loosely packed torn salad greens, seasoned chicken breast strips, drained canned corn, and KRAFT Lite Ranch Dressing.
2. Add the TACO BELL Thick & Chunky Salsa to the bowl and mix well.
3. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
4. Serve the Santa Fe Chicken Salad over a bed of lettuce or as a sandwich filling.

This recipe combines the flavors of the Southwest with the classic taste of chicken salad. The combination of the seasoned chicken breast strips, corn, and salsa creates a delicious and hearty salad that can be enjoyed as a meal or a side dish. The addition of the KRAFT Lite Ranch Dressing adds a creamy and tangy element to the salad, enhancing its overall taste.

0509ec4c83.gt:
Mix milk and vinegar together, and set aside.
Mix flour and salt.
Cut in shortening with fork.
Add milk and vinegar.
0509ec4c83.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare a delicious Never Fail Pie Crust using the provided ingredients, follow these steps:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, Crisco shortening, and salt.
2. Gradually add the milk, stirring until the dough comes together.
3. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it is smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Wrap the dough in plastic and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.
5. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
6. On a floured surface, roll out the chilled dough to your desired thickness.
7. Line a 9-inch (23 cm) pie pan with the rolled-out dough, leaving a 1-inch (2.5 cm) overhang.
8. Prick the bottom and sides of the pie crust with a fork.
9. Bake the pie crust for 10-12 minutes or until it is golden brown.
10. Remove the pie crust from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Fill the pie crust with your desired filling, such as fruit or custard.
12. Cover the pie with the pie crust, pressing the edges to seal.
13. Bake the pie in a preheated oven at 375°F (190°C) for 35-40 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
14. Allow the pie to cool completely before serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Never Fail Pie Crust!

83b98d7ee9.gt:
Saute diced onion in olive oil, add to crock pot.
Pour canned ingredients into crock pot, do not drain beans.
Add spices.
And the diced chicken.
(I used bagged chicken breast that was still partially frozen).
Heat on medium heat for 6 hours.
Microwave cream cheese for 45 seconds until it is easy to stir and pour.
Add the the soup.
Using a blender or immersion blender, blend until smooth.
Add 1 cup of favorite shredded cheese.
I used Colby Jack.
Hollow out your bead bowl if you so desire and pour soup into it.
Top with remaining shredded cheese.
83b98d7ee9.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
To make the Crockpot White Chili, follow these steps:
1. In a large skillet or a pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the northern beans, chicken broth, and chicken diced. Stir to combine.
3. Add the ground cumin, oregano, ground smoked chipotle, salt, and cream cheese. Stir to combine.
4. Cover the pot and cook on low heat for 6-8 hours, or until the chicken is tender and the chili is heated through.
5. Shred the chicken with two forks, if desired.
6. Stir in the shredded cheese.
7. If using a bread bowl, place it in the oven to warm, and then carefully fill it with the chili.
8. Serve the Crockpot White Chili hot, garnished with fresh cilantro, if desired.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

9980565108.gt:
Wash fruit and discard any skin (from peaches or the like).
Cut fruit into pieces no larger than 1 inch each.
In a large heavy-duty saucepan add the sugar and stir over medium heat while the sugar melts and the fruit softens.
Cook, stirring constantly until the jam thickens.
this may take an hour or more.
Cool, then spoon into very clean jars, cover with clean lids and refrigerate up to 3 weeks.
9980565108.pred:
To create delicious Refrigerator Jam, follow these steps:

1. Wash and peel the fruit, making sure to remove any seeds or pits.
2. Combine the fruit and sugar in a large, non-reactive pot or saucepan.
3. Cook the mixture over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the fruit is soft and the sugar has dissolved.
4. Reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the fruit is fully cooked and the mixture has thickened.
5. Remove the pot from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Carefully pour the mixture into clean, sterilized jars or containers, leaving about 1/2 inch of headspace.
7. Seal the jars or containers with lids or covers, and store them in a cool, dark place for at least 24 hours before opening.

Enjoy your homemade Refrigerator Jam!

08c1e0e854.gt:
break the banana into small pieces.
crush the cereal into big pieces
sieve flour and salt, beat in eggs, milk, vanilla, cream cheese, cereal and banana
heat a teaspoon of oil in a nonstick frying pan on a medium heat
depending on how big you like your pancakes depends on how big a spoon you use.
drop some batter in so its about 1/4 inch thick.
when the edges dry start to work a spatula around the edges and flip.
leave for a few mins.
check by lifting on end with the spatula
repeat steps 3 and 4 until all mixture is used up.
during cooking keep the ready pancakes warm in the oven
08c1e0e854.pred:
[INSTR]
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, eggs, milk, salt, and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth.
2. Add the overripe banana and cereal of your choice. Mix until well combined.
3. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Pour a small amount of batter onto the pan, spreading it evenly. Cook until the edges are slightly dry and the bottom is golden brown. Flip the pancake and cook the other side until golden brown.
4. Repeat with the remaining batter, stacking the cooked pancakes on a plate.
5. In a small bowl, mix the cream cheese and sugar until smooth. Spread the mixture over the top of the pancakes.
6. Serve immediately and enjoy!

[/INSTR]

[/SYS]

8b434331f6.gt:
Heat oven to 425F.
Cook broccoli according to pkg directions.
Mix margarine, onion salt, parsley, onion powder in saucepan.
Heat until melted.
Set aside.
Mix baking mix, wine, & chicken until soft dough forms.
You can add a little extra wine if there is still some of the baking mix not mixed in.
Press into bottom of baking dish.
Pour butter mixture over biscuit mixture.
Sprinkle with paprika.
Bake uncovered for 15 minutes or until golden brown.
Pour broccoli over biscuit mix.
Cut into squares & serve.
8b434331f6.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the frozen broccoli with cheese sauce, margarine, onion salt, parsley flakes, and onion powder. Mix well.
3. Add the gluten-free baking mix, cooking white wine, and shredded chicken to the bowl. Mix until well combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a greased baking dish.
5. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the edges are golden brown and the center is cooked through.
6. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

This Chicken Broccoli Biscuit Bake is a delicious and satisfying dish that combines the flavors of chicken, broccoli, and cheese. The gluten-free baking mix and cooking white wine add a unique twist to the classic biscuit bake, making it a versatile and enjoyable meal for those with dietary restrictions or preferences.

582a1779fb.gt:
Put all ingredients into a blender or food processor.
Process until smooth.
Pour into glass.
Enjoy!
582a1779fb.pred:
To make a delicious Peanut Berry Smoothie, follow these steps:
1. Combine 23 cups of milk and 13 cups of orange juice in a blender.
2. Add 1 cup of fresh strawberries and 2 tablespoons of plain yogurt.
3. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
4. Add 2 tablespoons of peanut butter and 2 tablespoons of instant chocolate drink mix (like Nestle's Quik).
5. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
6. Drizzle 1 tablespoon of honey over the top of the smoothie.
7. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
8. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy!

This Peanut Berry Smoothie is a delicious and nutritious drink that combines the flavors of peanut butter, strawberries, and chocolate. The smoothie is creamy and smooth, making it a perfect treat for any time of the day.

e65b0ff688.gt:
Combine chicken strips, orange juice, and 1 teaspoon cornstarch in a medium bowl; cover and chill 1 hour.
Heat oil in a nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Add cashews; cook, stirring constantly, 30 seconds.
Remove from skillet; set aside.
Add chicken mixture to skillet.
Cook, uncovered, over medium-high heat 8 minutes or until chicken is lightly browned, stirring constantly.
Add water chestnuts and next 3 ingredients; cook 5 minutes.
Combine broth, soy sauce, and 1 tablespoon cornstarch; add to chicken mixture.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat, and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened.
Remove from heat; stir in oranges.
Spoon chicken mixture over rice, and sprinkle with cashews.
Serve immediately.
e65b0ff688.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the cornstarch and 1 teaspoon of vegetable oil. Add the chicken strips and toss to coat evenly.
3. Spread the chicken mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the cornstarch is golden brown.
4. In a small bowl, mix the remaining 1 teaspoon of vegetable oil with the cornstarch. Add the cashews and toss to coat evenly.
5. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the cashew mixture and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly, until the cashews are golden brown and slightly crispy.
6. Add the sliced water chestnuts, green pepper, and green onion to the skillet. Cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.
7. Add the cooked chicken to the skillet and stir to combine.
8. Pour the reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth and low sodium soy sauce over the chicken mixture, stirring to combine.
9. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
10. Add the drained mandarin oranges and cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the oranges are heated through.
11. Serve the Diabetic Friendly Cashew Chicken over cooked brown rice.

This delicious and healthy dish is low in fat, low in sodium, and high in protein, making it an excellent choice for those following a diabetic diet.

fa898117da.gt:
These few potatoes weighed about 1 kg this time.
Peel them, cut into pieces, and soak in water.
Bring the butter to room temperature.
Boil the sweet potatoes until they become soft.
When finished boiling, drain the water.
Mash with a masher while they are still hot.
Add the butter, sugar, and heavy cream into a pot, and mix over medium heat, without burning the mixture, until the butter melts.
When the butter is melted, add the Step 3 potatoes and evaporate the water while kneading and mixing.
Add vanilla extract, as well.
Preheat the oven to 200C.
Form into your desired shapes and brush with the egg yolk and water mixture.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 ~ 20 minutes at 200C.
fa898117da.pred:
To prepare a delicious Our Family's Sweet Potato Dessert, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).

2. Peel the sweet potatoes and cut them into evenly sized pieces.

3. Place the sweet potatoes in a large mixing bowl and toss them with salt, pepper, and a dash of olive oil.

4. Spread the sweet potatoes evenly on a baking sheet and roast them in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.

5. While the sweet potatoes are cooking, prepare the sweet potato puree. In a saucepan, combine the heavy cream, granulated sugar, and a pinch of salt. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the sugar has dissolved and the mixture is hot.

6. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the roasted sweet potatoes.

7. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg yolks and vanilla extract until well combined.

8. Slowly pour the hot sweet potato mixture into the egg yolk mixture, stirring constantly to prevent the eggs from scrambling.

9. Return the mixture to the saucepan and cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens and coats the back of a spoon.

10. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the egg yolk.

11. Pour the mixture into a serving dish and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or until it has set.

12. To serve, dust the top of the dessert with a pinch of powdered sugar and enjoy!

[/INST]

143f7e5182.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Mix bread dough following the directions on the box (or use your favorite recipe).
Wrap the dough around the smokies, one at a time.
Place on a greased cookie sheet, or use Silpat or parchment paper.
Bake for 15 minutes.
143f7e5182.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the White Bread Mix and 1 cup (8 oz) of warm water. Mix until the dough comes together.
3. On a floured surface, roll out the dough into a rectangle, about 1/4 inch thick.
4. Spread the dough with the desired amount of butter or margarine.
5. Cut the dough into strips, about 1 inch wide and 4 inches long.
6. Place the strips on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the Snausages in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
8. Remove the Snausages from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

The required ingredients for preparing Snausages are: 1 box (about 16 Oz. Box) White Bread Mix, 1 pound Hillshire Farm Lil' Smokies.

27f4409414.gt:
In a large bowl, combine chicken broth with 3 cups ice.
Add chicken; chill 1 hour.
Meanwhile, in a resealable bag, combine bread crumbs, flour, salt, cayenne, oregano, garlic, parsley, and pepper; shake.
Preheat oven to 400F Coat a large baking sheet with vegetable or olive oil spray; set aside.
Place yogurt in a medium bowl.
Remove chicken from broth.
One piece at a time, dip chicken into yogurt, then place in bread crumb mixture and shake.
Place breaded chicken on baking sheet.
Spray tops of chicken with vegetable spray.
Bake 45 to 50 minutes, until golden brown.
Serve hot or at room temperature.
27f4409414.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 450°F (232°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the chicken broth, panko breadcrumbs, all-purpose flour, salt, cayenne pepper, oregano, garlic, and parsley.
3. Add the skinless chicken breast halves to the bowl, tossing to coat evenly with the breading mixture.
4. Heat a large skillet or oven-safe frying pan over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil to the pan, and cook the chicken until it is golden brown on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
5. Transfer the cooked chicken to a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
6. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
7. Remove the chicken from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into pieces and serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade You're Gonna Love This Oven-Fried Chicken!

9f341bf6c9.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Grease a 9x9" pan.
Melt white chocolate and butter in the top of a double boiler, or in microwave on med power.
Set aside to cool.
In a large bowl, beat eggs until foamy.
Gradually add the sugar and vanilla, mixing constantly.
Drizzle in the melted white chocolate mixture.
Combine the flour and salt and fold into the white chocolate mixture.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Spread the batter into the prepared pan.
Bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Do not over-bake.
4.
Serve heated.
Top with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, some real whipped cream and a drizzle of chocolate sauce.
9f341bf6c9.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened butter, white chocolate, and vanilla extract.
3. Add the flour, one cup at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and then add them to the butter mixture, mixing until well combined.
5. Add the salt, white sugar, and semi-sweet chocolate chips to the batter, mixing until well combined.
6. Pour the batter into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownie comes out clean.
8. Allow the brownie to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
Please note that this is a general cooking procedure for the Copycat - Moxies White Chocolate Brownie, and the actual cooking time may vary depending on your oven and the size of the baking dish. Always use caution when handling hot ovens and baking dishes.
<</SYS>>

555c73c04a.gt:
Thoroughly combine seasoning mix ingredients in a small bowl and set aside.
Cook pasta according to package directions and set aside.
Heat a skillet over high heat until it is hot, about 4 minutes.
Meanwhile, stir chicken pieces into seasoning.
Mix well.
Add 2 oz butter to pan.
Add chicken pieces and brown them.
Add the green onions, parsley, garlic and stock.
Cook two minutes or until the sauce is at a rolling boil.
Add the remaining butter (cut into pats) stirring to incorporate.
Cook for 3 minutes and add the cooked pasta.
Mix well.
Serve immediately.
I like to add parmesan on top.
555c73c04a.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the salt, onion powder, black pepper, rubbed sage, white pepper, thyme, garlic powder, and minced garlic.
3. Add the chicken strips to the bowl and toss to coat the chicken evenly with the seasoning mixture.
4. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Add the green onions, minced parsley, and minced thyme to the skillet. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
6. Add the chicken stock to the skillet, stirring to combine. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-12 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente.
8. Drain the pasta and add it to the skillet with the chicken and sauce. Toss to combine, and serve immediately.

[/INST]

[/INST]

Elvie's Chicken Diane is a delicious and hearty dish that combines tender chicken, aromatic herbs, and a rich, flavorful sauce. The combination of ingredients creates a satisfying and comforting meal that is perfect for a cozy evening at home.

5c4e65b3c5.gt:
Preheat oven to 200F.
Place flour for dredging in a shallow bowl; coat each fillet with seasoned flour and shake off excess.
Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat for 3-4 minutes; add butter/olive oil combination then add the fillets, without crowding.
Increase heat to high and saute, shaking the pan from time to time, until bottom of the fish is nicely browned, about 3 minutes; turn and brown the other side.
Remove fish to a plate and keep warm in the oven; repeat with remaining fillets.
Deglaze the pan with white wine; cook, stirring over high heat until reduced by about 1/3; stir in remaining butter and drained capers.
Place fillets on individual serving plates and drizzle sauce around each fillet.
5c4e65b3c5.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, salt, and pepper.
3. Dip the Chilean sea bass fillets in the seasoned flour mixture, coating them evenly.
4. Heat the butter and olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
5. Add the seasoned Chilean sea bass fillets to the skillet, and cook for about 3-4 minutes on each side, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
6. Remove the cooked fish from the skillet and place it on a plate.
7. Add the dry white wine to the skillet, and let it cook for a few minutes, until it has reduced by half.
8. Add the softened butter to the skillet, and stir to combine.
9. Add the capers to the skillet, and stir to combine.
10. Serve the cooked Chilean sea bass on a plate, and enjoy your delicious meal!

[/SYS]

b6f5004817.gt:
Combine all together, cook on low in crock-pot 6-8 hours.
Serve with brown rice.
b6f5004817.pred:
1. Preheat the crock-pot on low heat setting.
2. In a small bowl, mix the pineapple juice, brown sugar, and soy sauce.
3. Place the chicken chunks in the crock-pot, pour the pineapple juice mixture over the chicken, and stir to coat evenly.
4. Cook the chicken on low heat for about 6-8 hours, or until the chicken is fully cooked and tender.
5. Remove the chicken from the crock-pot, and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
6. Serve the Sweet Hawaiian Crock-pot Chicken over rice or with your preferred side dish.

[/INST]

708886aaca.gt:
Heat oil in a five to six quart pot over moderately high heat.
Add garlic and pepper flake, saute until golden.
Be careful not to burn the garlic.
Stir in tomatoes and salt.
Simmer uncovered for 35 minutes.
Serve with pasta.
708886aaca.pred:
To create a delicious Spicy Red Pasta Sauce, follow these steps:

1. Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, or until fragrant.
3. Add the red pepper flakes and stir to combine.
4. Pour in the diced tomatoes with their juice, and stir to combine.
5. Add the salt, and stir to combine.
6. Bring the sauce to a simmer, and let it cook for about 10-15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the flavors have melded together.
7. Taste the sauce, and adjust the seasoning as needed.
8. Serve the Spicy Red Pasta Sauce over your favorite pasta, and enjoy!

This recipe is a simple yet flavorful way to create a delicious Spicy Red Pasta Sauce using the ingredients provided. The combination of garlic, red pepper flakes, and tomatoes creates a rich, spicy, and tangy sauce that pairs well with pasta.

bfebd12211.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Line a 9 x 13 inch baking pan with foil (enough to go up the sides) then spray the foil with cooking spray.
In the bowl of an electric mixer, beat butter until smooth and creamy.
Add the sugars and salt and beat until well incorporated.
Beat in the egg and vanilla extract until smooth.
With the mixer on low speed, slowly add the flour, baking powder, and baking soda, stirring until incorporated.
The mixture will be thick.
Scoop the mixture into the prepared pan and use your fingers to press it into an even layer.
Bake in the preheated oven for 22 minutes, or until golden, puffed, and slightly cracked.
Remove the cookie layer from the oven and immediately spread the chopped chocolate evenly over the top.
Return to the oven for 2-3 minutes or until chocolate begins to melt.
Remove from the oven and use a spatula to smooth the chocolate over the top.
Cover the chocolate with the chips and marshmallows (or other toppings like toasted coconut or chopped nuts, peppermints, or other candies) and gently press them into the chocolate.
Allow bars to cool, then use the foil to pull them from the pan.
Slice and serve.
Recipe adapted from Bon Appetit.
bfebd12211.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
2. In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the egg and vanilla extract, and mix until well combined.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
4. Fold in the chopped chocolate and crunchy toppings.
5. Spread the batter evenly into the prepared baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bars comes out clean.
7. Allow the bars to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

These Sweet and Salty Chocolate Crunch Bars are a delicious treat that combines the rich, sweet flavor of chocolate with the crunchy, salty contrast of the crunchy toppings. The marshmallows and kettle chips create a delightful contrast in textures, making these bars a perfect dessert or snack for any occasion.

f951ae3f61.gt:
Light the grill.
In a food processor, puree the butter and olives with the anchovy paste, orange zest, orange juice, garlic, and pepper.
With a rubber spatula, scrape the butter into a small bowl and refrigerate.
Rub the hens with oil and cook over moderate heat for 12 minutes.
Turn and cook until just done, about 12 minutes longer.
Remove the hens from the grill and serve with the rice.
Top each serving with 2 tablespoons of the flavored butter, letting the butter melt over both the hen and the rice.
f951ae3f61.pred:
1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix the butter, anchovy paste, orange zest, and orange juice. Season the mixture with black pepper and refrigerate until ready to use.
3. Season the Cornish hens with salt and pepper.
4. In a large bowl, combine the rice, minced garlic, and a pinch of salt. Pour in boiling water, cover the bowl, and let it sit for about 15 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the water is absorbed.
5. Brush the Cornish hens with the butter mixture, then place them on the grill and cook for about 10-12 minutes, or until the skin is golden brown and the meat is cooked through.
6. Serve the grilled Cornish hens with the rice and a side of black olives.

[/INST]

4ca2ec2109.gt:
In a heavy bottomed saucepan, combine the heavy cream, sugar and basil and bring to a simmer.
Remove from heat and let steep for half an hour.
Place this mixture in a blender and puree.
In a large stainless steel bowl place the egg yolks.
Add the half and half mixture while constantly whisking.
Place entire mixture back onto heat.
Add the vanilla bean and the half and half and heat for one to two more minutes, stirring constantly until the mixture has thickened and coats the back of a spoon.
Do not boil!
Remove from heat and strain the entire mixture through a fine mesh sieve.
Cool over an ice bath.
Freeze in an ice cream machine according to manufacturers instructions.
4ca2ec2109.pred:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the heavy cream, sugar, and basil leaves until the sugar is fully dissolved.
2. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg yolks until they are light and fluffy.
3. Gradually pour the heavy cream mixture into the egg yolks, whisking constantly to ensure a smooth and consistent mixture.
4. Add the half and half and vanilla bean split lengthwise, and continue whisking until the mixture is smooth and well combined.
5. Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
6. Once the ice cream is fully churned and has reached the desired consistency, transfer it to an airtight container and place it in the freezer to chill for at least 2 hours or overnight.
7. After chilling, scoop the ice cream into bowls and enjoy!

[/INST]

e9acd2e2b9.gt:
Cook couscous in well-salted boiling water, uncovered, until tender, about 10 minutes.
Stir in sugar snaps 3 minutes before couscous is done.
Drain and transfer to a bowl, then stir in 1/2 tablespoon butter and salt and pepper to taste.
While couscous and sugar snaps cook, toss shrimp with 1/8 teaspoon each of salt and pepper.
Heat remaining tablespoon butter in a 10-inch heavy skillet over medium-high heat until foam subsides.
Saute shrimp, turning once, until just cooked through, about 3 minutes total.
Transfer shrimp with a slotted spoon to a plate.
Add wine, tomato, and sugar to skillet and boil until tomato starts to fall apart, about 4 minutes.
Return shrimp to skillet and stir in tarragon.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve shrimp and pan sauce on top of pearl couscous.
e9acd2e2b9.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the pearl couscous, sugar snap peas, and 1/2 tablespoon of the butter. Toss to coat the ingredients evenly.
2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the remaining butter, dry white wine, and sugar.
3. Add the shrimp to the bowl with the pearl couscous mixture, and toss to combine.
4. Add the tomato and tarragon to the bowl, and toss to combine.
5. Season the shrimp mixture with salt and pepper, to taste.
6. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
7. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
8. Remove the shrimp mixture from the refrigerator, and shape it into small balls or "pearls" using your hands.
9. Grill the "pearls" for about 2-3 minutes per side, or until they are cooked through and slightly charred.
10. Serve the shrimp and "pearls" immediately, and enjoy your delicious and visually appealing dish.

bce4690032.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a baking sheet (or 2) with parchment paper.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, chile powder and salt.
With a stand mixer, beat the butter and reserved bacon fat drippings on medium-high until smooth, about 1 minute.
Beat in the white and brown sugar until creamy, about 4 minutes.
Then add the egg and vanilla and beat until fluffy for about 2 minutes.
Reduce the speed of the mixer to low and add the flour.
Mix until just combined and then add in the chocolate chips and crispy bacon.
Form the cookie dough into 12 even-sized balls and arrange them on the cookie sheet about 2 inches apart from each other.
Flatten the cookie balls with your fingers and then bake for 12-14 minutes until golden brown.
Let the cookies cool for about 2 minutes on the baking sheet before transferring to a cooling rack.
bce4690032.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and vanilla extract, and beat until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, chile powder, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the reserved bacon drippings, and mix until just combined.
6. Fold in the chocolate chips and crumbled bacon.
7. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is still slightly soft.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

e10d62e4d9.gt:
To make the crust, preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Crust cookies in a food processor (or smash in a Ziploc bag with a rolling pin).
Stir in melted butter until all combined.
Pour into a regular pie pan and press crumbs all over the pan and up the sides.
Bake for 3 to 4 minutesjust long enough for it to set.
Cool crust completely.
Place raspberries on a plate or in an empty pan.
Smash them with a fork, then sprinkle on 3 tablespoons of sugar.
Stir together and allow to sit for 15 minutes.
In the bowl of an electric mixer, combine raspberry yogurt with the instant vanilla pudding mix (just the powder itself.)
Beat on low until combined, about 1 minute.
Pour in heavy cream and whip on low for 30 seconds.
Stop the mixer and scrape down the bowl with a rubber spatula.
Turn mixer on medium-high speed and beat for two minutes, or until mixture is thick.
Turn off mixer, then fold in raspberries until just combined.
Pour into cooled pie pan and spread evenly.
Freeze for two hours, or until very firm.
Cut into slices and top each slice with cookie crumbs, dollops of whipped cream, and extra raspberries.
Keep in freezer, allowing time to thaw before serving.
e10d62e4d9.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Crush the Oreo cookies into fine crumbs using a food processor or a rolling pin.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the crushed cookies, melted butter, and sugar. Mix until well combined.
4. Press the cookie mixture evenly into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch (23cm) springform pan.
5. Bake the crust for 10-12 minutes, or until it is set and slightly golden. Remove the crust from the oven and let it cool completely.
6. In a separate bowl, mix the raspberries, sugar, and vanilla pudding mix until well combined.
7. Pour the raspberry mixture over the cooled crust.
8. In a small mixing bowl, whip the heavy cream until it forms stiff peaks.
9. Carefully spread the whipped cream over the raspberry filling.
10. Refrigerate the pie for at least 4 hours or overnight before serving.
11. Garnish the pie with extra raspberries for a beautiful presentation.

Enjoy your delicious Raspberry Cream Pie!

50ad0077cb.gt:
Put all ingredients except the olive oil with the tuna steak to marinade.
Leave it for approximately 30 minutes to marinade (if you leave it longer it with take more in flavor but not necessary for this type.)
After marinating the tuna do not throw away the marinade you will use it as cooking liquid.
Start with a pan and place the olive oil to heat up, place in the tuna 1 minute per side to sear.
Return to low heat and leave it for 8 minutes per piece when the cooking liquid is getting low put some of the marinade.
It will enhance the taste and give it a great taste.
I decorated the plate with some coleslaw, tomatoes, lemon and deep fried potato shavings.
50ad0077cb.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, white wine, light soy sauce, and garlic cloves.
3. Season the tuna steak with salt and pepper, then coat it evenly with the marinade.
4. Place the tuna steak on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for about 12-15 minutes, or until it is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
5. While the tuna steak is cooking, prepare the lemon juice by squeezing the juice from the lemon over the tuna steak.
6. Once the tuna steak is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. Serve the tuna steak on a plate, garnished with a drizzle of lemon juice and a sprinkle of fresh parsley.

Enjoy your delicious Tuna Steak!

d34f8abc06.gt:
Saute pepper and onion in skillet with Pam.
Add soup, Rotel tomatoes and chicken.
Alternate layers of tortillas and soup mix.
Sprinkle cheese on top.
Bake at 325F for 40 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
Serves 4.
WW Points: 5 pt.
d34f8abc06.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the chopped green bell pepper and onion over medium heat until tender.
3. Add the Healthy Request cream of mushroom or chicken soup, Rotel Tomatoes, and cooked chicken. Stir to combine.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the torn corn tortillas with the shredded Mexican cheese.
5. Pour the soup mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Top the soup mixture with the corn tortilla mixture.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Serve hot and enjoy!

[/INST]

b7705a9251.gt:
Saute -- In a large pan, heat the oil.
Add the garlic, onion and red pepper and saute for 2-3 minutes on medium until slightly soft.
Beans and spinach -- Add the beans, seasoning and saute on medium high to high until cooked through, about 5 minutes.
As they cook I like to take a fork and slightly mash the beans a bit to get a good consistency.
I like to get them a little crisp and browned but not fried dark brown.
Just a light browning is good.
Add the spinach and break up as it cooks.
If too dry you can use a little white wine, chicken broth or just water to loosen the sauce if necessary.
Garnish with some good olive oil and ground pepper.
b7705a9251.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, combine the cannellini beans, onion, garlic, and parsley. Season with red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper. Cook over medium heat until the onion is tender and the beans are heated through.
3. Add the spinach to the pot, stirring to combine. Cook until the spinach is wilted and heated through.
4. Pour in the white wine (or chicken broth) and stir to combine. Cook until the liquid has evaporated, and the sauce has thickened slightly.
5. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve the Sauteed Cannellini With Spinach and Garlic over a bed of cooked pasta or rice.
7. Drizzle a little olive oil over the top as a garnish.

Enjoy your delicious Sauteed Cannellini With Spinach and Garlic!

db15adcf9f.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
Cut tops off of heads of garlic in a straight line across.
Rub extra virgin olive oil all over heads; wrap loosely in foil and place on a baking sheet.
Roast garlic at 400 degrees F until caramelized and soft, approximately 30-35 minutes.
Leave oven at 400 degrees F and line large baking sheet with nonstick foil for easy cleanup.
In a large bowl, add ground turkey breast, chopped baby spinach, chopped fresh parsley, beaten egg, melted palm shortening (or olive oil), salt, pepper, and carefully squeeze roasted garlic heads to release the roasted garlic into the bowl.
With your hands, mix everything together well until all ingredients are incorporated evenly.
Roll balls by hand in uniform sizes to ensure even cooking in the batch.
Place on nonstick foil-lined (or parchment paper) baking sheet.
Bake at 400 degrees F for about 25-30 minutes or until thoroughly cooked.
db15adcf9f.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the ground turkey breast, chopped baby spinach, and chopped fresh parsley. Season the mixture with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg and organic palm shortening or more olive oil until well combined.
4. Add the egg mixture to the turkey mixture and mix until the ingredients are well combined.
5. Using your hands, shape the mixture into small meatballs. Place the meatballs on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the meatballs in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are cooked through and golden brown.
7. Remove the meatballs from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Spinach & Roasted Garlic Meatballs!

70b786a095.gt:
Preheat the oven to gas 4 / 180C / 350F with and line 2 baking trays with foil and have 2 spare baking trays handy
Peel the beets and slice very thinly, 1/16 inch thick with a mandolin but be careful of your fingers.
In a large bowl, toss the sliced beets with the extra virgin olive oil
Arrange the beets in a single layer on each tray and sprinkle with a small amount of the salt.
You can use plain sea salt or any flavoured salt of preferrence.
Stack an extra baking tray on top of each layer of beetroot.
This keeps the crisps flat.
Put one tray on the oven top shelf and the other on the bottom
Bake until the edges of the beets begin to dry out, about 20 minutes.
Peek around 17 minutes to check!
Remove the extra trays that are on top of the beets and rotate the trays so the top one now goes in the bottom and the bottom one goes to the top
Bake a further 17 - 20 minutes.
Remove the crisps as they become lighter in color.
Transfer to a wire rack, they will crisp up as they cool
Keep in a lidded container for up to a week
70b786a095.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the beets, then slice them into thin rounds.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the beets, olive oil, garlic, rosemary, and sea salt. Mix well to ensure the beets are evenly coated.
4. Spread the beet mixture onto a baking sheet or a lined baking sheet.
5. Roast the beets in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
6. Remove the beets from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Once the beets are cool enough to handle, use a fork to mash them into a crispy texture.
8. Serve the crispy beets as a snack or a side dish.

[/INST]

d5926ad471.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 F. Lightly grease and flour a pie dish.
Rub the seasoning on the chicken breasts.
Place in a medium saucepan and add enough water to cover.
Bring to a simmer and cook over medium heat for 10 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
Drain and dice chicken.
In a large bowl, combine chicken, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, mixed vegetables, and salt and pepper.
Mix thoroughly.
Lay one sheet of pastry in the bottom of the greased and floured pan.
Pour chicken mixture over pastry.
Cover with second sheet of pastry.
Seal edges of the top and bottom pastries by pinching them together.
Cut steam vents in the top crust.
Bake in preheated oven for 50 minutes, until pastry is golden brown.
d5926ad471.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
