Preheat oven to 350.To prepare aioli, combine first 5 ingredients in a small bowl; set aside.To prepare crab cakes, combine bell pepper and next 7 ingredients (through black pepper) in a large bowl; stir well with a whisk.
Add panko and crabmeat; toss gently.
Divide the crab mixture into 12 equal portions, shaping each into a 1-inch-thick patty.Heat oil in a large ovenproof skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat.
Add patties; cook 2 minutes.
Carefully turn patties over.
Place pan in oven; bake at 350 for 6 minutes.
0ca9bd3da2.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the fat-free mayonnaise, chopped fresh chives, chopped fresh parsley, minced garlic, red bell pepper, and panko. Mix well.
2. Add the lump crabmeat, shell pieces removed, and mix until well combined.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the reduced-fat mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and freshly ground black pepper.
4. Pour the dressing over the crab mixture and stir to combine.
5. Using a spoon, form the crab mixture into small cakes, about 1 inch in diameter.
6. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium heat. Spray the crab cakes with cooking spray.
7. Cook the crab cakes for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and cooked through.
8. Serve the Mini Crab Cakes with Herbed Aioli as a side dish or appetizer.

c651774003.gt:
Wrap each banana slice with a piece of bacon.
Fry wrapped banana in a skillet until bacon is desired crispness, 15 to 30 minutes.
Remove wrapped bananas from skillet with a toothpick and place on a serving dish.
c651774003.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
3. Place the sliced bananas on the prepared baking sheet.
4. Place the bacon slices on top of the bananas, overlapping them slightly.
5. Drizzle the melted butter over the bacon and bananas.
6. Bake the bacon and bananas in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the bacon is crispy and the bananas are tender.
7. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Carefully transfer the bacon and bananas to a serving plate.
9. Serve the Bananas Wrapped in Bacon immediately, as they are best when hot and crispy.

Enjoy your delicious and satisfying Bananas Wrapped in Bacon!

59de26d69e.gt:
Saute onions and celery
Add chicken powder & 4 cups of water add chicken pieces (wingdings) & cook on med high for 45mins
Add cream of chicken let cook for another 30 mins
Cook rice as it states on the box
Place rice on plate top with chicken and enjoy
59de26d69e.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chicken pieces with the knorrs chicken powder, season all, onion powder, garlic powder, and chopped onion.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the rice, cream of chicken, and water.
4. Spread the chicken mixture evenly over the bottom of a baking dish.
5. Pour the rice mixture over the chicken.
6. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the rice is tender.
7. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
8. Serve the chicken and rice with a side of gravy.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
Please provide a visual representation of the cooking process, including the ingredients and the steps involved.
<</SYS>>

[/INST]

e4e4b2152e.gt:
Heat oven to 400 degrees.
Add 3/4 can water to soup.
Heat.
Mix 3/4 can water with flour.
Stir into soup.
Cook, stirring until it thickens.
Add tuna.
Pour into a baking dish.
Mix Bisquick with milk.
Roll into an 8x10 rectangle.
Spread with cheese and pimiento.
Roll like a jelly roll.
Cut into 12 slices.
Place on the tuna mixture.
Bake for 15 minutes.
e4e4b2152e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Vegetarian Vegetable Soup, Flour, Milk, and Sharp Cheddar Cheese. Mix until smooth.
3. Add the canned Tuna to the mixture and stir to combine.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the Pimiento, Grated Cheddar Cheese, and Bisquick.
5. Pour the Pimiento mixture over the Tuna mixture, and stir until well combined.
6. Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the top is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
8. Serve the Tuna Bake hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

This Tuna Bake recipe combines the flavors of the Vegetarian Vegetable Soup, Flour, Milk, and Sharp Cheddar Cheese to create a delicious and hearty dish. The addition of the canned Tuna and Pimiento mixture adds a unique twist to the traditional tuna casserole, while the Bisquick provides a crispy texture to the dish. The result is a satisfying and comforting meal that can be enjoyed by everyone.

01eb818f49.gt:
Cook the chicken breast pieces in the water in a large pot over high heat until done (170 degrees).
Remove the chicken pieces to plate and cover with plastic wrap; set aside.
Pour the dried pasta in to the same boiling water and cook until tender, about 6 minutes.
Drain in a colander; set aside.
Place the Greek yogurt, the Hidden Valley Original Ranch Seasoning Mix, the reserved marinating juice from the artichoke hearts, Parmesan cheese, the zest and juice of the lemon, white pepper, curry and cayenne powders in a small sized bowl and whisk until well blended and smooth.
Add in the 2 diced chives, carrots, celery, parsley, shallots and pimento and gently stir.
Pour this mixture over the cooked pasta in a larger bowl and add the cooked chicken breast pieces that have been diced into small cubes.
Mix until all is evenly coated.
To serve, plate a serving of the pasta mixture and garnish with (optional) parsley, several grape tomatoes, 1 purple cabbage leaf, chives pieces and several quarters of artichoke hearts.
01eb818f49.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chicken breast, water, and seasoning mix. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.
3. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
4. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced shallots and cook until softened, about 2 minutes.
5. Add the marinated artichoke hearts, sliced carrots, and minced celery. Cook for about 5 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
6. Add the cooked pasta, yogurt, and grated parmesan cheese to the skillet. Stir to combine.
7. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Transfer the mixture to a large bowl and stir in the reserved marinated artichoke heart juice, pimientos, and curry powder.
9. Add the freshly grated parsley and chives. Stir to combine.
10. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
11. Serve the Chicken Pasta Salad in a large bowl.

[/INST]

22df25b9dd.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Mix baking crumbs and butter; press onto bottom of 9-inch springform pan.
Beat cream cheese and granulated sugar in large bowl with mixer until blended.
Add chocolate and liqueur; mix well.
Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended.
Pour over crust.
Bake 45 to 50 min.
or until centre is almost set.
Run knife around rim of pan to loosen cake; cool before removing rim.
Refrigerate cheesecake 4 hours.
Sprinkle icing sugar over cheesecake just before serving.
Top with berries.
22df25b9dd.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a food processor, blend the Oreo Baking Crumbs and melted butter until the crumbs are finely ground.
3. In a large mixing bowl, beat the softened Philadelphia Brick Cream Cheese until smooth.
4. Add the granulated sugar and beat until well combined.
5. Add the melted chocolate, cooled, and the hazelnut-flavored liqueur, and mix until smooth.
6. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
7. Add the icing sugar and mixed fresh berries, and mix until well combined.
8. Pour the batter into a springform pan that has been greased and floured.
9. Bake the cheesecake in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until the center is set.
10. Allow the cheesecake to cool completely in the pan before refrigerating for at least 4 hours.

[/INST]

This delicious Chocolate Royale Cheesecake dish is made with a combination of Oreo Baking Crumbs, melted butter, Philadelphia Brick Cream Cheese, granulated sugar, melted chocolate, hazelnut-flavored liqueur, eggs, and mixed fresh berries. The ingredients are combined to create a rich, chocolatey, and creamy dessert that is both indulgent and delightful. The use of Oreo crumbs adds a crunchy texture to the cheesecake, while the fresh berries provide a burst of natural sweetness and a touch of freshness. This dish is perfect for special occasions or simply to enjoy with friends and family.

f0e77c97c6.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Brown onion, garlic and ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat for about 4 minutes.
Add red pepper flakes and continue cooking until the ground beef is fully cooked.
(If using fresh cabbage, add here and cook until soft.)
Drain extra fat out of the skillet then stir in drained sauerkraut and Worcestershire.
Heat through and set aside.
Press 1 package of crescent roll dough into the bottom of a lightly greased 9x13-inch baking dish.
Spread beef mixture on top and cover with cheese.
Lay second package of crescent roll dough over the top of the beef and cheese mixture.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
f0e77c97c6.pred:
To create a delicious Sauerkraut Bierocks Casserole, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the chopped onion over medium heat until it is softened and translucent. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
3. Add the ground beef to the skillet and cook until it is browned and no longer pink. Season the beef with red pepper flakes to taste.
4. Add the drained and squeezed dry sauerkraut to the skillet, stirring to combine.
5. In a small bowl, mix the Worcestershire sauce with 2 cups of water. Pour the mixture over the beef and sauerkraut mixture in the skillet.
6. In a separate bowl, combine the shredded cheddar cheese and the remaining cup of water.
7. Roll out the crescent rolls according to the package instructions. Cut the rolls into bite-sized pieces.
8. Spread the beef and sauerkraut mixture evenly over the bottom of a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
9. Arrange the crescent roll pieces on top of the beef and sauerkraut mixture, overlapping them slightly.
10. Pour the cheese mixture over the crescent rolls.
11. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the crescent rolls are golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
12. Allow the casserole to cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Sauerkraut Bierocks Casserole!

93479dc342.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees.
In a large mixing bowl, cream sugar, shortening, and salt.
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
Add extract and mix well.
In a separate bowl, sift flour and baking powder.
Add milk to creamed mixture.
Add flour mixture to creamed mixture.
Fold in coconut.
Bake in a greased and floured bundt pan for 1 hour.
About 10 minutes before cake is done, combine sugar, extract and water in a small saucepen.
Bring to a boil and boil one minute.
Pour over cake immediately after removing cake from the oven.
Let cake sit 30 minutes before removing from pan.
93479dc342.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and Crisco until fluffy.
3. Add the sugar, salt, and coconut extract, and mix until well combined.
4. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Gradually add the flour, baking powder, and milk, mixing until smooth.
6. Stir in the coconut flakes and water.
7. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
8. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Once cooled, dust the cake with powdered sugar and enjoy!

18c37b1d2b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a medium-sized mixing bowl, combine the part-skim ricotta cheese, peanut butter, and vanilla extract.
3. Gradually add the sugar substitute, stirring until well combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a greased 9-inch (23cm) round baking dish.
5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the edges are set and the center is slightly jiggly.
6. Allow the dish to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into wedges and serving.

[/INST]

9bde591cc5.gt:
In a large skillet, brown the ground meat and drain off any grease.
Add the chopped onion and cook for about 3 minutes, until the onions are softened.
Add the cabbage and water and cook for about 5 minutes, or until the cabbage starts to wilt.
Add the tomatoes, brown sugar, vinegar, salt, caraway seed and garlic.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and cover.
Simmer until the cabbage is cooked to the desired tenderness, about 30 minutes.
Serve with white rice.
9bde591cc5.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground chuck over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through. Drain any excess fat.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked ground chuck, chopped onion, and cabbage.
4. Add the water, crushed tomatoes, brown sugar, white vinegar, salt, caraway seeds, and garlic powder to the bowl. Mix well.
5. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour.
7. Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the cabbage is tender and the filling is hot and bubbly.
8. Serve the Unstuffed Cabbage Roll Casserole hot.

[/INST]

e1cc65aa99.gt:
Grease 9 x 13 inch pan.
Heat syrup, butter and morsels to boiling stirring constantly.
Remove from heat, stir in vanilla.
Pour over cereal in bowl, toss until coated.
Fold in marshmallows 1 cup at a time.
Press into pan with buttered back of spoon.
Let stand 1 hour.
Cut into 2 inch squares.
Store at room temperature.
e1cc65aa99.pred:
To cook Golden Graham Cereal S'mores Squares, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Golden Grahams cereal, marshmallows, and melted butter. Mix well to ensure the cereal is evenly coated with the butter.

3. Press the mixture into a 9x9 inch baking dish or a similar-sized pan.

4. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are slightly golden and the marshmallows are melted and slightly puffed.

5. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.

6. While the mixture is cooling, melt the chocolate chips in a double boiler or a heat-resistant bowl set over a pot of simmering water.

7. Once the mixture has cooled, spread the melted chocolate over the top of the baked mixture.

8. Return the baking dish to the oven and bake for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the chocolate is melted and slightly hardened.

9. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool completely before cutting into squares.

Enjoy your delicious Golden Graham Cereal S'mores Squares!

f3de3243b2.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Cut twelve 1/2 slices on the diagonal from the baguette.
Lay them out on a baking sheet and lightly brush the tops with olive oil and sprinkle with black pepper.
Bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden-brown.
When done remove the pan from the oven and set it aside.
Meanwhile, cook the bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy.
When done, set bacon aside on a paper towel-lined plate.
Very thinly slice the brie and set aside.
Cut the peaches in half and remove the pit.
Lay the halves flat-side down and cut into 1/4 thick slices.
Heat a grill pan over medium-high and lightly coat with cooking spray.
Grill the peaches for no more than 60 seconds on each side, brushing lightly with balsamic vinegar.
Place a piece of brie on each crostini, followed by half a piece of bacon and a peach slice.
Arrange them on a platter, sprinkle with chopped basil, and serve.
Makes 12 crostini.
f3de3243b2.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the French Baguette into 1-inch (2.5 cm) slices.
3. In a small bowl, mix the extra virgin olive oil, black pepper, and a pinch of salt.
4. Spread the olive oil mixture evenly over the sliced baguette.
5. In a small skillet, cook the bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove from heat and let cool.
6. Place the cooking spray in a small bowl.
7. Cut the Brie cheese into small cubes.
8. Slice the ripe peaches into thin wedges.
9. In a small bowl, mix the balsamic vinegar and chopped fresh basil.
10. Assemble the crostini by placing a slice of baguette on a serving platter. Top with a layer of Brie cheese, followed by a layer of sliced peaches. Drizzle the balsamic vinegar mixture over the peaches.
11. Sprinkle crispy bacon over the peaches.
12. Serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Peach, Bacon, & Brie Crostini!

4c06a6e6ee.gt:
Mix the sugar and Boric Acic well.
Add the warm water slowly, mixing all the while so it won't be too lumpy.
Store in a jar.
When ready to use, put cotton into the top of a jar lid to fill it, and then saturate the cotton to the top.
Place where you want it; make several if you need it.
Will keep for a long while.
NOTE: I usually drip a drop or two over the edge of the lid to rest on the counter so they will find it sooner.
It sometimes takes a little while for them to find it, but find it they will.
When they do, let them alone; you will want to kill them because they look so creepy; but don't because they will hang over the edge of the lid and drink, drink, drink, and then take it back to the nest.
Almost over night, they will be gone.
4c06a6e6ee.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To create a homemade ant repellent using the ingredients provided, follow these steps:
1. In a bowl, mix 1 cup of sugar with 3 tablespoons of boric acid.
2. Gradually add 3 cups of warm water to the mixture, stirring until the sugar and boric acid are fully dissolved.
3. Pour the mixture into a spray bottle and shake well to ensure the ingredients are evenly distributed.
4. Spray the mixture onto areas where ants are known to gather, such as around the kitchen sink, on countertops, and in other high-traffic areas.
5. Repeat the process every few days to ensure the ant population remains under control.

Please note that this homemade ant repellent is not a permanent solution and should be used in conjunction with other ant control methods, such as sealing cracks and crevices and regularly cleaning the affected areas.

cfc57858dc.gt:
Chill a serving bowl in the freezer while you make the salsa.
In a mixing bowl, combine the chopped green chiles, onion, green olives, and black olives.
Lightly mix in the Cheddar cheese and tomatoes; season to taste with garlic salt and black pepper.
If desired, mix in a little bit of the olive brine.
Serve in the chilled bowl.
cfc57858dc.pred:
1. First, open the canned green chiles and drain the liquid.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the drained green chiles, onion, green olives, black olives, shredded Cheddar cheese, ground black pepper, garlic salt, and red tomatoes.
3. Mix the ingredients together until well combined.
4. Taste the mixture and adjust the seasoning as needed.
5. Serve the Olive Dip immediately or refrigerate it for later use.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

21827f90ac.gt:
Bring carrots and cauliflower to boil in 1 inch water in Dutch oven or large deep skillet; cover.
Cook 2 min.
Add broccoli; cook, covered, 3 to 5 min.
or until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Meanwhile, heat oil in small saucepan on medium-high heat.
Add onions; cook and stir 1 min.
Add cream cheese product and milk; cook and stir 2 to 3 min.
or until cream cheese is completely melted and mixture is well blended, stirring frequently.
Drain vegetables; place in bowl.
Top with cream cheese sauce.
21827f90ac.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced carrots, cauliflower florets, broccoli florets, and oil. Toss to coat the vegetables evenly.
3. Transfer the vegetables to a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and slightly caramelized.
4. While the vegetables are roasting, prepare the sauce by combining the Philadelphia Chive & Onion Cream Cheese Product, milk, and green onions in a small mixing bowl.
5. Once the vegetables are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool slightly.
6. Add the sauce to the vegetables and toss to coat evenly.
7. Serve the Veggies with Creamy Chive and Onion Sauce immediately, as the sauce will thicken as it cools.

Enjoy your delicious Veggies with Creamy Chive and Onion Sauce dish!

12da18d9e5.gt:
In a large pot, cook the wheat berries according to the package directions.
Set aside and let cool to room temperature.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the apple cider vinegar, orange juice, salt, pepper, nutmeg, cinnamon, olive oil and lemon juice.
Set aside.
In a large bowl, toss the cooked wheat berries, Goji berries, apple, celery, scallions, parsley and pecans together until combined.
Pour half the dressing over the salad and stir thoroughly.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
Prior to serving, pour the remaining dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve immediately or store in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
12da18d9e5.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the par-cooked wheat berries, apple cider vinegar, orange juice, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper, nutmeg, cinnamon, and a pinch of sugar. Mix well to combine.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, goji berries, and chopped apple.
4. Add the olive oil mixture to the wheat berry mixture and stir to combine.
5. Add the chopped celery, scallions, and pecans to the bowl and stir to combine.
6. Add the chopped parsley and stir to combine.
7. Transfer the salad to a serving bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
8. Serve the salad chilled or at room temperature.

This Wheat Berry Waldorf Salad with Citrus Vinaigrette is a delicious and nutritious dish that combines the natural sweetness of the wheat berries with the tangy flavors of the citrus vinaigrette. The addition of goji berries and pecans adds a touch of sweetness and crunch, while the apple and celery provide a refreshing crunch. The combination of these ingredients results in a well-balanced and satisfying salad that can be enjoyed as a light meal or a side dish.

9008821dbd.gt:
In large bowl, whisk together oil and lime juice.
Add cilantro, cumin, salt and pepper to taste, mixing well.
Stir in beans, bell pepper, corn, onion, and jalapeno pepper.
Taste and adjust seasoning.
To serve, garnish with cilantro sprigs.
Serve at room temperature.
9008821dbd.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the beans, corn, and red onion.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lime juice, cumin, and salt.
4. Pour the dressing over the beans, corn, and red onion mixture, and toss to combine.
5. Add the diced red bell peppers, jalapenos, and chopped cilantro to the bowl.
6. Toss the ingredients together until well-coated.
7. Transfer the salad to a serving bowl and serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.

[/INST]

13da1b6a5b.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350F.
Coat a pie pan with cooking spray.
Heat a medium nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium heat.
Cook the scallions, bell pepper, and bacon for 3 minutes, or until softened.
Spoon into the prepared pie pan.
Top with the Cheddar.
In a large bowl combine the milk, egg substitute, mustard, and nutmeg.
Pour into the pie pan.
Sprinkle with the Parmesan.
Bake for 35 minutes, or until golden and a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
13da1b6a5b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded reduced-fat cheddar cheese, fat-free evaporated milk, and liquid egg substitute. Mix well.
3. Add the sliced scallion, chopped green pepper, and chopped Canadian bacon to the bowl. Mix until the ingredients are well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the Dijon mustard and ground nutmeg. Add the mixture to the cheese mixture and stir until well combined.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round baking dish.
6. Bake the quiche in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
7. Remove the quiche from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into wedges and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Western Quiche!

c8dbf06636.gt:
Season chicken on both sides, pushing in seasoning.
Once seasoned get a fork or knife and tenderize by poking repeatedly.
Then cover meat place in fridge about 2 hours.
After 2 hours wash your potatoes cook in microwave 1 at a time for about 4 or 5 minutes until soft.
Set aside
Chop and wash broccoli add to boiling water steam to your liking 5 or 10 minutes.
Drain water add some butter season to your taste.
Add olive oil to pan heat on medium heat.
Once heated add 2 breast at a time cooking about 5 minutes on each side.
Once almost done cover with lid cook about 5 more minutes.
(Make sure the fire is not to high the key is to cook slow)
In a pot add some butter and seasoning and peeled potatoes to pot mash up potatoes add milk , cheese, and green onions.
Blend until cheese melts.
Lumps are ok.
Time to grub place on plate lick fingers yummm!
I only used paprika on chicken..
c8dbf06636.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with paprika, black pepper, garlic powder, garlic sea salt, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
3. Heat the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until browned on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the chopped green onion and cook until softened, about 2-3 minutes.
6. Add the shredded cheddar cheese and cook until melted and bubbly.
7. Add the cooked chicken back to the skillet and stir to combine.
8. Add the cooked potatoes to the skillet and stir to combine.
9. Pour the milk over the chicken and potatoes, and stir to combine.
10. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
11. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the potatoes are tender.
12. Serve the chicken and potatoes over a bed of broccoli, and enjoy your delicious and easy-to-prepare meal!

[/INST]

[/INST]

77d4a763dd.gt:
Add 1 tbsp oil into pan and add 1/2 tsp 'WK Seed Blend'
Cut the following into 1 1/2 inch long by 1/2 inch wide strips and set aside: - tofu (1 cup) - onions (1/2 cup) - tomatoes (1/2 cup) - bell pepper (1 cup)
Set to medium heat and heat oil into there is small movement in spices (usually 2 min)
Immediately add onions to pan; stir until golden brown (usually 3 min)
Add 2 tsp 'WK Sabji Blend' and 3/4 tsp salt (to your taste)
Add bell peppers and tomatoes to pan, stir; cover and cook for 3 min
Add tofu to pan; cover and cook for 3 min
Uncover pan and cook for 2 min
Optional: garnish with 2 tbsp coarsely chopped cilantro
For a full meal add: - Rice, naan, bread or heated whole wheat tortilla - Salad - Any bean curry - Yogurt - Red wine
77d4a763dd.pred:
1. Prepare the tofu: Cut the tofu into small cubes and press them between paper towels to remove excess moisture.
2. Prepare the vegetables: Wash and chop the bell peppers, tomatoes, and onions into small pieces.
3. Prepare the spices: Chop the cilantro and mix it with the WK Seed Blend and WK Sabji Blend.
4. Heat the oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
5. Add the tofu cubes and cook until they are golden brown and crispy, stirring occasionally.
6. Add the chopped onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
7. Add the bell peppers and tomatoes, and cook until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
8. Add the cilantro mixture and cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally.
9. Season the dish with salt to taste.
10. Serve the Bell Pepper and Tofu Sabji hot, garnished with additional cilantro if desired.

This dish is a delicious and healthy combination of tofu, bell peppers, tomatoes, and onions, all cooked together with a flavorful spice blend. The use of tofu as a protein source makes it a suitable option for vegetarians and vegans, while the inclusion of vegetables provides essential vitamins and minerals. The spice blend adds depth and complexity to the dish, making it a satisfying and enjoyable meal.

7b189a7aea.gt:
Grind cookies in a food processor into fine crumbs; transfer to a large mixing bowl.
Grind pecans in the food processor; add to cookie crumbs.
Stir 1 cup confectioners' sugar, bourbon whiskey, cocoa powder, and corn syrup with the cookies and pecans until the mixture holds together; roll into 3/4-inch balls.
Spread coconut onto a plate and 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar onto a separate plate.
Roll balls in coconut and sugar to coat.
Arrange balls onto a platter, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until hardened, at least 1 hour.
7b189a7aea.pred:
To make Meemaw's Bourbon Balls, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the vanilla wafer cookies, pecans, and confectioners' sugar. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the bourbon whiskey, cocoa powder, light corn syrup, and flaked coconut, if using. Mix until well combined.
4. Roll the mixture into small balls, about the size of a walnut.
5. Place the balls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the balls in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are set and slightly golden.
7. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the balls cool for a few minutes.
8. If desired, roll the balls in the additional confectioners' sugar, or dust them with powdered sugar.
9. Serve the Meemaw's Bourbon Balls immediately or store them in an airtight container for later enjoyment.

[/INST]

b379bad205.gt:
Place potato and 3 tbs water in a small bowl.
Cover with plastic wrap, vent and microwave 4 minutes or until tender, stirring once.
Set aside.
Heat a 10" skillet over med-high heat.
Coat pan with cooking spray and add onion.
Cover and cook 10 minutes or until lightly browned, stirring occasionally.
Uncover and cook 10 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently.
While onions cook, add 1/3 cup water, 1 Tbs at a time to prevent sticking.
Stir in potato, sage, salt and pepper.
Spoon into bowl and cool.
Combine 1/4 cup cheese, milk, egg whites and eggs in a bowl.
Add egg mixture to potato mixture and stir well.
Preheat broiler.
Pour mixture into skillet coated with cooking spray.
Cook over medium heat for 7 minutes or until bottom of frittata is browned and top is almost set.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on top and broil for 5 minutes or until cheese melts and top is set.
b379bad205.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the diced baking potato and cook until they are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Add the sliced onion and cook until it is soft and caramelized, stirring occasionally. This may take around 10-15 minutes.
4. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the water, sage, salt, and pepper.
5. Pour the mixture over the caramelized onion in the skillet, stirring to combine.
6. Add the grated parmesan cheese and cook until it melts and becomes bubbly.
7. In a separate bowl, whisk together the skim milk, egg whites, and egg.
8. Pour the egg mixture over the onion mixture in the skillet.
9. Cook the frittata in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is still slightly wobbly.
10. Remove the frittata from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

This Caramelized Onion Frittata recipe combines the flavors of caramelized onions, baking potato, and parmesan cheese, creating a delicious and filling dish. The addition of egg whites and skim milk adds a lighter, fluffier texture to the frittata, making it a satisfying and healthy meal option.

625c3e8493.gt:
Add coarsely chopped or halved cherries to a large pot.
Add lemon juice, cherry Kirsch, and vanilla extract and bring the mixture to a slow boil over medium-high heat.
In a bowl, whisk together cocoa powder and 2 cups of sugar until it is evenly distributed and there are no clumps.
Add the cocoa/sugar mixture to the cherries.
Add the remaining sugar.
Bring the mixture back up to a boil.
Stir in the butter and reduce the heat to medium.
Simmer for 1215 minutes, stirring often, until the sugar has completely dissolved and the mixture has thickened slightly.
The sauce will thicken further once it cools.
To can and store the Black Forest Sundae Sauce: Ladle hot sundae sauce into sterilized half pint jars, leaving 1/4 headspace.
Wipe jar rims and add lids.
Process jars in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes.
Remove the jars and cool on wire racks.
Store in a cool, dark place.
Store any opened jars in the refrigerator.
625c3e8493.pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the cherries, lemon juice, and kirsch. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the cherries are softened and the sauce has thickened slightly.
2. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the vanilla extract.
3. Gradually add the cocoa powder, stirring until it is fully incorporated.
4. Gradually add the sugar, stirring until it is fully combined.
5. Add the butter, stirring until it is melted and the sauce is smooth and creamy.
6. Allow the sauce to cool slightly before serving.
7. Pour the sauce over ice cream or other desired dessert to create a delicious Black Forest Sundae.

[/INST]

3c3a00487b.gt:
combine first 5 ingredients in large bowl -- make well in center.
combine egg, milk and oil, stir well.
add to dry ingredients, just till moistened --
combine blueberries, 1 tbls flour and 1 tbls sugar, toss gently to coat.
fold into batter.
spoon batter into 6 greased jumbo muffin cups, 2/3 rds full --
combine 1/4 cup sugar, 2 1/2 tbls flour and cinnamon, cut in butter -- till crumbly --
sprinkle over batter.
bake at 400* for 20 minutes or golden.
remove from pan to wire rack immediately.
3c3a00487b.pred:
To make Blueberry Streusel Muffins, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, salt, baking powder, and lemon rind.
3. In a separate bowl, cream the sugar and butter until light and fluffy.
4. Add the egg and milk to the sugar and butter mixture, and mix until well combined.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until just combined.
6. Fold in the fresh blueberries.
7. In a small bowl, mix the flour, sugar, and cinnamon.
8. Cut the butter into small pieces and add it to the flour mixture, stirring until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
9. Gently fold the streusel mixture into the batter.
10. Grease a muffin tin with cooking spray or butter, and fill each cup with the batter.
11. Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
12. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Blueberry Streusel Muffins!

e77203d622.gt:
Throw the ingredients in a blender and whizz until smooth.
Easy!
Great for a fast breakfast and packed full of fruit for a healthy start or snack
Using frozen fruit means there's no need to chill.
If you have leftovers, stir in some lemon juice to keep the colour nice.
It gives an added yogurty tang too
Makes 500mls/2 cups.
I classed it as 4 kid sized portions as I make it for Jack
e77203d622.pred:
1. In a blender, combine the slightly over ripe bananas, frozen fruit, and frozen fruit juice or coconut milk. Blend until smooth and creamy.
2. Add the rice or coconut milk, vanilla extract, agave nectar or liquid sweetener, and blend until smooth.
3. If the mixture is too thick, add a bit more liquid (fruit juice or coconut milk) to achieve the desired consistency.
4. Add the slightly over ripe avocado and blend until smooth.
5. Taste and adjust the sweetness as needed.
6. Pour the mixture into a glass or bowl and serve immediately.

This recipe is gluten-free, dairy-free, egg-free, and soy-free, making it suitable for various dietary preferences and restrictions.

c3b113f071.gt:
Cook bacon and set aside.
Fry beef with mushrooms and salt and pepper (or seasoning of your choice).
Unroll crescent triangles on baking sheet.
Add a thick slice of cheese, bacon, beef mixture and green onions to each triangle and roll up.
Place a thin piece of cheese on top of roll.
Cook stuffed crescent rolls as per the package instructions and ENJOY!
!
c3b113f071.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is no longer pink. Season the beef with salt and pepper (or your preferred seasoning).
3. Add the chopped green onion and mushrooms to the skillet, stirring occasionally. Cook until the mushrooms are tender.
4. Spread the crescent rolls on a baking sheet, and press the seams together to form a single sheet.
5. Place the beef mixture on one half of the crescent rolls, leaving a small border around the edges.
6. Top the beef with the sliced cheese of your choice.
7. Fold the other half of the crescent rolls over the beef and cheese, sealing the edges together.
8. Place the beef and cheese-filled crescent rolls on the prepared baking sheet.
9. Bake the rolls for 10-12 minutes, or until the crescent rolls are golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Remove the rolls from the oven, and let them cool for a few minutes before slicing them into individual servings.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

337c3e4209.gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees.
Wash potatoes and leave the skins on.
Cut into large, equal-sized chunks, and place them in a large mixing bowl.
Slice the onion thickly, separate and place them in the bowl as well.
Add all of your dry ingredients, along with the olive oil, and give it a good mix to evenly distribute everything together.
Cut each sausage link into thirds and place in the bowl with the potatoes and onions.
From here, I mix this all together with my hands.
Gently mix the sausage into the potato and onion mixture, trying not to break apart the sausage as you do this.
Dump this all into a 13 x 9 baking dish and cover with aluminum foil.
Place in the oven and allow this to cook for a minimum of one hour.
After an hour, turn the oven up to 400 degrees, remove the foil and place back in the oven until the sausage is nicely brown.
Stir every few minutes so all the sausage gets some equal browning space.
This can take anywhere from 15 to 30 minutes to achieve.
Make sure you watch this closely after returning to the oven so your potatoes and sausage dont burn.
Notes: I used light tasting olive oil, which is my preference.
If you prefer a stronger tasting oil, like extra virgin olive oil, feel free to use it.
While I normally cook with fresh, chopped garlic, I dont use it in this recipe, and substitute the garlic powder.
Fresh garlic tends to pool in the bottom of the dish, or on the top, and burns when browning the sausage.
337c3e4209.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Cut the onion into small, evenly sized pieces.
3. Wash the potatoes thoroughly and cut them into evenly sized pieces.
4. In a large bowl, combine the onion, potatoes, and olive oil.
5. Season the mixture with the Italian seasoning blend, salt-free, Kosher salt, garlic powder, and black pepper.
6. Spread the seasoned mixture evenly on a baking sheet or roasting pan.
7. Roast the potatoes and onions in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly crispy on the outside.
8. Remove the potatoes and onions from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
9. While the potatoes and onions are cooling, cook the sausage according to the package instructions.
10. Once the sausage is cooked, let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Carefully slice the cooked sausage into bite-sized pieces.
12. Add the cooked sausage to the roasted potatoes and onions, and toss everything together.
13. Serve the Sausage and Potatoes dish immediately, or refrigerate it for later.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

11e9299476.gt:
Preheat the oven according the directions for the biscuits.
Have the biscuits ready to put in oven
Start cooking the Sausage.
Once cook drain out the oil that's in the pan
Leave sausage in pan.
Add the flour and the milk.
Put heat to high and continue to mix.
Don't stop mixing until the gravy starts to boil.
Once its boiling, lower down heat to simmer for 5min.
Don't touch for those 5min.
Now put in the biscuits in the oven
Once the 5min is up give the gravy a little mix and set aside to cool down.
The longer it sits outside the thicker it would get.
When the biscuits are ready open them up and pour the sausage gravy on top.
Enjoy.
11e9299476.pred:
To make a delicious Sausage biscuit with gravy, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned and cooked through. Remove the sausage from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the flour and cook over medium heat until it turns golden brown. This will create a roux, which is a key component of the gravy.
4. Gradually pour in the milk, stirring constantly to prevent lumps. Cook until the mixture thickens and bubbles.
5. Add the cooked sausage back into the skillet, along with the salt and pepper. Stir to combine.
6. In a separate bowl, mix the biscuits according to the package instructions.
7. Pour the gravy mixture over the biscuits and stir to combine.
8. Place the mixture into a greased baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the biscuits are golden brown and the gravy is bubbly and hot.
9. Serve the Sausage biscuit with gravy warm, and enjoy your delicious meal!

ea0c63b401.gt:
In a medium saute pan, bring the stock to a boil.
Add the orzo and cook for 7 to 8 minutes until liquid is almost absorbed and orzo is tender.
Turn off heat.
Stir in the remaining ingredients.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.
Enjoy!
ea0c63b401.pred:
To prepare a delicious Big Daddy's Lemon Pepper Orzo dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, combine 2 cups of vegetable stock (or chicken stock) and 1 cup of orzo pasta. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes or until the orzo is cooked through and tender.

2. While the orzo cooks, prepare the sauce by combining the remaining 12 cups of vegetable stock (or chicken stock), 1 cup of cream, 14 cups of grated parmesan cheese, 2 tablespoons of cream cheese (or mascarpone), 2 tablespoons of butter, 2 tablespoons of fresh chives, 1 tablespoon of cracked black pepper, and 1 teaspoon of lemon zest.

3. Once the orzo is cooked, drain the pasta and return it to the pot. Pour the sauce over the orzo and stir to combine.

4. Serve the Big Daddy's Lemon Pepper Orzo dish immediately, garnished with additional fresh chives if desired.

This dish is a delicious and comforting meal that combines the flavors of creamy sauce, tangy lemon, and the crunchy texture of orzo pasta. The combination of ingredients creates a satisfying and enjoyable dining experience.

c3ac924e63.gt:
Light a grill.
Shape the meat into 4 patties and season on both sides with salt and pepper.
Wrap each hamburger with 2 slices of pancetta.
Grill the burgers over a medium-hot fire for about 4 minutes, or until nicely browned on the bottom.
Flip the burgers and top them with the Gorgonzola.
Grill for about 4 minutes longer, or until nicely browned and cooked through.
Meanwhile, brush the cut sides of the buns with the butter and grill them, cut side down, until lightly toasted.
Set the burgers on the bun bottoms and top with the lettuce, tomato and onion.
Serve at once.
c3ac924e63.pred:
For the Gorgonzola Cheeseburgers with Pancetta, you will need the following ingredients:
1 1/2 pounds ground sirloin or chuck
Salt and freshly ground pepper
8 thin slices pancetta
Four 1/4-inch-thick slices Gorgonzola cheese (4 ounces)
4 hamburger buns or kaiser rolls, split
2 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted
Romaine lettuce leaves
Tomato slices
Paper-thin sweet onion slices

To prepare the Gorgonzola Cheeseburgers with Pancetta, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, mix the ground sirloin or chuck with salt and pepper. Form the mixture into four evenly sized patties.
3. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter with the minced garlic.
4. Place the patties on a plate and brush both sides with the garlic butter mixture.
5. Grill the patties for 4-5 minutes per side, or until they are cooked through and slightly charred.
6. While the patties are cooking, prepare the toppings.
7. Slice the pancetta into thin strips.
8. Slice the Gorgonzola cheese into four equal pieces.
9. Slice the tomato and onion into thin slices.
10. Place the cooked patties on the buns or rolls, and top with the pancetta strips, Gorgonzola cheese slices, tomato slices, and onion slices.
11. Serve the Gorgonzola Cheeseburgers with Pancetta immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Gorgonzola Cheeseburgers with Pancetta!

ffcb21a60b.gt:
In a pot combine vegetable broth and milk and bring to a boil.
turn off heat, stir in polenta and cook until thickened (abut 3-5 minutes).
Set aside to thicken further.
Clean, wash and peel the carrots.
Slice lenghtwise.
Heat butter in a skillet and add carrots.
Saute for some minutes, then add 5 tbs of water and cook covered on medium heat for another ten minutes until soft.
Season with sugar, salt and pepper.
Add sour cream or yoghurt, sage and half of the cheese to the polenta and stir to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Pour into a casserole dish (about 20X12 cm) and top with the carrots (I used their liquid too since it was full of flavour, but that way the casserole may get a bit soggy).
Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake in the preheated oven at 200C (~400F) for 20 minutes.
Let stand for about 5 minutes until polenta has set and can be sliced.
ffcb21a60b.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the vegetable broth, milk, polenta, and butter. Mix until smooth.
3. Add the carrots, sage leaves, grated cheese, and sugar. Mix well.
4. Pour the mixture into a greased baking dish.
5. Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until the polenta is cooked through and the edges are golden brown.
6. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[/INST]

[INST]
This Baked Polenta Carrot Casserole is a delicious and hearty dish that combines the flavors of carrots, sage, and cheese. The creamy polenta base adds a rich, comforting texture, while the carrots provide a sweet and slightly tangy contrast. The sage leaves add a delightful herbal touch, and the grated cheese adds a rich, melty element to the dish. This dish is perfect for a cozy, home-cooked meal or a special occasion, and can be easily customized with additional ingredients, such as chopped nuts, a sprinkle of fresh herbs, or a drizzle of honey.

167bcf0a2a.gt:
FRIED SCRUMBLE EGGS
fried scrumble egg set aside
BAKE BACON
bake bacon on parchment paper at 200 C for 15 minute then set aside
SAUTE SPINACH
with oiled pan quick saute spinach for 1 minute with a dash of salt then set aside
FRIED GARLIC AND SHALLOT
fry garlic and shallot till fragrant then add light soy sauce and off heat then add fried eggs and bacon mix well
top on cooked spinach and serve immediately
167bcf0a2a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the light soy sauce, salt, and garlic.
3. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the diced garlic and shallot, and cook until softened, about 2 minutes.
4. Add the spinach to the skillet, and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.
5. In a small bowl, whisk the egg and light soy sauce mixture.
6. Place the spinach mixture in the bottom of a baking dish.
7. Place the cooked bacon on top of the spinach mixture.
8. Pour the egg mixture over the bacon.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the egg is cooked through and the bacon is crispy.
10. Serve the LG CRISPY BACON AND EGGS ON SPINACH dish immediately.

73a84e1f5e.gt:
Wash and peel the zucchini and cut into long strips.
Season with salt and pepper.
Mix the eggs, milk and salt, dip the zucchini strips into the mixture and then roll in the breadcrumbs.
Saute until crisp on the outside but not overcooked, about 2-3 minutes.
Serve.
73a84e1f5e.pred:
To prepare a delicious "gilded" zucchini, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

2. Wash and peel the zucchini, then cut it into small, even pieces.

3. In a large bowl, mix the zucchini pieces with salt, pepper, and a pinch of sugar.

4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and milk together.

5. Add the egg and milk mixture to the zucchini mixture, stirring gently to combine.

6. In a small bowl, mix the breadcrumbs with a pinch of salt and a drizzle of oil or melted butter.

7. Dip each piece of zucchini into the breadcrumb mixture, ensuring it is evenly coated.

8. Place the breaded zucchini pieces on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.

9. Bake the zucchini pieces for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.

10. Serve the "gilded" zucchini immediately, as it is best when hot.

Enjoy your delicious "gilded" zucchini dish!

6bf369490a.gt:
Stir boiling water into dry gelatin mix in large bowl at least 2 min.
until completely dissolved.
Drain pineapple, reserving juice.
Add enough ice to juice to measure 1-1/2 cups.
Add to gelatin; stir until ice is completely melted.
Refrigerate 45 min.
or until slightly thickened.
Remove 1-1/2 cups of the gelatin; place in medium bowl.
Stir in pineapple; set aside.
Add 1-1/2 cups of the whipped topping to remaining gelatin; stir with wire whisk until well blended.
Pour into 9-inch square dish.
Refrigerate 15 min.
or until set but not firm.
Carefully spoon fruited gelatin over creamy layer in dish.
Refrigerate at least 3 hours or until firm.
Cut into 9 squares.
Serve topped evenly with the remaining whipped topping.
6bf369490a.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the boiling water and JELL-O Strawberry Flavor Sugar Free Gelatin. Stir until the gelatin is fully dissolved.
2. Add the pineapple chunks and ice cubes to the mixture, stirring gently to combine.
3. Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish, spreading it evenly.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the COOL WHIP FREE Whipped Topping with a spoon.
5. Spread the whipped topping evenly over the top of the pineapple mixture.
6. Refrigerate the dish for at least 4 hours or overnight, until the JELL-O has set.
7. Cut the dish into squares and serve.

[/INST]

These Low-Fat Fruit 'n Juice Squares are a delicious and healthy dessert option, perfect for those looking to enjoy a sweet treat without the added fat and calories. The combination of the pineapple chunks, JELL-O, and COOL WHIP FREE Whipped Topping creates a delightful and refreshing dessert that is both visually appealing and satisfying.

5c462ab39b.gt:
Mix all ingredients well and refrigerate for a few hours to let the flavors blend!
Its that simple!
My mom got this recipe from a friend of hers more than 20 years ago.
Her friend got the recipe while staying at an Inn/B&B named The Magnolia in Napa Valley.
5c462ab39b.pred:
To prepare a delicious Magnolia Dressing, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine 1/2 whole Small Onion, grated, and 1 cup Canola Oil (or oil of your choice).
2. Add 23 cups Granulated White Sugar to the bowl.
3. Next, mix in 13 cups Ketchup.
4. Gradually pour in 1/4 cups Red Wine Vinegar, stirring continuously to ensure the ingredients are well combined.
5. If the mixture seems too thick, you can add a bit more oil or vinegar to achieve the desired consistency.
6. Once the dressing is at your desired thickness, transfer it to a jar or container with a lid.
7. Store the Magnolia Dressing in the refrigerator for up to a week, or in the freezer for up to 3 months.

This Magnolia Dressing can be used as a salad dressing, marinade, or even as a base for other dishes. Enjoy!

51e70cd927.gt:
Heat oven to 425 degrees F.
Cut potatoes lengthwise in half; place, cut sides down, on foil-covered rimmed baking sheet.
Bake 30 to 35 min.
or until tender.
Scoop out centers of potatoes into bowl, leaving 1/4-inch-thick shells.
Add Neufchatel, milk, sugar and cinnamon to potatoes; mash until blended.
Fill shells with potato mixture; top with nuts.
Bake 8 min.
or until potatoes are heated through and nuts are toasted.
51e70cd927.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Scrub the sweet potatoes clean and cut them into equal-sized pieces.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sweet potatoes, Neufchatel cheese, fat-free milk, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, and chopped pecans.
4. Mix well to ensure the ingredients are evenly distributed.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, making sure to evenly distribute the ingredients.
6. Bake the sweet potatoes in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Carefully transfer the sweet potatoes to a serving dish and sprinkle with additional chopped pecans, if desired.
9. Serve the Twice-Baked Sweet Potatoes immediately.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious and satisfying Twice-Baked Sweet Potatoes dish.

5bcccb4e9b.gt:
Heat 1 Tbsp.
oil in medium nonstick skillet on medium-high heat.
Add potatoes and red pepper, cook 8 to 10 min.
or until tender; transfer to bowl; set aside.
Meanwhile in small bowl, whisk eggs and pepper.
Heat remaining oil in skillet.
Add egg mixture; cook 2 to 3 min.
or until eggs are almost set, lifting edge with spatula and tilting skillet to allow uncooked portion to flow underneath.
When egg mixture is set but top is still slightly moist, top with potato mixture and cheese.
Slip spatula underneath omelette, tip skillet to loosen and gently fold omelette in half.
Cook 1 to 2 min.
Slide or flip onto serving plate; cut in half.
5bcccb4e9b.pred:
1. Preheat a non-stick skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
2. Add 1 Tbsp. of the oil to the pan and swirl to coat the pan evenly.
3. Add the diced Yukon gold potatoes to the pan and cook until they are tender and slightly browned, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the chopped red pepper to the pan and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Remove the potatoes and red pepper from the pan and set aside.
6. Wipe the pan clean with a paper towel.
7. Add the remaining 1 Tbsp. of oil to the pan and swirl to coat the pan evenly.
8. Add the eggs to the pan, stirring gently to scramble them.
9. Add the black pepper and Cracker Barrel Shredded Double Cheddar Cheese to the pan, stirring to combine.
10. Cook the omelette until the eggs are cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Carefully pour the cooked omelette onto the cooked potatoes and red pepper in the pan.
12. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the omelette is fully cooked.
13. Serve the Cheesy Country Omelette immediately.

[/INST]

26e693a67f.gt:
Heat oven to 425F.
Spray pie pan with cooking spray.
Place crust in pan and crimp edges.
Toss apples with lemon juice.
Stir in sugars and flour.
Pour into prepared crust.
Mix sugar into oatmeal.
Cut margarine into oatmeal, I do this with my fingers, you can use two forks or pastry blender.
Sprinkle oatmeal mixture on apples.
Place in oven for about 25 minutes Then take out and place foil around edges and put back in oven for about 20 minutes more.
Allow to cool before serving at least 15 minutes.
26e693a67f.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the pie crust ingredients (flour, sugar, and oatmeal) and mix until well combined.
3. Add the apples, lemon juice, and spiced sugar to the bowl and mix until the apples are coated evenly.
4. Pour the mixture into a pie dish and press the crust mixture evenly over the apples.
5. Bake the pie for 45-50 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the apples are tender.
6. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This delightful Spiced Sugar Apple Pie Light dish is a delicious and healthy dessert option. The combination of the crust, apples, and spiced sugar creates a rich and flavorful experience, while the light margarine adds a touch of creaminess without being overly heavy. The oatmeal in the crust provides a satisfying crunch and a hint of natural sweetness. This pie is perfect for those who want a lighter dessert option without sacrificing taste and texture.

78bbc2284a.gt:
1.
Place the grapes on a parchment-lined plate in the freezer.
2.
Pour the boiling water over the hibiscus flowers, cover and allow to steep 15-20 minutes.
Whisk in the sugar until it dissolves.
3.
Pour the red wine and sliced peaches into a small pitcher.
Strain the hibiscus tea over the top, discarding the flowers.
4.
Chill this mixture until ready to serve.
5.
Stir in the frozen grapes, and enjoy while watching the sunset.
78bbc2284a.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients:
- 1 cup Grapes, Washed And De-stemmed
- 1 cup Boiling Water
- 1/4 cups Dried Hibiscus Flowers (also Called Flor De Jamaica)
- 1 Tablespoon Heaping, Sugar
- 2 cups Cheap Red Wine
- 1 whole Large Ripe Peach, Thinly Sliced

2. Prepare the ingredients:
- Rinse the grapes and remove the stems.
- Boil the water and let it cool down to room temperature.
- Rinse the dried hibiscus flowers and pat them dry.
- Slice the peach into thin pieces.

3. Combine the ingredients:
- In a large bowl, combine the grapes, hibiscus flowers, sugar, and red wine.
- Allow the mixture to sit for a few hours or overnight, stirring occasionally.
- After the mixture has sat for the desired amount of time, strain it through a fine mesh sieve to remove any solids.
- Discard the solids and return the liquid to the bowl.
- Add the sliced peach to the bowl and stir gently to combine.

4. Serve and enjoy:
- Pour the Hibiscus Sangria into glasses and serve immediately.
- Enjoy the refreshing taste of this unique and delicious beverage.

[/INST]

f87c45ee62.gt:
Place margarine, marshmallow creme and vanilla in small bowl; beat on medium speed until well blended.
Gradually add sugar, beating after each addition until well blended.
Blend in 1 Tbsp.
of the milk.
Add remaining 1 Tbsp.
milk if necessary for desired spreading consistency.
f87c45ee62.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, beat the softened margarine or butter until smooth and creamy.
2. Add the JET-PUFFED Marshmallow Creme and beat until well combined.
3. Gradually add the vanilla extract, beating until fully incorporated.
4. Slowly add the powdered sugar, mixing until the desired consistency is reached. If the frosting is too thick, add a small amount of milk. If it's too thin, add more powdered sugar.
5. Once the frosting reaches the desired consistency, beat in the remaining milk, if needed, to achieve the desired spreading consistency.
6. Cover the bowl and refrigerate the frosting for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld and the frosting to set.
7. Once the frosting is chilled, it's ready to use. Spread it on cakes, cupcakes, or other desserts for a delicious, creamy marshmallow flavor.

[/INST]

4a46bab1e9.gt:
Mix all ingredients together, I use my stand mixer with the dough hook.
Let mixer kneed the dough for about 5 minutes.
Dough should be moist and pliable but not sticky, if it is dry add more water, if it is too sticky add a little extra flour.
Coat a bowl with a little oil place dough in the bowl and cover with cling wrap and leave for about 1 hour or till doubled in size.
Once doubled in size dust bench lightly with flour turn out dough and lightly press down to remove a little of the air.
Form into your choice of loaf, I like to use a proofing basket, but you could use a tin or free form.
Let the loaf rise for another 40 min to 1 hour.
Pre heat your oven to super hot 450 F/ 250C.
I use a pizza stone but it can go straight in the oven on a tray if you don't have one.
Leave oven temp on high for 10 min then reduce to 375 F/ 190 C for a further 20 minute.
Enjoy!
4a46bab1e9.pred:
To make a delicious Greek Yogurt Bread dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the whole wheat flour, white bread flour, organic honey, and salt. Mix well.
2. Add the yeast to the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
3. Gradually add the water, stirring until the dough comes together. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a clean cloth, and let it rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
5. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
6. Punch down the dough and transfer it to a lightly floured surface. Shape the dough into a ball and then divide it into 8 equal pieces.
7. On a lightly floured surface, roll each piece of dough into a smooth ball. Place the balls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Cover the baking sheet with a clean cloth and let the dough rise for another 30-60 minutes, or until it has doubled in size.
9. Bake the dough in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
10. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack for 10-15 minutes.
11. Once the bread is cool, slice it into desired pieces and serve.

Enjoy your delicious Greek Yogurt Bread!

3182df418c.pred:
1. Wash and chop the watermelon, cucumbers, and red onions into small, even pieces.
2. In a large bowl, combine the chopped watermelon, cucumbers, red onions, and minced serrano chiles.
3. Add the Kraft Zesty Italian Dressing, and mix well to coat the ingredients evenly.
4. Season the mixture with salt, adjusting the amount to taste.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Serve the Fresh Watermelon Spring Salsa as a refreshing side dish or topping for your favorite dishes.

[/INST]

aacb2f290c.gt:
Preheat grill to medium high.
Drizzle oil and lemon juice over romaine and season with salt and pepper.
Place on grill and cook for 1-2 minutes per side.
Place cooked romaine on 2 plates and drizzle with dressing top with anchovies, cheese and or croutons.
Enjoy!
aacb2f290c.pred:
To prepare a delicious Grilled Caesar Salad or Grilled Romaine, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, combine the sliced romaine lettuce hearts, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Toss the ingredients to coat them evenly.
3. If using anchovy, add them to the bowl and toss again.
4. If using prepared caesar salad dressing, add it to the bowl and toss to combine.
5. If using croutons, add them to the bowl and toss to coat evenly.
6. If using fresh shaved parmesan cheese, add it to the bowl and toss to combine.
7. If using grilled chicken, season the chicken with salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
8. Grill the chicken until it reaches your desired level of doneness, usually around 6-8 minutes per side.
9. Once the chicken is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
10. To assemble the salad, divide the cooked chicken among the romaine lettuce hearts, and top with the croutons, anchovy (if using), and shaved parmesan cheese (if using).

Enjoy your delicious Grilled Caesar Salad or Grilled Romaine, accompanied by the flavors of the grilled chicken and the tangy dressing.

35f4aac182.gt:
Place rice into the bento, cover the whole surface with bonito flakes, and drizzle with a round of soy sauce.
Top it with shredded nori seaweed and roasted sesame.
The crackly texture and aroma of the baked seaweed is delicious.
Cover with lots of kettle-cooked shirasu.
Shred shiso leaves and scatter.
It smells great.
Top it with ginger to taste .
Grate a daikon radish, lightly squeezing out the excess water, mix with ponzu sauce in a small container to make grated ponzu sauce.
It tastes great to eat this with the grated ponzu sauce from Step 5.
In addition to the bento: Misakiko fried tuna katsu, Kanagawa komatsuna and daikon radish, aburaage stir-fry, Odawara fish paste with shiso leaves and pickled plums, imitation crab meat fried eggs, and tomatoes and shiso leaves.
Try eating the fried tuna katsu with lots of grated daikon and ponzu sauce from Step 5 ..
35f4aac182.pred:
1. Cook the rice according to the package instructions.
2. In a small bowl, mix the Bonito flakes, Soy sauce, Roasted sesame, and Shredded nori seaweed.
3. In a large bowl, combine the cooked rice, Grated ginger, Grated daikon radish, and Ponzu.
4. Add the Kettle-cooked shirasu to the large bowl and mix well.
5. Serve the Kettle-cooked Shirasu Rice Bowl Bento immediately.

[/SYS]

6f3b4ebeac.gt:
Cut the apple/pear and ginger into fine pieces.
Thinly slice the chili.
Mix chili, ginger, syrup, cinnamon, orange juice and zest in a saucepan and heat until it is boiling.
Add the apples/pears and bring to a boil again.
Add walnuts and raisins, and boil for about 5 minutes.
Pour into a glass with a tight fitting lid and cool completely.
(It will thicken up a bit when cooled down.)
Store in the fridge for a few weeks.
Serve with home baked baguettes, artisan bread and lots of wonderful cheeses.
Yum!
Enjoy!
6f3b4ebeac.pred:
To prepare a delicious Apple Chutney with Ginger, Walnuts, and Raisins, follow these steps:

1. Wash and peel the apples or pears, removing the core and seeds.
2. Core the apple or pear and cut it into small pieces.
3. Grate the fresh ginger and remove the stem and seeds.
4. Chop the red chili into small pieces.
5. In a large saucepan, combine the apples, ginger, chili, and maple syrup.
6. Add the cinnamon, orange zest, and orange juice to the saucepan.
7. Cook the mixture over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the apples are tender and the chutney has thickened.
8. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Add the walnuts and raisins to the chutney and stir to combine.
10. Allow the chutney to cool completely before serving.

This Apple Chutney with Ginger, Walnuts, and Raisins is a delicious and healthy side dish that can be served with a variety of main courses. The combination of apples, ginger, chili, and spices creates a unique and flavorful taste that is both satisfying and refreshing.

4816a33066.gt:
Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat until shimmering.
Add onion and salt and stir until coated with oil.
Reduce heat to medium, cover, and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is soft, about 10 minutes (if onion begins to burn after 5 minutes, reduce heat to low).
Add garlic and chili powder and cook, uncovered, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add beef and cook, breaking up meat with wooden spoon, until just pink, about 3 minutes.
Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper, brown sugar, tomato puree, ketchup, water, and hot sauce.
Simmer until Sloppy Joe sauce is slightly thicker than ketchup, 8 to 10 minutes.
Adjust seasonings.
Spoon meat mixture onto hamburger buns and serve.
Make Ahead: If you find yourself with leftover Sloppy Joes or just feel like making a double batch, the meat mixture freezes well for up to one month.
To return the meat mixture to its original consistency, you may need to add a little water when it is reheated.
4816a33066.pred:
1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. 
2. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
4. Add the chili powder, ground black pepper, brown sugar, and hot pepper sauce. Cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring to combine.
5. Add the tomato puree, ketchup, water, and tomatoes. Stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened and the beef is cooked through.
7. Serve the Sloppy Joes in the buns.

[/INST]

27b86a0c47.gt:
Combine Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, anchovy paste, pepper, Worcestershire sauce, egg yolk, and minced garlic in a mini food processor; process 15 seconds.
With the processor on, gradually add olive oil, processing until combined.
Toss with romaine lettuce.
27b86a0c47.pred:
To make a delicious Caesar Vinaigrette dish, follow these steps:
1. In a small bowl, mix the finely grated Parmesan cheese, fresh lemon juice, anchovy paste, and black pepper.
2. In a separate bowl, whisk the pasteurized egg yolk, garlic, minced, and Worcestershire sauce until well combined.
3. Slowly drizzle in the extra-virgin olive oil while continuously whisking the mixture.
4. Once the dressing is fully combined, add the Parmesan cheese mixture to the egg yolk mixture, and whisk until well combined.
5. Toss the Romaine lettuce in the dressing, ensuring it is evenly coated.

This Caesar Vinaigrette dish is a delicious and healthy option for a salad, providing a balance of flavors and textures. The combination of Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, anchovy paste, and Worcestershire sauce creates a tangy and slightly savory dressing, while the egg yolk and garlic add richness and depth. The extra-virgin olive oil provides a healthy and flavorful base, and the Romaine lettuce adds a crunchy texture and freshness to the dish.

842d3c7eb8.gt:
Combine and mix all of the ingredients together in a bowl.
Mix the egg whites in a cutting motion.
Strain the mixture through a sieve and cook the tamagoyaki in a tamagoyaki pan.
Once cooled, cut into long strips.
842d3c7eb8.pred:
[INST]
1. In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs, shiro-dashi, sugar, sake, and salt.
2. Heat a non-stick skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan, and let it cook for about 2 minutes, or until the edges start to set.
3. Using a spatula, gently lift and fold the omelette in half, then in half again. Cook for another 30 seconds.
4. Carefully slide the omelette onto a plate, and let it cool for a few minutes.
5. To assemble the sushi rolls, spread a thin layer of filling (e.g., sushi rice, tuna salad, or avocado) on the omelette. Roll the omelette over the filling, and slice the roll into bite-sized pieces.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

131faa12b8.gt:
Stir together 1 cup yogurt, 2 tablespoons oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, salt and spices.
Add chicken and turn until well coated.
Marinate at room temperature for 20 minutes.
While the chicken is marinating, preheat grill.
While grill is heating, stir together remaining 1 1/4 cups yogurt and 1 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice and salt to taste.
Reduce grill to moderate heat.
Grill chicken (discard marinade), on lightly oiled grill rack, turning occasionally (closing grill between turns), until cooked through, 10 to 12 minutes total.
Transfer chicken to a platter.
Toss together mint, shallot and remaining oil in a small bowl.
Drizzle chicken with yogurt sauce and top with mint salad.
131faa12b8.pred:
1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, mix the yogurt, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, chili powder, cumin, coriander, black pepper, cinnamon, and minced shallots.
3. Place the chicken breast halves in the bowl and toss to coat evenly with the marinade. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
4. Remove the chicken from the marinade and pat it dry with paper towels.
5. Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
6. While the chicken is grilling, prepare the mint leaves by washing them thoroughly and then chopping them.
7. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes.
8. Slice the chicken into thin pieces and serve it on a platter with the fresh mint leaves scattered on top.

[/INST]

fd5fe058a6.gt:
Heat oil in skillet.
Add garlic and shallots saute until tender.
Add wine and oregano.
Simmer 4 minutes.
Add clams and heat just until they open.
Discard any that do not open.
fd5fe058a6.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and shallot, and cook until softened, about 2 minutes.
3. Add the clam (fresh or frozen) to the skillet, and cook until they open, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the oregano, white wine, and lemon wedge to the skillet. Cook until the liquid has reduced by half, about 5 minutes.
5. Season the clams with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Transfer the clams to a baking dish, and pour the sauce over them.
7. Bake the clams in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
8. Serve the Clams in White Wine Sauce over rice or pasta, and enjoy!

0b797c29a0.gt:
Reserve 1 tablespoon of olive oil,now heat the remainder in a medium saucepan
Add the garlic and a pinch.of salt and over low heat.stirring until golden brown.then remove the pan from the heat.do not let the garlic burn as it will taint its flavor.if its burn you will have to start over.
Meanwhile, bring a large saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil.add the spaghetti and remaining olive oil and cook for 10 to 12 minutes, until tender.
Drain the spaghetti thoroughly and return to the pan.
Add the oil and garlic mixture to the spaghetti and toss to coat.season with pepper,add the chopped fresh parsley, and toss to coat.
Put on a plater and serve warm, serve immediately.
0b797c29a0.pred:
1. In a large pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
2. Add the crushed garlic and cook for about 1 minute, stirring occasionally, until fragrant.
3. Add the spaghetti to the pan and toss to coat with the oil and garlic mixture.
4. Cook the spaghetti for about 8-10 minutes, or until it is cooked through and slightly tender.
5. Remove the spaghetti from the pan and set aside.
6. In a small bowl, mix the chopped parsley with a pinch of salt and pepper to taste.
7. Add the parsley mixture to the pan with the cooked spaghetti and toss to combine.
8. Serve the spaghetti olio e aglio immediately.

[/INST]

56045e7740.gt:
Heat gas grill on medium or charcoal grill until coals are ash white.
Thread meat, pineapple, red bell pepper and onion alternately onto skewers.
Combine butter, hoisin sauce and orange zest in bowl; stir until well mixed.
Spread about 1/3 mixture onto 1 side of each skewer.
Place skewers onto grill, glaze-side up.
Grill 2-4 minutes or until browned.
Turn skewers; brush grilled side with about 1/3 glaze.
Continue grilling, turning often and brushing with glaze, 8-12 minutes or until meat reaches desired doneness.
56045e7740.pred:
1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter, hoisin sauce, and orange zest.
3. Season the beef with salt and pepper, then toss it in the butter mixture.
4. Thread the beef onto the skewers, alternating with pineapple and red bell pepper pieces.
5. Soak the skewers in water for 15-20 minutes to prevent them from burning on the grill.
6. Grill the skewers for 10-12 minutes, turning them occasionally, until the beef is cooked through and the pineapple and red bell pepper are tender and slightly charred.
7. Serve the Grilled Orange Teriyaki Beef Skewers immediately, garnished with a sprig of fresh mint.

Enjoy your delicious Grilled Orange Teriyaki Beef Skewers!

fda9c36818.gt:
Put all of the ingredients in a jar for the dressing and shake to mix throughly.
That's all.
It keeps up to 1 week.
Thinly cut daikon radish into match sticks.
Add sliced onions.
Wakame seaweed.
Pour the dressing over the salad.
Daikon radish & carrot with crispy boiled and chirimen jako salad.The combination is great.
I found this salad dressing container at a 100 yen shop.
Perfect for storing liquids!
Cheap and convenient!
Just put all the ingredients to shake it up.
fda9c36818.pred:
[INST]
1. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, sesame oil, and cider vinegar or grain vinegar.
2. Add the ground sesame seeds and sugar to the mixture, stirring well to combine.
3. If the dressing is too thick, add a bit more water or vinegar to achieve the desired consistency.
4. Taste the dressing and adjust the seasoning as needed.
5. Serve the dressing over a salad, noodles, or as a dip for vegetables.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

1d309c893f.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken, soup, cheese, milk, salt, pepper and butter.
Mix together and pour mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Bake at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 5 to 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly, and casserole is hot in the center.
1d309c893f.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked and shredded chicken, condensed cream of chicken soup, shredded Cheddar cheese, milk, salt, and pepper.
3. Mix well until the ingredients are combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Dot the top with the melted butter.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Serve hot.

Please note that this is a simple recipe and can be adjusted according to personal preferences or dietary requirements.

1e5cac3aa5.gt:
Arrange tomato slices on a serving platter.
Lay 1 avocado slice on top of each tomato, and top with fresh mozzarella.
Drizzle olive oil, then balsamic vinegar over the tops, and season with salt and pepper.
1e5cac3aa5.pred:
1. Wash and dry the ingredients: Wash the beefsteak tomato, avocado, and mozzarella cheese thoroughly. Dry the ingredients with a paper towel or a clean cloth.

2. Prepare the ingredients: Cut the beefsteak tomato into 6 equal slices, and cut the avocado into 6 equal slices. Slice the mozzarella cheese into 6 equal pieces.

3. Assemble the ingredients: Arrange the sliced tomato, avocado, and mozzarella cheese on a plate or a serving platter.

4. Drizzle with olive oil: Drizzle extra virgin olive oil over the ingredients, creating a light and even layer.

5. Add balsamic vinegar: Drizzle balsamic vinegar over the ingredients, creating a contrasting flavor.

6. Season with salt and pepper: Sprinkle coarse sea salt and freshly ground pepper over the ingredients, ensuring even distribution.

7. Serve: Serve the Insalata Tricolore immediately, allowing the flavors to meld together and enjoy the fresh, vibrant taste of this colorful salad.

[/INST]

3e392f1d33.gt:
Melt chocolate in oil (microwave), and add the rest in the order shown making sure that the eggs don't cook in the warmed oil/chocolate.
Before adding the flour, mix the salt and baking powder into the flour - then mix the flour mixture into the batter.
Pour the completed mixture into a greased and floured 9 inch x 13 inch cake pan.
Sprinkle some chopped nuts on top if desired.
Bake at 350F (180C) for 30 minutes.
Let cool at least 15 minutes.
3e392f1d33.pred:
To create Grandma Woodall's Brownies, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 2 squares of unsweetened chocolate, canola oil, and sugar.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt.
