5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until well combined.
6. Fold in the broken nuts, if using.
7. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownies comes out clean.
9. Allow the brownies to cool completely before cutting into squares and serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Grandma Woodall's Brownies!

0e781ad046.gt:
Roast a whole butternut pumpkin.
When soft, scoop out the flesh and mash or process before adding a teaspoon of ground cumin, crunchy peanut butter and a splash of chilli sauce to taste.
Add a drizzle of olive oil, and stir well.
Serve in a bowl with crackers or pita bread.
0e781ad046.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the butternut pumpkin into bite-sized pieces and remove the seeds and strings.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the ground cumin, crunchy peanut butter, and chili sauce.
4. Add the olive oil and mix well.
5. Place the butternut pumpkin pieces into a baking dish, making sure they are evenly distributed.
6. Roast the pumpkin pieces in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
7. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let the pumpkin pieces cool for a few minutes.
8. Using a fork, mash the cooked pumpkin pieces to create a smooth dip.
9. Serve the Roast Pumpkin Dip immediately, and enjoy with your favorite dipping items, such as pita chips, crackers, or vegetables.

This Roast Pumpkin Dip is a delicious and healthy option for a snack or appetizer, and the combination of flavors from the cumin, peanut butter, and chili sauce creates a unique and satisfying taste.

6970e8f99b.gt:
Preheat oven to 300F and grease an 8x8 baking pan.
Combine unsweetened chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and melt over medium low heat, stirring constantly until pieces are almost melted.
Remove from the heat and stir until smooth.
In a large bowl using an electric mixer on medium speed, beat eggs until light yellow in color--about 5 minutes.
Add sugar and blend on low until thoroughly combined.
Add vanilla and melted chocolate to the egg sugar mixture.
Blend on low until smooth.
Add the flour and mix thoroughly.
Pour batter into greased pan.
Smooth surface with a spatula, and sprinkle uniformly with chocolate chips.
Bake on center rack of oven for 45-55 minutes.
The batter should be set and a toothpick inserted into the center should come out clean.
Do not overbake.
Cool to room temperature.
Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour.
Cut and serve chilled.
6970e8f99b.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the unsweetened baking chocolate, softened butter, and eggs.
3. Add the sugar, vanilla extract, and flour, mixing until smooth.
4. Stir in the semi-sweet chocolate chips.
5. Pour the batter into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownies comes out clean.
7. Allow the brownies to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

65e738299c.gt:
Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a large, heavy pot.
Saute the onion for a couple of minutes until softened but not browned.
Add the rice and saute for a minute or two until it turns slightly translucent.
Add the wine and stir until absorbed.
Next, add the broth one ladle at a time, stirring very frequently.
When the rice begins to dry out, add another ladle.
After about 15 minutes, begin to check the grains.
When the rice begins to break down but is still slightly tough inside, add the vegetables, basil, salt and pepper.
Add the last few ladles of veggie broth and work in the vegetables.
If youve run out of broth, use water and add salt, if needed.
Within 5 to 10 minutes, the rice will become tender and creamy.
Once the mix is thick and starchy, take it off of the heat and stir in the cheese.
Garnish with a bit more basil and more cheese, if desired.
65e738299c.pred:
1. In a large saucepan, heat the 4 Tablespoons of Extra Virgin Olive Oil over medium heat. Add the minced onion and sauté until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
2. Add the Arborio Risotto and stir to combine. Cook for about 1-2 minutes, or until the rice is slightly toasted.
3. Pour in the Dry White Wine and stir to combine. Allow the wine to cook off, about 2-3 minutes.
4. Gradually pour in the Mild Vegetable Broth, stirring constantly to prevent the rice from sticking to the bottom of the pan.
5. Add the diced zucchini, chopped mushrooms, and frozen peas to the saucepan. Cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender but still slightly crisp.
6. Add the Fresh Basil, salt, and pepper to the saucepan. Stir to combine.
7. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the risotto is creamy and well-seasoned.
8. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the Grated Parmesan Cheese.
9. Serve the Summer Risotto immediately, garnished with additional fresh basil leaves if desired.

This Summer Risotto recipe combines the flavors of fresh vegetables, such as zucchini and mushrooms, with the richness of the Arborio rice and the creaminess of the Mild Vegetable Broth. The addition of the Parmesan cheese provides a satisfying, savory finish to the dish. This versatile recipe can be easily customized with different vegetables and seasonings to suit individual tastes and preferences.

496db791a3.gt:
In a bowl, stir together the strawberries, sugar, orange juice, and Grand Marnier.
Set aside for 30 minutes to macerate.
Position a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, sift together the flour, cocoa, and baking powder.
Whisk in the sugar and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together the egg, cream, butter, and vanilla.
Stir the cream mixture into the flour mixture.
Using a tablespoon, drop 6 to 8 shortcakes onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing the mounds evenly (the shortcakes will expand slightly as they bake).
Bake the shortcakes until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 15 to 18 minutes.
Transfer to a rack and let cool.
To whip the cream: In the bowl of a mixer fitted with the whip attachment, on medium-high speed, beat the cream, sugar, and vanilla to medium-stiff peaks.
Do not overbeat.
To serve, split the shortcakes horizontally.
Top the bottom half with a big spoonful of strawberries (including some of the juices) and a big dollop of whipped cream.
Top with the top layer of shortcake, and spoon some berries over the top.
Top with more whipped cream, drizzle with some of the juices, and serve.
496db791a3.pred:
}}]].

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour two 6-inch round cake pans.
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, sugar, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg, whipping cream, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the sliced strawberries.
6. Divide the batter evenly between the prepared pans.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cakes comes out clean.
8. Allow the cakes to cool in the pans for 10 minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.
9. To make the glaze, whisk together the sugar, orange juice, Grand Marnier, and vanilla extract in a small bowl.
10. Once the cakes are completely cooled, drizzle the glaze over the top of each cake.
11. Serve the Chocolate Strawberry Shortcakes immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate Strawberry Shortcakes!

56c2b059eb.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In four small cast iron skillets or one medium skillet, crumble half the cookie dough into small pieces, spreading in an even layer over bottom of skillet(s).
Drizzle hot fudge sauce over cookie dough.
Crumble remaining cookie dough on top of hot fudge, making sure to spread in an even layer.
Bake for 1820 minutes, or until top is golden brown and set.
Remove skillet(s) from oven and allow to cool slightly.
Serve with vanilla ice cream and extra hot fudge sauce, if desired.
Enjoy!
56c2b059eb.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease a 9x9 inch baking dish or a similar-sized pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the refrigerated chocolate chip cookie dough and hot fudge sauce. Mix until well combined.
4. Press the dough evenly into the prepared pan.
5. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is slightly gooey.
6. Allow the cookie to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
7. If desired, top the cooled cookie with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate Fudge Skillet Cookie!

e6bf3951b6.gt:
Cook meat and onion and green pepper until meat is browned and vegetables under tender.
Drain.
Stir in remaining ingredients and cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove Bay leaf when finished.
e6bf3951b6.pred:
[INST]
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, brown the ground beef over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the chopped green pepper and cook for another 5 minutes.
4. Add the stewed tomatoes, dark red kidney beans, drained, and the tomato sauce.
5. Stir in the salt, chili powder, and bay leaf.
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes.
7. Serve the chili hot over rice or with your preferred side dish.

[/INST]

e2b5a77d87.gt:
Heat oil in pan on low to medium heat, then throw in onion and sugar.
Cook for a couple of minutes, stirring from time to time.
Throw in mustard, stir to combine, and cook until onion is done to your liking, stirring as necessary.
Combine eggs, salt, pepper and cream cheese - don't worry if the cheese doesn't incorporate, it will once it's heated - and throw into pan, stirring everything together.
If mixture is too thick, add a little milk.
Add tomatoes, stirring and cooking until eggs are almost done, then add grated cheese and stir to melt and heat through.
Add extra salt & pepper if desired.
e2b5a77d87.pred:
1. In a large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and cook until it is soft and translucent.
3. Add the grated cheddar cheese and cook until it melts and becomes slightly golden.
4. Add the light cream cheese and cook until it melts and combines with the cheddar cheese.
5. Add the chopped tomatoes and cook until they become tender and release their juices.
6. Add the cooked onion mixture to the skillet and stir to combine.
7. Crack the two large free-range eggs into the skillet and stir gently to scramble them with the other ingredients.
8. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Cook the scrambled eggs until they are fully cooked and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. If desired, add a splash of milk to the skillet and stir to combine.
11. Serve the Tomato & Onion Scrambled Eggs hot, garnished with fresh chopped parsley if desired.

[/INST]

27e3ef474d.gt:
This recipes makes about 1 quart of frozen yogurt.
Place the blackberries in the bowl of a food processor.
Process until smooth.
Strain the blackberries through a fine mesh sieve set over a large mixing bowl.
Using the back of a spoon, press the mixture against the sieve to extract all the juice.
Discard the seeds and any pulp.
Add the yogurt to the blackberry juice and stir to combine.
Add about 3/4 cup of honey and taste for sweetness.
You may need more honey depending on how sweet the blackberries are.
I used just under 1 cup.
Add vanilla if desired and blend until smooth.
Process in an ice cream maker according to manufacturers instructions.
Serve immediately if you prefer a soft serve consistency or put it into a freezer safe container and freeze until firm.
If frozen remove from the freezer about 15 minutes before serving.
Recipe adapted from Southern Living Magazine.
27e3ef474d.pred:
1. In a blender, combine 12 ounces of fresh blackberries, rinsed, and 33 ounces of plain Greek yogurt (I used Fage 2%).
2. Add 1 cup of honey, more or less to taste, and mix until smooth.
3. If desired, add a drop of vanilla extract for added flavor.
4. Blend the mixture until it reaches the desired consistency, which should be smooth and creamy.
5. Pour the frozen yogurt mixture into a frozen yogurt maker or a plastic container, and place it in the freezer.
6. Allow the frozen yogurt to freeze for at least 4 hours or overnight.
7. Once the frozen yogurt is fully frozen, remove it from the freezer and let it sit at room temperature for a few minutes to soften slightly before serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Blackberry Frozen Yogurt!

ec1a27fd77.gt:
In a ceramic bowl over boiling water melt the chocolate, water and butter together over a pot of boiling water.
(Bain marie method)
Pour the melted chocolate over the sugar and mix well.
Then separate the egg yolks from the egg whites.
And one by one add the yolks to the mixture mixing after each one.
Beat the egg whites until they are firm.
Then fold the egg whites into the chocolate mixture.
Once its all nicely mixed spoon into invidual ramekins.
Leave in the fridge for two hours to set.
Once set decorate your mousse.
I sprinkled powdered suger over mine just before serving and added a few slices of banana.
ec1a27fd77.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the dark chocolate, butter, sugar, and eggs.
3. Add the water to the mixture and stir until well combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a 9-inch (23cm) springform pan that has been greased and lined with parchment paper.
5. Bake the cake for about 45-50 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
6. Allow the cake to cool completely in the pan.
7. Once cooled, remove the cake from the pan and place it on a serving plate.
8. Using a hand mixer or a stand mixer, whip the heavy cream until it forms soft peaks.
9. Carefully spread the whipped cream over the cooled cake.
10. Chop the remaining chocolate into small pieces and sprinkle it over the whipped cream.
11. Refrigerate the cake for at least 2 hours before serving.

Enjoy your homemade chocolate mousse dish!

f31dd42e03.gt:
Turn crock pot on high while preparing ingredients.
In crock pot, mix together both packages of bearnaise sauce mix, wine, tarragon, turmeric and garlic powder until well blended.
Add shallots, ham, red pepper, potatoes artichokes and chicken.
Stir gently.
Cover, reduce heat setting to low and cook 6 hours.
f31dd42e03.pred:
To prepare a delicious Chicken New Orleans dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the shallots and cook until softened, about 2 minutes.
2. Add the garlic powder, ground turmeric, and tarragon, and cook for another minute.
3. Pour in the dry white wine, and stir to combine. Let the mixture simmer for a few minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
4. Add the bearnaise sauce mix, and stir to combine. Bring the sauce to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 10 minutes, or until it thickens slightly.
5. Add the cooked ham, red bell pepper, red potatoes, and thawed artichokes to the skillet. Cook everything together for about 15 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the chicken is cooked through.
6. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the Chicken New Orleans dish over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

[/INST]

8fe5441410.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
Bake the yams until they are not quite done.
Remove them from the oven and allow them to cool.
Cut off the ends, peel them and cut them into approximately 1 slices.
Heat a heavy 10 skillet or pot on medium-low and melt the Earth Balance.
Add the honey, maple syrup, and barley malt syrup and stir.
Add the sliced yams to the pan, wedging them all in there.
Lift the pan (wearing pot holders), tilting it so that the sauce covers the yams.
Cook for 10 minutes, lifting and tilting occasionally.
Carefully turn the yams over.
Cook for another 10 minutes, lifting and tilting your pan again so the sauce covers the yams.
8fe5441410.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Peel the yams and cut them into bite-sized pieces.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Earth Balance Margarine, Honey, Maple Syrup, and Barley Malt Syrup.
4. Toss the yams in the mixture until they are evenly coated.
5. Spread the yams out on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Roast the yams in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
7. Remove the yams from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the Candied Yams warm or at room temperature.

Enjoy your delicious Candied Yams!

3d9830c9de.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Combine all the ingredients except for the artichoke bottoms and the beef broth.
Divide and mound the meat mixture on the artichoke bottoms, about 4 tablespoons each.
In a well greased baking pan, place the filled artichokes, filled side up, in one layer.
Pour the broth over the whole thing.
Bake, lightly covered with foil, for 1 1/2 hours.
Uncover and bake another 10-15 minutes, until browned.
Serve hot.
3d9830c9de.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pot, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the chopped mushrooms and onion to the skillet or pot, and cook until the mushrooms are tender and the onion is translucent.
4. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, celery, tomato puree, water, salt, pepper, and thyme.
5. Pour the egg mixture over the ground beef and mushroom mixture in the skillet or pot.
6. Add the cooked artichoke bottoms or frozen artichoke bottoms to the skillet or pot, and stir to combine.
7. Pour the beef broth over the top of the mixture, and bring to a simmer.
8. Cover the skillet or pot with a lid, and bake in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until the filling is cooked through and the artichokes are tender.
9. Remove the skillet or pot from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

8b0f1ee273.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large saucepan combine broth, undrained tomatoes and orzo.
Bring to boiling.
Stir in Grilled & Ready Southwestern Chicken Strips.
Transfer mixture to a 2-quart baking dish.
Bake, covered, for 25 to 30 minutes or until pasta is tender.
Uncover and sprinkle with cheese during last 5 minutes of baking.
Let stand, covered, for 10 minutes before serving.
8b0f1ee273.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the chicken strips over medium heat until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken, broth, tomatoes, green chile peppers, orzo, and shredded cheese. Season with salt, pepper, and any other desired herbs and spices.
4. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
5. Serve hot and enjoy!

[/SYS]

96679eee56.gt:
Blend four, 1 cup sugar, 3 tbsp melted butter, and milk until smooth.
Pour into greased 1 1/2 quart baking dish.
Pour fruit on top of batter.
Sprinkle remaining sugar on top.
Dot with remaining butter.
Bake on 375 for 45 min or until golden brown on top.
NOTE: If using fresh fruit, boil fruit with 1/4 cup water and 1 tbsp sugar until water is reduced to a syrup.
96679eee56.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, and melted butter. Mix until the dough comes together.
3. Press the dough into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the milk, unmelted butter, and peaches.
5. Pour the peach mixture over the dough in the pan.
6. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the cobbler is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
7. Allow the cobbler to cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Old Fashioned Southern Peach Cobbler!

46dc2bc350.gt:
Break noodles
Mix everything together.
Mix flavor packets with 1 cup oil, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup white vinegar,
Mix with other ingredients and refrigerate over night
Stir next morning allowing noodles to soften
Will ne ready to serve in afternoon or evening
46dc2bc350.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the broccoli slaw mix, green onions, sunflower seeds, and slivered almonds.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the Ramen noodles with a little bit of water to create a slurry.
4. Pour the Ramen noodle slurry over the broccoli mixture and stir to combine.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for about 20-25 minutes, or until the noodles are cooked through and the mixture is heated through.
6. Serve the cooked Broccoli Coleslaw immediately and enjoy!

[/INST]

c99df4226f.gt:
Preheat oven to 425F.
Grease the muffin tins.
Mix, in a medium bowl, cornmeal, flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, and white pepper.
Add cheese and nuts.
In another bowl, whisk the eggs.
Add milk and melted butter.
Mix the dry ingredients into the liquid mixture.
Stir until just combined.
Spoon the batter into prepared muffin tins.
Bake for ten minutes.
Let the muffins sit in the tins for a few minutes before removing.
Let cool on wire racks.
c99df4226f.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the yellow cornmeal, flour, sugar, salt, and white pepper.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and melted butter.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the shredded cheddar cheese and chopped nuts (pecans or walnuts).
6. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
7. Bake the muffins for 15-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes in the pan, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Corn Muffins With Cheese and Nuts!

1fda5d9400.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Grease one 9x5 inch loaf pan.
Cream butter and sugar together.
Beat in eggs one at a time.
Beat smooth.
Stir in milk, vanilla, and almond flavoring.
In large bowl combine flour, baking powder, and salt.
Stir in fruit, raisins, and nuts.
Add all at once to first bowl.
Stir only to moisten.
Turn into greased 9x5x3 inch loaf pan.
Bake for 1 hour in 350 degree F (175 degree C) oven until it tests done.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Cool and wrap.
1fda5d9400.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a loaf pan.
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the margarine and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, vanilla extract, and almond extract. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, mixing until just combined.
4. Fold in the candied mixed fruit, raisins, and chopped almonds.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
6. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.
7. Allow the loaf to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once cooled, slice the loaf and enjoy!

This Fruit and Nut Loaf is a delicious and nutritious treat that combines the sweetness of the margarine and sugar with the natural flavors of the fruits and nuts. The almond extract adds a subtle almond taste, while the vanilla extract enhances the overall flavor. The loaf is moist and fluffy, making it a perfect accompaniment to a cup of tea or coffee.

b0d84623b8.gt:
Toss the chicken cubes with taco seasoning.
In a heavy skillet with a tight fitting lid, heat the oil and add the chicken and cook, stirring, until it changes color.
Stir in rice and stir to mix.
Add salsa and water.
Bring to a boil and reduce heat to a simmer.
Cover and allow to cook about 20 minutes.
Remove from heat and allow to stand about 5 minutes before serving.
If you like, you may sprinkle with chopped cilantro.
b0d84623b8.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, heat the cooking oil over medium-high heat.
3. Add the chicken and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
5. In the same pan, add the taco seasoning and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly.
6. Add the cooked chicken back to the pan and stir to combine.
7. Add the rice, salsa, and water to the pan, stirring to combine.
8. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the pan.
9. Cook for 20-25 minutes or until the rice is cooked through and the liquid is absorbed.
10. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
11. Serve the Mexican Chicken and Rice over a bed of tortillas or with a side of beans.

[/INST]

a89dfedebf.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Lightly grease cookie sheets.
In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, oil, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth.
Beat in the egg substitute, vanilla and water.
Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and nutmeg; stir into the sugar mixture.
Stir in the oats, oat bran, wheat germ, raisins and walnuts.
Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets.
Bake for 18 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges are lightly browned.
Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.
a89dfedebf.pred:
To make delicious Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the margarine and canola oil until smooth.
3. Add the brown sugar and white sugar, and continue to mix until well combined.
4. Add the egg substitute, vanilla extract, and water, and mix until smooth.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the all-purpose flour, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, and oat bran.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until a soft dough forms.
7. Fold in the raisins and chopped walnuts.
8. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden and the cookies are set.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X dish!

e6f5055f34.gt:
Melt butter and cook minced onion in it.
Add rice; brown lightly.
Combine other ingredients with rice mixture and bring to boil.
Cover; reduce heat and steam until liquid is absorbed.
If rice is not done, add more water sparingly.
e6f5055f34.pred: [INST]To begin, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the mushrooms and cook until they are tender, about 5-7 minutes. Season the mushrooms with salt, basil, and thyme. Add the consomme, rice, and water to the saucepan, stirring to combine. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the saucepan. Cook the rice mixture for about 18-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the liquid is absorbed. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it sit, covered, for a few more minutes. Fluff the cooked rice with a fork and serve hot. Enjoy your delicious Savory Rice With Mushrooms!

295fa6c307.gt:
Combine oil and garlic in a small bowl and rub the mushroom caps on all sides with the mixture.
Place caps, top side down, in a circle on an oiled baking sheet.
Season with salt and pepper.
Arrange the cheese, basil, and tomato slices alternately in a circle on top of the mushrooms.
Sprinkle with oregano, if using.
Bake at 450 until the cheese melts, about 3 minutes.
295fa6c307.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the portabella mushroom caps to the skillet and cook until they are tender, about 5-7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

5. In a large bowl, combine the mozzarella cheese, oregano leaves (if using), and salt and pepper.
6. Lightly oil a pizza stone or baking sheet.

10. Sprinkle the fresh basil leaves on top of the tomatoes.

[/INST]

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious Portobello Pizza that everyone will enjoy.

43c305486e.gt:
Combine butter and onion in small microwave-safe dish and cook on high for three minutes or until onion is soft and then stir it to make it sure it is combined.
Beat eggs with sour cream in a small cup or bowl and then pour over onion.
Cook on high about 1 1/2 minutes, stirring several times.
Sprinkle bacon along rim of dish and cook on high for 30 seconds.
43c305486e.pred:
1. Preheat the microwave: Place the dish with the butter in the microwave and heat it for about 30 seconds to melt the butter.
2. Cook the onion: Place the sliced onion in the microwave-safe dish and cook it for about 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
3. Cook the eggs: Place the eggs in a microwave-safe dish and cook them for about 1 minute, or until they are cooked to your desired level of doneness.
4. Add the sour cream: Stir the sour cream into the cooked eggs.
5. Add the bacon: Place the cooked bacon pieces or bacon bits on top of the eggs.
6. Cook the dish: Cook the dish in the microwave for about 1 minute, or until the bacon is cooked to your desired level of crispiness.
7. Serve: Remove the dish from the microwave and let it cool for a few moments. Serve the cooked bacon and egg dish immediately.

72392b90a9.gt:
Place steak in a 6" x 9" baking dish.
Combine marinade ingredients; pour over meat.
Cover with plastic; refrigerate 1/2 to 2 hours.
Combine salad ingredients in a bowl; chill until ready to serve.
Remove meat from marinade; pat dry.
Coat grill or broiler pan with cooking spray.
Heat grill on high.
Grill or broil steak 3 minutes on each side for medium-rare.
Transfer to a platter and let rest 10 minutes.
Remove onion from marinade.
Coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Cook onion over medium-high heat until tender, 5 minutes.
Move to a bowl.
Cut meat thinly.
For lettuce rolls: Layer rice, salad, soybean paste, onions and steak in the center of each lettuce leaf; roll up.
Serve 4 rolls per person.
72392b90a9.pred:
To prepare the Steak in Lettuce Rolls, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the steak: Season the flank (or hanger) steak with salt and pepper. In a small bowl, mix the dark (toasted) sesame oil, sugar, and lemon juice. Pour the mixture over the steak and let it marinate for at least 30 minutes at room temperature or up to 2 hours in the refrigerator.

2. Prepare the steak rolls: While the steak is marinating, prepare the lettuce leaves. Remove the leaves from the head of lettuce and separate them.

3. Cook the steak: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Place the marinated steak on a baking sheet and cook for 6-8 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 120°F (49°C) for medium-rare. Remove the steak from the oven and let it rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing it thinly.

4. Assemble the rolls: While the steak is resting, prepare the rice. Cook the rice according to package instructions.

5. Assemble the rolls: Place a small amount of cooked rice on the bottom of each lettuce leaf. Top the rice with a thin slice of steak, a few scallions, and a drizzle of soybean paste. Roll up the lettuce leaves to enclose the filling.

6. Serve: Serve the Steak in Lettuce Rolls immediately, garnished with additional scallions and soybean paste, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Steak in Lettuce Rolls!

38c1babf26.gt:
In a small bowl combine graham cracker crumbs melted butter and 2 tablespoons of sugar.
After mixing well, press into the bottom of a cheesecake pan; set aside.
In a large bowl, combine room temperature cream cheese, eggs, vanilla, whipping cream and 1 cup sugar.
Beat until smooth and creamy.
Pour batter into the cheesecake pan and cook for 35 to 40 minutes at 350F.
If you like your cheesecake with a sour cream topping, remove from the oven after cooking, then combine 1 pint of sour cream, 2 tablespoons of sugar and 1 teaspoon of vanilla.
Spoon on top of the cheesecake and cook for 10 additional minutes at 420 degrees.
If I am adding fruit to the top of the cheesecake, I do not add the sour cream topping.
For chocolate cheesecake, add a bag of melted chocolate chips to the mixture and use chocolate cookie crumbs for the crust.
The vanilla can be substituted with any flavoring extract.
It is a very flexible basic recipe that can be changed to incorporate any favorite flavor.
38c1babf26.pred:
To cook a delicious Classic Cheesecake, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 1-1/2 cups of Graham Cracker Crumbs, 4 tablespoons of melted butter, and 1 cup of sugar. Mix until well combined.
3. Press the crumb mixture evenly onto the bottom and up the sides of a springform pan. This will serve as the crust for your cheesecake.
4. Bake the crust in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until it is set and lightly golden. Remove the crust from the oven and let it cool completely.
5. In a separate mixing bowl, beat the 4 whole eggs and 1 teaspoon of vanilla until they are well combined.
6. In a large mixing bowl, beat the 24 ounces of cream cheese until smooth and creamy. Add the eggs and vanilla, and continue to beat until well combined.
7. Gradually add the 2 tablespoons of heavy whipping cream to the cream cheese mixture, and beat until smooth.
8. Pour the filling over the cooled crust in the springform pan.
9. Bake the cheesecake in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until the center is set and the edges are slightly golden.
10. Remove the cheesecake from the oven and let it cool completely in the pan.
11. Once the cheesecake is completely cooled, refrigerate it for at least 4 hours or overnight.
12. Once the cheesecake is chilled, remove it from the pan and transfer it to a serving plate.
13. Refrigerate the cheesecake for at least 2 hours before serving.

By following these steps, you will be able to create a delicious Classic Cheesecake, using the ingredients provided.

06e92239ab.gt:
Combine all of the ingredients in a mason jar, screw on the top and shake to thoroughly mix.
Let sit for at least 20 minutes.
Keep refrigerated.
Makes about 3/4 to 1 cup of dressing.
06e92239ab.pred:
To prepare a delicious Balsamic Vinaigrette, follow these steps:

1. In a small bowl, whisk together the Balsamic Vinegar, Olive Oil, Dijon Mustard, and Honey.
2. Add the minced garlic to the mixture and whisk until well combined.
3. Season the vinaigrette with salt and pepper, to taste.
4. If the vinaigrette is too thick, you can add a small amount of water to achieve the desired consistency.
5. Store the vinaigrette in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.

This Balsamic Vinaigrette can be used as a dressing for salads, vegetables, or as a marinade for grilled meats or fish. The combination of tangy Balsamic Vinegar, sweet Honey, and savory Dijon Mustard creates a delightful and flavorful dressing that enhances the taste of any dish.

4ea5a98674.gt:
For the crust: combine the graham cracker crumbs, butter and sugar in a bowl and then press into an ungreased 13x9x2 dish.
Chill for 1/2 hour.
In a mixing bowl, cream butter, confectioners sugar, milk & vanilla.
Spread over crust, chill for 1/2 hour.
Layer strawberries, bananas, pineapple, and coconut (if desired).
Any fruit can be substituted and chocolate syrup can be added also.
Spread Cool Whip over the fruit.
Top with nuts or toasted coconut.
Keep refrigerated.
4ea5a98674.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.

2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and granulated sugar until light and fluffy. Add the vanilla extract and milk, and continue to mix until well combined.

3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until just combined.

4. Fold in the sliced strawberries and bananas.

5. Spread the batter evenly into the prepared cake pan.

6. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.

7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

8. Once the cake is cooled, prepare the topping by combining the crushed pineapple, whipped topping, and any additional desired toppings (shredded coconut, chocolate syrup, etc.).

9. Carefully slice the cooled cake into equal portions, and place each portion on a plate. Drizzle the pineapple topping over the cake slices.

10. Serve and enjoy your delicious Strawberry Banana Split Cake!

[/INST]

08647377e3.gt:
Soak the kiriboshi daikon in water and then squeeze it to remove the excess water.
If there is water in the canned soybeans, drain them well.
Julienne the carrots.
Cut the bacon into thin strips.
Heat the olive oil in a frying pan.
Add the ingredients and stir-fry.
Season with salt and black pepper.
All done.
My recipe for quiche, "Easy!
Kiriboshi Daikon Quiche with Homemade Crust" uses this as a filling!

57a8e4271c.gt:
Pour ingredients into empty gallon container or empty gallon milk jug.
Fill the rest of the container with water.
Put into spray bottle and refill as needed.
57a8e4271c.pred:
To prepare a delicious The Best All Purpose Cleaner dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 (16 ounce) bottle of rubbing alcohol, 12 cups of sudsy ammonia, and 1 teaspoon of liquid dish soap, such as dawn or joy.

2. Mix the ingredients well, ensuring that the alcohol and ammonia are fully combined.

3. Gradually add water to the mixture, stirring continuously to avoid lumps.

4. Once the water is fully incorporated, the dish is ready to be used as an all-purpose cleaner.

5. To clean various surfaces, such as countertops, sinks, and appliances, simply spray the solution onto the surface and wipe it down with a damp cloth or sponge.

6. For tougher stains or stubborn dirt, you can also use a scrub brush or a sponge with a stiff bristle to scrub the surface.

7. After cleaning, rinse the surface with water and wipe it down with a dry cloth or paper towel to remove any residue.

8. For a more pleasant scent, add a few drops of your favorite essential oil to the solution before using it.

By following these steps, you can create a powerful and effective all-purpose cleaner that will help you keep your home clean and fresh.

579917be2c.gt:
Light the grill or heat the broiler.
Coat the chicken with 1 tablespoon of the oil and season with 1/4 teaspoon of the salt and 1/4 teaspoon of the pepper.
Grill or broil until just done, 4 to 5 minutes per side.
Let the chicken rest for 5 minutes and then cut crosswise into 1/4-inch slices.
In a large pot of boiling, salted water, cook the fusilli until just done, about 13 minutes.
Drain, rinse with cold water, and drain thoroughly.
In a large bowl, toss the pasta with 1 tablespoon of the olive oil.
Add the chicken, artichoke hearts, scallions, parsley, the remaining 5 tablespoons oil, the vinegar, the remaining 1 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper, and the Parmesan to the pasta and toss well.
579917be2c.pred:
1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, toss the chicken breasts with the olive oil, salt, and pepper.
3. Grill the chicken breasts until cooked through and slightly charred, about 4-5 minutes per side.
4. While the chicken is grilling, cook the pasta according to the package instructions.
5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, artichoke hearts, scallions, and red-wine vinegar.
6. In a small bowl, mix the grated Parmesan cheese with the chopped flat-leaf parsley.
7. Once the chicken is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
8. Add the sliced chicken to the pasta mixture and toss to combine.
9. Serve the Grilled-Chicken Pasta Salad with Artichoke Hearts immediately, garnished with the Parmesan-parsley mixture.

This delicious Grilled-Chicken Pasta Salad with Artichoke Hearts dish is a perfect blend of flavors and textures, with the tender chicken, creamy pasta, and crunchy artichoke hearts. The grilled chicken adds a smoky, charred flavor, while the pasta and artichoke hearts provide a satisfying, filling meal. The combination of ingredients results in a delightful and satisfying dish that can be enjoyed by everyone.

Prepare banana blossom while soup is boiling ,cut half on runny water or in water bowl
Cut into 4 pieces ,now select only white leaves,take off small young banana inside
Cut to small pieces, this always soak in water to prevent from color change
Add to soup pot,increase to high heat ,stir to let all sink in hot boil soup ,let it simmer about 15 mins
Add fishsauce,add green leaves ,stir to mix,heat off ,serve hot with sticky rice by northern thai way or with steamed jasmine rice

fd91c2f3e6.gt:
Sift maizena and flour together
Add castor sugar
Rub butter into the dry ingredients and knead until a stiff dough its formed
Press dough into a 20 x 29cm greased baking tray
Mark the slices lightly and prick with a fork
Bake at 150C for 50 minutes
Once baked, drench the shortbread with castor sugar
Cut the shortbread into squares
Allow to cool and then enjoy

2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the soft butter and castor sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the flour and Maizena to the butter mixture, and mix until a dough forms.
4. Wrap the dough in plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
5. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to your desired thickness.

8. Bake the cookies for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown.

89a10ab4d0.gt:
Soak chiles in hot water 15 min.
or until softened.
Drain chiles, reserving 1/4 cup of the soaking water; place chiles and reserved water in blender container.
Cover.
Blend on medium speed until smooth; set aside.
Heat dressing in large skillet on medium-high heat.
Add pork; cook and stir 5 min.
or until evenly browned.
Remove pork from skillet; set aside.
Add alcaparrado condiment, cloves and chile puree to skillet; cook 2 min.
Return pork to skillet.
Stir in broth; bring to boil over medium-high heat.
Reduce heat to medium-low; cover.
Simmer 30 min.
Add potatoes and peanuts; cover.
Cook 45 min.
until potatoes are tender, stirring occasionally.
Top each serving with egg slices.

54ea4ac023.gt:
Place the eggs into a saucepan in a single layer and fill with water to cover the eggs by 1 inch.
Cover the saucepan and bring the water to a boil over high heat.
Remove from the heat and let the eggs stand in the hot water for 15 minutes.
Drain.
Cool the eggs under cold running water.
Peel and chop the cooled eggs.
Cook the bacon in a large, deep skillet over medium-high heat until evenly browned, about 10 minutes.
Drain on a paper towel-lined plate; crumble once cool.
Combine the eggs, bacon, mayonnaise, mozzarella cheese, paprika, sugar, white wine vinegar, and mustard in a bowl to make a chunky dip.
Garnish with paprika.
54ea4ac023.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, mayonnaise, shredded mozzarella cheese, white sugar, white wine vinegar, and mustard. Season with paprika for added flavor.
3. Carefully slice the 6 eggs in half lengthwise, and scoop out the yolks into the bowl with the other ingredients.
4. Stir the mixture until well combined.
5. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
6. Carefully spoon the egg yolk mixture onto the prepared baking sheet, creating a thin layer.
7. Bake the egg dip in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the edges are slightly crispy and the center is set.
8. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Once cooled, use a spatula to transfer the cooked egg dip onto a serving platter or individual plates.
10. Garnish with a sprinkle of paprika for added color and flavor.

Enjoy your delicious Deviled Egg Dip with your friends and family!

59f0023fcf.gt:
Cut tops off peppers and remove insides
Mix ground beef, rice, and taco seasoning in mixing bowl
Fill peppers with mix.
You shouldn't have any left over.
Stuff them!
Place filled peppers in crock pot
Spoon a little rotel on top of each pepper.
Pour remainder into bottom of crockpot (gives a little extra juice)
Cook on low 6-8 hours and high 3-4 hours.
(The uncooked meat will cook the pepper.
No need to precook the beef or add any liquid)
20-30 minutes before meal time add cheese on top of each pepper.
Enjoy!
59f0023fcf.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Clean and remove the seeds from the bell peppers.
3. Place the bell peppers in a large mixing bowl.
4. Add the ground beef, Spanish rice, Rotel, and taco seasoning to the bowl.
5. Stir the ingredients together until well combined.
6. Fill each bell pepper with the mixture, making sure to pack it in tightly.
7. Place the stuffed peppers in a Crockpot.
8. Cover the Crockpot and cook on low heat for 6-8 hours, or until the peppers are tender and the filling is hot and bubbly.
9. Remove the stuffed peppers from the Crockpot and let them cool for a few minutes.
10. Serve the stuffed peppers hot, and enjoy your delicious Crockpot stuffed peppers.

b500700d75.gt:
Pre-heat oven
In a bowl, grate the carrots and apple
Mix flour, baking soda, baking powerd , sugar , salt ,cinnamon and walnuts
Add the eggs, oil , milk ,vanilla extract
Add the carrots and apple
Spoon equal amount into the muffin tray
Bake for 20-30 min
b500700d75.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the eggs, milk, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, salt, and sugar. Whisk until well combined.
3. Add the ground cinnamon, chopped walnuts, grated carrots, and grated apple to the bowl. Mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the all-purpose flour and baking powder to the mixture, stirring until the batter is smooth and free of lumps.
5. If the batter is too thick, you can add a bit more milk to achieve the desired consistency.
6. Line a muffin tin with cupcake liners or grease the muffin tin with vegetable oil.
7. Pour the batter evenly into the muffin cups, filling them about 3/4 full.
8. Bake the muffins in the preheated oven for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
9. Remove the muffins from the oven and let them cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

This delicious Carrots muffin dish is a healthy and nutritious option for breakfast or a snack. The combination of carrots, apples, and walnuts provides essential vitamins, minerals, and fiber, while the eggs and milk contribute to the dish's moist and tender texture. The vanilla extract adds a touch of sweetness and flavor, and the baking powder and baking soda ensure that the muffins rise evenly and have a light, fluffy texture.

01483cc0de.gt:
Place the water and asparagus in a saucepan, and bring to a boil over medium heat.
Cook covered 5 minutes.
Remove cover and cook 1 or 2 minutes, until tender.
Drain and set aside, but keep warm.
Melt the margarine in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook the turkey cutlets 2 to 3 minutes on each side, or until browned and no longer pink on the inside.
Remove turkey from the pan and set aside.
Add the garlic and shrimp to the already heated skillet.
Cook over medium-high heat 1 or 2 minutes, stirring constantly until the shrimp is heated through.
Prepare hollandaise sauce according to package directions.
Place each turkey cutlet on a plate.
Top with the asparagus and shrimp.
Spoon hollandaise sauce over all.
01483cc0de.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the margarine over medium heat. Add the crushed garlic and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
3. Add the asparagus to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the asparagus is tender but still crisp.
4. In a small bowl, mix the water and the hollandaise sauce mix.
5. Place the turkey breast cutlets on a baking sheet and season with salt and pepper.
6. Dip each turkey cutlet into the hollandaise mixture, making sure it is evenly coated.
7. Place the turkey cutlets on the baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the turkey is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
8. Remove the turkey from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
9. Serve the turkey a la Oscar on a plate, alongside the cooked asparagus.

This delicious dish combines the flavors of the turkey, the crispiness of the asparagus, and the richness of the hollandaise sauce to create a satisfying and memorable meal.

0121dfda05.gt:
Heat oil in large pot over medium-high heat.
Add shallots, ginger, and garlic and let cook until soft, about 5 minutes.
Stir in peanut butter, turmeric, cumin, and curry paste and let cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
Whisk in water, coconut milk, lime zest, brown sugar, and salt until combined.
Add tofu, sweet potato, and kale, and bring to a boil.
Let simmer, covered, for 30 minutes, or until sweet potatoes are fork tender.
Stir in lime juice and adjust seasoning to taste.
Garnish with cashews and serve over rice or quinoa.
0121dfda05.pred:
1. Heat the oil in a large saucepan or wok over medium heat. Add the shallot and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
2. Add the ginger and garlic, and cook for another minute until fragrant.
3. Add the peanut butter, turmeric, cumin, red curry paste, and water. Stir to combine.
4. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the coconut milk, lime zest, brown sugar or maple syrup, sea salt, and tofu. Stir to combine.
6. Simmer for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the tofu is tender.
7. Add the sweet potato and kale to the pan, stirring to combine. Cook for another 5-7 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
8. Stir in the roasted cashews.
9. Serve the Vegetarian Panang Curry over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

[/INST]

[/TUTORIAL]

5b23053aa4.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Combine flours, Splenda, cocoa, and baking soda.
Add bananas, yogurt, egg whites, vanilla, and 1/2 cup walnuts.
Stir.
Coat a 9" x 13" cake pan with cooking spray.
Pour batter into pan, spreading evenly.
Bake about 35 minutes.
Cool.
Raise oven to 375F.
Toast remaining 1/4 cup walnuts 6 minutes.
To make frosting, pour 1/4 cup milk into a medium saucepan over medium heat.
Stir in Splenda, cocoa, and cornstarch.
Slowly add remaining 3/4 cup milk and bring to a low boil, stirring continuously until thick.
Remove from heat and stir in butter and vanilla.
Cool and spread over cake.
Sprinkle walnuts over cake.
5b23053aa4.pred:
To cook a delicious Chocolate-Banana Cake with Walnuts dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 1 cup whole-wheat flour, 1 cup unbleached all-purpose flour, 3/4 cup Splenda Sugar Blend for Baking, 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 2 teaspoon baking soda, and 4 large overly ripe bananas, mashed.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the 2 egg whites, 2 teaspoon vanilla extract, and 3/4 cup walnuts, chopped.
4. Add the vegetable-oil cooking spray to a large mixing bowl, and then add the 1 cup lowfat milk, 3/4 cup Splenda Sugar Blend for Baking, and 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder. Whisk until smooth.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, alternating between the flour and milk mixtures. Mix until just combined.
6. Fold in the mashed bananas and the egg whites mixture.
7. Grease and flour a 9-inch round cake pan, and pour the batter into the pan.
8. Bake the cake for 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Once the cake is cooled, use a serrated knife to slice it into equal portions.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate-Banana Cake with Walnuts!

8fdec3f08f.gt:
Bring a saucepan of water to the boil, begin to cook the spaghetti
Prepare the topping.
Finely slice garlic, cut red pepper into thin strips, cut olives in half, cut crab sticks into cubes, slice salmon into small slices.
Shallow fry garlic, red pepper and olives until softened.
Add the crab sticks, salmon and shrimps and cook until it's pretty much there.
Throw in a dash of white wine and a dash of lemon juice.
Season to taste with salt, pepper, basil.
Drain spaghetti and combine with topping.
Generously slash it with olive oil.
Boom.
8fdec3f08f.pred:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
4. Add the smoked salmon and cook until it is flaked and heated through.
5. Add the crab sticks and cook until they are heated through.
6. Add the shrimp and cook until they are pink and cooked through.
7. Add the red pepper and cook until it is slightly softened.
8. Add the olives and cook until they are heated through.
9. Add the white wine and lemon juice, stirring to combine.
10. Add the seasoned salt, basil, and stir to combine.
11. Drain the spaghetti and add it to the skillet.
12. Toss the spaghetti and ingredients together until well combined.
13. Serve the Budget Seafood Pasta immediately.

[/INST]

669da1896f.gt:
Peel the pears, cut them into quarters and remove the cores.
Cut each quarter in half and put them in a bowl.
Shave the cheese with a vegetable peeler and mix three-quarters of it with the pears.
Beat the oil and the lemon juice together and add salt and pepper to taste.
Spoon about half this dressing over the pears and leave for 1 hour.
Spoon the pears into a deep dish and shower with the remaining cheese.
Surround with the rocket and drizzle the rest of the dressing over it.
Serve immediately.
Serves 4.
669da1896f.pred:
[INST]
To make AMIEs PEAR and CHEESE SALAD, follow these steps:
1. Wash and peel the pears, then cut them into thin slices.
2. In a small bowl, mix the lemon juice with 2 tablespoons of olive oil.
3. In a larger bowl, combine the sliced pears, Parmigiano-Reggiano or good padano cheese, and the lemon juice mixture.
4. Add the rocket to the bowl and toss everything together until the pears are well-coated in the dressing.
5. Season the salad with salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste.

[/INST]

dde6859b7c.gt:
1.
Brown turkey in a nonstick skillet over medium high heat.
After about 7 minutes, drain the liquid off and return the meat to the pan.
Cook another 3 to 5 minutes or until browned.
Drain and set aside.
2.
Add bell pepper, mushrooms, and onion to the skillet and cook about 3 minutes.
The onions and/or mushrooms should be softened.
Add the garlic and cumin; cook another minute.
3.
Add the turkey back to the veggies, then stir in the BBQ sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, and Worcestershire sauce.
Cook, stirring often, until heated through (about 5 minutes).
4.
Spoon mixture into hollowed out rolls (makes it a bit less messy) and serve with your favorite baked chips!
dde6859b7c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the ground turkey, green bell pepper, mushrooms, onion, garlic, cumin, BBQ sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, and Worcestershire sauce. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Place the mixture into the hollowed-out rolls, dividing it evenly among the rolls.
4. Place the filled rolls on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the turkey is cooked through and the rolls are golden brown.
5. Serve the Spicy BBQ Turkey Joes hot, and enjoy!

aff56897c3.gt:
Combine all ingredients and stir.
Serve with sprinkled Parmesan cheese on top.
aff56897c3.pred:
To make a delicious and satisfying Rice and Peas dish, follow these steps:

1. Cook the rice according to the package instructions, typically by boiling it in water until it is fully cooked and fluffy.
2. While the rice is cooking, prepare the peas by either using frozen peas that have been thawed or fresh peas that have been washed and drained.
3. In a large saucepan, cook the bacon over medium heat until it is crispy. Remove the bacon from the pan and set aside.
4. In the same saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat.
5. Add the cooked rice to the saucepan and stir to combine.
6. Add the peas to the saucepan and stir to combine.
7. Season the rice and peas mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
8. If desired, add the crumbled bacon back to the saucepan and stir to combine.
9. Serve the Rice and Peas hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

This dish is a comforting and satisfying meal that can be enjoyed by people of all ages. The combination of rice and peas provides a balanced mix of carbohydrates and proteins, while the crispy bacon adds a savory and delicious touch. The buttery sauce complements the flavors of the rice and peas, creating a delicious and hearty meal.

646d990717.gt:
Cut the chicken breast into thin slices.
Soak dried shiitake mushrooms in lukewarm water until soft.
Cut off hard stems and cut in halves.
Cut onion into thin slices.
Chop cilantro.
In a large skillet with a lid, mix all the simmering sauce ingredients and bring to a boil.
Add chicken, mushrooms and onion and cook over medium heat for 3 to 4 minutes, or until chicken is done and onion is tender.
Beat eggs in a small bowl, then pour over the chicken and cover with a lid.
Cook until the egg is set, about 1 minute on low heat.
Sprinkle cilantro on top.
To serve: put about 1 1/4 cup of rice in a large, deep bowl and gently lay 1/4 of the chicken and egg mixture on top.
Pour simmering sauce over and serve immediately.
646d990717.pred:
To make Chicken and Egg on Rice (Oyako Donburi), follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, combine the chicken breasts, onion, and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer and cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the meat is tender.

2. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the sauce by mixing the soy sauce, mirin, sugar, and cilantro (if using).

3. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the pot and set aside to cool.

4. In the same pot, add the cooked rice and the sauce mixture. Stir to combine, and cook for about 2-3 minutes, or until the rice is heated through and the sauce is absorbed.

5. To assemble the dish, place the cooked chicken on top of the rice, and then crack the eggs on top of the chicken. Cook the eggs for about 2-3 minutes, or until the whites are set and the yolks are cooked to your desired level of doneness.

6. Garnish the dish with cilantro (if using) and serve immediately.

This Chicken and Egg on Rice (Oyako Donburi) recipe combines tender chicken, flavorful sauce, and a delicious mix of rice to create a satisfying and balanced meal.

33b543f946.gt:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
Fry mustard seeds in oil until they begin to pop.
Add red pepper flakes and shallot and saute until shallot is soft.
Add garbanzos, turmeric, cumin, ginger, salt and enough water to prevent sticking.
Simmer for 15 minutes.
Sprinkle with cilantro and serve.
33b543f946.pred:
To cook a delicious Curried Garbanzo Beans (Chickpeas) dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the mustard seeds and let them sizzle for a few seconds.
2. Add the crushed red pepper flakes and shallot, stirring to combine. Cook for a few minutes until the shallot is softened.
3. Add the garbanzo beans, turmeric, ground cumin, ground ginger, and salt. Stir to combine.
4. Pour in 12 cups of water, and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 30-45 minutes or until the garbanzo beans are tender.
5. Stir in the chopped cilantro, and cook for a few more minutes until the cilantro is fragrant and heated through.
6. Serve the Curried Garbanzo Beans over rice or with your favorite side dish. Enjoy the delicious, flavorful dish!

e827f8e8c3.gt:
In a medium bowl, combine the soy sauce, dark soy and cornstarch.
Whisk to blend well, and add the chicken to the sauce.
Toss to evenly coat the chicken and set aside for 15 to 20 minutes.
In a medium bowl, combine the ketchup, stock, chili garlic sauce and sugar.
Stir to combine and set aside until ready to use.
Place a wok over high heat and add the vegetable oil to the pan.
Swirl the wok to be sure to coat well with the oil.
Add the ginger, garlic, green onions, dried chilies and jalapenos to the wok.
Cook, stirring often until the garlic is fragrant and the chilies begin to brown, about 20 to 30 seconds.
Add the chicken, bell peppers and onions to the pan and stir-fry until the chicken is no longer pink, about 4 to 5 minutes.
Add the sauce to the pan and bring to a boil, being sure to toss well in order to coat all the chicken and vegetables evenly, about 1 to 2 minutes.
Sprinkle the sesame seeds, sesame oil and cilantro into the pan and toss to combine.
Remove from the heat and serve on a platter with steamed white rice.
e827f8e8c3.pred:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, dark soy sauce, cornstarch, and sugar.
2. Add the diced chicken breasts to the bowl and toss to coat evenly.
3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.
4. In a large saucepan, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the minced ginger and garlic, and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
5. Add the chili-garlic sauce, ketchup, chicken broth, and toasted sesame seeds. Stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Add the diced red bell pepper, jalapeno, and yellow onion to the saucepan. Cook until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.
8. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the fresh cilantro.
9. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
10. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
11. Arrange the chicken cubes on the prepared baking sheet, spacing them evenly.
12. Drizzle the sauce evenly over the chicken.
13. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
14. Serve the Sichuan Pepper Chicken over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

903a5e2cd4.gt:
Pop Trader Joe's frozen brown rice in the microwave, or make a batch of rice the traditional way.
While rice is cooking, make the dressing by whisking together half of the chopped garlic, tahini, lemon zest, lemon juice, and 3 tbs.
olive oil.
Add the hot water to thin a bit, and then 2 teaspoons salt.
Set aside.
Add 3 tbs.
olive oil to a big skillet over medium-high heat, swirling to coat the pan.
Be sure the chickpeas are completely dry, or they'll spit at you during this next step!
Add the chickpeas and a sprinkling of salt.
Let the beans saute for a couple minutes, until they get a toasty little crust on them.
Add remaining garlic and onions.
Stir for a minute.
Stir in the asparagus with another pinch or two of salt, then cover with a lid for a minute to steam until the asparagus softens a touch.
Uncover and stir in the rice and almond slivers, reserving a few almonds for garnish.
Adjust seasonings, adding more salt if needed.
Serve family-style in a big bowl drizzled with a few tablespoons of the tahini dressing, letting each person add more dressing to their tastes.
Watch as this magical concoction disappears before your eyes!
903a5e2cd4.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the cooked brown rice, smashed and chopped garlic cloves, tahini, lemon zest, lemon juice, and 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Mix well.
2. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
3. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
4. In a separate bowl, toss the chickpeas in 1 tablespoon of olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread the chickpeas evenly on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Roast the chickpeas in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy.
5. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes.
6. Add the asparagus to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the asparagus is tender but still crisp.
7. Add the slivered almonds to the skillet and cook for 1-2 minutes, or until they are lightly toasted.
8. Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the cooked chickpeas.
9. Pour the rice mixture over the vegetables and chickpeas in the skillet, stirring to combine.
10. Serve the Super-Quick Brown Rice With Asparagus, Chickpeas, and Almonds immediately, or let it cool and refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

[/INST]

This cooking tutorial provides a delicious and nutritious meal option that combines the flavors of brown rice, asparagus, chickpeas, and almonds. The use of tahini adds a unique and savory taste to the dish, while the lemon zest and juice provide a bright and refreshing touch. This versatile recipe can be easily customized to suit individual preferences and dietary needs, making it a great choice for

1690800ec2.gt:
Peel and quarter the potatoes, then wash them thoroughly.
Place the potatoes in a large pot with enough cold, salted water to cover them and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20 min, or until cooked through, and drain.
Meanwhile put butter, lemon and garlic in a saucepan over very, very low.
Let it simmer for 20-30 minutes.
Discard lemon and garlic.
When potatoes are done, drain and mashed to your liking.
Fold in avocado and butter.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
If you like creamer mashed potatoes, you can add some milk.
1690800ec2.pred:
[INST]
To make Avocado Mashed Potatoes, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the mashed potatoes, salt, and pepper.
3. Add the butter, lemon juice, and minced garlic to the bowl, and mix until well combined.
4. Add the avocado to the bowl, and continue mixing until the avocado is fully incorporated into the potatoes.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are golden brown and cooked through.
6. Serve the Avocado Mashed Potatoes hot, and enjoy!

[/INST]

606b8ac522.gt:
Cut mars bars in 1cm thick slices, and place in a pyrex bowl.
Set the bow over a pot off boiling water and allow the chocolate to melt.
The nugget and caramel will take longer to melt then the chocolate, so stir vigorously until all the lumps have melted.
Remove from the heat, add the wipped cream and stir well.
You can add a little milk if the consistency is too thick.
Serve over ice cream.
Add a tot of brandy if you want hot chocolate brandy.
(Great for a cold day)
606b8ac522.pred:
1. Crush the Mars bars into small pieces.
2. In a saucepan, heat the crushed Mars bars over medium heat until melted and smooth.
3. Add the whipping cream to the saucepan and stir until well combined.
4. Cook the mixture over low heat for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it reaches the desired consistency.
5. Pour the hot chocolate mixture into a bowl and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Add ice-cream to the bowl and stir until well combined.
7. Serve the hot chocolate mixture immediately.

[/INST]

3a699000d0.gt:
Cut bread into 1/2 - 3/4 inch cubes.
Rub serving dish with garlic and add bread cubes.
Mix cornstarch and brandy together.
Heat wine until it starts to boil.
The add grated cheeses, stirring constantly until the cheese has melted.
DO NOT BOIL.
Add the cornstarch mixture to the melted cheese, stirring until it is a cream consistency.
Add nutmeg and pepper.
Serve at once in fondue pot.
3a699000d0.pred:
To cook Swiss Fondue, follow these steps:
1. In a saucepan, heat the dry white wine over medium heat until it starts to simmer.
2. Add the kirschwasser and stir to combine.
3. Gradually add the cornstarch, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the grated Swiss and Gruyere cheeses.
5. Stir until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth and creamy.
6. Season the fondue with nutmeg, pepper, and a pinch of salt.
7. Serve the Swiss Fondue in a fondue pot or a large bowl, accompanied by French bread for dipping.

Enjoy your Swiss Fondue!

b7aac475a1.gt:
Place haddock and water in a dutch oven and heat to boiling.
Cover and reduce heat to low and simmer approximately 10-15 minutes or until the fish is white and flakes easily.
Remove the halibut, reserving (set aside) the 'broth' (liquid); cut the haddock into bite size pieces.
Return 1 CUP of the reserved broth to the dutch oven.
Add the potatoes, onion and green pepper and simmer 15 minutes or just until the potatoes are tender.
Add the remaining broth, the haddock, tomato, milk, salt and pepper.
Heat until hot, but do not boil; sprinkle with cheese before serving.
b7aac475a1.pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, combine the haddock fillets, water, and potatoes. Bring the mixture to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender.

2. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until it is softened, about 5 minutes. Add the green bell pepper and cook for an additional 5 minutes.

3. Add the chopped tomatoes to the skillet and cook for another 5 minutes, or until they are slightly softened.

4. Add the milk, salt, and pepper to the pot with the haddock and potatoes. Stir to combine, and cook for 5-10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the soup is heated through.

5. Serve the Easy Fish Chowder hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

This recipe for Easy Fish Chowder is a delicious and comforting dish that combines the flavors of haddock, potatoes, onions, green bell peppers, and tomatoes. The addition of low-fat cheddar cheese and milk adds a creamy texture and richness to the dish, making it a satisfying meal.

2219f566cb.gt:
Heat oil in large skillet on medium heat.
Add onions and red peppers; cook and stir 3 min.
Stir in corn and zucchini; cook and stir 5 min.
or until all vegetables are crisp-tender.
Remove from heat.
Stir in parsley, black pepper and 2 Tbsp.
cheese.
Top with remaining cheese.
2219f566cb.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped sweet onion and sauté until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
3. Add the sliced zucchini to the skillet and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, until the zucchini is tender.
4. Add the corn kernels to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, until heated through.
5. In a small bowl, mix the chopped fresh parsley, black pepper, and 1/4 cup of the KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese.
6. Add the corn and zucchini mixture to a large mixing bowl.
7. Pour the remaining 1/4 cup of KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese over the corn and zucchini mixture, and stir to combine.
8. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and top with the remaining 1/4 cup of KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the Farmers' Market Corn Toss dish warm, and enjoy!

b4e4245834.gt:
Slice bananas and lay them out on cookie sheets, put into freezer for about 2 hours.
Take them from the freezer to your food processor or blender and blend them up, stopping every few min or so to scrap the sides down.
It does take a lil while but once it reaches the creaminess u like you can serve it as is and it will be more like a custard or put into a container and put into freezer til nice and thick like ice cream.
Update: If planning to keep this for a few days or so add a crushed vitamin C tablet and give it a good stir!
That's it!!!
Enjoy!!
!
b4e4245834.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To make Banana ice cream, you will need the following ingredients:
1. 6 ripe bananas
2. 1 cup of milk
3. 1/2 cup of sugar
4. 1/4 cup of cornstarch
5. 1/4 cup of water
6. 1/4 cup of vanilla extract
7. Optional: 1/4 cup of heavy cream or whipping cream for a smoother texture

Instructions:
1. Peel the bananas and cut them into small pieces.
2. In a blender or food processor, combine the banana pieces, milk, sugar, cornstarch, water, and vanilla extract. Blend until smooth and creamy.
3. If the mixture is too thick, add the additional water or heavy cream to achieve the desired consistency.
4. Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
5. Once the ice cream is churned, transfer it to an airtight container and place it in the freezer to harden for at least 2 hours or until firm.
6. Serve the Banana ice cream immediately or store it in the freezer for later use.

Enjoy your homemade Banana ice cream!

f40e32cead.gt:
In a blender or food processor, combine cumin, coriander, turmeric, red pepper flakes, mustard seed, and ginger.
Process to a fine powder.
Store in an airtight container.
f40e32cead.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix all the ingredients together.
2. Store the mixture in an airtight container for future use.
3. To prepare the dish, heat a small amount of oil in a pan over medium heat.
4. Add the curry powder mixture and cook for about 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly.
5. Add the desired amount of water or broth to the pan, and bring the mixture to a simmer.
6. Add the meat or vegetables of your choice, and cook until tender.
7. Adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper, if needed.
8. Serve the dish over rice or with your preferred side.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

9af737b60b.gt:
Blend all ingredients in blender on high speed until smooth.
Serve immediately.
9af737b60b.pred:
1. In a blender, combine 3/4 cup prepared CRYSTAL LIGHT Lemonade Flavor Drink, 2 Tbsp. SURE-JELL For Less or No Sugar Needed Recipes Premium Fruit Pectin, and 1/2 cup blueberries.
2. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
3. Add 1/2 cup thawed COOL WHIP FREE Whipped Topping and 1/2 cup ice cubes to the blender.
4. Blend the mixture until the ice is well-incorporated and the desired consistency is achieved.
5. Pour the Blueberry-Lemon Smoothie into a glass and enjoy!

This cooking procedure involves blending the ingredients together to create a delicious and refreshing Blueberry-Lemon Smoothie. The CRYSTAL LIGHT Lemonade Flavor Drink provides a sweet and tangy flavor, while the SURE-JELL For Less or No Sugar Needed Recipes Premium Fruit Pectin adds a touch of natural sweetness and thickness to the smoothie. The blueberries contribute a burst of natural sweetness and a vibrant color, while the COOL WHIP FREE Whipped Topping adds a creamy texture and a cool, refreshing sensation. Finally, the ice cubes help to chill the smoothie and create a smooth, cold beverage.

a106242e0e.gt:
Preheat oven 350 degrees F.
Salt the zucchini lightly and let it sit for 15 minutes.
Squeeze out all the excess moisture using your hands.
I usually put enough into my palm and and squeeze.
Repeat as necessary.
Combine all crust ingredients except the olive oil, and spread into an olive oiled 9 x 13 inch baking pan.
Bake 20-25 minutes until the surface is dry and firm.
Brush the top with olive oil and broil it, under moderate heat for 5 minutes.
Do not let it burn.
Spread the pizza or tomato sauce evenly over the crust and scatter olives, green peppers, onions, mushrooms, artichoke hearts, mozzarella cheese, Swiss cheese, and Parmesan cheese over the crust or use your own topping of choice and bake in a 350 F oven for about 20-25 minutes.
Remove from oven and scatter fresh basil leaves.
Return the pizza to oven and bake for additional 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot, cut into squares.
Eaten with fork and knife.
a106242e0e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 450°F (232°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the grated zucchini, eggs, flour, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, basil leaves, pepper, and olive oil. Mix well to combine.
3. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet or pizza stone.
4. Bake the crust for 15-20 minutes, or until it is golden brown and cooked through.
5. While the crust is baking, prepare the toppings.
6. In a small bowl, mix the pizza sauce or fresh tomato sauce with the olive oil.
7. Once the crust is done, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Spread the sauce evenly over the crust.
9. Add the sliced green pepper, onion, mushroom, artichoke heart, mozzarella cheese, swiss cheese, and parmesan cheese on top of the sauce.
10. Return the pizza to the oven and bake for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

This recipe provides a delicious and satisfying pizza experience, with a crispy crust, a flavorful sauce, and a variety of fresh and delicious toppings.

79efd7e435.gt:
Grate 1 teaspoon zest from 1 orange and reserve.
Cut peel, including white pith, from oranges with a sharp knife.
Cut segments free from membranes into a bowl.
Squeeze 1 tablespoon juice from membranes into a large bowl and whisk together with reserved zest, vinegar, oil, mustard, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon pepper until emulsified.
Add escarole, endive, and orange segments to vinaigrette and gently toss.
79efd7e435.pred:
1. Wash and dry the escarole and endive leaves thoroughly.
2. In a large bowl, combine the red-wine vinegar, olive oil, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper. Whisk until well-blended.
3. Add the torn escarole and endive leaves to the bowl and toss to coat the vegetables evenly with the vinaigrette.
4. Transfer the salad to a serving platter or individual plates, and serve immediately.

This salad recipe combines the fresh flavors of navel oranges, red-wine vinegar, olive oil, and Dijon mustard, creating a delicious and healthy meal option. The combination of endive and escarole provides a mix of textures and flavors, while the tangy mustard-orange vinaigrette adds a zesty touch to the dish. This salad is perfect for a light lunch or a side dish for a dinner party, and it can be easily customized with additional ingredients or dressings to suit individual preferences.

d7f427bc2d.gt:
Combine peanut butter, graham crackers, powdered sugar and butter.
Press into 9 x 13 inch pan.
Melt chocolate chips and spread over peanut butter mixture.
Allow to harden.
(Cut while still soft or layers will separate.)
d7f427bc2d.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the peanut butter, melted butter, and confectioners' sugar until smooth and fluffy.
3. Add the graham cracker crumbs and mix until well combined.
4. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Scoop the peanut butter mixture onto the prepared baking sheet, using a spoon or a cookie scoop.
6. Refrigerate the mixture for about 15-20 minutes to allow it to set.
7. Meanwhile, melt the semisweet chocolate chips in a double boiler or in a heat-resistant bowl set over a saucepan of simmering water.
8. Once the chocolate has melted, remove it from the heat and stir in the vanilla extract.
9. Carefully pour the melted chocolate over the peanut butter mixture on the baking sheet.
10. Refrigerate the chocolate-covered mixture for about 15-20 minutes to allow the chocolate to set.
