This dish is a delicious and flavorful addition to any meal, with the rich taste of saffron and the creamy texture of the aioli sauce.

91eb1e20fb.gt:
Put the rice in a small sauce pan.
I like to rinse my rice by placing in a sieve and running under cold water.
This rids the rice of excess starch powder and broken rice which makes the cooked rice mushy and sticky.
Add just enough water to cover the top of the rice by 1/2 inch (approx.
3 cups) Cover the pot with the lid.
Place over medium to medium high heat and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low.
Simmer, covered, for at least another 10 minutes, until the water is completely absorbed.
Turn off burner and allow rice to sit, covered, for at least another 5 minutes.
Sprinkle with half of the salt and pepper and stir to fluff.
IN THE MEANTIME, sprinkle the fish with the rest of the salt and pepper, and dredge in flour.
Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
Add fish to pan; cook 2 1/2 minutes on each side (less for thinner filets) or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
Add wine, juice, and capers to the pan; cook one minute.
Add butter to pan, stirring until butter melts.
Remove fish and sauce from pan; keep warm.
Wipe pan clean with paper towel, add spinach and saute one minute or until wilted.
Place 1/4 of the rice on each of 4 plates.
Top each serving with 1/4 of the spinach, one fish filet, and 1/4 of the sauce.
91eb1e20fb.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat coconut oil over medium-high heat. Season halibut with salt and pepper. Add halibut to the skillet and cook until it is golden brown on both sides and cooked through, about 4-5 minutes per side.
3. Remove halibut from the skillet and set aside.
4. Add flour to the skillet and stir to create a roux. Cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly, until the flour is lightly browned.
5. Gradually pour in white wine, stirring constantly to prevent the flour from burning. Cook until the wine has almost completely evaporated.
6. Add lemon juice or lime juice, capers, and butter to the skillet. Stir until the butter has melted and the sauce is smooth and creamy.
7. Return the halibut to the skillet and toss to coat it evenly with the sauce.
8. In a large mixing bowl, combine rice, salt, and pepper. Pour in the wine sauce and toss to coat the rice evenly.
9. Transfer the rice mixture to a baking dish and top with the halibut and spinach.
10. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the fish is flaking easily.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

a5c8eb3798.gt:
Cook the pasta in large pot of the boiling salted water until al dente.
Using a mortar and pestle, mash the salt and garlics together into a paste.
Warm the yogurt slightly in sauce pan.
Remove a small amount of warm yogurt from the pan, and stir together with garlic paste.
Stir this mixture into the remaining yogurt.
Drain the pasta and rinsed in cold water.
Place in caserol or deep serving dish, tosh with 1 table spoon of butter or margarine.
Tosh with half of the garlic - yogurt sauce.
Spread the remaining sauce over the pasta.
Garnish with the parsley.
For a very special dish, brown the pine nuts in two table spoon of butter or margarine.
Pour over the parsley.
Serve immediately.
a5c8eb3798.pred:
1. In a large pot, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to the package instructions until al dente.

2. In a small bowl, mix the yogurt, butter, garlic, and salt. Set aside.

3. Drain the pasta and return it to the pot.

4. Pour the yogurt sauce over the pasta and stir to combine.

5. If desired, add pine nuts for a crunchy texture.

6. Serve immediately, and enjoy your delicious pasta with yogurt sauce.

[/INST]

eadbe5886e.gt:
In a small saucepan, bring 1 quart of water to a boil.
Add 1 teaspoon of salt and the eggs and simmer over moderately high heat for 5 minutes.
Using a slotted spoon, transfer the eggs to a bowl of cold water and let stand for 3 to 4 minutes.
Keep the pan of hot water on the stove over low heat.
Meanwhile, put the spinach in a large bowl.
In a medium skillet, combine the olive oil, sherry and balsamic vinegars, shallots and thyme, and boil for 1 minute.
Crack the eggs all over and gently peel them under warm running water, keeping them whole.
Using a slotted spoon, slip the eggs in the hot water for 30 seconds.
Pour the warm dressing over the spinach, season with salt and pepper and toss.
Mound the salad on plates, top each with an egg and serve.
eadbe5886e.pred:
To make a delicious Warm Spinach Salad with Soft-Poached Eggs, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine the baby spinach, thyme, and coarsely chopped thyme.
2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the extra-virgin olive oil, sherry vinegar, and balsamic vinegar.
3. Season the spinach mixture with salt and freshly ground pepper.
4. Heat a small pot of water on the stove. Add a pinch of salt and the eggs to the pot. Cook the eggs at a gentle simmer for about 4 minutes, or until the whites are set and the yolks are still runny.
5. Carefully remove the eggs from the water with a slotted spoon or spatula, and let them cool for a few moments.
6. Carefully place the eggs on top of the spinach mixture, and drizzle the olive oil and vinegar mixture over the top.
7. Toss the salad gently to combine the ingredients, ensuring that the spinach is evenly coated with the dressing.
8. Serve the warm spinach salad immediately, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

33aa48e240.gt:
In a small bowl, whisk together 3 tablespoons of vegetable oil with the garlic, salt, chile powder, ground cumin, paprika, sugar and fresh lime juice.
Set aside.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the tomatillos to the dry pan and cook for 3 to 5 minutes on each side or until slightly charred all over.
Remove from pan and set aside.
In the same pan, add the oil and then stir in the chicken.
Cook for 2 minutes or until the chicken is lightly browned.
Stir in the onion and bell pepper and cook with the chicken for 3 to 5 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
Stir in the spice mixture and cook for another 2 minutes or until everything is well combined and heated through.
Fold in the cooked tomatillos.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve with tortillas and optional toppings.
33aa48e240.pred:
1. Heat a large skillet or frying pan over medium-high heat. Add 1/4 cup of the vegetable oil and swirl to coat the pan.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
3. Add the chile powder, cumin, and paprika, and cook for another 30 seconds, stirring constantly.
4. Add the sugar and lime juice, and cook for 1 minute, stirring to combine.
5. Add the sliced tomatillos, chicken strips, onion, and bell pepper to the pan. Cook until the vegetables are tender and the chicken is cooked through, about 10-12 minutes.
6. Season the dish with fresh cracked black pepper, to taste.
7. Serve the cooked fajitas in warm flour or corn tortillas, and top with shredded cheese and sour cream, if desired.
8. For added flavor, garnish with chopped avocado, chopped cilantro, and salsa or chopped tomatoes.

[/INST]

This delicious Chicken Fajitas with Tomatillos dish is a perfect blend of flavors and textures, with the tender chicken, juicy tomatillos, and crisp vegetables coming together in a delightful meal. The combination of spices, such as chile powder, cumin, and paprika, adds depth and warmth to the dish, while the lime juice and sugar bring a refreshing tanginess. The cooking method, using a large skillet or frying pan, ensures that the ingredients cook evenly and retain their vibrant colors and textures. Serve the dish in warm tortillas and top with shredded cheese, sour cream, avocado, cilantro, and salsa or chopped tomatoes for a complete and satisfying meal.

78dd461363.gt:
Cream butter, peanut butter, sugar, honey, egg, vanilla.
Sift together dry ingredients and then blend into creamed mixture.
Stir in nuts and chocolate chips, if desired.
Spoon 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 375 degrees for 10 minutes or until lightly brown; do not overbake.
Cool slightly; remove and place on rack to cool.
78dd461363.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter or margarine and peanut butter until smooth.
3. Add the sugar, honey, egg, and vanilla, and mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the whole wheat flour, baking soda, and salt, mixing until a smooth dough forms.
5. If desired, add chopped macadamia nuts and miniature semisweet chocolate chips to the dough.
6. Roll the dough into small balls, and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
8. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Wholesome Peanut Butter Cookies!

48b55fcddd.gt:
Seed 1 cup watermelon chunks and cut into small dice.
Puree remaining watermelon in a blender (in batches if necessary).
Pour puree through a sieve into a bowl, pressing on solids, and discard seeds.
Return juice to blender and blend together with ice, almonds, and garlic (in batches if necessary) until smooth.
Add bread, vinegar, salt, and pepper to taste and blend, adding oil in a slow stream, until smooth.
Top with diced watermelon.
48b55fcddd.pred:
1. Cut the watermelon into large chunks and discard the rind.
2. Cut the watermelon into large chunks and discard the rind.
3. Add the watermelon chunks, ice cubes, and whole blanched almonds to a blender or food processor.
4. Add the garlic cloves, red-wine vinegar, kosher salt, and extra-virgin olive oil to the blender or food processor.
5. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
6. Transfer the mixture to a bowl and refrigerate it for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
7. Serve the gazpacho immediately or refrigerate it for up to 2 hours before serving.

By following these key steps, you can create a delicious and refreshing Watermelon Gazpacho that is perfect for hot summer days.

03b718988e.gt:
Place bacon in a stock pot over medium-low heat; cook and stir until bacon begins to brown, about 5 minutes.
Stir onion and garlic into bacon; cook and stir until onion is tender, about 10 minutes.
Add green tomatoes, vegetable broth, celery salt, bay leaf, and black pepper to bacon-onion mixture; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer until tomatoes are tender, about 40 minutes.
03b718988e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
4. Add the green tomatoes, vegetable broth, and bay leaf to the pot. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
5. Remove the bay leaf.
6. Using an immersion blender or transfer the soup to a blender, blend the soup until smooth. Alternatively, you can use a regular blender, but be cautious not to overfill the blender, as it may cause spillage.
7. Season the soup with celery salt, freshly ground black pepper, and more salt if needed.
8. Serve the Green Tomato and Bacon Soup hot, garnished with chopped green onions and crumbled bacon, if desired.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious and satisfying Green Tomato and Bacon Soup.

2ae1ab4527.gt:
Over medium heat,melt 2 Tablespoons of margarine in a medium sized skillet.
Add onions and cook until softened.
Then add pork, gravy, and crushed red pepper flakes.
Stir to make sure all ingredients are well combined, and heated through.
2ae1ab4527.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, melt the butter or margarine over medium heat. Add the thinly sliced onion and cook until it is soft and translucent.
3. Add the breaded cooked pork strips to the skillet and cook until they are browned, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Pour the jar of pork gravy over the pork and onions, stirring to combine.
5. Season the mixture with crushed red pepper flakes to taste.
6. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and the gravy is bubbly and hot.
7. Serve the Breaded Pork With Onions and Gravy over rice or noodles.

[/INST]

ce64c17852.gt:
In blender, combine soymilk and orange juice; add papaya, strawberries, and, if desired, protein powder and honey.
Cover and blend until smooth.
ce64c17852.pred:
1. Begin by pouring the vanilla-flavored soymilk into a blender or food processor.
2. Add the chopped papaya and frozen unsweetened strawberries to the blender.
3. If desired, add the powdered soy protein concentrate and honey to the blender.
4. Blend the ingredients until smooth and creamy, or until the desired consistency is achieved.
5. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy!

This delicious Papaya Strawberry Soymilk Smoothie is a refreshing and nutritious drink that combines the natural sweetness of papaya and strawberries with the creaminess of soymilk. The addition of the powdered soy protein concentrate and honey, if desired, provides an extra boost of protein and natural sweetness, making it a perfect treat for breakfast or a healthy snack.

e910d0b6fc.gt:
Stir together the potato flakes, pancake mix, onion, Cheddar cheese, milk, egg, olive oil, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and cayenne pepper in a bowl until well combined.
Grease a griddle or large skillet, and place over medium heat.
Drop pancakes, 1/4 cup at a time, onto the hot griddle, and cook until the edges look dry and 1 bubble appears in the center, about 3 minutes.
Flip the pancakes, and cook until browned on the other side, about 3 more minutes.
e910d0b6fc.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the instant mashed potato flakes, complete dry pancake mix, chopped onion, shredded Cheddar cheese, skim milk, egg, beaten, extra-virgin olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and pepper to taste. Mix well.
3. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Pour a small amount of the pancake batter onto the skillet, creating a circular shape. Cook for about 3 minutes, or until the edges are slightly browned and the pancake is cooked through.
4. Carefully flip the pancake and cook for another 2 minutes, or until the other side is also slightly browned.
5. Transfer the cooked pancake to a baking sheet and repeat with the remaining batter.
6. Bake the pancakes in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
7. Serve the Mountain Mama's Potato Pancakes hot, garnished with additional chopped onion, if desired.

[/INST]

a0ea3e1280.gt:
Combine sugar, cream, half-and-half, milk, and instant espresso in a bowl and stir until sugar is completely dissolved.
Turn on your ice cream machine before pouring the ice cream mix into it.
Then pour it in and churn according to the manufacturers instructions.
Add toffee and chocolate chips about 2 minutes before the end of the churning cycle.
Serve right away if you want it soft or transfer to an airtight container and store in the freezer for at least 2 hours.
Use within 3 days.
Recipe makes about 1 1/2 quarts.
a0ea3e1280.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine 23 cups of granulated sugar, 2 cups of heavy cream, 1 cup of half-and-half, and 3 tablespoons of instant espresso powder. Whisk until smooth and well-combined.
2. Add 1/2 cups of toffee bits and 1/2 cups of mini chocolate chips to the mixture. Whisk until the toffee bits and chocolate chips are evenly distributed throughout the mixture.
3. Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
4. Once the ice cream is fully churned and frozen, transfer it to an airtight container and store in the freezer until ready to serve.
5. Serve the Coffee Toffee Mocha Crunch Ice Cream immediately after transferring it to the container, as it will melt quickly once removed from the freezer.

This Coffee Toffee Mocha Crunch Ice Cream is a delicious and indulgent treat that combines the flavors of coffee, toffee, and chocolate. The addition of the espresso powder adds a rich and bold coffee flavor, while the toffee bits and mini chocolate chips provide a sweet and crunchy contrast. This ice cream is perfect for those who enjoy a combination of coffee and chocolate flavors, and it can be enjoyed as a refreshing dessert or a delightful treat on a warm summer day.

d25661eadd.gt:
Place your pork tenderloin in an oven proof pot.
Grate your garlic cloves and rub it into the pork tenderloin.
Rub smoked paprika powder into the pork tenderloin.
Dice the onions and place them in the pot with the pork tenderloin.
Cover with bbq sauce.
Put on the lid and make sure it is closed.
Cook in the oven at 125F celsius/255F for 5,5 hours.
Take out your pot and remove the lid.
Using to forks, pull the meat apart.
Serve with tortillas, vegetables and a sauce of your chosing.
d25661eadd.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 160°C (320°F).
2. Season the pork tenderloin with salt, pepper, and Smoked paprika powder.
3. In a large roasting pan, place the pork tenderloin and cook it in the preheated oven for about 4-5 hours, or until it reaches 145°F (63°C) for medium-rare.
4. Remove the pork from the oven and let it rest for about 15-20 minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
5. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onions and cook them until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
6. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
7. Pour in the BBQ sauce and stir to combine. Cook the sauce over medium heat for about 10-15 minutes, or until it has thickened and coated the pork pieces evenly.
8. Serve the pulled pork on buns, with the caramelized onion and BBQ sauce as desired. Enjoy your delicious Pulled pork!

96de2fb2f9.gt:
Cut broccoli florets into small bite-sized pieces.
Combine with grapes, celery, raisins, and sunflower seed kernels.
Mix mayonnaise with remaining ingredients, stirring with a whisk.
Pour dressing over the broccoli mix, and toss well.
Chill for 1 hour minimum.
96de2fb2f9.pred:
[/INST]

To prepare Broccoli Salad (Lite), follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the broccoli florets, grapes, celery, and raisins.

3. In a small bowl, whisk together the light mayonnaise, plain fat-free yogurt, sugar, and white wine vinegar.

4. Pour the dressing over the vegetables and grapes, and toss to coat evenly.

5. Transfer the salad to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the dressing is slightly caramelized.

6. Remove the salad from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.

7. Serve the Broccoli Salad (Lite) immediately, or refrigerate it for later use.

Enjoy your delicious Broccoli Salad (Lite) with your family and friends!

0eeb43444a.gt:
Steam the cauliflower florets for 10 minutes or until tender.
In a small skillet over medium heat, saute garlic in hazelnut oil or coconut oil, just until fragrant.
Add all of the ingredients into a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve over gluten-free noodles, spaghetti squash, veggie sticks, spuds, kale chips or Vegan Shepherds Pie On The Fly.
0eeb43444a.pred:
To prepare Cauliflower Cheese Sauce (Dairy-Free), follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).

2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, heat the hazelnut oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.

3. Add the cauliflower florets to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the cauliflower is tender but still slightly crunchy.

4. Add the coconut oil, pepper, and minced artichoke hearts to the skillet. Cook for an additional 3-5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the cauliflower is tender and the artichoke hearts are heated through.

5. In a small bowl, whisk together the Annie's Honey Mustard, salt, and a splash of water. Pour the sauce over the cauliflower and artichoke mixture in the skillet.

6. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the cauliflower is tender and the sauce is bubbly and slightly thickened.

7. Serve the Cauliflower Cheese Sauce (Dairy-Free) immediately, garnished with fresh herbs if desired. Enjoy!

e834a54d65.gt:
Bring 2 medium saucepans of salted water to a strong boil.
Add the squid to 1 saucepan and the shrimp to the other and boil until just cooked, about 1 minute for the squid and 3 minutes for the shrimp.
Drain the squid and shrimp and immediately transfer to a bowl of ice water to cool.
Drain again and pat dry.
In a large bowl, mix the lemon juice with the peanut oil, parsley, cilantro, garlic and jalapeno.
Add the mushrooms, shrimp and squid.
Season with salt and pepper and refrigerate until chilled, about 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, using a sharp knife, peel the oranges, removing all the bitter white pith.
Working over a bowl, cut in between the membranes to release the sections.
Squeeze the juice from the membranes over the chilled seviche.
Arrange the orange sections and avocado wedges around the edge of a platter.
Using a slotted spoon, spread the seviche in the center.
Spoon some of the marinade over the oranges and avocados and serve immediately.
e834a54d65.pred:
To prepare a perfect Flash-Cooked Seviche with Mushrooms and Avocado, follow these key steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients: Clean the squid and shrimp, peel and cut the oranges, and cut the mushrooms into thin slices.

2. Prepare the marinade: In a small bowl, mix the lemon juice, peanut oil, garlic, jalapeno, and a pinch of salt and pepper.

3. Prepare the cooking method: In a large skillet or wok, heat the peanut oil over medium-high heat.

4. Cook the mushrooms: Add the mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they are golden brown and tender, about 3-4 minutes.

5. Cook the shrimp: Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until they are pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes.

6. Cook the squid: Add the squid to the skillet and cook until it is opaque and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes.

7. Prepare the avocado: Cut the avocado into 1/2-inch wedges and season with salt and pepper.

8. Combine the ingredients: Remove the cooked ingredients from the skillet and place them in a large bowl. Add the marinade and toss to coat the ingredients evenly.

9. Serve: Serve the Flash-Cooked Seviche with Mushrooms and Avocado immediately, garnished with fresh parsley and cilantro.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious and visually appealing Flash-Cooked Seviche with Mushrooms and Avocado, perfect for sharing with friends and family.

fd3e9f4f9e.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Combine sugar, butter and cream cheese in large bowl.
Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy.
Add milk, eggs and vanilla.
Continue beating until smooth.
Stir in flour and coconut.
Spoon into paper-lined or greased muffin cups, filling each 3/4 full.
Bake 32-38 minutes or until light golden brown.
Serve warm or at room temperature; top with fruit preserves or jam.
fd3e9f4f9e.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.

2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.

3. Add the cream cheese and vanilla extract, and mix until well combined.

4. Gradually add the milk, mixing until smooth.

5. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs until light and fluffy.

6. Gradually add the eggs to the butter mixture, alternating with the flour mixture, mixing until just combined.

7. Stir in the coconut and fruit preserves or jam.

8. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan.

9. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.

10. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

11. Once cooled, use a sharp knife to slice the cake into individual pieces.

12. Serve the Individual Coconut Pound Cakes with a dusting of powdered sugar or a drizzle of fruit preserves or jam.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
The Individual Coconut Pound Cakes are ready to be served. Enjoy your delicious dessert!
<</SYS>>

8afb640d04.gt:
Wash the sweet potato.
Bake the wet sweet potato in a toaster oven for 10 minutes.
Turn it 90 degrees, and bake for another 10 minutes.
You can also boil or microwave.
Mash the sweet potato with a masher.
Add katakuriko, and water, and knead briefly.
Preheat the oven to 180C / 350F, and set the baking time for 15 minutes.
In the meantime, roll the dough into bite-size balls, and lay on a sheet of parchment paper.
Bake in the oven for 15 minutes at 180C / 350F, then it's done.
8afb640d04.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Wash the sweet potato thoroughly and peel it.
3. Cut the sweet potato into small, evenly sized pieces.
4. In a small bowl, mix the Katakuriko with the water until it reaches a smooth, paste-like consistency.
5. Add the sweet potato pieces to the Katakuriko mixture and toss them to coat evenly.
6. Spread the coated sweet potato pieces on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the sweet potato pieces in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly crispy on the outside.
8. Remove the baked sweet potato pieces from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
9. Serve the Sweet Potato Baby Biscuit Baby Snack warm, as a delicious and nutritious treat.

c1a30da967.gt:
Mix all ingredients except oil and dressing until well blended.
Shape into 8 patties.
Cook patties in hot oil in large frying pan on medium heat 4 to 5 minutes on each side or until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with dressing, if desired.
c1a30da967.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the prepared Stove Top Stuffing Mix, turkey, celery, and Mayo. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the flour, Dijon mustard, egg, and chipotle pepper. Mix until well combined.
4. If desired, add the Kraft Rancher's Choice Dressing to the mixture.
5. Form the mixture into a ball, then press it into a flat, even layer on a baking sheet or a silicone mat.
6. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the edges are golden brown and the center is cooked through.
7. Allow the cakes to cool for a few minutes before cutting them into wedges.

Enjoy your delicious Turkey and Stuffing Cakes!

c1c23779c6.gt:
Heat the cider, syrup, sugar and cinnamon sticks in a saucepan over medium heat.
Cook until the mixture is simmering, reduces by half and starts to thicken, about 15 minutes.
Remove from the heat, stir in the butter and let it cool completely.
Remove the cinnamon sticks, then pour over pancakes or use as desired.
c1c23779c6.pred:
To make Apple Cider Syrup, follow these steps:

1. In a medium saucepan, combine the 2 cups of apple cider, 3 tablespoons of light corn syrup, and 1 cup of light brown sugar.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
3. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until the sugar has dissolved and the mixture has thickened slightly.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the 2 sticks of cinnamon and 1 tablespoon of unsalted butter.
5. Allow the mixture to cool for a few minutes, then pour it into a clean glass jar or container.
6. Store the Apple Cider Syrup in a cool, dark place, and it will keep for several weeks.

This Apple Cider Syrup can be used as a topping for pancakes, waffles, ice cream, or yogurt, or as a base for cocktails, such as a cider-based cocktail. Enjoy!

50ae7ae60c.gt:
For this soup, I use 1/2 lb button, 1/4 lb cremini and 1/4 lb shitake mushrooms.
In a large pot, sautee mushrooms in olive oil until browned.
Add onions, carrots, celery and garlic and sautee until tender.
Add flour and thyme and cook for 3-4 mins until flour is cooked into the vegetables.
Add stock, bay leaf and rice and bring to a boil.
Simmer soup covered for 45-60 mins until rice is tender.
Add salt and pepper to taste and balsamic vinegar if desired.
50ae7ae60c.pred:
To prepare a delicious Low Fat Mushroom and Wild Rice Soup, follow these steps:
1. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they are tender and slightly browned.
2. Add the chopped onion and cook until it is soft and translucent.
3. Add the diced carrots and celery, and cook for a few more minutes until they are tender.
4. Add the minced garlic and cook for an additional minute.
5. Pour in the dried thyme and stir to combine.
6. Add the flour and stir to create a roux. Cook for a few minutes, stirring constantly, until the flour is lightly browned.
7. Gradually pour in the vegetable stock, stirring continuously to prevent lumps from forming.
8. Add the bay leaf, wild rice, brown rice, salt, and pepper. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the soup has thickened.
9. Remove the bay leaf and stir in the balsamic vinegar. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
10. Serve the Low Fat Mushroom and Wild Rice Soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh thyme or a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil, if desired.

[/INST]

c7e6c70205.gt:
In a medium bowl place first 7 ingredients up to lemon juice.
Stir until combined.
Set aside.
In a medium saute pan place 1/4 cup oil and heat to medium hot.
Fry each tortilla for 15 seconds, or until softened.
Drain on paper towels or paper bags.
In a large, heavy pan place 4 cups of oil and heat over high heat until very hot.
Loosely roll each tortilla and deep-fry it for 1-2 minutes, or until crisp.
Drain on paper towels or paper bags.
Stuff reserved vegetable mixture inside each tortilla.
Cut the taquitos in half, crosswise.
c7e6c70205.pred:
To make Blue Corn Feta Taquitos, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

2. In a large bowl, mix the feta cheese, crumbled, tomatoes, green bell pepper, jalapeno pepper (if using), and onion. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.

4. On a flat surface, roll out the tortillas to your desired thickness.

5. Place a spoonful of the feta cheese mixture on the center of each tortilla.

6. Fold the tortilla in half over the filling, creating a half-moon shape.

7. Place the filled tortillas on the prepared baking sheet.

8. Brush the tops of the taquitos with oil.

9. Bake the taquitos in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until golden brown.

10. Serve the Blue Corn Feta Taquitos warm with a squeeze of lemon juice and a sprinkle of fresh cilantro.

Enjoy your delicious Blue Corn Feta Taquitos!

1282ffb964.gt:
Cook onion rings as directed on package.
When onions are almost done, grill franks 7 to 9 min.
or until heated through, turning occasionally and adding buns to the grill to toast for the last few minutes.
Spread rolls with barbecue sauce.
Insert each frank through 3 onion rings; place in bun.
Top with cheese.
1282ffb964.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the frozen breaded onion rings in the BULL'S-EYE Original Barbecue Sauce until evenly coated.
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Arrange the onion ring-covered baking sheet in the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the onion rings are golden brown and crispy.
4. While the onion rings are baking, cook the Angus beef franks according to package instructions.
5. Once the onion rings are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
6. Meanwhile, prepare the hot dog sandwich rolls by splitting them in half.
7. To assemble the dish, place a cooked Angus beef frank on each hot dog sandwich roll half.
8. Add the cooled onion rings on top of the franks, then drizzle the remaining BULL'S-EYE Original Barbecue Sauce over the onion rings.
9. Top the onion rings with the KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Cheddar Cheese.
10. Serve the Angus Ring Toss dish immediately.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

21b8be21c5.gt:
Place all ingredients together in roasting pan.
Bake, uncovered, in 325 oven, 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
Stir often.
This recipe can be made in a crockpot, as well.
Mix all ingredients together in crockpot, set temperature dial to low setting, cook 4-6 hours.
Stir occasionally.
21b8be21c5.pred:
To prepare a delicious Baked Beans dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large saucepan, combine the pork and beans, chopped white onion, and chopped green pepper. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender.
3. Add the diced raw bacon and cook until it is crispy.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the catsup and brown sugar. Pour the mixture over the beans and bacon in the saucepan, stirring to combine.
5. Cook the mixture in the saucepan over medium heat for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened and the beans are coated with a sweet and tangy glaze.
6. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the mixture cool for a few minutes.
7. Transfer the mixture to a large baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until the beans are tender and the sauce is bubbly and caramelized.
8. Serve the Baked Beans hot, garnished with fresh chopped green onions if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Baked Beans dish!

b9040d1858.gt:
Place salted caramel sauce into the bottom of your mug and slowly add in the shot of espresso whilst stirring the mixture together.
Set aside.
Place cocoa powder, milk and sugar into a small saucepan over low-medium heat.
Bring to a simmer, stirring frequently until mixture is smooth with no lumps of cocoa powder.
Remove from heat and gradually pour into the mug with your caramel and coffee mixture, stirring to combine as you pour the milk mix in.
To garnish (optional): Squirt desired amount of cream on top of your mocha, then drizzle some extra salted caramel sauce on top.
Finish with some chocolate sprinkles and serve immediately.
b9040d1858.pred:
1. In a saucepan, combine the Salted Caramel Ice Cream Topping and the Freshly Brewed Espresso. Heat the mixture over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the caramel sauce has melted and the mixture is smooth.
2. In a separate saucepan, heat the milk over medium heat until it reaches a simmer.
3. Slowly pour the hot milk into the caramel mixture, stirring constantly to avoid lumps.
4. Add the Cocoa Powder, Sweetener or Sugar, and cream to the mixture. Stir until well combined.
5. If desired, add extra sauce to taste and mix well.
6. Pour the mixture into a mug or a glass.
7. Optionally, sprinkle some extra sauce and sprinkles on top for garnish.
8. Enjoy your Salted Caramel Mocha dish!

[/INST]

663548f6ad.gt:
Do not peel potatoes.
Cut potatoes in long, uniformly shaped sticks.
Fry in hot oil(approx 325F)to desired doneness(dark & well done is the way they do them at the stands on the boardwalk).
Remove fries to paper towels and generously salt right away.
Serve in a paper cup or cone with plenty of malt vinegar.
663548f6ad.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash the potatoes thoroughly and pat them dry.
3. Cut the potatoes into fry-sized pieces (typically about 1/2 inch thick and 3 inches long).
4. In a large bowl, mix the potatoes with salt, malt vinegar, and a drizzle of oil.
5. Spread the potatoes out on a baking sheet, making sure they are not overcrowded.
6. Bake the potatoes in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy on the outside.
7. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. While the potatoes are cooling, heat a small amount of oil in a pan over medium heat.
9. Carefully fry the cooked potatoes in the hot oil, being careful not to overcrowd the pan.
10. Once the potatoes are golden brown and crispy, remove them from the pan and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain any excess oil.
11. Serve the New Jersey Boardwalk Fries immediately, with a side of salt and malt vinegar for dipping.

[/INST]

[/INST]

[/INST]

6a483319ff.gt:
Wash the enoki mushrooms, cut off the stem ends and put on a plate.
Put a pat of butter (or margarine) on top.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Top with cheese (I used sliced cheese) and cover loosely with plastic wrap.
Microwave for about a minute and it's done.
Add a little soy sauce or ponzu sauce before eating.
Enjoy piping hot!
6a483319ff.pred:
1. Preheat the microwave to 1000 watts.
2. Open the packet of Enoki mushrooms and drain the excess water.
3. Place the Enoki mushrooms on a microwave-safe plate.
4. Drizzle the mushrooms with a small amount of soy sauce, ponzu, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
5. Place the plate in the microwave and cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the mushrooms are tender and slightly crispy.
6. Remove the plate from the microwave and let it cool for a few seconds.
7. Place the cooked Enoki mushrooms on a microwave-safe plate.
8. Place a slice of cheese on top of the mushrooms.
9. Drizzle the mushrooms and cheese with a small amount of butter or margarine.
10. Add a pinch of salt and pepper to taste.
11. Place the plate back in the microwave and cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the mushrooms are heated through.
12. Remove the plate from the microwave and let it cool for a few seconds.
13. Serve the cooked Enoki Mushrooms and Cheese immediately.

This step-by-step procedure ensures that the user can easily follow the instructions for cooking the Microwave Enoki Mushrooms and Cheese, while also providing guidance on the best way to prepare the dish.

f01aec104c.gt:
Let the chopped tomato drain in a colander while preparing the rest of the guacamole.
Bring 4 cups water to a boil in a small saucepan.
Add the frozen lima beans and cook until tender and creamy, about 5 minutes.
Drain the beans and rinse under cold water until cool.
Pat the beans dry with a paper towels then remove the skins by pinching the beans so the skins slide off.
If using baby limas, you can skip this step.
Scoop out a quarter of the avocado flesh, then process it with the lima beans, lime juice, mayonnaise, and 1/2 teaspoons salt in a food processor until very smooth, 1-1 1/2 minutes, stopping to scrape down the bowl as needed.
Cube the remaining 3/4 of the avocado into 1/2" pieces.
Gently stir the cubed avocado, pureed lima mixture, drained tomato, cilantro, jalapeno, onion, garlic, and cumin together.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Enjoy!
The guacamole can be refrigerated, wrapped tightly in plastic wrap, for up to 48 hours.
(the lima beans help keep it very green).
Make sure the plastic wrap is touching the surface of the guacamole.
Bring to room temperature and season with additional fresh lime juice, salt, and pepper before serving.
f01aec104c.pred:
To cook a delightful Light Guacamole! dish, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine the chopped tomatoes, lima beans, and minced red onion (or shallot).
2. Add the minced garlic, cilantro, jalapeno chile, and cumin to the bowl.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the fresh lime juice, mayonnaise, and salt.
4. Pour the lime juice mixture over the vegetables and stir to combine.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Serve the Light Guacamole! dish as a side or appetizer, garnished with additional cilantro if desired.

This dish is light and refreshing, with a balance of flavors from the tangy lime juice, creamy mayonnaise, and spicy jalapeno chile. The combination of ingredients results in a delicious and satisfying dish that is perfect for a variety of occasions.

3b5d73be72.gt:
Add butter and sugar into a bowl, and mix until the mixture becomes white (If it's hard to blend, add oil in small amounts).
Add egg and remaining vegetable oil, and mix some more.
Sift the ingredients.
Add milk and dry ingredients alternately in 2 batches to the bowl, and mix.
When the batter is ready, it's really smooth.
Pour the batter into muffin cups.
Bake in the oven for 25 ~ 30 minutes at 170C (340F).
It's done.
These are also great as presents.
3b5d73be72.pred:
[<INST>]
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the eggs, sugar, milk, and vegetable oil. Whisk until well combined.
3. Add the cake flour, baking powder, and butter to the mixture, stirring until a smooth batter forms.
4. Fill the muffin cups in a muffin tin with batter, about 3/4 full.
5. Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
6. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
7. Enjoy your delicious Easy Basic Plain Muffin!

[/<INST>]

b801079396.gt:
In a small pot simmer the green garlic in the olive oil for 5 minutes.
Cool completely (this is very important, if the oil is still warm, the aioli will break).
When the oil is cold, combine the remaining ingredients in a small bowl and whisk until frothy.
Slowly drizzle the green garlic olive oil in drop by drop until an emulsion is made.
Continue to add the oil and green garlic until you aioli is thick and creamy, season with salt to taste.
b801079396.pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a small saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add the green garlic and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the garlic is tender and slightly browned.
3. In a small bowl, whisk the egg yolks and Dijon mustard together until smooth.
4. Slowly pour the hot oil into the egg mixture, whisking constantly to prevent the eggs from curdling.
5. Return the mixture to the saucepan and cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until the sauce thickens and reaches the desired consistency.
6. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the juice from the Meyer lemon.
7. Season the sauce with salt to taste.
8. Serve the Green Garlic Aioli Recipe immediately or refrigerate it for later use.

[/SYS]

b53489fe80.gt:
Pre heat oven to 180c/350F.
Grease a 6" cake tin or 1 lb loaf tin, and line with greaseproof paper.
Rub the butter into the flour so that it looks like breadcrumbs.
Add the sugar, ground nuts, chopped nuts, dates and the spice.
Mix well.
Add the egg and milk stir with a spoon, do not beat the mixture.
Transfer the mixture to the tin and top with a few nuts.
Bake for 1.5 hour or until a tooth pick inserted into the centre comes out clean.
Allow to cool in the tin for 10 mins and place on a wire rack.
When cool peel off the paper.
b53489fe80.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the ground mixed spice, sifted flour, chopped dates, and chopped walnuts to the bowl.
4. Mix the ingredients together until well combined.
5. Add the egg and milk to the mixture, and continue to mix until a smooth batter forms.
6. Grease and flour a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
7. Pour the batter into the prepared pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
8. Bake the cake in the preheated oven for about 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Once the cake is fully cooled, dust it with powdered sugar and enjoy!

[/INST]

[/INST]

[/INST]

fa8f24e9ab.gt:
Stir together dry ingredients.
Mix liquids and fruit or nuts together and add to dry mixture, stirring lightly.
Fill 6 oiled muffin tins 1/2 full and bake 15 minutes at 425 degrees F.
fa8f24e9ab.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the oat flour, baking powder, and sea salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the honey, buttermilk, eggs, and vegetable oil.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the raisins and dates.
6. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
7. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
8. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes in the pan, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Oat Flour Muffins!

00b1995e31.gt:
Heat oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Season pork ribs with salt and pepper.
Working in two batches, sear the pork until light golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
As each batch of pork is seared, place it in the bottom of the crockpot.
Pour out all but 1 tablespoon of the drippings.
Add shallots and garlic to the pot.
Saute until the shallots are light golden brown.
Add tomato paste and cook until the paste becomes dark red, approximately 3 minutes.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, red wine, and fish sauce.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Pour the tomato sauce into the crockpot.
Add cannellini beans to the crockpot.
Cook on low heat for 6 to 8 hours, or until the pork is tender.
Remove the pork from the crockpot and cut into bite-sized pieces.
Return the pork to the crockpot and keep warm until ready to serve over rice or pasta (I use egg noodles).
Garnish with chopped fresh Italian parsley and grated Parmesan cheese.
00b1995e31.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pot, heat the Canola Oil over medium heat.
3. Season the pork ribs with salt and pepper, then add them to the skillet. Cook until browned on all sides, then remove them from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the minced shallots and garlic cloves. Cook until the shallots are softened, then add the tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, red wine, and fish sauce. Cook until the liquid has reduced and the flavors have melded together.
5. Add the cannellini beans to the skillet, stirring to combine.
6. Return the pork ribs to the skillet, nestling them among the other ingredients.
7. Cover the skillet with a lid, then transfer it to the preheated oven. Cook for about 3-4 hours, or until the pork is tender and the sauce has thickened.
8. Remove the skillet from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
9. Serve the Crockpot Braised Country Style Pork Ribs in Tomato & Red Wine Sauce over rice or noodles, garnished with chopped fresh Italian parsley.

[/INST]

14273bf5f9.gt:
Trim most of fat from pork loin, and place in crock pot, fat side up.
Sprinkle with garlic powder, pepper, salt, and red pepper flakes.
Top with onion.
Cook on high for 45-60 minutes.
Switch to low.
Cook on low for about 4 1/2 hours.
Mix all sauce ingredients together.
Separate pork loin into big chunks.
Pour sauce mixture into crock pot, making sure to mix in juices from pork loin.
Cook for one more hour, then shred pork with two forks.
Barbecue can be left simmering for another 2 hours on low, or switched to"keep warm" setting instead.
Serve on buns.
14273bf5f9.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. Season the pork loin with garlic powder, black pepper, salt, red pepper flakes, and onion.
3. Place the pork loin in a crock pot, and pour in the ketchup, tomato sauce, garlic powder, honey, Worcestershire sauce, smoky-style barbecue sauce, apple cider vinegar, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and onion.
4. Cook the pork loin on low heat for 8-10 hours or on high heat for 4-5 hours.
5. After cooking, remove the pork loin from the crock pot, and let it rest for a few minutes.
6. Slice the pork loin into thin pieces, and serve it with the sauce.

[/INST]

07f2c36b9b.gt:
Heat bacon for 30 seconds in the microwave between two pieces of paper towel to soak up excess grease
Spread honey mustard on tortilla then lay cheese on top of honey mustard, then add chicken, then add the bacon.
Spread the guacamole on top of the bacon then lay lettuce leaves on top of guacamole
Roll up and devour!
07f2c36b9b.pred:
[INST]
To prepare a delicious Chicken, Bacon, Avocado and Swiss wrap, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the chicken with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
3. Place the chicken on a baking sheet and cook in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
4. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the other ingredients.
5. Slice the baby Swiss cheese into thin rounds.
6. Cook the bacon according to your preference, either in the oven or on a stovetop.
7. Slice the avocado into small pieces.
8. Prepare the Honey Mustard by mixing the Boar's Head Honey Mustard with a small amount of water to achieve the desired consistency.
9. Wash and dry the leafy butter lettuce.
10. Assemble the wrap by spreading a thin layer of the prepared Honey Mustard on the tortilla.
11. Layer the chicken, baby Swiss cheese, bacon, avocado, and leafy butter lettuce on the tortilla.
12. Roll the tortilla up, ensuring the filling is evenly distributed.
13. Cut the wrap into bite-sized pieces and serve immediately.

[/INST]

[/INST]

ce99fab83f.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F.
Cream together butter, sugar, egg and vanilla extract until well combined.
Add flour, baking soda, and salt to mixture.
Fold in puffed rice cereal gently so as not to break up the puffs.
Incorporate chocolate chips.
Bake for 10 15 minutes.
ce99fab83f.pred:
[INST]1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and vanilla extract, and mix well.
4. Gradually add the flour, baking soda, and salt, mixing until well combined.
5. Fold in the Rice Krispies or Cocoa Krispies and chocolate chips.
6. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a greased baking sheet.
7. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
8. Remove from the oven and let the cookies cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/INST]

1db4782a47.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F
Place a paper cupcake liner in each cup (12 total) of muffin pan.
Beat cream cheese with electric mixer until fluffy.
Add sugar and vanilla, beating well.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.,.
Place one of the Oreo halves, cream side up, in each muffin cup.
Spoon cream cheese mixture over wafers filling each to about 1/4 inch from top of paper.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Cool completely.
Spoon a tablespoon of the cherry pie filling on top of each tart.
Chill before serving.
1db4782a47.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla extract.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the crushed Oreo cookies.
5. Pour the mixture into a springform pan, lined with parchment paper.
6. Bake the cheesecake for about 45-50 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is still slightly jiggly.
7. Remove the cheesecake from the oven and let it cool completely on a wire rack.
8. Once cooled, refrigerate the cheesecake for at least 4 hours or overnight.
9. Once the cheesecake is chilled, carefully remove the springform pan and cut the cheesecake into 12 equal pieces.
10. For the cherry topping, combine the cherry pie filling and a small amount of water in a saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens slightly.
11. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
12. Carefully spoon the cherry topping over the cheesecake pieces.
13. Refrigerate the cheesecake tarts for at least 2 hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Black Forest Cheesecake Tarts!

c5ede2d8c3.gt:
Smooth the asparagus stalks with a peeler.
Cut in half lengthwise, then slice into 4-5 cm lengths.
Put the asparagus, salt and sesame oil into a heatproof dish and mix gently.
Microwave unwrapped at 600 W for 2 minutes.
Add more salt and sesame oil if necessary, and sprinkle on some white sesame seeds to finish.
c5ede2d8c3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash the asparagus thoroughly and pat it dry with a paper towel.
3. In a small bowl, mix the salt, sesame oil, and white sesame seeds.
4. Place the asparagus in a microwave-safe dish, and drizzle the sesame oil mixture over it.
5. Cover the dish with a microwave-safe lid or plastic wrap, and cook the asparagus for 2-3 minutes or until it is tender but still crisp.
6. Remove the dish from the microwave, and stir the asparagus to ensure even cooking.
7. Serve the cooked asparagus immediately, and enjoy your delicious Easy in the Microwave Asparagus Namul.

15565646e5.gt:
Sift all the ingredients together.
Wrap the lid with a kitchen towel, and start boiling water in the steamer.
Cut up the cranberries into small pieces.
In a bowl whisk the egg yolk, and add the vegetable oil, milk, sugar and strawberry sauce, in that order, and mix each time you add an ingredient.
Add the sifted dry ingredients to the bowl.
Add the cranberries and fold into the batter with a spatula.
The batter should be somewhat sticky and thick.
Place cupcake linings into silicone muffin molds and spoon in the batter 70% full.
Align the molds in the steamer and steam for 12 minutes over high heat, and the buns are done.
If you're not going to eat the buns right away, place them in a plastic bag while they are still slightly warm.
This is to prevent them from hardening.
15565646e5.pred:
To make delicious Blooming Flowers Strawberry Steamed Buns, follow these steps:

1. In a small bowl, whisk the egg yolk, vegetable oil, and milk together until well combined.
2. In a separate bowl, mix the sugar and baking powder until well combined.
3. Add the wet ingredients (egg mixture and milk) to the dry ingredients (sugar and baking powder) and mix until a smooth dough forms.
4. If desired, add cranberries to the dough for extra flavor and color.
5. Preheat your steamer or a pot with water.
6. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to your desired thickness and shape.
7. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
8. Place the shaped dough on a steamer or a baking sheet lined with parchment paper, and steam for about 15-20 minutes or until the buns are cooked through and slightly golden.
9. Allow the buns to cool for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Blooming Flowers Strawberry Steamed Buns!

9b2eec25f7.gt:
Wash the cabbage well, remove the core, and chop roughly.
Try to use very fresh, raw beef offal!
Blanch the beef offal by dipping it in boiling water and then putting it in ice water.
Cut the Chinese chives into 5 cm pieces.
Remove the center of the garlic and slice the cloves.
Cut the grilled tofu into 12 equal pieces.
Remove the seeds from the red chili pepper.
Add all ingredients except for the Chinese chives and sesame oil.
Simmer and skim off scum.
If using chicken stock, add 1.5 tablespoons now.
When the cabbage is cooked, add the Chinese chives and the sesame oil.
Cutting the red chili pepper into very fine pieces will increase the spiciness.
As soon as the Chinese chives are heated, sprinkle on the sesame seeds and it's all done!
Eat with the soup and enjoy!
Make ramen for the "shime" at the end of the meal.
Cook fresh noodles in boiling water for 1 minute and then add to the hot pot soup.
Simmer for 3 minutes and the noodles are done.
Refer tofor the chicken stock.
9b2eec25f7.pred:
[INST]
To create a delicious Hakata Specialty Soy Sauce Based Motsu Hot Pot, follow these steps:
1. Clean and chop the beef offal into bite-sized pieces.
2. Cut the cabbage into bite-sized pieces and remove the core.
3. Chop the Chinese chives into thin strips.
4. Cut the grilled tofu into bite-sized pieces.
5. Crush the sesame seeds and set aside.
6. In a large pot, combine the beef offal, cabbage, Chinese chives, and grilled tofu.
7. Pour in the chicken stock and bring the mixture to a boil.
8. Reduce the heat and let the ingredients simmer for about 30 minutes or until the beef is tender.
9. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, mirin, sugar, and red chili pepper.
10. Pour the sauce mixture over the simmering ingredients and stir to combine.
11. Cook for an additional 10 minutes or until the sauce has thickened and the flavors have melded together.
12. Serve the Hakata Specialty Soy Sauce Based Motsu Hot Pot over ramen or chanpon noodles.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

f545630e3c.gt:
Combine cracker crumbs and taco seasoning, stirring well.
Roll chicken in cracker crumbs and place in a greased 13x9 baking dish.
Saute green onions in butter in a skillet until tender.
Stir in whipping cream and remaining ingredients.
Pour over chicken.
Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.
f545630e3c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the Cheddar Cheese Crackers, Taco Seasoning, and green onions.
3. Dip the chicken breasts in the melted butter, then coat them with the cheese and taco seasoning mixture.
4. Place the chicken breasts on a baking sheet, and bake for 30-35 minutes or until cooked through.
5. While the chicken is baking, heat the whipping cream in a saucepan over medium heat.
6. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. In a small bowl, mix the Monterey Jack cheese and chicken bouillon granules.
8. Add the whipping cream to the cheese mixture, stirring until smooth.
9. Place the cooked chicken breasts on a serving platter, and pour the cheese sauce over them.
10. Serve immediately and enjoy your mouthwatering Farmers Favorite Fiesta Chicken dish!

6a3e3c9a3b.gt:
Soften butter, add sugar and eggs, stir till creamy.
Sift flour, baking powder and salt.
Fold dry ingredients into creamy mixture.
Blend in almonds, raisins, lemon.
Add needed milk.
Pour into greased cake form/angel food cake pan.
Bake at 350 F for 30 to 40 minutes.
Remove from oven and cool.
If you wish to add a glaze use recipe below.
To create a glaze, combine 3 cups of powdered sugar, 3/4 cup of milk, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, and the zest (grated skin) of 1 orange in a large bowl.
Drizzle glaze on top of Gugelhopf and enjoy!
6a3e3c9a3b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt.
3. Add the milk, melted butter, lemon juice, and zest. Mix until a smooth dough forms.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it is smooth and elastic.
5. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and let it rest for 30 minutes.
6. After the dough has rested, roll it out on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.5 cm).
7. Cut the dough into rounds using a cookie cutter or a round glass.
8. Place the rounds on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the Gugelhopf for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
10. Allow the Gugelhopf to cool for a few minutes on the baking sheet, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.
11. While the Gugelhopf are cooling, prepare the filling by combining the raisins, almonds, and lemon zest in a bowl.
12. Once the Gugelhopf are cooled, poke a few holes in the top of each one using a skewer or a toothpick.
13. Carefully spoon the filling into the holes in the Gugelhopf.
14. Bake the Gugelhopf in a preheated oven at 350°F (180°C) for 20-25 minutes, or until the filling is bubbly and the Gugelhopf are golden brown.
15. Allow the Gugelhopf to cool for a few minutes on a wire rack, then transfer them to a serving plate.

Enjoy your delicious Gugelhopf!

4ecdf46b58.gt:
Heat frying pan and fry bacon until lightly browned
Spoon baked beans onto base of muffin halves, top with cooked bacon and squirt tomato sauce on bacon if you wish and top each muffin with cheese
Place muffins under grill and cook for a few minutes until cheese has melted
4ecdf46b58.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Spread one half of each English muffin with a thin layer of butter.
3. Place the English muffin halves, buttered side up, on a baking sheet.
4. Place the tin of baked beans in ham sauce on top of the English muffin halves.
5. Top each English muffin half with a slice of bacon.
6. Place the other half of each English muffin on top of the bacon.
7. Sprinkle each English muffin half with a slice of cheddar cheese.
8. Drizzle each English muffin half with a squirt of tomato sauce.
9. Bake the English Muffin Melts in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Remove the English Muffin Melts from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

0af8036e1e.gt:
Grease an 11 x 7-inch-inch baking pan.
Set oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, beat 1 cup sugar and the shortening with an electric mixer on medium or high speed until well mixed.
Add in eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition, then add in orange extract.
In a small bowl mix together flour, baking soda and salt.
Add flour mixture and buttermilk alternately to egg mixture, beating on low speed after each addition JUST until combined.
By hand stir in the orange peel, raisins and nuts.
Transfer and spread the batter into prepared baking pan.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean.
Stir together 1/3 cup sugar and the orange juice; gradually pour over the baked cake.
Cool in pan on a wire rack for 30 minutes.
Serve warm, or cool completely.
0af8036e1e.pred:
To cook a delightful Orange Snack Cake, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, shortening, eggs, and vanilla extract.
3. In a separate bowl, mix together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
4. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the buttermilk, and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the chopped raisins and nuts.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

This Orange Snack Cake is a delicious and easy-to-make dessert that combines the sweetness of the sugar and shortening with the tangy flavor of the orange extract and zest. The raisins and nuts add a delightful crunch and extra flavor, making it a perfect treat for any occasion.

cf03193597.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F Lightly grease two baking sheets or cover them with parchment paper.
In a medium-sized bowl, mix well oats, coconut, flour, and sugar.
Mix in butter and honey.
In a small bowl, mix boiling water and baking soda together and add to the flour mixture.
Drop rounded teaspoonfuls of dough 3 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes, until crisp and golden brown.
Cool on the baking sheet for 30 seconds.
Loosen with a thin spatula and cool on wire racks.
If the cookies stick to the sheet, return to the oven for 1 minute, then loosen with a spatula.
When cool, store in an airtight container.
cf03193597.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. Combine the rolled oats, coconut, flour, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, alternating with the boiling water, mixing well after each addition.
6. Stir in the honey or corn syrup.
7. Drop the dough by rounded teaspoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the cookies are set.
9. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

d6c22c19dd.gt:
Cut your brownies up into square bite size pieces and put a single layer of the brownies in the container you want to use.
It can be single serving or in a big truffle dish.
Whip your cream to stiff peaks and then fold in powder sugar.
Making sure it's combined.
Spoon or put in the whipped cream in pastry bag and put the whipped cream top of the brownies.
Then, drizzle the caramel on top and drizzle the chocolate fudge in a pastry bag or zip lock bag and cutting a end on it and top the brownie sundae with cherry.
Enjoy.
d6c22c19dd.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the ingredients for the brownies: melted butter, sugar, eggs, cocoa powder, flour, baking powder, and salt. Mix until well combined.
3. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
4. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownies comes out clean.
5. Allow the brownies to cool completely before cutting them into squares.

1. In a mixing bowl, whip the heavy cream until it reaches the desired consistency for the whipped cream.
2. In a small bowl, mix the powdered sugar and vanilla extract.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the cherries and chocolate fudge.
4. In a small saucepan, heat the caramel ice cream topping over low heat, stirring constantly, until it reaches the desired consistency.

1. To assemble the sundae, place a square of brownie on a plate.
2. Spread a layer of whipped cream on top of the brownie.
3. Add a dollop of caramel ice cream topping on top of the whipped cream.
4. Garnish with a cherry on top.
5. Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious Brownie sundae.

[/INST]

0524637e4d.gt:
Don't peel the potatoes.
Just wash if needed.
Then cut in to medium dice.
Put in pan with enough water to cover.
Add the amount of salt for your taste.
Bring to the boil.
Cook until tender, but not mushy.
Cool a little.
While the potatoes are cooking mix all the other ingredients for the dressing together in a bowl or jug.
You may want to add more or less milk to the dressing, depending how thick or thin you want to coat the potatoes.
0524637e4d.pred:
1. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into bite-sized pieces.
2. In a large bowl, combine the potatoes, salt, and red onion.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the mayonnaise, yogurt, whole grain honey mustard, and milk.
4. Pour the dressing mixture over the potatoes and onion, and toss to coat evenly.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Serve the salad chilled or at room temperature.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
The Whole Grain Honey Mustard Potato Salad is now ready to be served. Enjoy!
<</SYS>>

[/INST]

84cd401629.gt:
Roast the poblano peppers direct in the stove until the skin turns black, be careful not to burn the pepper.
Put the roast poblano peppers into a plastic bag and top with a cloth, wait 10 minutes.
Put oil on your hands and peel the poblano peppers.
With a thin knife carefully opened vertically and cut the base of the seeds, remove seeds and wash if necessary.
Fill poblano peppers with cheese.
Heat the oil in an 1 inch pan and stir the garlic, add the rice, stir for 2 minutes until rices start move and stick together, add 1 1/2 cup of water, put the poultry seasoning and the salt move carefully.
place the poblano peppers on the pan.
Turn heat to low.
cover and let cook until water is absorbed.
Add 1 cup of water, wait until water gone and taste the rice.
84cd401629.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cut the peppers into 1-inch (2.5 cm) pieces and remove the seeds and membranes.
3. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the rice to the skillet and stir to combine with the garlic and oil. Cook for 2 minutes, until the rice is slightly toasted.
5. Add the water to the skillet and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the water is absorbed.
6. Remove the skillet from the heat and let it sit, covered, for 5 minutes.
7. In a small bowl, mix the poultry seasoning and salt.
8. Add the seasoning mixture to the skillet, stirring to combine.
9. Add the mozzarella cheese to the skillet and stir to combine.
10. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Serve the Poblano Peppers Rice hot.

[/INST]

dbe7c0f305.gt:
Bring water to a boil.
Add the salt.
Gradually whisk in cornmeal, then reduce to low heat and cook until thick and tender (about 15 minutes).
Remove from heat and stir in the parmesan, milk, butter, herbs, and pepper.
dbe7c0f305.pred:
[/INST]

To prepare Parmesan and Herb Polenta, follow these steps:

1. In a large saucepan, combine the 6 cups of water, 2 teaspoons of salt, and the yellow cornmeal. Bring the mixture to a boil, stirring constantly.

2. Reduce the heat to low and simmer the polenta for about 25-30 minutes, or until the cornmeal is tender and the mixture has thickened.

3. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the grated Parmesan cheese, whole milk, and melted butter. Stir until the cheese is melted and the polenta is smooth.

4. Stir in the chopped Italian parsley, rosemary, thyme, and pepper. Season with additional salt and pepper, if needed.

5. Serve the Parmesan and Herb Polenta immediately, or let it cool and then refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Parmesan and Herb Polenta!

1bcf4a39d5.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Press pie crust into a 9-inch deep dish pie plate.
Cover the edges of the crust with aluminum foil.
Bake pie crust until lightly browned, about 12 minutes.
Set pie crust aside to cool.
Increase oven heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Cook bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat until crisp, about 10 minutes.
Drain the bacon slices on paper towels, while retaining drippings in the skillet.
Stir zucchini, mushrooms, onion, and garlic into the reserved bacon drippings; season with Italian seasoning, dill, parsley, garlic salt, and black pepper.
Cook and stir the zucchini mixture until the zucchini is tender yet crisp, 5 to 7 minutes; remove from heat.
Chop the bacon and stir through the zucchini mixture.
Sprinkle about half the mozzarella cheese into the bottom of the pie crust.
Spoon zucchini mixture over the mozzarella cheese layer.
Pour eggs over the zucchini mixture; top with remaining mozzarella cheese.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over the mozzarella cheese.
Put pie plate onto a baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven until the top begins to brown, about 30 minutes.
1bcf4a39d5.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove the bacon from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, cook the sliced onion and minced garlic until softened.
4. Add the zucchini and mushrooms to the skillet and cook until the vegetables are tender.
5. Season the vegetables with Italian seasoning, dill weed, parsley, garlic salt, and black pepper.
6. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked vegetables, shredded mozzarella cheese, and beaten eggs.
7. Pour the mixture into the prepared pie crust.
8. Bake the pie in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the filling is set and the crust is golden brown.
9. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
10. Sprinkle grated Parmesan cheese on top of the pie.
11. Cut the pie into wedges and serve.

[/INST]

2a17a3e2d2.gt:
In a large bowl, combine tomatoes, cucumber, green onion, yellow pepper, parsley, and basil.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, ground black pepper, and garlic.
Pour lemon juice mixture over the tomato mixture, and toss to coat.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Place bread cubes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Bake for 12 minutes, or until toasted and dry.
Toss bread cubes with tomato mixture, and serve.
2a17a3e2d2.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chopped tomato, cucumber, green onions, sweet yellow pepper, parsley, basil leaves, lemon juice, olive oil, and minced garlic. Mix well.
3. Season the mixture with ground black pepper to taste.
4. Transfer the mixture to a large baking dish or roasting pan.
5. Bake the Panzanella in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the vegetables are tender.
6. Remove the Panzanella from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Serve the Panzanella warm or at room temperature, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

9168e15a37.gt:
Heat 3 tablespoons of the olive oil in a heavy soup pot or Dutch oven over medium heat, and add the onions.
Cook, stirring, until very tender, about eight minutes.
Add a pinch of salt and the garlic, and stir for another minute or so until fragrant.
Stir in the tomatoes, with their liquid, and bring to a simmer.
Simmer about eight minutes until cooked down and fragrant, and add the cauliflower to the pot.
Stir together, and add the bay leaf, rosemary, pepper, dissolved tomato paste and wine.
Bring to a simmer, and add salt to taste.
Cover, reduce the heat and simmer 30 to 40 minutes until the cauliflower is very tender.
Stir in the olives and vinegar if using, and adjust salt and pepper.
Remove from the heat, and stir in the remaining olive oil.
Serve hot or warm.
9168e15a37.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large oven-safe pot or Dutch oven, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant but not browned.
4. Add the sliced red onions and cook for about 5 minutes, until they are softened and slightly caramelized.
5. Add the chopped tomatoes, bay leaf, rosemary sprig, and a pinch of salt. Cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the tomatoes are softened and slightly broken down.
6. Add the cauliflower florets and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they are tender but still retain their shape.
7. Add the dissolved tomato paste and water, stirring to combine.
8. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then cover the pot and transfer it to the preheated oven.
9. Cook for about 30-40 minutes, or until the cauliflower is tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
10. Remove the pot from the oven and let it sit for a few minutes.
11. Stir in the kalamata olives and sherry vinegar or balsamic vinegar, if using.
12. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
13. Serve the Stewed Cauliflower With Red Onions and Tomatoes hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

[/INST]

fe6115c71a.gt:
Cut the avocado and tuna into bite-sized chunks.
Combine the listed ingredients from the nameko mushrooms to the wasabi.
Pour the mixture on top of the avocado and tuna.
This is exactly what the dish looks like when you order it in a restaurant.
It's also great with thinly sliced cucumber.
fe6115c71a.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the Nameko mushrooms, vegetable oil, and wasabi. Set aside.
3. In a large bowl, combine the sushi grade tuna, avocado, and soy sauce. Mix well.
4. Spread the mushroom mixture evenly over the tuna and avocado mixture.
5. Place the tuna and avocado mixture in a baking dish.
6. Drizzle the vegetable oil over the top of the mixture.
7. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the tuna is cooked through and the mushrooms are tender.
8. Serve the Raw Tuna & Avocado with Nameko Mushrooms and Soy Sauce immediately. Enjoy!

24c12168e6.gt:
Insert wooden craft sticks or lollipop sticks into the cores of the apples at the stem.
Place the roasted peanuts and candies on separate plates.
Set aside.
Place the chocolate into a metal or glass bowl and set over a pan of barely simmering water.
Stir frequently until melted.
Remove from the heat.
Dip apples into the melted chocolate, turning to coat completely.
Dip or roll in candy or nuts, then place on a sheet of waxed paper.
Repeat with remaining apples.
Allow apples to set at room temperature until the chocolate is firm, about 20 minutes, before serving.
24c12168e6.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Wash and dry the apples thoroughly.
3. Core the apples and slice them into 1/4-inch (0.6 cm) thick pieces.
4. In a small bowl, mix the chopped roasted peanuts and candy-coated milk chocolate candies.
5. Melt the semisweet chocolate in a heat-resistant bowl set over a saucepan of simmering water, stirring occasionally.
6. Carefully dip the apple slices into the melted chocolate, allowing the excess to drain off.
7. Immediately roll the dipped apple slices in the peanut-chocolate mixture to coat them evenly.
8. Place the coated apples on a parchment-lined baking sheet and refrigerate for about 15-20 minutes to set the chocolate.
9. Remove the apples from the refrigerator and transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate Dipped Apples dish!

97bb525c81.gt:
Heat 6 tablespoons olive oil in heavy large skillet over medium heat.
Add onions and saute until deep golden brown, about 20 minutes; sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Transfer onions to large bowl; mix in prunes, dates, apricots, sugar, and cinnamon.
Do ahead Can be made 1 day ahead.
Cover and chill.
Preheat oven to 350F Spread fruit mixture over bottom of large roasting pan.
Tuck chicken wing tips under.
Rub each chicken with 1/2 tablespoon remaining olive oil and 1/2 teaspoon turmeric.
Sprinkle each with salt and pepper; place chickens, side by side, atop fruit mixture.
Pour 11/2 cups water around chickens.
Roast chickens 1 hour.
Turn pan around; add more water to fruit mixture by 1/4 cupfuls if beginning to dry.
Continue to roast chickens until brown and juices run clear when thigh is pierced, about 45 minutes.
Transfer chickens to carving board; let stand 10 minutes.
Spoon fruit onto platter; top with chickens and any accumulated juices.
Sprinkle with almonds and serve.
97bb525c81.pred:
To make Roast Chicken With Dried Fruit and Almonds, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. In a large bowl, combine the 7 tablespoons of olive oil, 1 teaspoon of ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon of turmeric, and 3 tablespoons of sugar. Mix well.

3. Season the chickens with salt and pepper. Then, place the chickens in the bowl with the olive oil mixture, and make sure they are evenly coated.

4. In a large roasting pan, combine the onions, pitted prunes, dates, and dried apricot halves. Add the water, and season with the remaining 1 teaspoon of ground cinnamon and 1/2 teaspoon of turmeric.

5. Place the chickens on top of the vegetables in the roasting pan.

6. Roast the chickens in the preheated oven for about 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).

7. Remove the chickens from the oven, and let them rest for about 15 minutes before carving and serving.

8. While the chickens are resting, you can toast the almonds in a dry skillet over medium heat.

9. Once the chickens are rested, carve them into pieces, and serve them with the roasted vegetables and toasted almonds.

Enjoy your delicious Roast Chicken With Dried Fruit and Almonds!

a5230cef43.gt:
With and Electric mixer, beat butter & Icing sugar until it stands up like egg whites.
In a seperate medium bowl, combine flour and corn starch.
Add slowly to butter and icing sugar mixture.
(I find when your mixer starts to power out, then use a wooden spoon to take over, but please try to use the mixer as long as possible).
Drop from teaspoon onto cookie sheet about 2 inches apart.
