Spread about 1 tsp pesto down center of each thigh, leaving a 1/4-inch border on short ends.
Starting at a short end, roll each thigh up with pesto inside and secure with a toothpick.
Arrange rolls 1/2 inch apart, seam sides down, in a 13 x 9-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray.
Bake at 375 until a cooking thermometer registers 170 (about 30 minutes), turning rolls after 15 minutes.
IMPORTANT: Cool, transfer to a covered container and refrigerate overnight.
Remove toothpicks and cut each roll crosswise into 1/4-inch-thick slices.
592c968c3a.pred:
To make a delicious Pesto Chicken Spirals dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the nonstick cooking spray over medium-high heat. Add the chicken thighs and cook until browned on both sides, about 4-5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the extra virgin olive oil and sauté the garlic cloves until fragrant.
4. Add the basil leaves and parsley to the skillet, and sauté until the basil leaves are wilted and the parsley is slightly crispy.
5. Add the crumbled parmesan cheese to the skillet and stir until the cheese is melted and the flavors are combined.
6. Add the reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth to the skillet, stirring to combine.
7. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Return the cooked chicken thighs to the skillet and toss to coat them evenly with the pesto sauce.
9. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly thickened.
10. Serve the Pesto Chicken Spirals hot, garnished with additional parsley if desired. Enjoy your delicious homemade dish!

0039c547a7.gt:
Firstly cook some rice.
Dice the onion and garlic into small pieces.
Chop all other vegetables and chicken into about 2cm cubes.
Soak the chopped eggplant in a bowl of water for a while.
Put olive oil into a pot and brown the garlic and onion.
Then add in the chicken and saute until it turns color.
Add other vegetables and saute well.
Put in the curry powder, cinnamon powder, bay leaf and salt once all food has cooked through.
Add one cup of water into the pot and cook for about 10 min on medium heat.
When it starts to boil, turn to low heat and keep cooking for about 15 min with the lid on, stirring occasionally.
Finally, pour in the coconut milk while mixing gently.
Add more seasoning if needed.
Serve the curry on the cooked rice, and add mint leaves for a nice finishing touch.
Enjoy.
0039c547a7.pred:
To make a delicious Coconut Milk Curry dish, follow these steps:
1. Heat oil in a large pan or wok over medium heat.
2. Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides.
3. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
4. In the same pan, add the eggplant, carrot, onion, and pumpkin/kabocha squash. Cook until the vegetables are tender but still slightly crunchy.
5. Add the garlic and curry powder, stirring to combine.
6. Add the chicken back to the pan and stir to combine.
7. Pour in the coconut milk and bring the mixture to a simmer.
8. Add the cinnamon powder, bay leaf, and salt. Stir to combine.
9. Reduce the heat to low and let the curry simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
10. Remove the bay leaf and serve the Coconut Milk Curry over rice or with your preferred side dish.

[/INST]

cab917403f.gt:
Mix all ingredients together and place in a clean jar with a tight lid.
Use 2 T.
per pound of meat.
cab917403f.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 14 cups of instant minced onion, 3 tablespoons of chili powder, 2 tablespoons of cumin, 1 teaspoon of salt, 2 teaspoons of red pepper flakes, 1 tablespoon of cornstarch, and 12 teaspoons of garlic powder.
3. Mix the ingredients together until well combined.
4. Add 2 teaspoons of oregano to the mixture, and mix until well combined.
5. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet or a silicone mat, making sure it is not too thick or too thin.
6. Bake the seasoning mix in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until it is slightly crispy and fragrant.
7. Remove the seasoning mix from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Once the seasoning mix has cooled, store it in an airtight container or a jar for later use.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

364e4fdc52.gt:
Melt butter, add flour, salt, and pepper, wisk until smooth.
Add milk slowly, whisking to blend.
Cook until thick and smooth, add cheese and stir until melted.
Cook elbow noodles as directed on package.
Drain and pour into a baking dish.
Pour cheese sauce over cooked elbows.
Bake at 350F for 15 minutes or until lightly browned.
*It's best to use a double boiler or nonstick pan to make your cheese sauce.
364e4fdc52.pred:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the elbow macaroni and cook according to the package instructions until al dente.
2. In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Whisk in the flour and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly.
3. Gradually add the milk, whisking constantly to prevent lumps. Cook the mixture over medium heat until it thickens and bubbles.
4. Reduce the heat to low and stir in the American cheese, a few pieces at a time, until melted and smooth.
5. Drain the cooked macaroni and add it to the cheese sauce. Stir to combine, then season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Transfer the macaroni and cheese to a serving dish and serve immediately.

[/INST]

fbc4ea771e.gt:
Make Cacik: In a mixing bowl, combine cucumbers and garlic.
Add salt to taste.
Mix in yogurt with wooden spoon.
Transfer to serving bowl.
Garnish with mint and drizzle olive oil on top.
Serve immediately or cover and refrigerate.
Prepare skewers by spraying a light coat of cooking oil to prevent sticking.
Place lamb and vegetables on skewers.
Grill spicy lamb kebabs for about 5-7 minutes on each side or until desired doneness.
Serve with hummus, baba ghannouj, or turkish cacik, a cucumber yogurt sauce for dipping.
fbc4ea771e.pred:
1. Preheat the grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, mix the lamb, green peppers, cherry tomatoes, onions, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, cumin, turmeric, red pepper, and salt.
3. Shape the lamb mixture into small, evenly-sized kabobs by pressing the mixture into the center of each piece of lamb.
4. Grill the kabobs for about 10-15 minutes, or until the lamb is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
5. While the kabobs are cooking, prepare the cacik by combining the cucumbers, yogurt, garlic, mint, and salt in a bowl.
6. Once the kabobs are cooked, remove them from the grill and let them rest for a few minutes.
7. Serve the cooked kabobs with a dollop of cacik on the side.

Enjoy your Spicy Lamb Kabobs With Turkish Cacik!

eb0fd599e7.gt:
Mix together all dry ingredients, then add the wet ingredients gradually and stir in until the consistency is like that of smooth thick cream
Heat a lightly oiled frying pan and spoon the batter in ladlefulls
Cook until bubbles form then start to pop then flip over and lightly brown the other side
You can change the vanilla for any other flavouring you like such as strawberry, add some cocoa powder and some orange essence for chocolate orange, add blueberries or chocolate chips to the batter, the possibilities are endless!
eb0fd599e7.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat your oven to 175°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, bicarb, cream of tartar, and sugar.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, rice, potato or corn starch, and vanilla extract.
4. Gradually pour the wet mixture into the dry mixture, stirring until smooth and free of lumps.
5. Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat.
6. Pour a small amount of batter onto the pan, spreading it out to form a thin, even layer. Cook until the edges start to curl and the pancake is golden brown, then flip it and cook the other side.
7. Repeat with the remaining batter, stacking the cooked pancakes on a plate or serving them immediately.
8. Serve the pancakes with your desired toppings, such as fruit, maple syrup, or whipped cream.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare delicious and fluffy Vickys Vegan Scotch Pancakes.

b12f641798.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F with rack in middle.
Pat beef dry and season with 2 1/2 teaspoons salt and 1 teaspoon pepper.
Heat oil in pot over medium-high heat until it shimmers, then brown meat, without crowding, in 3 batches, turning, about 8 minutes per batch.
Transfer to a platter.
Reduce heat to medium, then add carrots, celery, onions, and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until well browned, about 12 minutes.
Push vegetables to one side of pot.
Add tomato paste to cleared area and cook paste, stirring, 2 minutes, then stir into vegetables.
Add vinegar and cook, stirring, 2 minutes.
Stir in wine, bay leaves, and thyme and boil until wine is reduced by about two thirds, 10 to 12 minutes.
Add broth to pot along with water, beef, and any juices from platter and bring to a simmer.
Cover and braise in oven until meat is very tender, about 2 1/2 hours.
Set a large colander in a large bowl.
Pour stew into colander.
Return pieces of meat to pot, then discard remaining solids.
Let cooking liquid stand 10 minutes.
While beef braises, peel potatoes and cut into 1/2-inch-wide wedges.
Slice carrots diagonally (1-inch).
Add potatoes and carrots to stew (make sure they are submerged) and simmer, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until potatoes and carrots are tender, about 40 minutes.
b12f641798.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large, heavy pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the beef and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the beef from the pot and set aside.
3. In the same pot, add the onions, celery, and carrots. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute more.
5. Add the tomato paste, balsamic vinegar, and wine to the pot. Stir to combine, then bring the mixture to a simmer.
6. Add the beef back to the pot, along with the bay leaves, thyme, and broth. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then cover the pot and transfer it to the preheated oven.
7. Cook the stew in the oven for 2-3 hours, or until the beef is tender and the vegetables are cooked through.
8. Remove the pot from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Carefully transfer the stew to a large serving bowl, discarding the bay leaves and thyme.
10. Serve the Beef Stew with Potatoes and Carrots hot, garnished with crusty bread.

[/INST]

9fd9690bf2.gt:
1.
Mix all ingredients together.
2.
Cook in a greased 9 springform pan at 400 degrees F for 3035 minutes, or until cooked in the center.
3.
Cool and cut into wedges.
9fd9690bf2.pred:
To cook a delightful Easy Corn Bread dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Jiffy Corn Muffin Mix, Creamed Corn, and Milk. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the eggs and grated Cheddar Cheese to the mixture. Mix until well combined.
4. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
5. Bake the corn bread for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
6. Remove the corn bread from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

This Easy Corn Bread dish is a delicious and satisfying side dish or snack, perfect for any meal. The combination of corn muffin mix, creamed corn, milk, eggs, and cheese creates a flavorful and moist texture that everyone will enjoy.

db70371f36.gt:
Sprinkle gelatin over juice in a small heatproof cup and let stand 1 minute to soften.
Puree mangoes with sugar in a blender until very smooth and force through a sieve into a large bowl.
Melt softened gelatin in cup in a pan of simmering water or in a microwave and stir into puree.
Beat cream with an electric mixer until it just holds stiff peaks and gently fold into puree.
Chill fool, covered, at least 8 hours.
db70371f36.pred:
1. Prepare the mangoes: Rinse the mangoes and remove the pit. Coarsely chop the mango flesh.
2. Prepare the gelatin: In a small bowl, combine the gelatin and lime juice. Allow the gelatin to bloom for a few minutes.
3. Prepare the straws: In a small saucepan, combine the sugar, anise seeds, and water. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the sugar has dissolved. Remove from heat and let the mixture cool slightly.
4. Prepare the mango mixture: In a blender, combine the mango chunks, sugar, and lime juice. Blend until smooth.
5. Prepare the chocolate-anise straws: Stir the cooled sugar mixture into the melted chocolate.
6. Assemble the dessert: Carefully pour the mango mixture into the mold, ensuring it is evenly distributed. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
7. Remove the mold from the refrigerator and carefully unmold the dessert onto a serving plate.
8. Garnish with Chocolate-Anise Straws: Using a small spoon, drizzle the chocolate-anise mixture over the dessert, creating a decorative pattern.

Enjoy your delicious Mango Fools with Chocolate-Anise Straws!

4256f1a9b2.gt:
Preheat oven to 300.
Prepare some boiling water.
In a saucepan over medium heat, combine cream, banana puree and 2 T. sugar.
Cook, stirring occasionally until small bubbles appear around edges of pan.
Set aside.
In a bowl, beat egg yolks and vanilla until smooth and light.
Pour hot cream mixture into egg yolks, a little at a time, beating continuously until well blended.
Strain mixture through a fine sieve into a bowl.
Divide mixture among 4 ramekins.
Arrange ramekins in a baking pan and place on middle shelf of preheated oven.
Fill pan with boiling water to halfway up sides of ramekins.
Cover pan loosely with aluminum foil.
Bake until custard is just set, about 25 minutes.
(this took an additional 9 minutes for mine, as I have deeper ramekins) Chill 2-3 hours.
Slice bananas horizontally into 1/2" slices and arrange on top of chilled creme brulees.
Sprinkle remaining sugar over tops of bananas.
With cooking torch, move flame econtinuously over the surface of the ramekins, in a circular motion until sugar melts and becomes golden brown and bubbly.
(this is where I failed.
I was afraid to add the entire 1/3 cup sugar, so didn't get enough carmelized effect) Serve immediately.
4256f1a9b2.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the heavy cream, banana puree, sugar, and vanilla extract until smooth.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg yolks until they are light and fluffy.
4. Gradually pour the whisked egg yolks into the cream mixture, stirring gently to combine.
5. Pour the mixture into a 9-inch (23cm) round baking dish that has been greased or lined with parchment paper.
6. Bake the Banana Creme Brulee in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until the center is set and the edges are slightly jiggly.
7. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for about 10-15 minutes.
8. Carefully run a knife around the edge of the baking dish to loosen the Creme Brulee, then invert the dish onto a plate.
9. Sprinkle the top of the Creme Brulee with a pinch of sugar, if desired, and use a kitchen torch or under the broiler to caramelize the sugar. This will create a delightful crunchy topping.
10. Serve the Banana Creme Brulee immediately, and enjoy!

[/INST]

27d1b89ffe.gt:
For the dressing: In a small bowl, add Greek yogurt, barbecue sauce, ranch seasoning and milk.
Mix until combined; refrigerate until ready to use.
For the salad: Divide romaine lettuce, corn, black beans, tomato, cucumber, avocado and chicken among plates.
Top with barbecue ranch dressing.
27d1b89ffe.pred:
1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, combine the cooked chicken, Greek yogurt, barbecue sauce, and seasoning packet. Mix well to combine.
3. Add the shredded romaine lettuce, corn, black beans, diced tomatoes, cucumber, and avocado to the bowl. Mix gently to combine.
4. If desired, add a splash of milk to the salad to thin out the dressing.
5. Grill the salad ingredients for about 5-7 minutes, until the corn is cooked through and the chicken is slightly charred.
6. In a small bowl, whisk together the ranch dressing ingredients.
7. Serve the BBQ Chicken Salad on a plate, and drizzle the BBQ Ranch dressing over the top.

Enjoy your delicious BBQ Chicken Salad with BBQ Ranch Dressing!

daa0bc21ff.gt:
Preheat oven to 350
Mix cake mix as directed on box.grease and flour pan.
Pour batter into pan.13 x 9 " cake pan.
Mix other 3 ing.
Creme well.swirl cheese in cake.
Top with rest of chips
Bake 350 for about 25 to 35 min.
daa0bc21ff.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease and flour an 8-inch square baking pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cake mix, granulated sugar, and chocolate chips.
4. Add the egg and creme cheese, and mix until well combined.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared baking pan.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownies comes out clean.
7. Allow the brownies to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once cooled, cut the brownies into squares and enjoy!

These delicious Creme cheese brownies are a perfect treat for any occasion, and the combination of chocolate and cream cheese creates a rich and indulgent dessert.

3bcbe8be61.gt:
Directions
1.
Clean blueberries and place in a stainless steel pan over medium heat.
2.
Add sugar.
3.
Bring to rolling boil, stirring constantly, and then bring heat down to low.
4.
Cook on low for five minutes or until blueberries are mostly liquid (there will be some remaining chunks of blueberries).
5.
Remove from heat, pour mixture into a bowl and place in fridge until cool (about 1 hour).
6.
Remove blueberry mixture from fridge, mix in creme fraiche.
7.
Pour blueberry creme fraiche mixture into ice cream maker, following machine instructions.
If you dont have an ice cream maker (I borrowed my friend Annes) then follow David Lebovitzs instructions for making ice cream without a machine.
3bcbe8be61.pred:
1. Wash and pick the fresh blueberries, making sure to remove any stems or leaves.
2. In a medium saucepan, combine the blueberries, sugar, and 1/2 cup of water. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the blueberries are soft and the sugar has dissolved.
3. Remove the saucepan from the heat and allow the mixture to cool for a few minutes.
4. Transfer the cooled blueberry mixture to a blender or food processor, and blend until smooth.
5. Add the Creme Fraiche to the blender, and blend until the ice cream reaches the desired consistency.
6. Pour the ice cream mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
7. Once the ice cream is fully churned, transfer it to an airtight container and place it in the freezer to harden for at least 2 hours or overnight.
8. Once the ice cream is fully hardened, scoop it into bowls and serve immediately.

This Blueberry and Creme Fraiche Ice Cream dish is a delicious and refreshing treat that combines the natural sweetness of blueberries with the rich, creamy flavor of Creme Fraiche. The ice cream is smooth and creamy, with a subtle tanginess from the Creme Fraiche, making it a delightful dessert or snack.

f12ad1f38c.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
2.
Make the cheese mixture: mix the cottage cheese, mozzarella, parmesan, basil, oregano, and lemon pepper seasoning together.
3.
Slice the chicken in half lengthwise to create a pocket.
4.
Fill the chicken with the cheese mixture and place into a greased baking dish.
5.
Brush the tops of the chicken breasts with oil and sprinkle with a bit of salt and pepper.
6.
Bake the chicken for 45-55 minutes, or until cooked through and no longer pink.
7.
The cheese mixture will likely have melted a bit from inside the chicken, but just scoop it up and place on a serving plate.
8.
Top the chicken with pasta sauce of your choice.
I usually make my own sauce, but any favorite sauce will work!
f12ad1f38c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cottage cheese, shredded mozzarella, grated Parmesan, dried basil, dried oregano, lemon pepper seasoning, and olive oil. Mix well.
4. Place the seasoned chicken breasts in the bowl with the cottage cheese mixture, and toss to coat evenly.
5. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Place the seasoned chicken breasts on the prepared baking sheet.
6. Bake the chicken breasts in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
7. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
8. While the chicken is baking, cook the pasta according to the package instructions.
9. To assemble the dish, place the cooked pasta on a serving platter or individual plates. Top with the cooked chicken and any remaining cottage cheese mixture.
10. Serve the Triple Cheese Stuffed Chicken and Pasta immediately. Enjoy!

2c940899a2.gt:
Mix all the ingredients.
Form into rice balls, wrap in nori and enjoy!
2c940899a2.pred:
1. Rinse the rice thoroughly in a strainer, and then transfer it to a large bowl.
2. Add the Dashida and sesame oil to the rice, and mix well.
3. Spread the sesame seeds evenly over the rice mixture.
4. Wet your hands with water, and then shape the rice mixture into small, evenly sized balls.
5. Place the Nori seaweed on a flat surface, and place a rice ball on top of each sheet.
6. Fold the Nori seaweed over the rice ball, creating a half-moon shape.
7. Repeat the process for the remaining rice balls.
8. Serve the Onigiri with a bowl of Dashida soup stock, and enjoy!

[/INSTRUCT]

[/SYS]

020aa88369.gt:
Halve dough.
Roll out both to 34cm X 30cm.
Leave to rise for 10 minutes.
Carefully spread each one with 1 TBSP of vegemite, coating all the dough.
Sprinkle the grated cheese over the bases, keeping some for sprinkling on the top.
Roll the dough from the 34cm end loosely til you have a sausage.
Slice into 10 pieces and arrange on baking tray, loosening them up a little.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on the scrolls.
Bake at 200.C for about 20 minutes.
I always check after 10 to see how they are going.
Enjoy!
020aa88369.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Roll out the pizza dough on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch.
3. Spread the vegemite evenly over the dough, leaving a 1-inch border around the edges.
4. Sprinkle the grated cheese evenly over the vegemite.
5. Fold the dough over the cheese and vegemite, creating a half-moon shape.
6. Place the dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the scrolls in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the scrolls cool for a few minutes before slicing them into individual servings.

Enjoy your delicious Ange's Awesome Cheeseymite Scrolls!

064cb6c3cf.gt:
In a large Dutch oven, cook green beans and ham on medium heat with water up just over the beans.
Cook for 20-30 minutes.
Add potatoes and salt, cover and turn heat down to low, cook another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are done when pierced with a fork.
Note: Amount of ham and salt can be adjusted to your taste.
064cb6c3cf.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the diced bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove the bacon from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, cook the diced ham or salt pork over medium heat until browned, then remove and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, cook the green beans until they are tender but still crisp. Season the green beans with salt and pepper.
5. In a large mixing bowl, toss the cooked green beans with the cooked ham or salt pork and the crispy bacon.
6. In a separate mixing bowl, toss the washed new potatoes with the tablespoon of salt.
7. Place the green beans and new potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
8. Roast the green beans and new potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the green beans are crispy.
9. Serve the Homegrown Green Beans and New Potatoes hot.

[/INST]

aa904a4678.gt:
Place your jello shot cups on a cookie sheet (that you know will fit in your fridge).
This will make for easy transport.
Place 2 cups VERY hot water (but not boiling) in a pitcher.
Slowly pour in contents of jello packages while stirring constantly.
Stir until completely mixed (about 2 minutes).
Add in the remaining ingredients and stir well.
Pour into plastic jello shot cups or you can use a 9x13 pan if you don't have the cups.
Chill 4 hours or more until set.
If you are using a cake pan, simply cut the set jello into squares and place on individual cupcake cups for serving.
If you want to get silly, top each one with a small dollop of whip cream just before serving!
aa904a4678.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the two boxes of blue Jello gelatin and the very hot water. Stir until the gelatin is fully dissolved.
2. Add the coconut rum and blue schnapps to the mixture, stirring to combine.
3. Pour the mixture into a large, shallow dish or individual serving cups.
4. Refrigerate the mixture for at least 4 hours or overnight, until it has set.
5. Once the mixture has set, carefully pour the unsweetened pineapple juice over the top, making sure to cover the entire surface.
6. Refrigerate the mixture for an additional 30 minutes or until the pineapple juice has set.
7. Carefully remove the mixture from the refrigerator and place it in the freezer for 15-20 minutes or until the mixture is firm and set.
8. Carefully remove the mixture from the freezer and use a spoon to scoop out small portions of the mixture.
9. Serve the Baja Blue Jello Shots immediately, garnishing them with a pineapple wedge or a sprig of mint if desired.

[/INST]

112e4c6352.gt:
Slice panettone into 1 inch slices; cut each slice into 4 wedges.
In a small bowl, whisk together the mascarpone, orange preserves, and orange juice.
In a separate large bowl, whisk the eggs, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Dip the panettone into the egg mixture, coating well.
Place into the hot oil; fry until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
Serve with the orange mascarpone sauce.
112e4c6352.pred:
To cook a delightful Panettone French Toast With Orange Mascarpone Sauce dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the panettone into slices, and toast them in the oven for about 5-7 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
3. In a large bowl, whisk together the mascarpone cheese, orange juice, and orange marmalade until smooth.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs, ground cinnamon, and nutmeg until well combined.
5. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
6. Dip the toasted panettone slices into the egg mixture, and then coat them in the olive oil.
7. Cook the panettone slices in the skillet until they are golden brown on both sides, and cooked through.
8. Serve the Panettone French Toast with a dollop of Orange Mascarpone Sauce on top.

This dish is a delicious combination of the sweetness of the panettone and the tangy flavors of the orange mascarpone sauce, creating a delightful and indulgent breakfast or brunch option.

99ac5fb3f6.gt:
Mix first 10 ingredients in a bowl.
Take a wonton wrapper and place 1 heaping teaspoon of filling in center.
Moisten edges with water, fold over and press to seal edges.
Add 3 tablespoons of Peanut Oil to a large skillet and saute until the bottoms are golden brown.
When golden brown, add 1/2 cup chicken broth, cover pan and simmer 8 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Reserve broth in a separate bowl and repeat process until all potstickers are cooked.
Keep warm on a plate covered.
99ac5fb3f6.pred:
To prepare Pot Stickers (Chinese Dumplings), follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine the ground pork, chopped green onions, soy sauce, rice wine, sesame oil, minced garlic, beaten egg, cornstarch, salt, and pepper. Mix well to combine all the ingredients.

2. To assemble the dumplings, take one wonton skin and place a small amount of the pork filling in the center. Fold the skin over the filling, creating a half-moon shape. Pinch the edges together to seal the dumpling, and press the edges to create a neat edge. Repeat with the remaining wonton skins and filling.

3. In a large pot or skillet, heat peanut oil over medium heat. Carefully place the dumplings in the pot, being careful not to overcrowd them. Cook the dumplings for about 5-7 minutes, or until they are golden brown on all sides.

4. To cook the dumplings in chicken broth, divide the chicken broth into two portions. In a separate pot, heat one portion of the broth over medium heat. Carefully place the cooked dumplings in the pot with the hot broth, and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the dumplings are fully cooked through.

5. Serve the Pot Stickers hot, garnished with additional chopped green onions if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Pot Stickers!

c2277ff083.gt:
In a large pot, bring the water and salt to a boil; add the lentils, reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 30 minutes or until the lentils are tender but not overcooked; drain.
In a colander, rinse the cooked lentils under cold water until slightly cool, then place them in a bowl.
Whisk together the remaining ingredients; pour over the lentils and combine well.
Chill for 1 to 2 hours and serve cold.
c2277ff083.pred:
1. In a large pot, bring the 8 cups of water to a boil.
2. Add the 2 tablespoons of salt and the 1 lb of dried lentils. Cook the lentils until they are tender but still have a slight bite, which usually takes about 20-25 minutes.
3. While the lentils are cooking, heat the 14 cups of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
4. Add the 14 cups of white wine vinegar to the skillet and stir to combine.
5. Add the 12 teaspoons of dried ground cumin and the 12 teaspoons of dried ground coriander to the skillet. Cook for a few minutes, stirring constantly, to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Gradually add the 1 teaspoon of cayenne pepper to the skillet, stirring constantly to ensure that the spices are evenly distributed.
7. Once the spices are well combined, remove the skillet from the heat and let it cool slightly.
8. Once the lentils are cooked, drain the water and rinse the lentils with cold water.
9. Add the cooked lentils to the skillet with the spicy vinaigrette mixture. Stir gently to combine.
10. Allow the salad to cool for a few minutes before serving.

This delicious Chilled Lentil Salad with Spicy Vinaigrette can be served as a side dish or a main course, depending on the portion size. The combination of the tender lentils, the tangy vinaigrette, and the spicy kick from the cayenne pepper creates a unique and flavorful dish that is perfect for a warm summer day or any time of the year.

e05a7c1c5e.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F.
Stir together salt, allspice, and cayenne.
Pat pork dry and sprinkle spice rub all over pork, pressing to adhere.
Heat oil in a 12-inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown pork, 1 tenderloin at a time, on all sides, about 1 minute each.
Transfer as browned to a large roasting pan and arrange 2 inches apart.
Roast in middle of oven until an instant-read thermometer inserted diagonally 2 inches into center of each tenderloin registers 155F, 20 to 25 minutes.
Let pork stand 5 minutes before slicing.
e05a7c1c5e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the pork tenderloins with the coarse salt, ground allspice, and cayenne.
3. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork tenderloins and cook until browned on all sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
4. Transfer the pork to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
5. While the pork is cooking, prepare the Pineapple-Avocado Salsa.
6. Remove the pork from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
7. Serve the pork with the Pineapple-Avocado Salsa as a side dish.

[/INST]

d069fb1925.gt:
Cut off the stem of the shiitake mushrooms and cut into bite size pieces.
Put water and the seasoning ingredients in a pot and let it boil.
Then, add the shiitake mushrooms, cover with a drop lid, and cook it for about 10 minutes on low heat.
Stir the pot sometimes.
Take off the drop lid when the liquid boils down and remove from the heat when the liquid has almost gone.
When it has cooled down a little, it is done.
You can keep it in the fridge for about 3 days so make some and keep it for bento lunch box.
It will be an extra dish for dinner if you keep some in the fridge.
d069fb1925.pred:
1. Wash the shiitake mushrooms thoroughly under cold running water to remove any dirt or debris.
2. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar.
3. Heat a small saucepan over medium heat. Add the mixture of soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar, stirring to combine.
4. Add the shiitake mushrooms to the saucepan, and cook for about 5 minutes or until the mushrooms are tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
5. Remove the mushrooms from the saucepan, and let them cool for a few minutes.
6. Serve the Salted and Sweetened Shiitake Mushrooms as a side dish or appetizer.

[/INST]

7a20842b45.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large bowl using an electric mixer or stand mixer, beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Add vanilla.
In another bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder and salt.
Add the flour mixture and bananas to the butter mixture in the mixer, alternating between the two.
Line each muffin cup with a paper liner.
Fill each muffin cups about 2/3 full with batter and bake for 17-20 minutes until a tester inserted into a cupcake comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and let cool on a wire rack.
Let cupcakes cool completely before frosting.
For the frosting, using an electric mixer or stand mixer, cream butter until light and fluffy.
Add confectioners sugar 1/2 cup at a time, beating well after each addition.
Add vanilla and milk and beat until frosting is well combined.
Add in strawberry preserves 1 tablespoon at a time until frosting is creamy.
Frost cooled cupcakes and store in the refrigerator.
7a20842b45.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. Stir in the vanilla extract and mix well.
5. Gradually add the flour mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until just combined.
6. Fold in the mashed bananas.
7. Line a muffin tin with cupcake liners and fill each cup about 3/4 full.
8. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a cupcake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cupcakes to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. To make the frosting, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
11. Add the vanilla extract and mix well.
12. Gradually add the confectioners sugar, mixing until smooth and creamy.
13. If the frosting is too thick, add a bit more milk, a teaspoon at a time, until the desired consistency is reached.
14. Once the cupcakes are cooled, spread a generous amount of frosting on top of each cupcake.
15. Dust the frosted cupcakes with a bit of powdered sugar, if desired.

[/INST]

These delightful Banana Cupcakes with Strawberry Frosting are a delicious and visually appealing dessert. The combination of the moist banana cupcakes and the sweet, fruity strawberry frosting creates a delightful contrast in flavors and textures. The cupcakes can be enjoyed on their own or paired with a cup of tea or coffee, making them a perfect treat for any occasion.

415a9b7161.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350F and line a 6-cup muffin pan.
Place the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat and cook until the aroma is nutty and the milk solids start to turn brown on the bottom of the pan, about 5 minutes.
With a spatula, transfer the browned butter into a large mixing bowl.
Add the brown and white sugars, eggs and vanilla to the bowl and mix until combined.
Whisk together the flour, ground hazelnuts, baking powder and salt.
Pour the dry ingredients into the browned butter mixture and mix until fully incorporated.
Gently fold in the raspberries.
Spoon the muffin batter into the paper cups.
Scatter the tops with a few of the cracked hazelnuts, while gently pressing them securely into place.
Bake for 15-18 minutes, until a cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean.
Let the muffins cool briefly in the pan, and then place them on a wire rack to cool.
415a9b7161.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a muffin tin with cupcake liners.
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, brown, and 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons packed light brown sugar until smooth.
3. Add the 3 large eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the 2/3 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup ground hazelnuts, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder, and 1/4 teaspoon salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the raspberries, and mix until just combined.
6. Fold in the hazelnuts, lightly cracked as garnish.
7. Divide the batter evenly among the prepared muffin cups.
8. Bake for 20-22 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
9. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

615e73ba74.gt:
The best way to capture the elusive flavor of summertime.
Ben and Jerry prefer small peaches because they have more flavor and less water than the larger ones.
Combine the peaches, 1/2 cup of the sugar, and the lemon juice in a bowl.
Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours, stirring the mixture every 30 minutes.
Remove the peaches from the refrigerator and drain the juice into another bowl.
Return the peaches to the refrigerator.
Whisk the eggs in a mixing bowl until light and fluffy, 1 to 2 minutes.
Whisk in the remaining 3/4 cup sugar, a little at a time, then continue whisking until completely blended, about 1 minute more.
Pour in the cream and milk and whisk to blend.
Add the peach juice and blend.
Transfer the mixture to an ice cream maker and freeze following manufacturer's instructions.
After the ice cream stiffens (about 2 minutes before if is done) add the peaches, then continue freezing until the ice cream is ready.
Makes 1 generous quart.
615e73ba74.pred:
1. In a large bowl, mix the chopped peaches, sugar, and lemon juice until the sugar is fully dissolved.
2. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and heavy whipping cream until smooth.
3. Combine the egg mixture with the peach mixture and mix until well combined.
4. Add the milk and mix until the ice cream base is smooth and creamy.
5. Pour the ice cream base into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
6. Once the ice cream is churned, transfer it to an airtight container and place it in the freezer to harden for at least 2 hours or overnight.
7. After the ice cream is hardened, scoop it into your desired ice cream container and enjoy!

Please note that the ice cream maker is not included in the ingredients provided.

0a605c19e8.gt:
Add everything but the shrimp to a gallon-sized freezer bag.
Seal the bag and shake well to combine.
Taste test for spiciness; add sriracha for more heat, and tomato paste and olive oil for less heat.
When youre happy with it, add the shrimp and marinate in the fridge for 45 minutes.
Dump the entire bag, marinade included, into a pre-heated frying pan.
Fry the shrimp until theyre curled up and no longer translucent, a couple of minutes on each side.
You can also skewer and grill the shrimp.
Serve over rice, pasta, udon, in lettuce wraps with carrot and sprouts, as an appetizer ...
0a605c19e8.pred:
1. In a large skillet or wok, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
3. Add the chopped parsley and cook for another minute, until the parsley is slightly wilted.
4. Squeeze the juice of the whole lemon into the skillet and stir to combine the ingredients.
5. Add the Sriracha sauce and stir to combine.
6. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook for about 3-4 minutes, or until they are cooked through and pink.
7. Add the tomato paste and oregano to the skillet and stir to combine.
8. Season the shrimp with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Serve the Sriracha Fried Shrimp over rice or with your favorite side dish.

[/INST]

2893fcfb35.gt:
Heat a medium skillet over medium-high heat.
Spray with nonstick cooking spray.
Add the diced onion and saute until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add the diced apple and saute until tender, about 3 minutes.
Then remove from heat and set aside for the moment.
In a medium sized mixing bowl, melt the butter (you can do this in the microwave, heating for 30 seconds, stirring, then heating for additional 30 second increments if needed).
Then add the bread crumbs to the melted butter and toss to coat.
Into the bread crumb mixture, mix in the onion and apple.
Add the shredded cheese and mix to thoroughly combine.
Slice the pork chops lengthwise leaving about 1/2 an inch on one side still intact (you are basically making a pocket for the filling mixture).
Stuff pork chops with bread crumb mixture.
Secure the pork chops closed using toothpicks.
Spray each side of the pork chops with nonstick cooking spray and season with salt and pepper.
Grill the pork chops (or cook on a skillet) over medium to medium high heat until the juices run clear, about 20-25 minutes.
Remove from the grill and let rest about 5 minutes.
Remove toothpicks.
Serve and enjoy!
!
2893fcfb35.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix together the melted butter, bread crumbs, and shredded cheese.
3. Season the pork chops with salt and pepper, or to taste.
4. In a large skillet, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Add the diced onions and cook until they are softened and slightly caramelized.
5. Add the diced apple to the skillet and cook until it softens and begins to caramelize as well.
6. Remove the onions and apple from the skillet and set aside.
7. In the same skillet, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Add the pork chops and cook until they are browned on both sides.
8. Add the onions and apple back into the skillet, and stir to combine.
9. Pour the bread crumb mixture over the pork chops and onions, and stir to coat the pork evenly.
10. Place the pork chops in a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and the bread crumb mixture is golden brown.
11. Remove the pork from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

0ede22d38c.gt:
Chop onion and celery.
Saute celery and onion in vegetable oil in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat until tender.
Add chicken stock and frozen vegetables.
Cover and cook until vegetables are cooked, about 10 minutes.
If vegetables are too large, you may wish to cut them into smaller pieces.
Stir in cream of chicken soup, chicken and milk and heat through, stirring occasionally.
Cut cheese into chunks and add to soup, stirring until melted.
Taste and season if needed.
(It shouldnt need much if any salt.)
Serve immediately with crackers.
0ede22d38c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat.
3. Add the onion and celery, and cook until they are softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the chicken stock, cauliflower, and broccoli to the pot. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
5. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix the cream of chicken soup and milk.
6. Add the mixture to the pot with the vegetables, stirring to combine.
7. Add the shredded chicken and processed cheese to the pot. Stir until the cheese is melted and the ingredients are well combined.
8. Cook for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the soup is heated through.
9. Serve the Chunky Chowder in bowls, and top with crackers to enjoy.

[/INST]

dd8991d2f0.gt:
Bring water for noodles to boil in a large pot.
Cook noodles according to instructions on package, then drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil, and then add onion.
Saute onions for 10-15 minutes, over medium-low heat until lightly browned.
Add broccoli and 1/4 cup water.
Cover pan and saute 5 minutes or so until broccoli turns bright green and begins to soften.
Stir in garlic and salt.
Then stir in sesame oil, agave and ume vinegar.
In a small bowl, combine arrowroot and 1 tablespoon water, stirring vigorously to make a paste without any lumps.
Pour the paste over the broccoli and mix quickly and vigorously to loosen any of the mixture that sticks to the bottom of the pan.
Place noodles on individual plates, then top with broccoli mixture.
Garnish with scallions, cilantro and peanuts.
dd8991d2f0.pred:
1. In a large pot, combine the mung bean noodles and water. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until the noodles are cooked through and tender.
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until it is soft and translucent.
3. Add the broccoli to the skillet, and cook until it is tender but still slightly crisp.
4. In a small bowl, whisk together the celtic sea salt, sesame oil, agave nectar, ume vinegar, arrowroot, and water.
5. Add the vegetable mixture to the skillet, and stir in the sauce mixture. Cook for a few minutes, until the sauce has thickened slightly.
6. Serve the Vegetarian Pad Thai over a bed of cooked noodles, garnished with the chopped cilantro and peanuts.

[/INST]

6902fabddb.gt: Stir salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and cayenne pepper in an airtight container, seal, and shake to combine.
6902fabddb.pred:
1. Combine all the ingredients in a small bowl.
2. Mix well to ensure even distribution of the spices.
3. Store the seasoned salt in an airtight container or jar for up to 6 months.

[/INST]

To use the seasoned salt, simply sprinkle it over your desired dish before cooking or as a finishing touch. This homemade seasoned salt can be used to enhance the flavor of various dishes, from grilled meats and vegetables to salads and pasta dishes.

e766664a53.gt:
Heat the oven to 450 degrees F with a rack in the middle position.
Take a small slice off of the bottom of each potato so that they will sit flat, and then a small slice (about 1/4) from each end.
Make slices crosswise down the potato at 1/4 intervals, leaving 1/4 at the bottom.
Make sure you do not cut all the way through.
Rinse the sliced potatoes under cold running water, making sure water gets between each slice to wash away excess starch.
Place the potatoes on a plate, bottom side up, and microwave for 5 minutes (do not cover).
Flip the potatoes over, then microwave for another 5 minutes.
While the potatoes are in the microwave, make the topping.
Pulse the bread in a food processor until you have coarsely ground crumbs.
In a medium bowl, use a fork to mix the crumbs with the melted butter, cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, paprika, garlic powder, oregano, minced garlic, salt, and pepper until it forms a chunky paste.
Set aside.
When the potatoes are finished in the microwave, place them on a rimmed baking sheet.
Drizzle slowly with olive oil, so that it can run into the slices.
Fan the slices slightly, then dash each one with paprika, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 30 minutes, until the potatoes are cooked through and the edges are just starting to brown.
Remove from the oven and turn the broiler on.
Press the topping onto the top of the cooked potatoes, pressing into any slices that you easily can, but being careful not to rip the potatoes.
Place under the broiler for a couple of minutes, until the topping is bubbly and starting to brown.
e766664a53.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Scrub the potatoes clean and cut them into 1/4-inch thick slices.
3. In a large bowl, mix the sliced potatoes, melted butter, olive oil, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, oregano, minced garlic, and grated Parmesan cheese.
4. Spread the potato mixture evenly on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
5. Bake the potato slices for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy on the edges.
6. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the potato slices cool for a few minutes.
7. Meanwhile, toast the slices of Italian bread.
8. Once the potato slices have cooled, place a slice of bread on top of each potato slice.
9. Add a layer of shredded Old Cheddar cheese on top of the bread.
10. Add a sprinkle of grated Parmesan cheese on top of the cheese.
11. Return the baking sheet to the oven and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
12. Serve the Flavor Packed Potato Fans immediately.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

84dcc3c2e0.gt:
Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes and shake vigorously.
Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a wedge of lime.
84dcc3c2e0.pred:
To make a Key Lime Martini, follow these steps:

1. In a cocktail shaker, combine 1-1/4 ounces of fluid Vanilla Vodka, 1 ounce of fluid Rum, 1 ounce of fluid Midori, and 1 ounce of fluid Lime Juice.
2. Add 1 teaspoon of Simple Syrup to the shaker, and shake vigorously for about 15-20 seconds.
3. Strain the mixture into a chilled martini glass.
4. Top the martini with 1 ounce of fluid Pineapple Juice.
5. Garnish the drink with a lime wedge and a sprig of mint.

Enjoy your Key Lime Martini!

b240a9e8bb.gt:
Heat oven to 250F degrees.
Mix together cornmeal, flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Combine egg whites, milk and margarine, mix well.
Pour milk mixture into the dry ingredients, stir until just smooth (do not over mix).
In a large non stick skillet heat the 2 tbsp oil, heat until quite hot but not smoking.
Drop in a 1/4 cup of batter for each fritter.
Cook approx 4-6 minutes on each side.
Keep warm in the oven covered with foil until you have cooked all the fritters.
Serve with Blueberries or other fruit.
b240a9e8bb.pred:
To create delicious Pan Fried Blueberry Corn Fritters, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cornmeal, flour, light brown sugar, baking powder, and salt. Whisk to combine.
2. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg whites until they are foamy. Gradually add the skim milk, and continue whisking until the mixture is smooth.
3. Add the melted margarine to the egg mixture, and whisk until combined.
4. Pour the egg mixture into the dry ingredients, and stir until the batter is smooth.
5. Fold in the canned or fresh blueberries.
6. Heat a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Add a small amount of vegetable oil to the pan, swirling to coat the bottom.
7. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, scoop the batter onto the hot pan, forming small pancakes. Cook until the edges are golden brown, then flip the fritters and cook the other side until golden brown as well.
8. Remove the fritters from the pan and place them on a wire rack or plate to cool.

Serve the Pan Fried Blueberry Corn Fritters warm, with a drizzle of syrup or a dollop of whipped cream, if desired. Enjoy your delicious homemade fritters!

704ac085bf.gt:
Get the 2 slices of bread and the peanut butter and banana.
Spread the peanut butter on one of the slices of bread.
Slice up as much banna as the bread can fit on it.
Place the two slices of bread together.
And now it is ready to eat.
704ac085bf.pred:
1. First, peel and slice the banana into 12 equal pieces.
2. Next, spread 12 tablespoons of peanut butter onto the slices of bread.
3. Arrange the banana slices on top of the peanut butter, alternating between the two slices of bread.
4. Carefully press the banana slices down to ensure they are evenly distributed and adhere to the bread.
5. Cut the sandwich in half or into smaller portions, depending on the desired size.
6. Serve the Peanut Butter and Banana Sandwich to enjoy a delicious and nutritious snack.

The Peanut Butter and Banana Sandwich is a simple yet satisfying treat that can be enjoyed by people of all ages. The combination of the creamy peanut butter and the natural sweetness of the banana creates a delightful flavor profile that is both satisfying and nutritious. The sandwich can be easily customized by adjusting the amount of peanut butter and banana slices, or by adding additional ingredients such as honey, jelly, or even a drizzle of chocolate sauce.

1090169845.gt:
Preheat the over to 400F.
Divide the fish into 2 portions placing each in the center of a piece of foil (spraying the foil with some cooking oil is a good idea).
Salt and pepper to taste.
To each portion add pieces of pinched-off-the-stem fresh dill, a splash of lemon juice (or a slice of lemon) and half a pat of butter (optional).
Fold the foil into a packet by folding the edges up until they meet over the center and folding over to seal.
Put the packets in an oven dish and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove and serve.
1090169845.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]
To prepare the It's Fish, Okay? dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the new zealand orange roughy fillet with salt and pepper to taste.
3. In a small bowl, mix the 2 sprigs fresh dill with the lemon juice or squeeze the lemon over the fish.
4. Heat the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the fish fillet and cook for about 4-5 minutes on each side, or until it is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
5. Remove the fish from the skillet and place it on a serving platter.
6. Drizzle the cooked fish with the lemon juice mixture and garnish with the lemon slices.
7. Serve the It's Fish, Okay? dish immediately.

Enjoy your delicious It's Fish, Okay? dish!

b5d5eda997.gt:
Preheat oven to 325F
mix cake in bowl...following the directions on the box.
add jell-o pudding
add strawberry extract
add 1\2 can of strawberry frosting
pour mixture in a floured cake pan.
I used a bundt pan
bake for 35 to 40 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
once cake has cooled, take the un-used portion of the frosting and microwave for 10 seconds.
stir and drizzle with spoon over cake
b5d5eda997.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Prepare the ingredients by gathering all the necessary items and measuring the required amounts of each ingredient.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 1/2 tbsp of strawberry extract, 1 box of strawberry jell-o instant pudding, and 1 box of White cake mix.
4. Add the eggs, oil, and water according to the package instructions. Mix well to combine all the ingredients.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
6. Bake the cake in the preheated oven for about 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once the cake is completely cooled, use a serrated knife to cut it into equal portions.
9. To prepare the frosting, divide the can of Strawberry frosting into the desired number of servings.
10. Spread the frosting onto the cooled cake slices, and garnish with fresh strawberries if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Easy Strawberry Cake!

820cb37cdd.gt:
1.
Brown the onion in the olive oil until turning translucent.
Add the garlic.
2.
Add both sausage and beef, break into very small pieces and cook through.
3.
Add spices and seasonings, remove from heat.
Drain and cool.
In a food processor, add ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, egg, and the sausage/ground beef mixture.
Process together until it reaches an almost paste-like consistency.
Refrigerate until ready to use.
Can also be frozen.
820cb37cdd.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
3. Add the ground sirloin and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
4. Add the Italian sausage and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
5. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
6. Add the paprika, Italian seasoning, ground fennel, red pepper flakes, and cook for another 2 minutes.
7. Add the ricotta cheese and cook until it has melted and combined with the other ingredients.
8. Add the Parmesan cheese and the egg, stirring to combine.
9. Season the filling with salt and pepper to taste.
10. To assemble the ravioli, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
11. Use a pasta machine or a rolling pin to thinly roll out the pasta dough.
12. Cut the pasta dough into squares or rectangles, and place a spoonful of the filling in the center of each square or rectangle.
13. Fold the pasta dough over the filling to create a half-moon shape, pressing the edges to seal.
14. Cook the ravioli in the boiling water until they float to the surface, then remove them with a slotted spoon and transfer them to a wire rack to drain.
15. Serve the ravioli with a side of marinara sauce or your preferred dipping sauce.

This recipe provides a delicious and hearty filling for your homemade ravioli, combining the flavors of Italian sausage, ground sirloin, and a variety of spices and cheeses. The result is a satisfying and comforting dish that can be enjoyed with a side of marinara sauce or your preferred dipping sauce.

b9b1d42894.gt:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Pour mixture over chicken in slow cooker.
Cook 3-4 hours on low.
Serve with no-yolk egg noodles.
Number of Servings: 4.
b9b1d42894.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your slow cooker on low heat setting.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chopped garlic, ranch dressing mix, and cream of chicken soup. Mix well.
3. Add the skim milk and reduced-fat sour cream to the bowl and mix until smooth.
4. Place the chicken breasts in the slow cooker, pour the sauce mixture over the chicken, and cook on low heat for 6-8 hours or until the chicken is fully cooked through.
5. Remove the chicken from the slow cooker and shred it using two forks.
6. Return the shredded chicken to the slow cooker and stir to combine.
7. Add the bacon bits to the slow cooker and stir to combine.
8. Cook the dish on low heat for an additional 15-20 minutes or until the sauce has thickened and the chicken is heated through.
9. Serve the Bacon Ranch Slow Cooker Chicken over rice or noodles for a delicious and satisfying meal.

[/INST]

1c2ae05e91.gt:
Cook/steam sliced carrots until fork-tender; drain and keep warm.
Preheat oven to 375.
Lightly grease/spray a 2 1/2 qt casserole dish; set aside.
In a mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, onion, cheese soup, milk, egg, cheese, crushed crackers, salt, pepper, tarragon and nutmeg; mix well.
Gently fold in the hot cooked carrots to the mixture.
Turn mixture into prepared casserole dish.
Bake, uncovered at 375 for 25-30 minutes.
1c2ae05e91.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced carrots, melted butter, minced onion, and cheddar cheese soup. Mix well.

8. Allow the dish to cool for a few minutes before serving.
