6ee25d7bfc.gt:
Prepare bread pans,.
I just use Pam cooking spray.
In large mixing bowl: Beat eggs until frothy, add sugar, oil, molasses, vanilla, and zucchini, mix well.
Combine flour slowly, add soda,baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
Also add nuts if desired.
Pour into bread pans, bake at 325F for 40 to 45 minutes or until you can stick a toothpick in and it comes out clean.
This recipe makes 3 large or 6 small bread pans.
This may vary.
6ee25d7bfc.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the eggs, brown sugar (or white sugar and brown sugar), and molasses.
3. Add the chopped zucchini, corn oil, vanilla, and mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, and walnuts (if using).
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until just combined.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured loaf pan.
7. Bake for 1 hour and 10 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.
8. Allow the loaf to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/SYS]

78e1fe788f.gt:
Stir together all sauce ingredients in a small bowl.
Heat oil in a 12-inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then stir-fry garlic and ginger until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add shrimp and stir-fry until almost cooked through, about 3 minutes.
Add half of romaine and stir-fry until it begins to wilt, then add remaining romaine and stir-fry until just wilted and shrimp are just cooked through, about 1 minute.
Stir sauce, then add to stir-fry and simmer, stirring, 2 minutes.
78e1fe788f.pred:
1. In a small bowl, whisk together the reduced-sodium chicken broth, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar, and cornstarch. Set aside.
2. In a large skillet or wok, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and ginger, and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until they are pink and cooked through, about 2 minutes per side.
4. Add the broth mixture to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook until the sauce thickens slightly, about 2 minutes.
5. Add the romaine hearts to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook until the romaine is tender but still crisp, about 2 minutes.
6. Serve the Shrimp and Romaine Stir-Fry over a bed of white rice.

[/INST]

1832d9054d.gt:
In a medium saucepan over medium heat, toast the barley in 1 tablespoon olive oil for 2 minutes until it is fragrant and nutty.
Add the chicken stock, bring to a boil, reduce heat to a simmer, cover and cook 45 minutes or until most of the liquid is absorbed.
In a large cast iron (or other oven safe) skillet over medium heat, saute the onion and corn kernels in the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil until onions are slightly softened.
Season with salt and pepper.
Shove the onion and corn to the side of the pan, and add the chorizo into the pan.
Cook the chorizo, breaking it apart as it cooks.
When it is almost browned and cooked through, mix it with the corn and onions then shove the entire mixture to the side.
Create as much open surface on the base of the skillet as possible.
Add the kale, pressing down and turning over until it is wilted.
Season with salt and pepper, then mix it in with the chorizo, corn and onion.
Remove from heat.
Preheat your broiler to high.
Add the cream and 1 cup of cheese into the corn mixture.
Add the cooked barley and mix well.
Spread the entire mixture into an even layer, and top with the panko and remaining cheese.
Place skillet 6 inches under the broiler for 3 minutes until the top is melted and brown.
1832d9054d.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the pearl barley to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the barley is slightly toasted.
4. Add the chicken stock, sweet corn kernels, and ground chorizo to the skillet. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the barley is tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
5. In a separate skillet, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the torn kale pieces and cook until they are wilted, about 5-7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked barley mixture, wilted kale, heavy cream, and 1/2 cup of shredded cheddar jack cheese. Mix well.
7. Transfer the mixture to a greased 9x9 inch baking dish. Sprinkle the remaining 1/4 cup of shredded cheddar jack cheese on top.
8. In a small bowl, mix the panko bread crumbs with salt and pepper. Sprinkle the bread crumb mixture evenly over the cheese.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the bread crumbs are golden brown.
10. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

36b3caf34c.gt:
Preheat the oven to 325.
In a large enameled cast-iron casserole, heat the peanut oil.
Season the pork with salt and pepper.
Add the shanks to the casserole and cook over moderate heat, turning, until browned all over, about 20 minutes; transfer to a plate.
Add the onion to the casserole and cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until golden, about 4 minutes.
Stir in the water, miso, brown sugar, soy sauce, ginger, garlic, chiles and scallions.
Add the shanks and any juices and bring to a boil.
Cover and braise in the oven for 2 hours, until the pork is very tender.
Garnish with scallions and serve with rice.
36b3caf34c.pred:
[/SYS]

Braised Pork Shank with Miso

Ingredients:
- 3 tablespoons peanut oil
- 4 pork shanks (about 3 3/4 pounds)
- Salt
- Pepper
- 1 yellow onion, coarsely chopped
- 3 cups water
- 3/4 cup light brown or red miso
- 1/2 cup packed light brown sugar
- 1/3 cup soy sauce
- 1/4 cup thinly sliced peeled fresh ginger (from one 3-inch piece)

- 5 dried red chiles, such as chiles de Arbol
- 1 bunch scallions, coarsely chopped
- Cooked white rice, to serve

Instructions:
1. In a large, heavy-bottomed pot or Dutch oven, heat the peanut oil over medium heat.
2. Season the pork shanks with salt and pepper, then add them to the pot. Cook for about 5 minutes on each side, or until they are browned and cooked through. Remove the pork shanks from the pot and set aside.
3. In the same pot, add the onion and cook until it is softened and translucent.
4. Add the water, miso, light brown sugar, soy sauce, and ginger. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 2 hours, or until the pork shanks are tender and the sauce has thickened.
5. Add the dried red chiles and garlic cloves to the pot and cook for another 15 minutes, or until the chiles are slightly softened.
6. Return the pork shanks to the pot and stir to combine the sauce and pork. Cook for another 15 minutes, or until the pork is heated through and the sauce is slightly thickened.
7. Remove the pork shanks from the pot and let them rest for a few minutes.
8. In a small bowl, whisk together the cornstarch and cold water. Stir the corn

94d70d2bcc.gt:
Wash, dry, and cut broccolini into thirds.
Heat oil over high in a wok or similar type pan.
Stir fry the stems first for about 3-4 minutes.
You may need to turn the heat down to medium high.
Add the top leaf portion, and cook for another 3-4 minutes.
Shut off heat and add oyster sauce, stirring to coat.
Serve.
94d70d2bcc.pred:
To cook a delightful Easy Broccolini With Oyster Sauce dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the peanut oil over medium heat.
3. Add the broccolini florets to the skillet and cook for about 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they are slightly tender but still crisp.
4. Pour the oyster sauce over the broccolini, and stir to combine.
5. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and cook for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the broccolini is tender and the sauce has thickened slightly.
6. Remove the skillet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Serve the cooked broccolini immediately, and enjoy the delicious Easy Broccolini With Oyster Sauce dish.

This dish is a delightful combination of tender broccolini florets and rich oyster sauce, creating a flavorful and satisfying meal. The use of peanut oil and oyster sauce adds depth and complexity to the dish, making it a delightful and satisfying option for a healthy and delicious meal.

13ce606661.gt:
May ajust these seasonings to your own taste !
Grind porkfat and mix with lean pork.
Combine well.
Combine all seasonings and mix with pork.
Mix in well with hands and make a small patty and fry until done, Taste your product and ajust seasonings if needed.
Shape into patties and freeze on cookie sheets until hard.
Store in freezer containers until needed.
I use a slider mold to make patties.
Cook time is time in freezer.
13ce606661.pred:
1. Combine the ground lean pork, pork fat, salt, white pepper, sage, thyme, cloves, garlic, and msg in a large bowl. Mix well.
2. Add the cayenne pepper, if using, and mix again.
3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
4. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
5. Shape the mixture into 1-inch (2.5 cm) balls.
6. Place the balls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the sausages in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they reach an internal temperature of 160°F (71°C).
8. Remove the sausages from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing them into rounds.

Enjoy your homemade Real Down Home Pork Sausage!

a040895990.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees.
Mix together all ingredients except olive oil and garlic.
Place olive oil in the bottom of a casserole dish or square glass baking dish.
Rub the dish with one bulb of chopped garlic and leave the garlic in the dish.
Pour mixture into baking dish and bake for 30-40 minutes at 325 degrees.
a040895990.pred:
[/SYS]

To create a delicious savory Green Rice Casserole, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the uncooked white rice, beaten egg, and milk. Mix well to ensure the rice is evenly coated.
3. Add the chopped onion, minced garlic, and fresh parsley to the rice mixture. Mix until well combined.
4. Grate the parmesan cheese and add it to the rice mixture.
5. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
6. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil and minced garlic.
7. Pour the olive oil mixture over the rice mixture and stir to combine.
8. Transfer the mixture to a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
9. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the top is golden brown.
10. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Green Rice Casserole!

ea87319f86.gt:
Roast the eggplant directly over a gas flame, turning occasionally, until charred all over and soft, about 12 minutes.
Transfer to a colander and let cool slightly, then peel and let cool completely.
Meanwhile, in a medium saucepan, cook the garlic in the oil over moderate heat until sizzling, about 2 minutes.
Remove from the heat and whisk in the vinegar, honey, rosemary, oregano and minced parsley.
Season the vinaigrette generously with salt and pepper.
Heat a large cast-iron skillet.
In batches if necessary, add the piquillos to the skillet in an even layer.
Cook over high heat, turning once, until lightly charred on both sides, about 2 minutes total.
Add the piquillos to the warm vinaigrette and let cool completely.
In a food processor, combine the eggplant with both cheeses and puree until smooth.
Scrape into a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the whipped eggplant on toasts and, using a slotted spoon, spoon some of the marinated piquillos on top.
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve with anchovies.
ea87319f86.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cut the eggplant into 1/2-inch (1.5 cm) rounds and season with salt and pepper.
3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
4. Add the eggplant rounds to the skillet and cook until they are tender and slightly browned, about 5 minutes.
5. Transfer the eggplant to a large bowl and let it cool.
6. In a small bowl, mix the red wine vinegar, honey, rosemary, oregano, and parsley. Pour the marinade over the eggplant and toss to coat evenly.
7. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
8. In a small bowl, mix the goat cheese and cream cheese until smooth.
9. Toast the thick slices of bread.
10. Spread the goat cheese mixture on the toasted bread.
11. Cut the piquillo peppers into thin strips.
12. Arrange the piquillo pepper strips on top of the goat cheese mixture.
13. Serve the Marinated Piquillo Pepper and Whipped Eggplant Toasts immediately.

[/INST]

57e41370a3.gt:
Combine flour, baking powder, nutmeg, and salt in one bowl.
In another bow, beat egg yolks slightly.
Beat in milk, bananas, and oil.
Add egg mixture to flour mixture all at once.
Stir just till combined but still slightly lumpy.
In small bowl, beat egg whites until stiff peaks form.
Gently fold beaten egg whites into flour mixture, leaving a few puffs of egg white.
Do not overmix!
Pour batter onto pre-heated, lightly greased waffle maker.
Bake waffles according to manufacturer's directions.
Serve hot and fresh.
I topped mine with butter and syrup, and they were delicious!
57e41370a3.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, and salt.
2. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg yolks and milk until well combined.
3. Add the mashed ripe banana, cooking oil, and nutmeg to the egg yolk mixture.
4. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.
5. Fold in the egg whites until the batter is smooth and free of lumps.
6. Preheat a waffle iron and pour the batter onto the hot waffle iron, cooking until the waffles are golden brown and crisp on both sides.
7. Serve the Banana-Wheat Waffles with butter, syrup, or your preferred topping.

[/INST]

86b69c2d99.gt:
Combine the vinegar, horseradish cream, and measured salt and pepper in a medium, nonreactive bowl and whisk until thoroughly mixed.
Whisking constantly, slowly pour the oil in a thin stream down the side of the bowl.
Whisk until completely incorporated.
Taste and adjust the seasoning as desired.
86b69c2d99.pred:
1. In a small bowl, whisk together the horseradish cream, kosher salt, and pepper. Set aside.
2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the olive oil and champagne vinegar.
3. Slowly drizzle the whisked olive oil mixture into the horseradish cream mixture, whisking continuously to emulsify the vinaigrette.
4. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
5. Serve the Creamy Horseradish Vinaigrette immediately or refrigerate until ready to use.

This Creamy Horseradish Vinaigrette Recipe is a delicious and versatile condiment that can be used as a salad dressing, marinade, or even as a topping for various dishes. The combination of the creamy horseradish, tangy vinegar, and the richness of the olive oil creates a unique and flavorful sauce that is perfect for enhancing the taste of your favorite dishes.

522f19c745.gt:
Place flat bread or shell on 14 inch pizza pan (or lightly grease a 15x10x1-inch baking pan.
Unroll the pizza dough onto the greased pan, using your hands to press the dough into a 14x 9 inch rectangle, build up the edges slightly.
Bake pizza dough in a 425F oven for 5 minutes.
remove from oven).
In a mixing bowl combine chicken and barbecue sauce, toss to coat.
Spread chicken mixture evenly over pizza crust.
Sprinkle with cheese and chopped spinach.
Bake in a 425F oven for 10 minutes or until crust edge is lightly browned.
Cut flat bread or bread shell into wedges (or cut rectangular pizza into squares.
522f19c745.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 450°F (232°C).
2. Prepare your pizza crust by spreading a thin layer of olive oil over the surface, then sprinkle it with a pinch of salt and pepper.
3. Place the crust on a baking sheet or pizza stone, and bake it in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes, or until it is golden brown and crispy.
4. While the crust is baking, prepare the chicken by shredding it into bite-sized pieces.
5. In a small bowl, mix the barbecue sauce and a pinch of salt and pepper.
6. Once the crust is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Spread the shredded chicken evenly over the crust, then sprinkle the shredded monterey jack cheese over the chicken.
8. Add the finely chopped spinach on top of the cheese.
9. Drizzle the barbecue sauce evenly over the spinach.
10. Return the pizza to the oven and bake for an additional 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the crust is golden brown.
11. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Barbecued Chicken Pizza!

8c32c6a022.gt:
Make the dough.
Put all the dough ingredients except for the olive oil into a plastic bag, and knead it well to make the dough.
When the dough comes together, add the olive oil and keep kneading (10 minutes).
Leave it to rise in the bag (30 minutes).
When the dough has risen, press it down lightly to deflate.
Place it on a kitchen parchment paper lined oven tray and leave to rest for 10 minutes.
Cut up the toppings for the pizza crust.
Slice the sausages diagonally.
Slice the onion and cherry tomatoes.
Defrost the seafood mix.
Put olive oil on your hands, and spread the dough out to cover the oven tray.
Preheat the oven to 300C (or 250C if your oven doesn't get that hot).
Spread the dough with pizza sauce, and cover evenly with toppings of your choice.
Add the pizza cheese to finish.
Bake at 300C for 13 minutes.
Top with something like fresh basil leaves and cut into 8 portions.
It's very hot so be careful.
I tried varying the toppings by section.
You won't get bored with the toppings this way, and looks like fun too.
8c32c6a022.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cake flour, bread flour, dry yeast, sugar, and salt.
3. Gradually add the lukewarm water, olive oil, and mix until a dough forms.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic.
5. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and let it rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
6. Punch down the dough and transfer it to a floured surface.
7. Roll out the dough into a circular shape, creating a thickness of about 1 cm (1/2 inch).
8. Spread the pizza sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
9. Add the wiener sausages, onion, mixed frozen seafood, cherry tomatoes, and mozzarella cheese evenly over the sauce.
10. Fold the dough over the filling, creating a half-moon shape.
11. Place the pizza on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
12. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

These steps will guide you through the process of making a delicious pizza using the ingredients provided. Remember to follow the recipe carefully and adjust the cooking time and temperature as needed, based on your oven and the thickness of the crust. Enjoy your homemade pizza!

ac2ebd1a37.gt:
Preheat oven to 450F.
Prebake fresh pizza crust, if using, for 3 to 4 minutes.
Remove from oven, and set aside to cool slightly.
Brush oil on crust.
Top crust with sauce and artichokes.
Sprinkle with soy mozzarella, goat cheese and sun-dried tomatoes.
Bake for 12 to 15 minutes.
Remove from oven, and serve.
ac2ebd1a37.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. Prepare the pizza crust by rolling it out on a lightly floured surface to your desired thickness.
3. Spread a thin layer of olive oil over the crust, leaving a small border around the edges for the crust to cook.
4. Add a layer of pizza sauce over the crust, leaving a small border around the edges as well.
5. Add a layer of shredded mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
6. Add a layer of baby artichokes or artichoke hearts, frozen or water-packed and drained, over the cheese.
7. Add a layer of goat cheese, in small pieces, over the artichokes.
8. Add a layer of dry sun-dried tomatoes, reconstituted or oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, over the goat cheese.
9. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

03321392c1.gt:
Spread cut sides of roll with dressing and mustard.
Fill with remaining ingredients.
03321392c1.pred:
To prepare a delicious California Turkey & Vegetable Sandwich, follow these steps:

1. Gather all the necessary ingredients, including a whole wheat kaiser roll, partially split, MIRACLE WHIP Light Dressing, GREY POUPON Dijon Mustard, KRAFT 2% Milk Sharp Cheddar Singles, OSCAR MAYER Deli Fresh Smoked Turkey Breast, tomato, mixed green pepper strips, and shredded carrots.

2. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

3. Place the kaiser roll on a baking sheet, and bake it in the preheated oven for 5-7 minutes, or until it is golden brown and slightly crispy.

4. While the roll is baking, prepare the sandwich by spreading a thin layer of MIRACLE WHIP Light Dressing on the bottom half of the roll.

5. Add a layer of GREY POUPON Dijon Mustard on top of the dressing.

6. Add a layer of KRAFT 2% Milk Sharp Cheddar Singles on top of the mustard.

7. Add a layer of sliced tomato on top of the cheese.

8. Add a layer of mixed green pepper strips and shredded carrots on top of the tomato.

9. Place the top half of the roll on top of the vegetables, and gently press down to ensure that the ingredients are evenly distributed.

10. Serve the California Turkey & Vegetable Sandwich warm, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

[/INST]

95fc2c99a6.gt:
Combine dry ingredients in large bowl.
Whisk remaining ingredients together; stir into dry mixture just until moistened.
Pour batter by 1/4 cupfuls onto a hot nonstick griddle coated with nonstick cooking spray.
Turn when bubbles form on top of pancakes; cook until second side is golden brown.
95fc2c99a6.pred:
To cook a delicious Buttermilk Buckwheat Pancakes (gluten-free) dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the buckwheat flour, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and clove. Whisk the ingredients together until well combined.

2. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and low-fat buttermilk until well combined.

3. Add the melted butter to the dry ingredients and mix until the batter is smooth and well-combined.

4. Preheat a non-stick frying pan or griddle over medium heat.

5. Pour a small amount of batter onto the pan, spreading it evenly to form a thin pancake. Cook the pancake for about 2-3 minutes, or until the edges are slightly browned and the pancake is cooked through.

6. Carefully flip the pancake and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the pancake is golden brown on both sides.

7. Repeat the process with the remaining batter, stacking the cooked pancakes on a plate or serving them immediately.

8. Serve the pancakes with your favorite toppings, such as butter, syrup, fruit, or whipped cream.

This recipe provides a delicious gluten-free option for those who prefer a pancake alternative. The combination of buckwheat flour and buttermilk creates a unique and satisfying taste, making it a delightful addition to your breakfast or brunch menu.

b067e71075.gt:
Heat the oven to 450 degrees F and arrange a rack in the middle.
Place a baking sheet upside down in the oven while its heating.
Remove chorizo from its casing and place in a medium frying pan over medium-high heat.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until browned, about 7 minutes.
Remove to a plate and set aside.
Add 2 tablespoons of the olive oil to the pan.
Add mushrooms and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Cook, stirring rarely, until beginning to brown, about 10 minutes.
Roll out pizza dough to a 10-inch round, remove the hot baking sheet from the oven, drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil, and carefully place dough on the upside-down baking sheet.
Scatter chorizo, mushrooms, Jack cheese, and Parmesan cheese on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake until cheese is melted and crust is crisp and browned, about 15 minutes.
b067e71075.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the Mexican chorizo and cook until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the cremini mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they are tender, about 5-7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Remove the skillet from the heat and let the mixture cool slightly.
5. Roll out the pizza dough on a lightly floured surface to your desired thickness. Transfer the dough to a pizza stone or a baking sheet.
6. Spread a thin layer of olive oil over the dough, then top it with the cooked chorizo and mushroom mixture.
7. Sprinkle the shredded Jack cheese evenly over the top of the chorizo and mushroom mixture.
8. Drizzle the grated Parmesan cheese over the top of the cheese.
9. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

3427daffb8.gt:
Mix the oils and teriyaki sauce in a skillet, and warm over medium heat.
Baste eggs in skillet, turning constantly, until eggs turn dark brown (5 minutes).
Remove eggs from pan.
Mix garlic salt and pepper into oils in skillet.
Stirfry broccoli until tender crisp (3 minutes), then melt cheese on top.
Serve eggs with broccoli.
3427daffb8.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the shelled hard-boiled eggs and cook until they are slightly browned and cooked through.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the teriyaki sauce, garlic salt, and pepper.
4. Add the broccoli to the skillet and cook until it is tender but still slightly crunchy.
5. Remove the eggs from the skillet and set aside.
6. Pour the teriyaki sauce mixture over the broccoli in the skillet, stirring to coat the vegetables evenly.
7. Add the shredded Swiss cheese to the skillet and stir until the cheese is melted and the sauce is well combined.
8. Carefully place the cooked eggs back into the skillet with the broccoli and cheese mixture.
9. Cook the dish in the oven for about 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the eggs are cooked through.
10. Serve the Broccoli and Eggs hot, garnished with fresh chopped parsley if desired.

Please provide the step-by-step instructions for cooking a delicious Broccoli and Eggs from scratch using the following ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil,1 teaspoon sesame oil,2 tablespoons teriyaki sauce,4 hard-boiled eggs, shelled,18 teaspoon garlic salt,14 teaspoon pepper,1 cup broccoli, chopped,13 cup swiss cheese, shredded (optional).

08e438e0f5.gt:
If you happen to use larger potatoes for the double batch, halve the large potatoes because the small ones for the regualr batch can be left whole.
Place all the potatoes in a deep pot and cover with water.
Place a lid on the potatoes and bring it to a boil.
Once it starts to boil, uncover and cook until tender (about twelve to fifteen minutes).
Then drain potatoes and put them back into the hot pot.
Add the butter, the seasoning package, milk and cheese.
It really depends on how creamy and cheesy you like your potatoes when deciding how much you want to add of the milk and cheese.
Smash the potatoes until they are the desired texture.
Add the amount of salt and pepper to taste you like and enjoy.
08e438e0f5.pred:
1. Wash and peel the small red potatoes, then cut them into bite-sized pieces.
2. In a large pot, cook the small red potatoes in a large pot of boiling salted water until they are tender but still firm. This should take about 15-20 minutes.
3. Drain the potatoes and return them to the pot.
4. Mash the potatoes using a potato masher or a fork, making sure to break up any large chunks.
5. In a small bowl, mix the Italian salad dressing mix with the milk.
6. Add the mashed potatoes to the bowl with the dressing mixture, stirring to combine.
7. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
9. In a large bowl, combine the large red potatoes, butter, and seasonings.
10. Toss the potatoes to coat them evenly with the butter and seasonings.
11. Spread the potatoes out on a baking sheet and bake for about 45-60 minutes, or until they are golden brown and tender.
12. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
13. In a large bowl, combine the mashed potatoes with the large potatoes, mixing well.
14. Add the mozzarella cheese to the mixture, stirring to combine.
15. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
16. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for about 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
17. Serve the Italian Mashed Potatoes hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

934deaadde.gt:
Boil chicken, salt& poultry in approximately 2 quarts of water.
Remove chicken and set aside.
Add 3 cups milk (more for a richer flavor), bouillon cubes, and butter to broth.
Bring to almost a boil.
Add water to the flour to make a thin solution and pour in broth.
Stir well, reduce heat, and let simmer to thicken.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Pinch each biscuit to small pieces and put in broth.
Stir often so dumplings won't stick together.
When dumplings begin to sink, they are almost ready.
Pick chicken to small pieces and add to broth.
When dumplings are not gummy to taste, it is ready to eat.
934deaadde.pred:
To make a delicious Chicken And Dumplings dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, combine the chicken breasts, salt, and poultry seasoning. Add enough chicken bouillon cubes to cover the chicken. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the chicken is cooked through.
3. Remove the chicken from the pot and let it cool. Once cooled, shred the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded chicken, 3 cups of milk, and 2 tablespoons of flour. Mix well.
5. In a separate bowl, combine the remaining 1 cup of milk, 2 tablespoons of flour, and the butter. Whisk until smooth.
6. Pour the milk mixture into the chicken mixture and stir until combined.
7. In a small bowl, combine the remaining 2 tablespoons of flour and the water. Stir until smooth.
8. Pour the flour mixture into the chicken mixture and stir until smooth.
9. In a large mixing bowl, combine the biscuits and melted butter. Mix until the biscuits are evenly coated.
10. Pour the biscuit mixture into the chicken mixture and stir until combined.
11. Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
12. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 30-35 minutes, or until the dumplings are cooked through and the filling is bubbly.
13. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This delicious Chicken And Dumplings dish is perfect for a cozy meal or a special occasion. Enjoy!

1f141c8991.gt:
Heat oven to 375 degrees F. In bowl, mix together tomatoes, onion and cilantro.
Squeeze lime into the tomato mixture and toss until blended.
Arrange a single layer of chips on heatproof platter or baking sheet.
Top with spoonfuls of chili, tomato mixture, olives and cheese.
Add jalapeno slices, if desired.
Repeat layers until all the ingredients are used.
Bake 15 minutes or until cheese is completely melted.
Serve nachos hot.
1f141c8991.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chopped plum tomatoes, red or white onion, cilantro, lime juice, and salt. Mix well.
3. Spread the mixture evenly over the corn tortilla chips, leaving a small border around the edges.
4. Bake the chili nachos in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
5. If desired, add sliced fresh jalapenos or more to taste.
6. Serve immediately and enjoy!

[/INST]

c799c55881.gt:
Combine the sun-dried tomatoes, parsley, butter, and Tabasco in a medium bowl and mix into a uniform paste.
Taste and season with salt and pepper as needed.
Place 8 slices of the toasted bread on a work surface.
Spread an even amount of the tomato butter on each slice, using it all up.
Set the remaining 4 unbuttered bread slices aside.
Place 2 pieces of bacon each on the buttered sides of 4 of the bread slices.
Top the bacon with 1/4 cup of the arugula per sandwich.
Top the arugula with a slice of the unbuttered bread.
Place a quarter of the sardines on top of each unbuttered piece of bread and season with pepper.
Top the sardines with another 1/4 cup of the arugula per sandwich, and finish with a slice of buttered bread, buttered-side down.
Slice each sandwich in half and serve.
c799c55881.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the sun-dried tomato slices, parsley, and butter. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Spread the sun-dried tomato mixture on the bread slices.
4. Cook the bacon in a medium skillet over medium heat until crispy. Remove from the heat and let it cool.
5. In a large bowl, mix the sardines, mayonnaise, and Tabasco Sauce. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Toast the bread slices.
7. Assemble the sandwiches by placing the toasted bread slices on a plate. Spread the sardine mixture on the bread slices.
8. Top the sardine mixture with the cooked bacon, and arugula.
9. Serve the sandwiches immediately.

This delicious Sardine, Sun-Dried Tomato, and Bacon Club Sandwich Recipe is a perfect combination of flavors and textures, with the crispy bacon, creamy sardine mixture, and fresh arugula adding a delightful contrast to the toasted bread.

79b26bed8a.gt:
Spray 8 x 8-inch casserole dish with vegetable cooking spray or grease with olive oil.
In a skillet, saute onion and garlic until soft in a little olive oil.
Toss with the cooked pasta.
Add and toss with the herbs, salt, pepper, a little (about 2 tsp.)
of the Parmesan cheese, all the ricotta, and beaten egg.
Toss well together.
Spread and press down half of the mixture in the prepared casserole dish.
Layer with half the tomato slices and zucchini.
Sprinkle with half of the Parmesan and mozzarella.
Repeat the process again.
Cover dish with foil and bake in a preheated 350F (180C) oven for 35 minutes.
Uncover and bake another 5 to 10 minutes, until cheese in oozy and light golden brown.
Let cool for 5 to 10 minutes before cutting into squares like lasagna.
79b26bed8a.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked pasta, onion, garlic, eggs, ricotta, basil, parsley, salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil. Mix well.
3. Transfer the pasta mixture to a large baking dish, spreading it evenly.
4. Add the sliced zucchini and tomatoes on top of the pasta mixture.
5. Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese evenly over the top of the pasta and zucchini mixture.
6. Dot the top with the grated parmesan and parmesan cheese.
7. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
8. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

This recipe is a delicious and satisfying pasta dish that can be enjoyed by everyone. The combination of pasta, vegetables, and cheese creates a hearty and flavorful meal.

d859113e86.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
Grease and flour a loaf pan and set aside.
Combine the eggs, oil, pumpkin and water in a large bowl.
Sift the dry ingredients together and stir into the pumpkin mixture.
Stir in walnuts.
Pour into the prepared loaf pan and bake for one hour or until a tester inserted near the center comes out clean.
d859113e86.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the eggs, oil, pumpkin, water, sugar, and flour.
3. Add the salt, nutmeg, cinnamon, and baking soda to the mixture.
4. Stir until well combined.
5. Fold in the chopped black walnuts.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured loaf pan.
7. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.
8. Allow the loaf to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

91e966c057.gt:
Wash, scrape and slice carrots into 1/4 inch thick rounds.
Bring water to a boil in a heavy saucepan.
Add carrots and garlic, cover, and cook about 15 minutes, or until tender (but still firm).
Drain carrots and place in serving bowl.
Mix remaining ingredients and pour over the carrots.
Toss, then cover with plastic wrap and set aside for about 30 minutes before serving at room temperature.
91e966c057.pred:
To make a delicious Cooked Carrot Salad dish, follow these steps:
1. Wash and peel the 8 carrots, then cut them into bite-sized pieces.
2. In a large saucepan, combine the carrots, 1 cup of water, and a garlic clove. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the carrots are tender.
3. In a small bowl, mix together 12 teaspoons of paprika, 12 teaspoons of ground cumin, 2 tablespoons of olive oil, 2 tablespoons of red wine vinegar, and 1 tablespoon of parsley, minced (flat leafed variety).
4. Once the carrots are cooked, drain the water and let them cool slightly.
5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked carrots, the paprika-cumin dressing, salt, and pepper. Mix well to ensure the carrots are evenly coated with the dressing.
6. Taste the salad and adjust the seasoning as needed.
7. Serve the Cooked Carrot Salad immediately, or refrigerate it for later use.

This delicious Cooked Carrot Salad dish is a healthy and nutritious side dish that can be enjoyed on its own or paired with other dishes. The combination of tender carrots, flavorful dressing, and fresh herbs creates a delightful and satisfying meal.

a22e0c83cf.gt:
1.
Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat.
Drain.
Place pasta in a large bowl; keep warm.2.
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add onion; saute 3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add garlic and tomatoes; saute 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
Sprinkle shrimp with Cajun seasoning, red pepper, and salt.
Add shrimp mixture to pan; saute 3 minutes or until shrimp are almost done; remove from heat.
Stir in half-and-half.
Pour shrimp mixture over pasta; toss.
Sprinkle with parsley.Wine note: Linguine with Spicy Shrimp combines peppery heat with a creamy sauce, making a fuller-bodied white a good partner.
Little Penguin Chardonnay 2008 ($6), from Australia, has tropical and pear fruit, with just a bit of sweetness and refreshing acidity.
--Jeffery Lindenmuth
a22e0c83cf.pred:
[/SYS]

To prepare the Linguine with Spicy Shrimp, follow these steps:
1. Cook the linguine according to the package instructions until al dente.
2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until the onion is translucent.

5131480fd6.gt:
Combine all ingredients.
Marinate fish from 1-2 hours depending on thickness.
Use to baste while cooking.
5131480fd6.pred:
[/INST]

1. In a large bowl, whisk together the sweet sherry, salad oil, soy sauce, brown sugar, minced garlic, and Worcestershire sauce.
2. Season the mixture with ground pepper to taste.
3. Allow the marinade to sit for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
4. After the marinade has had time to sit, remove the fish from the refrigerator and pat it dry with paper towels.
5. Place the fish in the marinade, making sure it is fully coated.
6. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or a lid, and refrigerate the marinated fish for at least 1-2 hours, or up to 4 hours.
7. After the marinating time is up, remove the fish from the marinade and pat it dry again with paper towels.
8. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
9. Place the marinated fish on the grill or grill pan, and cook for 4-6 minutes per side, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
10. Remove the fish from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[/INST]

Please note that these instructions are for cooking fish using a grill or grill pan. If you prefer to cook the fish in a different manner, such as baking or pan-searing, you may need to adjust the cooking time and temperature accordingly.

74d3b41960.gt:
Use both hands to massage the Honey Vinegar Miso Chicken Breasts to soften the muscle fibers.
Break it up into large pieces.
Salt the cucumber and roll on a cutting board.
Lightly wash, then use a spatula to smash while breaking it apart with your hands.
Add Step 1 (together with the miso) and Step 2 to a bowl, and mix together with Japanese mustard if you like.
74d3b41960.pred:

2f09be220e.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Combine all ingredients in a mixing bowl.
Spoon out into a glass pie plate or casserole dish.
Bake for 25 minutes.
Serve with nachos or corn chips.

[/INST]

dcc524d157.gt:
Brown hamburger and onions in the oil.
Combine all other ingredients in the crockpot (Except for the cheese)
Cover and cook 1 hour on high then turn your crockpot to low and cook for an additional 4 hours.
When finished cooking sprinkle the cheese on top and let sit in the cooker for about 5-10 more minutes until its all melted through.
dcc524d157.pred:
To cook a delightful Macaroni & Hamburger One Dish Crock Pot Casserole dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it into small pieces as it cooks. Season the beef with salt, pepper, and chili powder.
3. Add the onion to the skillet and cook until softened.
4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked beef, onion, spaghetti sauce, elbow macaroni, whole corn, beef broth, salt, pepper, and brown sugar. Mix well.
5. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Grate the sharp cheddar cheese over the top of the casserole.
7. Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the casserole is hot and bubbly.
9. Serve the Macaroni & Hamburger One Dish Crock Pot Casserole immediately.

This delicious dish combines the flavors of ground beef, onions, spaghetti sauce, macaroni, corn, beef broth, and cheddar cheese, resulting in a hearty and satisfying one-dish meal that can be enjoyed by the whole family.

30325f1814.gt:
Beans: trim and remove strings if you choose, then wash them.
Cook beans until they are crisp-tender.
Drain and set aside.
Cook bacon and reserve fat.
In a deep pan or pot, add olive oil.
Once hot, add the onion and saute for a little bit.
Now add garlic and simmer until the onions are clear.
Add the mushrooms, red bell pepper and parsley.
After 5 minutes of simmering, add cooking wine, chicken broth and some of the reserved bacon fat.
Cook until desired taste or when some of the liquid steams away.
Add salt to taste.
Remove liquid mixture from the stove, add the string beans, almonds and crumbled bacon.
Mix well and put in a serving dish.
Enjoy!
30325f1814.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the reserved bacon fat over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
3. Add the garlic and cook for another minute.
4. Add the mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and become tender, about 5 minutes.
5. Add the green beans, bell pepper, and parsley. Cook until the vegetables are tender but still crisp, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Season the mixture with salt and pepper.
7. In a small bowl, mix the slivered almonds with the white cooking wine.
8. Pour the chicken broth over the vegetables in the skillet, and stir to combine.
9. Cook the mixture over medium heat until the liquid has been absorbed and the flavors have melded together, about 5-7 minutes.
10. Serve the Green Bean Almondine immediately.

5a55d2d191.gt:
Preheat oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C).
Line a baking sheet with paper towels.
Fill a bowl with lightly-salted water.
Rinse the grated sweet potato in the water, and drain into a sieve.
Pat the grated sweet potato dry with a cloth or paper towels, then place into a bowl.
Squeeze excess moisture from the grated onion, and place into the bowl with the sweet potato.
Stir the eggs and pepper into the mixture until well combined.
Heat the olive oil in a nonstick skillet over medium heat until it shimmers, and spoon about 1 heaping tablespoon of the potato mixture per patty into the hot oil.
Flatten the patties with a fork, and fry until golden brown and crisp on the bottom, 5 to 8 minutes.
Flip and cook on the other side, sprinkle with salt, then set the cooked patties aside on the prepared baking sheet in the preheated oven while you finish cooking the latkes.
Stir the potato mixture before cooking each batch of patties.
Serve hot with applesauce and yogurt.
5a55d2d191.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the grated sweet potato, onion, eggs, black pepper, and salt. Mix well.
3. Add the olive oil and applesauce to the bowl, and mix until the ingredients are well combined.
4. Gradually add the nonfat yogurt, mixing until the batter reaches the desired consistency.
5. Heat a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
6. Using a spoon or a cookie scoop, scoop out small balls of the batter and place them on the skillet. Cook the latkes for about 3-4 minutes on each side, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
7. Transfer the cooked latkes to a plate and serve them hot.

Enjoy your delicious Kerry's Sweet Potato Latkes!

df8f764b0d.gt:
Sprinkle the patties with salt and pepper and grill the hamburgers; Transfer the patties to a warmed platter and start the eggs.
Heat 4 teaspoons of butter in a skillet and carefully break the eggs and cook them sunny side up until the whites are firm.
Remove from the skillet and place one egg on each pattie.
Sprinkle the eggs with salt and pepper;.
Arrange the anchovies (if desired) on top of the eggs.
Heat 4 tablespoons in a skillet; When it gets foamy, add the capers and parsley.
When the butter just starts to brown, pour equal amounts of the sauce over each egg/pattie and serve hot.
df8f764b0d.pred:
To make Steak Hache Avec Oeufs a Cheval, you will need the following ingredients:
1 12 lbs ground sirloin
4 teaspoons butter
4 tablespoons butter
4 eggs
6 - 12 anchovy fillets (optional)
2 tablespoons capers, drained
1 tablespoon parsley, finely chopped
salt & freshly ground black pepper

First, preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).

Next, shape the ground sirloin into 4 patties. You can either do this by hand or use a food processor to create evenly shaped patties.

Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium-high heat. Add the butter to the skillet and let it melt. Once melted, add the patties to the skillet and cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until the patties are cooked through and slightly charred.

While the patties are cooking, prepare the eggs. Crack the eggs into a bowl and season them with salt and pepper.

Once the patties are cooked, remove them from the skillet and place them on a plate.

Add the butter to the skillet and let it melt. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and cook until the eggs are set and the edges are slightly crispy.

Next, place the cooked patties on top of the cooked eggs.

Add the capers and parsley to the skillet and stir gently to combine.

Sprinkle the anchovy fillets on top of the patties and eggs, if using.

Place the skillet in the preheated oven and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

Serve the Steak Hache Avec Oeufs a Cheval immediately, and enjoy your delicious hamburger with eggs on horseback!

c7e9cae7ae.gt:
In a large saucepan with boiling salted water, cook pasta 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente.
Drain and put back in the saucepan.
Meanwhile, in another saucepan, bring to boil heavy cream and dry onion flakes.
Add asparagus and smoked salmon, cook at low heat until warm.
Remove from the heat, add 1/2 cup of parmigiano reggiano and stir.
Add salt and pepper.
Add sauce to the pasta and stir to coat well.
Sprinkle each serving with remaining parmigiano reggiano.
c7e9cae7ae.pred:
1. Cook the linguine according to package instructions until al dente.
2. In a large saucepan, heat the heavy cream over medium heat until it begins to simmer.
3. Add the dry onion flakes and stir to combine.
4. Add the thawed and cut asparagus pieces to the saucepan, and cook until they are tender but still slightly crisp.
5. Add the smoked salmon flakes or slivered smoked salmon to the saucepan, and stir to combine.
6. Reduce the heat to low and let the sauce simmer for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
7. In a small bowl, mix the grated parmigiano-reggiano cheese with a pinch of salt and pepper.
8. Gradually pour the cheese mixture into the saucepan with the cream and salmon mixture, stirring constantly to avoid lumps.
9. Cook the sauce over low heat for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it thickens and reaches your desired consistency.
10. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
11. Drain the cooked linguine and toss it with the smoked salmon creamy sauce.
12. Serve the Linguine With Smoked Salmon Creamy Sauce immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Linguine With Smoked Salmon Creamy Sauce!

dafbe725ac.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).
Mix ingredients well in the order given.
Drop by teaspoon on cookie sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Under bake for a chewy cookie.
dafbe725ac.pred:
To prepare Sun Up Cookies, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until smooth.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the baking soda and salt, then the baking powder and vanilla extract.
5. Gradually mix in the flour, alternating with the raisins and coconut, until a dough forms.
6. Stir in the whole wheat flake cereal.
7. Chill the dough in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
8. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to your desired thickness.
9. Cut out the dough into desired shapes using cookie cutters or a knife.
10. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
11. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
12. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your Sun Up Cookies!

1ebd581dca.gt:
In a large mixing bowl combine rhubarb, strawberries, sugar, lemon juice, cornstarch and the pinch of salt, stirring together well.
Spoon mixture into an 8x8 in (20x20 cm) glass baking dish.
In a second bowl, combine brown sugar, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg and butter, and stir with a fork until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Sprinkle this mixture over the fruit mixture.
If using oven, place in a 325F preheated oven, and bake uncovered for 20-25 minutes until golden brown on top and fruit is tender.
If using an outdoor grill, position the pan on a cool side of the grill (that means for a gas grill no heat directly underneath).
Maintain the heat to a medium-low temperature (around 300F).
Close lid of grill and cook 25-30 minutes.
Make sure to rotate the baking dish on the grill about every 8 minutes for even cooking.
Either way, the fruit should be tender and the juices bubbling when finished cooking.
I love serving with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or frozen yogurt.
1ebd581dca.pred:
[INST]
To make Rhubarb & Strawberry Crisp, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sliced rhubarb and halved strawberries.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the sugar, lemon juice, cornstarch, and salt.
4. Add the cornstarch mixture to the fruit mixture, stirring to combine.
5. Pour the mixture into a baking dish, making sure it is evenly distributed.
6. Cube the cold butter and sprinkle it evenly over the fruit mixture.
7. Sprinkle the cinnamon and nutmeg evenly over the butter.
8. Dot the top of the fruit mixture with butter, making sure it is evenly distributed.
9. Bake the crisp in the preheated oven for 35-45 minutes, or until the fruit is bubbly and the crisp is golden brown.
10. Remove the crisp from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Rhubarb & Strawberry Crisp!

540bbf9ab0.gt:
For the muffins: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease 2 muffin tins.
In the bowl of a stand mixer, add butter and 1 cup sugar.
Cream for 3-5 minutes or until fluffy and pale in color.
Add the vanilla.
Add the eggs one a time, mixing after each addition.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, baking powder, cream of tartar, and nutmeg.
Add the flour mixture and sour cream alternately to the butter mixture, starting and ending with the flour.
Scrape down the bowl as needed.
Fold in the cinnamon chips.
In a small bowl, whisk together remaining 1 cup of sugar and tablespoons of cinnamon.
Using an ice cream scoop, scoop the batter into the cinnamon-sugar mixture and roll around to coat completely, making sure not to press your fingers into the batter while you roll.
Place the coated muffins into the prepared tins.
Bake for 20-22 minutes, or until golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and let cool in the pans for 5 minutes before removing them to a wire rack to cool completely.
For the glaze: In a small bowl, whisk together powdered sugar, vanilla and milk until smooth.
Drizzle the glaze over the warm muffins with a spoon or a fork.
540bbf9ab0.pred:
[INST]To make the Glazed Snickerdoodle Muffins, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.

6. Fold in the cinnamon chips and powdered sugar.
7. Divide the batter evenly among the prepared muffin cups.
8. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
9. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Once cooled, drizzle the muffins with the glaze made by mixing the milk and vanilla extract.

f89bbed17a.gt:
Bring sweet potatoes and beets to a boil.
Slice sweet peppers lengthways.
Finely chop parsley.
Grate carrots and put aside in a bowl.
Cut beets into squares of medium to small sizes but not large.
Crush sweet potatoes and place both in a large bowl.
Chop up kale as finely as you can.
Ensure not to add the stalk.
Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl adding the salt and black pepper to taste.
Add sweet corn and cream style corn to bowl and mix.
In greased dish add approximately half of mixture.
Then add a layer of cheddar cheese and add all of the feta cheese.
Add remainder of mixture and layer top with cheddar cheese.
Bake at 190C for 30-45minutes.
Enjoy!
:)
f89bbed17a.pred:
To prepare a delicious Corn pie a la carte, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the beets, sweet potatoes, sweet peppers, parsley, carrots, and kale.
3. Add the salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil to the bowl, and toss the ingredients to coat them evenly.

abf7924ee4.gt:
Start by heating olive oil in a skillet over high heat.
When the pan is pretty hot, add the garlic and cook for 1 minute literally.
You dont want the garlic to burn.
We used 3 cloves of garlic, but we probably should have used 4.
I love that stuff!
Add the butter and stir to melt.
Then add the heavy cream.
Stir well and heat for 5 minutes.
Add the flour.
This will help thicken the sauce.
Although corn starch could be used instead, I tend to stay away from that unless I absolutely need to use it.
Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat to simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Then add the salt and pepper.
We used more pepper than salt, but thats entirely up to you.
Add the ground nutmeg, and stir.
At the end of the process, add the grated cheese, stir and then add in the parsley, which will add some green and liven up the dish.
Serve with pasta (we used tortellini) and enjoy!
abf7924ee4.pred:
Once-Every-Two-Months Garlic Cream Sauce:

Ingredients:
- 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
- 3 cloves Garlic, finely chopped
- 2 Tablespoons Butter
- 1-1/2 cup Heavy Cream
- 1/2 Tablespoon Flour
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- 2 pinches Ground Nutmeg
- 1/4 cups Parmesan Cheese, grated
- 3 Tablespoons Parsley, chopped

Instructions:
1. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the butter and cook until melted and combined with the garlic.
4. Add the heavy cream, flour, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.
5. Bring the mixture to a simmer, stirring occasionally.
6. Reduce the heat to low and let the sauce simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until it thickens slightly.
7. Stir in the grated Parmesan cheese and chopped parsley.
8. Serve the Once-Every-Two-Months Garlic Cream Sauce over pasta, rice, or any other dish of your choice.

This recipe is designed to be prepared and enjoyed every two months, as the garlic flavor is mild and not overpowering. The combination of the garlic, cream, and Parmesan cheese creates a rich, savory sauce that can be paired with a variety of dishes.

c33ce732c6.gt:
Add a pinch of salt to a pot of boiling water.
Cut the broccoli into small florets and boil for 40 seconds to a minute!
* Do not over boil and drain in a sieve.
Finely chop the bacon and garlic.
Pour a generous amount of oil into a pan and fry the bacon until it is brown and crispy.
Add the garlic.
When the garlic is fragrant, add the broccoli.
Sprinkle salt and pepper to taste.
Allow the flavours to blend and it's done!
c33ce732c6.pred:
To make a delicious Broccoli and Garlic Stir Fry dish, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients: Wash and chop the broccoli into bite-sized florets. Cut the bacon into thin strips. Chop the garlic clove into small pieces.

2. Heat the oil: In a large skillet or wok, heat the oil over medium heat.

3. Add the garlic and stir fry: Add the garlic to the hot oil and stir fry for about 1 minute, until fragrant.

4. Add the broccoli: Add the broccoli to the skillet and stir fry for about 5 minutes, until the broccoli is tender but still slightly crunchy.

5. Add the bacon: Add the bacon to the skillet and stir fry for another 2-3 minutes, until the bacon is cooked through and slightly crispy.

6. Season with salt and pepper: Season the stir fry with salt and pepper to taste.

7. Serve: Serve the Broccoli and Garlic Stir Fry immediately, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

This delicious dish combines the nutty flavor of broccoli with the rich, savory taste of bacon and the aromatic, pungent flavor of garlic. The olive oil provides a healthy, flavorful base for the dish, and the salt and pepper add a touch of seasoning to enhance the overall taste.

6d750b6d49.gt:
Heat pan, brown ground meat of choice
Finely chop peppers and onions.
Heat seperate pan with olive oil and saute peppers and onions with salt and pepper to taste.
Peel and dice Avocados.
Set aside.
Once peppers and onions are finished, combine meat, peppers, and avocados together.
Add 1 3/4 cups of Balsamic Vinaigrette to mixture and cook on low.
Add salt, black pepper, and garlic to taste.
Slice limes into wedges and set aside.
Finely dice Cilantro and set aside.
Cut heads off of Romaine lettuce and set aside.
Since we are using the lettuce as the wrap, the outer leaves typically work better.
Take two leaves of Romaine lettuce and spread hummus on the inside.
Add meat, pepper, onion, avocado, balsamic mix to wrap.
Finish off with Cilantro and Lime!
There are many things you can add to this such as rice, cheese, etc.
This is a healthier option we chose.
Enjoy!
6d750b6d49.pred:
1. First, wash and dry the lettuce thoroughly.
2. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
3. In a large bowl, mix the ground meat with the chopped onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, and yellow bell pepper. Season the mixture with salt, pepper, and any additional desired spices.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the chopped cilantro with the lime juice and zest.
5. Spread a layer of hummus on one side of each lettuce leaf.
6. Divide the meat mixture into equal portions, and place a portion on top of each hummus-covered lettuce leaf.
7. Roll up the lettuce leaves to enclose the meat, and secure the rolls with toothpicks or skewers.
8. Place the rolled lettuce wraps on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the meat is cooked through and the lettuce is slightly crispy.
9. Serve the Trav's Cilantro Lime Lettuce Wraps with a side of rice (optional) and a drizzle of balsamic vinaigrette.

[/INST]

102b043149.gt:
1.
Make the seasoned rice vinegar (sushi-su): Combine the vinegar, sugar, salt, and kombu (if you are using it) in a small saucepan.
Place the saucepan over medium-high heat and cook, stirring until the sugar and salt dissolve.
When the mixture is clear, remove the saucepan from the heat and set it aside to cool.
Discard the piece of kombu.
The vinegar can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 month.
2.
Make the sushi rice: Cook rice according to package directions.
Transfer freshly cooked hot rice to a wide shallow bowl.
Pour a small amount of the seasoned vinegar evenly over the rice.
Toss the rice by gently cutting into it vertically with your rice paddle (or spatula), and then lifting the rice and turning it over.
As you do this, fan the rice with a hand fan or piece of cardboard (or get someone to help you).
Add more of the seasoned vinegar and continue the cutting, folding, and fanning process.
Fanning the rice facilitates quick cooling, which gelatinizes the surface of the rice and gives a glossy finish to it.
Towards the end, taste the rice occasionally to decide how much of you seasoned vinegar you want to add.
3.
Cover the seasoned rice with a moist cloth or plastic wrap until ready to use.
102b043149.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the cooked rice, rice vinegar, granulated sugar, and salt. Mix well.
2. Add the dried seaweed (kombu) to the rice mixture and mix until the ingredients are well combined.
3. Optionally, you can add a small amount of soy sauce and sesame oil to enhance the flavor.
4. Cover the bowl and let the rice mixture sit for about 15-20 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
5. Serve the sushi rice as desired, either as a side dish or as the base for a variety of sushi rolls or dishes.

[/INST]

This recipe provides a simple and straightforward method for making sushi rice using a combination of ingredients commonly found in Japanese cuisine. The rice, vinegar, sugar, and salt are essential components that contribute to the flavor and texture of the sushi rice. The addition of the dried seaweed (kombu) adds a unique and savory depth to the dish, while the optional soy sauce and sesame oil can further enhance the flavor profile. The rice mixture can be served as a side dish or used as the base for a variety of sushi rolls or dishes, allowing for endless creativity and culinary exploration.

8872296451.gt:
Mix all ingredients and blend well.
Pour into a greased 2 1/2 quart casserole baking dish.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45 to 50 minutes or until light brown on top.
Note: 1/2 cup of shredded cheddar cheese may be sprinkled on top during last 10 minutes of baking (optional).
8872296451.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cornbread mix, sweet creamed corn, sweet whole kernel corn, and eggs.
3. Add the melted butter and sour cream to the mixture, stirring until well combined.

This delicious Emily's Cheesy Corn Casserole dish is ready to be enjoyed with your family and friends.

3fe0a3e464.gt:
1.
Bring a large saucepan of water to a boil.
Add soba; cook 3 minutes.
Add broccoli to pan; cook 3 minutes or until soba and broccoli are done.
Drain.2.
Heat a grill pan over medium-high heat.
Coat pan with cooking spray.
Sprinkle chicken evenly with salt and pepper.

Cut into 1-inch pieces.3.
