- Serve the Sweet Sesame Noodles with Chicken and Broccoli over a bed of rice or noodles

d070cb5476.gt:
In a small bowl, mix together rosemary, thyme, marjoram, salt, and pepper.
Rub herb mixture over tenderloin.
Place in a container, and pour hard cider over roast.
Add water until pork is completely submerged.
Cover, and refrigerate 6 to 8 hours, or overnight.
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Place roast in a roasting pan, elevated from the bottom, and pour marinade around the meat.
Bake for 1 hour in preheated oven.
In a large bowl, mix apples and onion.
Put mixture around and on top of roast.
Spoon brown sugar over entire pan evenly.
Place roast back into oven, and continue to cook for 1 hour more, or until meat reaches 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
Transfer roast, apples, and onion to a serving platter.
For the gravy, brown flour in a skillet.
Pour the marinade/drippings mixture into the skillet.
Stir in syrup.
Cook and stir over high heat until liquid has thickened to desired consistency.
Slice roast, and serve with gravy.
d070cb5476.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the pork tenderloin with salt and pepper, then coat it with the dried rosemary, thyme, and marjoram.
3. Heat the hard apple cider in a saucepan over medium heat until it comes to a simmer. Reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 10 minutes, or until it has reduced by half.
4. In a large bowl, combine the brown sugar, flour, and maple syrup.
5. Add the apple pieces and red onion to the bowl, tossing to coat evenly.
6. Place the pork tenderloin in a roasting pan, then pour the reduced apple cider mixture over it.
7. Roast the pork in the preheated oven for about 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
8. Remove the pork from the oven, let it rest for 10 minutes, then slice it thinly and serve.

[/INST]

4edb974667.gt:
Pre-heat broiler.
Prepare pan with non stick spray.
in a small bowl combine chili powder, paprika, cumin, pepper, & cinnamon.
Place steak on wax paper, sprinkle cinnamon mixture over both side of steak.
Let stand for 15 minutes.
Broil steal 5" from heat for approx 6 minutes on each side.
Slice steak against grain.
4oz per serving.
4edb974667.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Season the London Broil with the chili powder, paprika, black pepper, ground cinnamon, and cumin.
3. Place the London Broil on a baking sheet and cook for 12-15 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 120°F (59°C) for medium-rare.
4. Remove the London Broil from the oven and let it rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

fdb9200291.gt:
start by heating a large skillet with butter, garlic & olive oil cook on med heat about 1 minute add in diced serrano chili cook another minute.
add in shrimp & chopped lobster and all seasonings along with chili paste.
Cook 6-7 minutes till shrimp are nice & pink.
This is a spicy dish Enjoy!
fdb9200291.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the precooked chopped lobster tail, chili paste, hot shot black & red seasoning, course ground black pepper, garlic salt, and serrano chili. Mix well to ensure all ingredients are evenly distributed.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the olive oil, butter, minced garlic, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. Pour the olive oil and butter mixture over the lobster mixture, and stir to combine.
5. Add the shrimp to the bowl, and toss to coat the shrimp evenly with the lobster mixture.
6. Transfer the shrimp and lobster mixture to a baking dish, and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the shrimp is cooked through and the lobster is heated through.
7. Serve immediately, and enjoy your delicious Peppered Shrimp & Lobster!

fc990de78b.gt:
Cut leeks diagonally into thirds and then diagonally in half to form 6 triangular pieces from each leek.
Rinse under cold water; drain.
Melt margarine in a heavy skillet; add leeks.
Cook until lightly browned, stirring gently, approx 15 minutes.
Stir in the broth cover and simmer for 30 minutes or until golden and the broth has mostly evaporated.
fc990de78b.pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, melt the margarine or butter over medium heat.
2. Add the leeks, root ends down, and cook until they are tender but still slightly crisp, about 10-15 minutes.
3. Add the chicken broth, and bring the mixture to a boil.
4. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the leeks are very tender.
5. Season the Poireaux Braises with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve the Poireaux Braises hot, over rice, or with crusty bread.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

7106d13160.gt:
preheat oven to 350
cream together brown sugar, butter, milk and eggs
mix in bisquick
in pieces add bananas 1 at a time until incorporated
pour batter into greased bread pan or baking dish of choice (i use an 8x10 casserole because i dont have a bread pan)
bake at 350 for 45-55 minutes
remove from oven, cool for 5 minutes for easier removal from pan
7106d13160.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the melted butter, brown sugar, and milk. Whisk until smooth.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, whisking well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the dry ingredients: the bisquick, baking powder, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until just combined.
6. Fold in the mashed bananas and mix until well combined.
7. Grease a loaf pan with cooking spray or butter.
8. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan.
9. Bake for 60-70 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bread comes out clean.
10. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Follow these key steps, and you will have a delicious and moist Major's banana bread.

1ce32e6812.gt:
Toss lettuce with croutons and bacon in large bowl.
Add dressing and cheese; mix lightly.
Serve with lemon wedges.
1ce32e6812.pred:
1. Wash and dry the romaine lettuce thoroughly.
2. In a large bowl, combine the torn romaine lettuce, whole wheat croutons, and chopped turkey bacon.
3. In a small bowl, mix the Kraft Creamy Caesar Dressing and 2 tablespoons of the Kraft 100% Parmesan Light Grated Cheese.
4. Add the dressing mixture to the salad, tossing gently to coat the ingredients evenly.
5. Squeeze the lemon juice over the salad and toss again.
6. Serve the salad immediately, garnished with the remaining 2 tablespoons of the Kraft 100% Parmesan Light Grated Cheese.

Ingredients:
- 3 cups tightly packed torn romaine lettuce
- 1 cup whole wheat croutons
- 2 slices cooked turkey bacon, chopped
- 1/4 cup Kraft Creamy Caesar Dressing
- 2 Tbsp. Kraft 100% Parmesan Light Grated Cheese
- 1 lemon, cut into 8 wedges
- Safeway 4 ct For $5.00 thru 02/09.

92214874b7.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Cook lasagna in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
Drain.
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat; stir cream cheese into hot butter until it begins to melt, about 5 minutes.
Season with salt, onion powder, and black pepper.
Whisk warm milk gradually into cream cheese until smooth; stir in 1 1/2 cup Swiss cheese.
Bring sauce to a simmer, stirring constantly, until cheese has melted and sauce has thickened, 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Spread 3/4 cup of cheese sauce into bottom of a 9x9-inch baking dish.
Arrange 1/3 of the lasagna noodles over the sauce and spread half the cooked chicken and half the ham over the noodles.
Pour 1 cup sauce over chicken and ham.
Repeat layers starting with half the remaining lasagna noodles, remaining chicken, remaining ham, and 1 more cup of cheese sauce.
Finish by layering remaining lasagna noodles, remaining sauce, 1/2 cup Swiss cheese, and bread crumbs; sprinkle top with Italian seasoning.
Cover dish with aluminum foil.
Bake in the preheated oven until casserole is bubbling, about 25 minutes.
Remove foil and continue to bake until crumbs are browned, about 10 more minutes.
Let casserole stand 5 to 10 minutes before serving.
92214874b7.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the lasagna noodles, butter, and cream cheese. Mix well until the noodles are evenly coated.
3. Add the salt, onion powder, and black pepper to the mixture, and stir to combine.
4. Spread the mixture evenly over the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the warm milk, chicken, ham, Swiss cheese, bread crumbs, Italian seasoning, and salt and pepper to taste.
6. Pour the chicken and ham mixture evenly over the noodle mixture in the baking dish.
7. Bake the lasagna in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the lasagna from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

This cooking tutorial provides a step-by-step guide for preparing a delicious Chicken Cordon Bleu Lasagna. The essential ingredients include lasagna noodles, butter, cream cheese, salt, onion powder, black pepper, Swiss cheese, warm milk, chicken, ham, bread crumbs, Italian seasoning, and milk. By following these instructions, you can create a mouth-watering dish that will be enjoyed by everyone.

24452e5a07.gt:
Stir the cream cheese, sour cream, jalapeno pepper, salsa verde, red salsa, onion, lime juice, and chili powder seasoning together in a bowl until well blended.
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.
24452e5a07.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a medium bowl, mix the cream cheese, sour cream, and salsa verde.
3. Add the minced jalapeno pepper, red salsa, minced onion, and fresh lime juice. Mix well.
4. Season the mixture with the Mexican-style chili powder with lime.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the mixture is hot and bubbly.
6. Serve the TJ's Creamy Salsa immediately, and enjoy!

fec819225d.gt:
Bring the orange juice, soy sauce, chicken stock, and orange zest to a boil in a saucepan.
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until the sauce has reduced to half of its original volume, about 30 minutes.
fec819225d.pred:
1. Wash and peel the oranges, and then juice them.
2. In a saucepan, combine the juice from the oranges, soy sauce, and chicken broth.
3. Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
4. Reduce the heat to low and let the sauce simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and reduced by half.
5. Stir in the grated orange zest.
6. Taste and adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper, if needed.
7. Serve the Orange-Soy Sauce Reduction over your favorite dish, such as noodles, rice, or vegetables.

Enjoy your delicious Orange-Soy Sauce Reduction!

a7cd3b464c.gt:
Heat oil in large saucepan or Dutch oven.
Add garlic, ginger, lemon peel and hot pepper flakes.
Cook gently until very fragrant.
Add broth, soy sauce and lemon juice and bring to boil.
Add carrots.
Reduce heat and simmer gently for 15 minutes.
Add scallops, shrimp, sesame oil and green onions, Cook for just a few minutes, or until seafood is barely cooked.
Serve sprinkled with cilantro.
a7cd3b464c.pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and gingerroot, stirring constantly for about 1 minute, or until fragrant.
3. Add the lemon peel and red pepper flakes, stirring for another minute.
4. Pour in the chicken broth, soy sauce, and lemon juice, and bring the mixture to a boil.
5. Add the carrots, scallops, and shrimp to the pot, stirring to combine.
6. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the seafood is cooked through.
7. Add the sesame oil, green onions, and cilantro, stirring to combine.
8. Serve the Seafood Soup hot, garnished with additional green onions and cilantro, if desired.

This Seafood Soup With Ginger Broth is a delicious and comforting dish that can be enjoyed with friends and family. The combination of flavors from the ginger, garlic, and soy sauce, along with the tender seafood, creates a satisfying and satisfying meal.

12f49a25e6.gt:
Take the meat out of the fridge at least 30 minutes before cooking and pound it to tenderize.
Use your hands to re-shape the meat back into it's original thickness and season with salt and pepper.
In a pan that is hot enough to cause the beef fat to smoke, cook one side of the meat on a strong heat until browned.
Flip it over and cook the other side for 1 minute.
Then flip over again and cook for another 1 minute to finish.
Pour over your choice of sauce and serve.
I recommend this steak sauce,.
By the way, this is the dinner that I made for my husband's birthday.
12f49a25e6.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Season the beef with salt and pepper on all sides.
3. Heat the beef tallow or vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once the skillet is hot, sear the beef for 2-3 minutes on each side to create a nice crust.
4. Remove the beef from the skillet and place it on a baking tray.
5. Place the beef in the preheated oven and cook for 10-12 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 120°F (59°C) for medium-rare.
6. Remove the beef from the oven and let it rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing it into your desired thickness.
7. Prepare your chosen sauce, either by mixing it with the beef juices in the skillet or by making a separate sauce.
8. Serve the beef with the sauce on the side.

This guide provides a simple and straightforward method for cooking a delicious and tender steak using the ingredients provided. The key to achieving a great steak lies in the proper preparation and cooking techniques. By following these steps, you can create a mouthwatering and satisfying meal for yourself or your guests.

0979acfd51.gt:
Slice the sausages diagonally.
Heat the oil in a pan, and fry the sausage until browned.
Sprinkle on a generous amount of cracked black pepper.
The sausages are done when they are close to becoming burnt.
If you have the time, top them with a sunny-side-up egg.
The creaminess of the egg yolk is divine.
0979acfd51.pred:
To prepare a delicious My Hubby's Beer Snack, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).

2. In a small bowl, mix the cracked black pepper with the oil.

3. Cut the fish sausages into bite-sized pieces.

4. Place the fish sausages in a single layer on a baking sheet.

5. Drizzle the pepper-oil mixture over the fish sausages, ensuring even coverage.

6. Roast the fish sausages in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.

7. Remove the fish sausages from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.

8. Serve the fried fish sausages with the accompanying ingredients, such as a cold beer, for a delicious and satisfying snack.

Enjoy your My Hubby's Beer Snack!

73d8122a4e.gt:
In food processor, mix all ingredients until you have a lumpy paste.
Put in a saucepan (I used a small saucepan and it was perfect).
Bring to boil and let simmer slowly about 15 minutes.
Add salt to taste.
Pour in a jar and let cool.
It's good up to one month in the fridge.
73d8122a4e.pred:
To prepare a delicious Hot Pepper Paste Like Sambal Oelek dish, follow these steps:

1. Chop the red bell pepper into small pieces and remove the seeds.
2. Slice the long hot red pepper into thin strips.
3. Peel the garlic cloves.
4. In a large bowl, mix the chopped red bell pepper, sliced long hot red pepper, and minced garlic.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the white vinegar, sugar, and salt.
6. Pour the vinegar mixture over the pepper mixture and stir to combine.
7. Allow the mixture to sit for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
8. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
9. Store the Hot Pepper Paste Like Sambal Oelek in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to a week.

This Hot Pepper Paste Like Sambal Oelek dish is a versatile condiment that can be used as a topping for various dishes, such as stir-fries, noodles, or even as a base for dipping sauces. The combination of the red bell pepper, long hot red pepper, and garlic creates a spicy, tangy, and slightly sweet flavor profile that is perfect for adding depth and complexity to your favorite recipes.

4368d128b9.gt:
Brown the ground beef using the seasonings i have listed to flavor the meat.
(I usually add these seasonings to taste since i rarely measure them, so the measurements i have listed are a guideline) Add 1/4 cup of water and let meat and seasonings simmer until liquid is mostly cooked off.
You don't want it soupy.
Drain on paper toweling.
Clean lettuce, tear into bite sized pieces.
Toss with all of the rest of the ingredients adding about 1/2 cup of the dressing and tossing again well.
Serve with salsa and sour cream on the side if desired.
I list Doritos here because, let's face it, they're good!
But when I have time, i like to cut up corn tortillas into wedges, fry in a bit of oil, and season with Mexican style spices.
4368d128b9.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, chili powder, cumin, Mexican oregano, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper. Mix well to combine.
3. Form the beef mixture into small meatballs.
4. Place the meatballs on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat. Bake the meatballs in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are cooked through and no longer pink in the center.
5. While the meatballs are baking, prepare the salad by combining the iceberg lettuce, chopped tomatoes, and onion in a large bowl.
6. Once the meatballs are cooked, let them cool for a few minutes before adding them to the salad.
7. Add the shredded cheese, Dorito Nacho Chips, and diced avocado to the salad.
8. Toss the salad gently to combine all the ingredients.
9. Serve the Leah's Taco Salad immediately, and enjoy!

[/INST]

7112e492e4.gt:
Heat oil and slowly cook onion, carrot and celery over medium heat for approx 8 min until soft.
Add zest of lemon and rice.
Stir.
Add chicken broth and boil on low for approx 20 min until vegetables are tender.
Add peas, chicken, lemon juice and parsley 5 minutes before serving.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
7112e492e4.pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the carrots and celery, and cook for another 5 minutes, or until they are tender but not mushy.
3. Add the rice to the pot, stirring to coat it with the vegetables. Cook for 2 minutes, or until the rice is heated through.
4. Add the chicken broth, peas, and lemon zest to the pot. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
5. While the soup is cooking, prepare the lemon juice mixture by combining the lemon juice, parsley, salt, and pepper in a small bowl.
6. After the soup has cooked for 20 minutes, add the lemon juice mixture to the pot. Stir to combine, and cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the flavors are fully melded.
7. Serve the Chicken Lemon Soup W/Rice and Vegetables hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

[/INST]

c5696489b7.gt:
Soften cream cheese and mix well with sour cream, cheese and salsa.
Make sure to drain the salsa if it has to much liquid.
Garnish with chopped tomato or cilantro.
c5696489b7.pred:
To cook a delicious Salsa & Cream Cheese Dip, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese, sour cream, and Mexican blend cheese. Mix well until smooth and creamy.
2. Add the chopped tomatoes (or cilantro) to the mixture, and stir to combine.
3. If desired, add a small amount of salsa to the mixture to enhance the flavor.
4. Season the dip with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Serve the dip immediately, either as a standalone appetizer or as a topping for tortilla chips, pita chips, or vegetables.

This Salsa & Cream Cheese Dip is a delicious and easy-to-prepare appetizer or snack that can be customized with various ingredients to suit your taste preferences.

11f49e3f17.gt:
In a bowl combine pecans and wafers and mix together.
Sift in icing sugar and cocoa powder and ensure it is blended well.
Add corn syrup and rum.
Stir.
Let chill for at least 30 minutes.
Take a teaspoonful and roll into a ball.
I rolled them in chocolate sprinkles because that just seemed so rum-ball-like but you could dip them in chocolate or roll them in icing sugar or cocoa.
Place in the refrigerator to chill.
These can be kept for 2 weeks in an airtight container.
Serve at room temperature.
11f49e3f17.pred:
To cook a delicious Banana Rum Balls dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the finely chopped toasted pecans, vanilla wafers, and icing sugar.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the cocoa powder, light corn syrup, and banana rum until well combined.
4. Add the cocoa mixture to the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
5. Roll the mixture into small balls and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
6. Bake the balls in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are set and slightly firm to the touch.
7. Allow the balls to cool for a few minutes, then roll them in the chocolate sprinkles or chocolate, if desired.
8. Serve the Banana Rum Balls immediately or store them in an airtight container for later enjoyment.

These Banana Rum Balls are a delicious and easy-to-make dessert that combines the flavors of bananas, rum, and chocolate. The use of finely chopped toasted pecans and vanilla wafers adds a crunchy texture to the dish, while the icing sugar and cocoa powder provide a sweet and slightly bitter contrast. The light corn syrup balances the flavors and helps to create a smooth, creamy texture. The combination of these ingredients results in a delightful dessert that is perfect for sharing with friends and family.

e3bc640873.gt:
In a mixing bowl beat eggs, sugar, corn syrup and vanilla.
Add butter and mix well.
Stir in pecans and chocolate chips.
Pour into pie shell.
Bake at 350 F for 50-55 minutes or until set.
It is important for it to be set *before* you remove it from the oven.
It will not set afterward if you haven't baked it long enough.
Serve with ice cream if desired.
e3bc640873.pred:
To prepare a delicious Chocolate Chip Pecan Pie, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, sugar, and vanilla extract. Whisk until smooth.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, whisking well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the chopped pecans, semi-sweet chocolate chips, and a pinch of salt.
5. Pour the butter mixture into the unbaked pastry shells.
6. Sprinkle the pecan mixture evenly over the butter mixture.
7. Bake the pie for 45-50 minutes, or until the filling is set and the edges are golden brown.
8. Allow the pie to cool completely before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate Chip Pecan Pie with vanilla ice cream, if desired, for a delightful dessert experience.

7bf3659a3a.gt:
Place tomatoes, onions, celery, parsley and bay leaves in a large pot and cook, covered, on low heat for 1 to 2 hours, until quite soft and fragrant.
Remove bay leaves and blend tomato mixture in batches in a food processor or blender, then run through a sieve and return juice to pot.
Stir in salt, sugar, seasoning salt, pepper and garlic salt.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and cook, uncovered, 1 to 2 hours, until thickened.
7bf3659a3a.pred:
1. Begin by washing the tomatoes, onions, and celery thoroughly.
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat.
3. Add the chopped onions and sauté until they are soft and translucent.
4. Add the chopped tomatoes and sauté for a few minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the chopped celery and continue to cook for a few more minutes.
6. Add the chopped parsley, bay leaves, salt, sugar, seasoning salt, black pepper, and garlic salt. Stir to combine.
7. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
8. Remove the bay leaves and discard.
9. Using an immersion blender, puree the soup until smooth. Alternatively, you can transfer the soup to a blender and blend until smooth.
10. Return the soup to the pot and reheat over low heat.
11. Serve the Tomato Soup II hot, garnished with a dollop of sour cream or a sprinkle of fresh parsley, if desired.

[/INST]

2989cc6886.gt:
Dredge the well drained oysters in some starch and toss them very gently in a bowl till the liquid turns dark.
Wash out the darkened liquid with cold water until the water becomes clear.
Drain well.
Place the oysters between paper towels and dry.
Coat the oysters lightly with some flour (not listed in the ingredients above).
Heat some salad oil in a non-stick frying pan, add garlic, stir fry till they become golden over medium heat.
Add oysters cook until golden.
Turn over, add the Sake and cover.
Cook for 2 to 3 minutes over low heat.
Add and melt the butter.
Add soy sauce and green onion and stir to coat the oysters with sauce.
Serve hot.
Washing oysters with starch to purify the taste is a method I learned from Chinese recipe while traditionalist Japanese chefs use graded Daikon radish juice.
Buttered ride recipe is available in my blog.
http://kcocoangela.blog132.fc2.com/blog-entry-6.html
2989cc6886.pred:
To prepare the Pan fried Oyster with Green Onion Sauce, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Wash and clean the oysters thoroughly.
- Chop the green onions finely.
- Crush the garlic clove.
- Melt the starch in a small bowl.
- Heat the cooking oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat.
- Add the chopped garlic and stir-fry for a few seconds until fragrant.
- Add the melted starch and stir-fry until it thickens slightly.
- Add the sake or white wine, and stir-fry until it evaporates.
- Add the soy sauce and stir-fry until the sauce thickens slightly.
- Add the chopped green onions and stir-fry until they are slightly wilted.

2. Prepare the oysters:
- Drain the oysters and pat them dry with a paper towel.
- Season the oysters with salt and pepper to taste.

3. Cook the oysters:
- Heat a non-stick pan or skillet over medium heat.
- Add the oysters and cook them until they are cooked through, about 2-3 minutes per side.
- Remove the oysters from the pan and set aside.

4. Assemble the dish:
- Add the cooking oil and butter to the pan, and stir-fry the green onion sauce until it thickens slightly.
- Add the cooked oysters to the pan, and toss them in the sauce until they are coated evenly.
- Serve the Pan fried Oyster with Green Onion Sauce immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Pan fried Oyster with Green Onion Sauce!

b9d49b2792.gt:
Marinade lamb in lemon juice, oil, garlic and chopped rosemary for at least an hour.
Combine lemon, onion, garlic and rosemary sprigs in a baking dish and place lamb rack with marinade on top.
Bake at 180 C for 35-40 mins or until cooked to your preference.
Remove lamb to a plate & keep warm.
Discard pan ingredients but reserve pan juices.
Heat pan juices and blend in flour.
Cook for 1 minute.
Gradually blend in stock and wine until smooth.
Cook stirring until sauce boils and thickens, Season to taste.
Serve roast, sliced into cutlets with sauce and vegetables of your choice.
b9d49b2792.pred:
To cook a delightful Lemon and Garlic Lamb Rack dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).

2. Season the lamb rack with salt and pepper.

3. In a large bowl, combine the lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, rosemary, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Mix well.

4. Place the lamb rack in the bowl with the marinade, making sure it is evenly coated. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.

5. Heat the oven to 475°F (245°C).

6. Remove the lamb from the marinade and pat it dry with paper towels.

7. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and cook until it is softened, about 3-4 minutes.

8. Add the garlic and cook for another 1-2 minutes, or until fragrant.

9. Add the lamb rack to the skillet, making sure it is evenly distributed. Cook for about 10-12 minutes, or until the lamb is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).

10. Remove the lamb from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into individual pieces.

11. In a large saucepan, combine the flour and vegetable stock. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens.

12. Add the red wine to the saucepan and stir to combine. Cook for a few more minutes, or until the sauce has thickened to your desired consistency.

13. Serve the lamb rack on a platter, accompanied by the rosemary sprig and a side of the sauce. Enjoy your delicious Lemon and Garlic Lamb Rack dish!

128f70ff9b.gt:
Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
Heat the olive oil in a large, heavy pot over medium-high heat.
Stir in the onion, garlic, and serrano chili; cook until the onion has softened, about 1 minute.
Add the chicken, and continue to cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in the cilantro, peas, corn, and red pepper; cook for 1 minute.
Pour in the chicken broth, potatoes, and rice.

f0e5ecb2aa.gt:

Set aside.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease a muffin pan or use paper muffin cups.

Add in the eggs one at a time and mix until well incorporated.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cream of tartar and nutmeg.
Add the flour mixture and the sour cream alternately to the egg-butter mixture in multiple additions.

Scrape the bowl occasionally.

Roll the muffin around in the mixture until it is covered completely in cinnamon sugar.
Place muffin into muffin tin.

Bake them for approximately 20-22 minutes or until they are golden brown.

7278a1d6dc.gt:
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.

Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
Add sliced mushrooms, and cook 5 minutes, stirring constantly.
Sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon salt.
Serve ragout over mushrooms.

).

Place the chocolate-covered pretzels on a wire rack or a plate to allow the chocolate to set. This will help the chocolate harden and create a smooth, shiny coating.

836615e74d.gt:

Store in the refrigerator until ready to use.

2. In a small bowl, mix the granulated sugar and seedless tamarind paste until well combined.

3. Carefully pour the hot chile mixture into the bowl with the sugar mixture, stirring to combine.

4. Simmer the mixture for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the sugar has dissolved and the syrup has reached the desired consistency.

5. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the syrup cool for a few minutes.

6. Strain the syrup through a fine-mesh sieve to remove any remaining chile pieces or solids.

7. Transfer the cooled syrup to a clean, dry saucepan and heat it over low heat for a few minutes, stirring occasionally, to ensure that the sugar has fully dissolved and the syrup is smooth and clear.

8. Store the syrup in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks or in the freezer for up to 3 months.

9. Use the syrup as desired, such as drizzling it over desserts, marinating meat, or incorporating it into various recipes that call for a sweet and tangy sauce.

ecab1caf21.pred:
1. First, prepare the shrimp by peeling and deveining them.
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
4. Add the crushed red pepper flakes and cook for another minute.
5. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until they are pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes.
6. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside.
7. In the same skillet, add the cognac or brandy and cook until it has reduced by half.
8. Add the diced tomatoes, drained, and cook until they are heated through.
9. Add the sugar and cook until it has dissolved.
10. Add the cooked shrimp back to the skillet and toss everything together.
11. Cook for a few minutes until the sauce has thickened and coated the shrimp.
12. Cook the linguine according to package instructions, then drain and toss it with the shrimp and sauce.
13. Serve the Shrimp Fra Diavolo With Linguine immediately, garnished with fresh parsley.

[/INST]

9a2ed3c6dc.gt:
Wisk all ingredients together until combined.
Do not overstir.
Heat lightly greased griddle or skillet over medium heat.
Pour or scoop batter onto griddle, apx 1/4 cup per pancake.
Brown on both sides.
Serve hot!
9a2ed3c6dc.pred:
[/INST]

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pancake mix, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice, and egg.
2. Gradually add the milk, vegetable oil, and vinegar, mixing until well combined.
3. Stir in the pumpkin puree until the batter is smooth and well-blended.
4. Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat.
5. Pour the batter onto the pan, making sure to spread it evenly.
6. Cook the pancakes until they are golden brown on both sides and the edges are slightly crispy.
7. Serve the pancakes warm, garnished with a sprinkle of additional pumpkin pie spice if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Easy Pumpkin Pancakes!

6f4d1ffc76.gt:
In la deep pot, bring water, a pinch of salt and oil to a boil.
Rinse rice a couple of times.
Add to boiling water.
Reduce heat to low, cover and cook until water evaporates (1520 minutes).
Fluff with fork, let it cool to room temperature or refrigerate until ready to use.
When ready to serve, add chopped cilantro and lime juice.
Season with salt.
6f4d1ffc76.pred:
1. In a saucepan, combine the water and vegetable oil over medium heat. Bring to a boil.
2. Add the rice to the saucepan, stirring to ensure it is evenly coated with the liquid.
3. Reduce the heat to low, cover the saucepan, and let the rice simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the water has been absorbed.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it sit, covered, for a few minutes.
5. Stir in the chopped cilantro and lime juice, squeezed from the ripe lime. Season with salt as needed.
6. Serve the Cilantro Lime Rice hot.

[/SYS]

6b1de00aa7.gt:
Boil rigatoni according to package directions.
While pasta is cooking, mix ricotta, egg, garlic powder, Italian seasoning, and red pepper for the minicotti filling.
Season with salt.
You could add minced, sauteed mushrooms or chopped spinach here if you wish.
I season the filling a bit more than I would a normal manicotti; you want this one little bite to have some punch.
When rigatoni is al dente, drain and place pasta in cool water to stay soft while you work.
Place filling in an icing bag with a small tip, or a smaller plastic bag with a tiny corner nipped off will work just fine.
Pipe filling into rigatoni.
I like to fill the pasta halfway from one side and halfway from the other.
Place filled minicotti in a baking dish lightly sprayed with cooking spray.
Top minicotti lightly with pasta sauce.
Sprinkle lightly with Parmesan.
Bake at 350 F for 15-20 minutes.
Let sit at room temperature for 5 minutes before serving.
Enjoy!
6b1de00aa7.pred:
1. Cook the Rigatoni according to package instructions until al dente.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked Rigatoni, Ricotta Cheese, and egg.
3. Season the mixture with garlic powder, Italian seasoning, red pepper flakes, and salt.
4. Gradually add the pasta sauce to the bowl, mixing until well combined.
5. If the mixture is too dry, add a splash of water or milk to achieve the desired consistency.
6. Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish or a casserole dish.
7. Sprinkle the top with grated Parmesan cheese.
8. Bake the Minicotti in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for about 25-30 minutes or until the top is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
9. Serve the Minicotti hot.

[/INST]

789488866b.gt:
Mix all wet ingredients and beat until everything is well incorporated.
Mix all dry ingredients.
Then add them to wet mixture a little at a time until everything is completely mix.
Divide mixture equally and pour in two loaf pans.
Bake between 55-60 minutes for 350F.
789488866b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded carrots, shredded coconut, golden raisins, and canola oil.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the plain yogurt, eggs, vanilla extract, brown sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, baking soda, and nutmeg.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
5. Gradually add the all-purpose flour to the mixture, stirring until the dough comes together.
6. Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan, and bake for 1 hour or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
7. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Carrot Coconut Bread!

43e0e4b926.gt:
Bring cream cheese and mozzarella to room temperature or just [slightly] warm in microwave.
Mix everything together in a bowl.
Except for anything that says, "reserve half."
Or, your purple onions, sweet chili sauce, hot mustard, wontons and oil in a bowl.
Look closely at the ingredient section for clarification.
Smear your cream cheese spread evenly atop of your pre-made crust[s].
Smear a thin layer of sweet chili sauce atop the cream cheese.
This chili sauce can seriously over dominate your pizza - flavor wise - so don't overdue it.
Unless of course, you prefer it as a primary flavor.
Lightly smear your hot mustard to taste and evenly sprinkle on your remaining crab meat.
Add your thin sliced purple and your reserved green onions, red pepper flakes and mozzarella cheese.
Thin slice your wontons and fry in hot oil for about 30 seconds - just until they're just slightly browned and crispy.
They'll brown more as they dry.
Don't over fry.
Place on clean napkins to drain oil then, place them on your pizza.
Bake on a pizza stone or cookie sheet at 425 for 25 minutes.
Or, until crusts are browned and cheese is bubbling.
Slice and serve hot with ice cold beers.
43e0e4b926.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. Prepare the pizza crusts by rolling out the dough and transferring it to a pizza stone or a baking sheet.
3. Spread the mozzarella cheese evenly over the crusts.
4. Spread the Philadelphia Cream Cheese over the mozzarella cheese.
5. Add the cooked and drained crab meat over the cream cheese.
6. Spread the Sweet Chili Sauce over the crab meat.
7. Sprinkle the reserved Parmesan cheese, green onions, and red pepper flakes over the pizza.
8. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is bubbly.
9. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
10. Cut the pizza into slices and serve.

Enjoy your mouthwatering Mike's Crab Rangoon Pizza!

cb7e6bedc8.gt:
Preheat oven to 180C.
Melt the butter in the microwave.
Mix all the ingredients together.
Pour the mixture into a baking dish and cook for 45 minutes.
cb7e6bedc8.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
3. Add the flour and baking powder to the creamed mixture, and mix until well combined.
4. Add the drained crushed pineapple to the mixture, and stir until well combined.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
6. Bake the pudding in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the pudding comes out clean.
7. Allow the pudding to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once the pudding is fully cooled, dust it with powdered sugar and serve.

Enjoy your delicious Pineapple pudding!

49ba66ed9e.gt:
In a large saucepan, heat the butter or margarine and oil over medium heat.
Add the chicken and brown lightly on each side.
Once the chicken breasts are cooked (the juices should run clear) remove them from the pan and set aside.
Add the shallots and the chicken stock to the pan.
Simmer for 3 minutes.
Add the raspberry vinegar.
Bring all to a boil and simmer, stirring, until the mixture thickens.
Stir in the cream and return the chicken to the pan.
Heat for 1 minute to warm the chicken, turning the chicken pieces to coat with the sauce.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
49ba66ed9e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the butter and vegetable oil together.
3. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
4. In a large skillet, heat the butter and oil mixture over medium heat. Add the minced shallots and cook until they are soft and fragrant, about 2 minutes.
5. Add the chicken stock and raspberry vinegar to the skillet, stirring to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 10 minutes, or until the liquid has reduced by half.
7. Add the heavy whipping cream to the skillet, stirring to combine.
8. Increase the heat to medium-high, and let the mixture come to a boil.
9. Reduce the heat to low, and let the mixture simmer for about 5 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
10. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper to taste.
11. Place the chicken breasts on a baking sheet, and pour the sauce over them.
12. Bake the chicken breasts in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
13. Remove the chicken breasts from the oven, and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Raspberry Vinegar Chicken Breasts!

af9b2fab3d.gt:
Add your garlic powder, onion powder, pepper and celery to your cut up meat
Heat oil in a big pot (I like using my dutch oven type) add your cubed seasoned beef, start browning over med high heat
When you have some good color, add the water, and the beef bouillon and bring to a boil and cook for about 2hrs, you want it to simmer, a low boil here, cover with a lid
Add tomato sauce, baby carrots, potatoes, continue cooking at a low boil, stirring occasionally for about 1 & 1/2hrs, keep lid on
Add your geen beans ( add 1 can beans and the liquid from can , the other can of beans you need to drain and just add the beans), and the corn, let cook about 30mins longer
af9b2fab3d.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To make Tinklee's Family Stew, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
2. Add the garlic powder, onion powder, and black pepper, stirring to combine. Cook for about 1 minute, or until fragrant.
3. Add the beef stew meat and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
4. Pour in the water, beef bouillon, tomato sauce, and any remaining seasonings. Stir to combine.
5. Add the baby carrots, potatoes, and green beans. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer.
6. Cover the pot and let the stew simmer for about 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the vegetables are tender.
7. Add the frozen corn and continue to simmer for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the corn is cooked through.
8. Season the stew with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Serve the Tinklee's Family Stew hot, over rice or with crusty bread.

[/INST]

e0704be51f.gt: Add all ingredients together and blend until combined
e0704be51f.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients, which include 2 cups of cherries, pitted, 1 banana, peeled, 1 cup of yogurt, 1 cup of ice, and 1 tablespoon of honey.
2. In a blender, combine the cherries, banana, yogurt, ice, and honey.
3. Blend the ingredients until they are smooth and creamy.
4. Optionally, you can add a splash of milk or almond milk for a thicker consistency, or a pinch of salt for extra flavor.
5. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy your delicious Cherry Banana Smoothie.

This smoothie is not only easy to make but also delicious and nutritious. The combination of cherries, banana, yogurt, ice, and honey creates a refreshing and satisfying drink that is perfect for a hot summer day or as a healthy snack.

d1c38e95f4.gt:
Note: You will also need a Babycakes cake pop machine.
For the donuts: Preheat your Babycakes cake pop machine.
In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt.
Then add eggs, maple syrup, and vanilla.
Mix well.
Before adding apple pie filling, run a knife through the large chunks of apples to chop them into smaller pieces.
Then add to mixture and mix until all apples are incorporated.
Then add the milk.
The mixture will be on the thick side.
Pour 1 tablespoon of donut mixture into each reservoir of your preheated Babycakes cake pop machine.
Bake for 4 minutes, then remove and place on a plate or cooling rack to cool off.
For the glaze: In a small bowl mix together powdered sugar, vanilla, and milk.
You want the consistency to be runny, not thick.
Dip each donut in the mixture and flip it around by hand or with a fork until the whole donut is covered.
Then place back on the cooling rack until the glaze is dry.
For the coating: In a small bowl combine the powdered sugar and cinnamon.
Dip each donut into the mixture and roll around until all covered.
Then place finished donuts in an airtight container until ready to eat.
Oh, who are you kidding, go ahead and start eating!
d1c38e95f4.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt. Whisk to combine.
2. Add the eggs, maple syrup, pure vanilla extract, and apple pie filling to the dry ingredients. Mix until just combined.
3. Gradually add the milk, mixing until the dough comes together.
4. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch.
5. Cut out donut holes using a donut cutter or a round cookie cutter.
6. Place the donut holes on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake the donut holes in a preheated oven at 375°F (190°C) for 8-10 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
8. While the donut holes are baking, mix the powdered sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl.
9. Once the donut holes are done, let them cool for a few minutes on the baking sheet.
10. Dip the cooled donut holes into the sugar mixture, and then roll them in the cinnamon-sugar mixture to coat evenly.
11. Serve the Apple Pie Donut Holes warm or at room temperature.

[/INST]

These Apple Pie Donut Holes are a delicious and unique twist on traditional donuts. The combination of the apple pie filling, cinnamon, and powdered sugar creates a warm, sweet, and fruity flavor that is perfect for a special treat or a fun dessert option. The step-by-step instructions ensure that you can easily make these delectable donut holes at home, and the timing and ingredient measurements ensure that you have the perfect balance of flavors and textures.

3d07a1a906.gt:
Halve avocados and remove pit.
Roll limes or heat in microwave for 10 seconds to get juices flowing.
Halve the limes.
Rub the avocado halves gently with 1/2 lime to retard the browning.
Juice limes into small bowl and mix with sugar, chili powder and salt using a fork or small whisk.
Add extra-virgin olive oil in a slow stream while mixing dressing.
Pour dressing into the cavities of avocados, distributing it equally and serve.
Garnish with chives or cilantro as an optional garnish.
3d07a1a906.pred:
To make a delicious Chili Lime Avocados dish, follow these steps:

1. Rinse the avocadoes and remove the pit.
2. Cut the avocadoes in half lengthwise and remove the seed.
3. In a small bowl, mix the sugar, chili powder, and salt.
4. Drizzle the olive oil over the avocado halves, and then sprinkle the spice mixture evenly over the top.
5. Gently toss the avocado halves to coat them evenly with the spices.
6. If desired, garnish with chopped chives or cilantro.
7. Serve immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

This dish is a simple yet flavorful way to enjoy avocados, with the addition of a chili lime kick that enhances the taste. The combination of the creamy avocado, tangy lime, and spicy chili powder creates a delightful contrast of flavors that will surely impress your taste buds.
